story:
So I wanted to make a set of 3 pins depicting Mametchi, Kuchipatchi and Maskutchi.

And an iron on patch of a actual Tamagotchi device that will perfectly frame the pins.

But to make this real I need your help!

These are basically preorders. Which means this funding campaign will be pretty straight forward. I don't want to get bogged down in too many stretch goals for stickers and t-shirts or whatever. So...

There's just 2 stretch goals:

$1000 AUD

2 new patch colours to choose from!

Surveys for which patch you want will be sent out after the campaign has concluded.

$2000 AUD

Die cut vinyl sticker packed with every order!

And that's it!

I hope you'll consider ordering some pins but if you can't right now, don't worry because any remaining pins and patches will be sold online at a later date.

story:
Join us to bring to life new release of AUGUSTE REYMOND top quality Swiss made watch  Orbital Moon with patented moonphase module (this is new design variation of famous Orbital Moon wich was released in 2016), with blue or black PVD and rose gold color PVD finishing:

And new edition of Silver Orbital Moon for this campaign ( the same as 1st release 2016):

TECHNICAL DESCRIPTION  

Swiss made quartz movement AR.L706.1  is equipped with Orbital Moon module, created and patented by Auguste Reymond. The moon index revolves on it's orbit around the Earth index on a dial, indicating a moon's phase ( with a scale of a moon's day, it's more comfortable for a lovers of fishing).

- battery autonomy 44 months  

- Solid sapphire scratchproof crystal  

- Top quality stainless steel case 

- Hightech PVD case coating in blue, black or rose gold color  

- Water resistance 8 bar (80m/266ft)  

- Functions:  date, week day, moon phases, hours, minutes, seconds  

- Calf leather strap with croco imitation, width 22/20 mm

- stainless steel butterfly clasp  

- Luxury walnut wooden box

Dimensions:

-  case diameter 42 mm (48mm from lug to lug), thickness 9,2mm

- overall lenght case+strap 245mm, maximal useful (over a wrist) length 235mm (from an end hole in a strap to a holder in a clasp)

The 1st edition 2016 of Blue Orbital Moon (steel&blue PVD finishing):

 

 

About this project

AUGUSTE REYMOND is traditional Swiss watchmaking company with the history since 1898, located in Tramelan, Switzerland. Throughout our long history, the phases of the moon were a characteristic sign of Auguste Reymond watch design. We invite you to participate in our project and together bring to life the new Cotton Club watches with "Orbital Moon" module, created and patented by AUGUSTE REYMOND.

We are the company with professional team, who produce swiss made watches many years, using original swiss movements and top quality watch components. For this project we offer the  new models of our famous collection Cotton Club Orbital Moon. The first serie of this collection was released earlier in 2016, and some of the models of 1st serie you can see in our official online store or in our video on our Vimeo channel  https://vimeo.com/augustereymond1898 . 

This project was successfully funded by 174% at Kickstarter, nevetherless we have a reason to continue our campaign here at Indiegogo. Our dream is to gather a community of watch lovers under the roof of Auguste Reymond Club to create and launch an interesting new watch models that can not be realized in the usual commercial way. We offer with our rewards a membership in AR Club, which will provide exclusive privileges for its members.

OPTIONAL: EXTRA LEATHER STRAP (NO CLASP) 35 euro, an available is blue or black color straps

OPTIONAL:  EXTRA BUTTERFLY STEEL CLASP 53 euro

story:
THE COW FUNDER INITIATIVE: HOW IT WORKS

It’s simple, really. You make a pledge, a family gets a cow, we make the bags, and the world gets better.

THE BASICS
We need to raise €50,000 to contribute 250 cows to 250 struggling families in rural villages Bagatipara and Chargat, Bangladesh. Pledge €250 to contribute a cow to a family, or buy an exclusive initiative bag or accessory where all profits go to contributing more cows to more families.

THE COW
Just one cow can be the difference between simply surviving to thriving for a struggling family in rural Bangladesh. During the your donated cow’s lifetime, its health and wellness will be carefully catered to by the family, along with a project team on location. At its end-of-life, the family takes care of and sells the meat, and the rawhide is taken care of by the project team.

THE FAMILY
We believe that agency and trust are key to creating strong communities. Therefore, a family which signs up to raise a cow becomes our partners, receiving special education. All families are initiated and trained in the project in collaboration with NGO Thanapara Swallows Development Society. With a cow, the family can earn up to a year’s income from the meat, enabling whole new possibilities. Such as sending the kids to school. Building a new roof. Or re-invest in a new cow. Imagine what 250 families raising 250 cows can do.

THE LEATHER
A wholly traceable and well-kept rawhide is the outcome of working in transparent, dignified partnership with local families, organizations and companies. We are building our own tannery in Bagatipara where the entire process is going to be salt-free with no harmful chemicals. There will be zero discharge. Only renewable energy from biogas and solar power will be used.

THE BAGS
All Sandlund/Hossain bags are made using our custom-developed vegetable leather tanning method. Our signature lining is made by Thanapara Swallows Development Society, a woman-centered cooperative with great experience in textiles. The cloth is made with organic cotton, traditionally hand loomed and coloured with vegetable extracts. We use only YKK Excella zippers. Every aspect is handcrafted to last beautifully for generations to come. If you choose to become a Cow Funder by purchasing a bag from our limited Cow Funder Edition, your bag will be specially embossed with the initiative logo inside, marking your support. Read more about this special collection further down. In the near future, the goal is that all our bags are made by leather ultimately developed through this initiative.

THE CONSUMER
Finally, the leather, bags and accessories made possible through The Cow Funder Initiative will be available to everyone. But naturally, as a Cow Funder, you will be the very first to know and receive a special deal. And the more people that carry the message of social good and sustainability with them through bags that matter, the more difference we can make on all bottom lines, across all borders, for us all and the world we live in.

THE TIMEPLAN
Now-September 30th: Campaign active
October 25th: First delivery of Cow Funder Edition products
December 1st: First distribution of cows to families
≈ Fall 2020: First products made from Cow Funder Initiative Leather

–––––
 

SANDLUND/HOSSAIN: HOW WE WORK

We at Sandlund/Hossain, founded in 2016 by childhood friends Anders Sandlund and Tulin Hossain, are artisan leather bag makers based in Sweden and Bangladesh. Our mission is to make the most durable, sustainable and truly beautiful leather bags in the world.

OUR BACKGROUND
Sandlund/Hossain springs from Böle spruce bark tannery above Sweden’s Arctic Circle. The family-run tannery, which Anders is now proprietor and heir of, has been making leather since 1899. Böle is today the globe’s last standing spruce bark tannery as well as premium leather goods maker and Purveyor to the Swedish Royal Court.

It’s fair to say that we’ve learned a few things along the way. The hardest lesson? There are no shortcuts if you want to make something really good. Daring to take what some may believe the long way around in order to create long-term solutions is what we’re all about. We honour this belief with a deep sense of tradition, knowledge and passion. Together with fellow compassionate people, taking pride and care in what we do. For ourselves, for you and the world we all share.

OUR ORIGINAL COW F(O)UNDERS
Both of us, Anders and Tulin, come from generations of rather uncompromising yet practical people in small villages – Böle and Bagatipara. In 1977 Anders’ parents, Inger and Jan, left Sweden for volonteer work with NGO The Swallows in Bangladesh. One of the assignments to develop the leather sector. The Sandlunds lived in Bagatipara for almost two years, becoming best friends and co-workers with Tulin’s parents, Atiq and Dolly. 40 years later, our parents’ ideas for social development live on with us, where Sandlund/Hossain is the next step.

Let’s be honest. We launched Sandlund/Hossain out of frustration. We first started producing bags for other brands who showed interest in sustainability. However, many times this gave us a first hand experience of the so-called “the race to the bottom” in terms of quality, pricing and ultimately that coveted sustainability. So we decided to pause producing for other brands and attempt to create the bags we wanted to own and carry ourselves. Simply to see if our dream was possible. We launched our first collection in 2016, selling directly to people through our online store. We are forever thankful for the overwhelming response we’ve received from those who buy our bags and those who spread the word. And thanks to all of our customers and supporters, we’re able to launch The Cow Funder Initiative. Hopefully, the initiative can serve as an inspiration to others as well, especially in the tannery, fashion and design industry.

OUR TEAM
Our team is made up of 35 committed individuals, including top management. 32 of these people are skilled and committed staff in our studio. All have proper salaries, paid vacation, sick leave and a savings program. Our people are our greatest assets, so we make sure to take care. Our two main HQ:s are located in Härnösand, Sweden and Dhaka, Bangladesh. We hope to grow, so if you love craftmanship, sustainability och social development the way we do, let us know!


–––––
 

THE COW FUNDER EDITION

If you choose to become a Cow Funder by purchasing a bag from our limited Cow Funder Edition, your bag will be specially embossed with the initiative logo inside, marking your support. All bags are made using our custom-developed vegetable leather tanning method. Our signature lining is made by Thanapara Swallows Development Society, a woman-centered cooperative with great experience in textiles. The cloth is made with organic cotton, traditionally hand loomed and coloured with vegetable extracts. We use only YKK Excella zippers. Every aspect is handcrafted to last beautifully for generations to come.

OVERVIEW

 

SHOULDER BAGS UDDEN & UDDEN TWIN
Get 20% off regular price by supporting The Cow Funder Initiative

Shoulder bag Udden is perfectly sized for your daily essentials. Carry yours as it is or stow it into your briefcase or handbag to keep things organized. Crafted in luxurious full grain vegetable tanned leather, it features a lined interior and an optional shoulder strap for hands free action. Understated and elegant it adds sophistication to your outfit.

 

 

SHOULDER BAGS GRUNNA & GRUNNA TWIN
Get 20% off regular price by supporting The Cow Funder Initiative

Shoulder bag Grunna combines basic functionality with elegance and style. Its size is perfect for everyday use and the generous interior can easily house all your essentials. You can wear it in different ways, over the shoulder or as an envelope bag, as Grunna´s versatile design easily transitions from day to night.


HANDBAG DUETT 
Get 20% off regular price by supporting The Cow Funder Initiative

Its generous size boasts a padded compartment for your 13´ lap top, a zipped inner pocket and plenty of room left for your everyday essentials. In short it´s your ideal companion from the early morning to the late night.

 

HANDBAG SIRI
Get 20% off regular price by supporting The Cow Funder Initiative

The Handbag Siri matches any day of the week and is roomy enough to pack all your essentials for the day; it will take you to the office, gym and back with no effort. Crafted in luxurious full grain vegetable tanned leather, it features open interior pockets as well as a zipped inner pocket, a detachable shoulder.

 

BRIEFCASE INGA
Get 20% off regular price by supporting The Cow Funder Initiative

Briefcase Inga will stay sophisticated and classy for the rest of your working life, because easy luxury never goes out of style. It is comfortably sized to hold your 15″ lap top and documents safe and secure. Handcrafted in full grain vegetable tanned leather, it features two top handles, a top zip closure and a adjustable shoulder strap for those heavy-duty days.

 

WEEKEND BAG BARNHOLM
Get 20% off regular price by supporting The Cow Funder Initiative

Weekend bag Barnholm is ideal for short travels and everyday use. Bring it to the airport, meeting, school – or wherever the day takes you, it´s a great companion for most occasions. Handcrafted in luxurious full grain vegetable tanned leather.

 

WEEKEND BAG KALAHATT
Get 20% off regular price by supporting The Cow Funder Initiative

Weekend bag Kalahatt is your ideal travel companion for weekends and getaways. It is meticulously handcrafted in full grain vegetable tanned leather and minimally detailed created to wear beautifully over time. Its sophisticated and timeless design will undoubtedly stand out on the luggage carousel.


–––––
 

HOW TO FIND OUT MORE


PRESS/INTERVIEWS/QUESTIONS/REQUESTS
Download press kit here.

For interviews, please contact:
Anders Sandlund, CEO
anders@sandlundhossain.com
+46 (0) 73 503 23 34

For general questions or requests, please contact:
info@sandlundhossain.com
+46 (0) 10 458 04 60

SANDLUND/HOSSAIN ON THE WEB
Site
Facebook
Instagram

#cowfunderinitiative
#sandlundhossain
#makeyourbagmatter

story:
Intro

Nearly two years ago I drew up these drawings as a weekend project in my small apartment while studying abroad in Europe. And now its become this full blown thing. Its been a monumental amount of work - but now I need your help to bring it to life. With a large minimum order quantity, crowd funding seemed like a good way to get it moving. I've opted for "All or Nothing" funding, which means we must meet that goal or this project won't happen!

Please check out the campaign below. If you want to help out the best way is to pick up one of the perks in the sidebar. The price of these watches after the campaign will be 125$ so get them now! Every bit big or small helps make this project get a little closer to reality. Share it with everyone you know on every social media platform you use! Word of mouth is so powerful - it would mean the world to me!

www.itemproject.co
www.instagram.com/Itemproject.co
www.facebook.com/Itemproject.co
www.itemprojectco.tumblr.com


The Design




Feature Summery:
316L Stainless Steel Case and Buckles
Swiss Ronda 763 Movement
Sapphire Crystal
Genuine Fine Grain Leather
Removable Straps (Includes Strap Removal Tool)
Water Resistant 3ATM (light rain, showers, sweat, ect)

Dimensions:
Case Diameter: 40mm
Case Thickness: 9mm
Strap Width: 20mm
Smallest Wrist Circumference: 138mm
Largest Wrist Circumference: 190mm

Full 2 YEAR Warranty:
If anything happens within the first 2 years of wearing your watch, shoot me a message! We can try and fix it together, and if we can't, I'll send out a replacement once you send yours back. This of course doesn't include regular wear and tear, abuse or accidents.



When I wore this watch out in public for the first time the lug free design is one of the first things that people commented on - the strap seems to disappear seamlessly into the watch case. The dial is completely free of distractions, with absolutely no logos. Just 3 hands. In the age where your telephone can manage your finances and your car can stream movies, it seems rare to find objects that do just one thing. This watch has one job - to tell you the time. It adds to the ideology of this whole campaign - both conveyed with the design language and in it's beautifully simple function.



The case is machined from 316L and finished with a soft media blast. An Ion Vapor Deposition (IVD) coating is then applied to the watch case and matching buckles. The crown is slightly over-sized for easier adjustment and a more balanced aesthetic. As mentioned, the face has absolutely no branding or logos - meaning this watch can be worn on both the left and the right hand with the crown facing outwards. The only branding is a small logo on the case.





The case back has been engraved with a very intricate design based on the Canadian maple tree. It represents both the origin of myself, as a born and raised Canadian and as the cyclic nature of time. I wanted something unique that was very personal to the customer - which is why only the wearer of this time piece will know it is there.



The crystal is sapphire. This is one of the most expensive parts of the watch because of how scratch resistant the surface is. The combination of the solid 316L stainless steel case and the sapphire crystal should ensure it can take a beating. The crystal is pressed into a nylon gasket seal - this combined with the rubber seal on the crown makes the watch water resistant.





The leather straps is a fine grain genuine leather. The main strain points are stitched for extra strength and durability. The leather is soft and supple - it molds well to the wrist and breaks in the longer you wear it. Integrated stainless buckles ensure that they do not fray or become loose over time. I went through 3 different iterations before finding something that both felt premium and was durable against every day wear and tear.









The movement selected for this watch is a Ronda 763. Ronda AG is a watch manufacture based in Switzerland since 1946. I wanted something that was robust - something that could survive the abuse of being worn every single day. This particular movement was chosen for its small form factor, serviceability and reliability with the 763 being a proven workhorse among many other quarts watches. For the more nerdy ones like myself, technical information can be found on this PDF provided by Ronda AG.





 

The Presentation/Packaging

I love beautiful packaging. Its why I have spent a lot of time focused on making the best possible unboxing experience. I teamed up with my incredibly talented friend Aaron Davis (Seriously - check out his Instagram its nuts @aarondav1s) who gave me permission to use one of his photos as a cover art for the sleeve. The photo wraps around the back of the box showcasing a beautiful waterfall located in the PNW. The tree logo adds a layer of continuity between the packaging and to the watch. A very important part of the experience.





Sliding off the sleeve reveals a technical exploded view of the watch. A white ink was used instead of black to keep the overall aesthetic light. This line work was actually created directly off of an early CAD file I sent to the manufacturers. The sleeve with the photo is a matte soft touch finish while a glossy spot UV has been applied to the white badge. Although much more expensive, the textual contrast between the two look and feel very premium.





Inside you will find the watch and a spring bar tool (for strap removal) set in high density foam. This impact absorbent foam offers protection during shipping as well as adding to the overall aesthetics. The grey color was selected for its resemblance of poured concrete. A large card is included inside with a pull tap that reveals more extras. Contact information is included in the event you need to message me regarding problems. A sticker featuring matching artwork is also included.


Extra Perk: 11 x 14 Inch Technical Print

A fun little extra I made while designing the packaging - a full exploded view of the watch itself! The diagram is the same one on the box, only this one explains what each of the components are. These are printed on poser paper with the help of my friend Dwayne who is located just outside of Toronto. The frame is not included (its a $4.99 Ikea special!)


 



Look Book

I teamed up with two friends of mine to create this look book. They are both very talented individuals with unique perspectives - check it out below.  

Alec Campbell (@aleccampbell)










Aaron Davis (@aarondav1s)








Myself (@jeffreypang911 ft. @fernandos2k)



 

The Story

How did this all start? In 2015 I was studying abroad in Europe. One of my friends there mentioned they had modeled a watch for his engineering school project. At the time, I was running an e-commerce business filled with products I had designed myself and I thought that a wrist watch would be a cool thing to try. I never modeled something like a watch in CAD before, so it became my design project - a way to take a mental break on the weekends (I know I'm a total nerd).



I worked on this project on and off for a few months. When I spoke to my machinist in Asia, I briefly mentioned that I had designed a simple wrist watch. They told me that they could probably help find a production company to get a prototype made - something I actually never even considered. After some back and fourth with this company, I had a working prototype sent to me. It was a really exciting project since it was so different than what I was usually doing - and that was supposed to be the end of that.



I took some photos posted them up on my Facebook to show some friends. I instantly got a flood of messages asking if they could purchase one. Only having a couple prototypes made I didn't know what to tell them. I was convinced that maybe I could do a small run of these watches for the friends who asked. A few of them were actually already good customers of mine.





I shifted my focus on this watch even more in 2016. People kept messaging about the watch. The production company claimed I needed a minimum order quantity to actually put this into production. So I started refining some of the designs on the watch itself. A larger more ergonomic crown. The strap was improved, actually the first one (on the left) looked great but it stretched 3 holes, then fell apart in water after my 2nd month of wearing it. Just a lot of problems that required testing it by wearing them every day. When I returned back to Canada, I got in contact with the print shop who was already making my packaging and sent them the designs I came up with. Package design is one of my favorite things to do because you have so much creative freedom. I knew if I wanted to put this thing into production it had to be absolutely spectacular.



And now you are reading this page. Nearly two years ago I drew up these drawings in my CAD program just for the heck of it. And now its a real thing. So much time has been put into every aspect of this project and I hope that shines through. If you are one of the few who have read this far, I really do thank you for taking the time to read everything I've written. Lets make this campaign a good one!

 

Risks & Challenges

Obviously with crowd funding project of this scale there are both risks and challenges, but during the last 6 months I have done my best to control both of these things to the best of my ability. I have found suppliers and manufacturers with extremely good communication and will likely travel back to their factory after the campaign finishes. My experience working with factories over seas in the past is definitely a huge asset for this project (scroll down to see the video I made documenting the product development for Skyva). This can ensure better quality control and also faster turn around time when it comes to the little details.

I have set a generous deadline to anticipate for delays but it is impossible to predict the future. If all goes to plan, everyone should get their watches on, or before the date. The only way it could be extended is if there is a massive production delay but at this stage is isn't likely.
 

Who Am I?


 

I'm a self taught designer and media producer. My formal education is actually in automotive service, although I never ended up working as a mechanic after I graduated. Funny how life works right? I tried the University thing after and ended up in Europe with a backpack (long story). I later started freelancing and running my e-commerce business, and I've never looked back since. You can read a long blog post about it here.

This is my first Crowd Funding style campaign but this isn't my first product release or large scale project. I love product design. I love working on cars. I love photography and making videos. I love skilled toys that help me think straight. Hopefully I can gain some trust by showing you a glimpse of my personal life - check out some of the projects I have accomplished throughout the years below:

Luftverk Titanium Supply Co.
Ultra high precision yoyos machined from titanium.
My full time job since 2015. Designed, assembled, packaged and shipped by yours truly. Small batch limited runs means they sell out very quickly. Titanium is super expensive to machine.
www.Luftverk.com
www.Instagram.com/Luftverk
www.Facebook.com/Luftverk
Luftverk has allowed me to travel the world. I'm wearing a prototype Item watch in this video:
www.youtube.com/watch?v=vDm-Yk8wztc

B18c Powered Austin Mini
College project car - shoe horning a 200hp engine in an Austin Mini.
Built this car when I was studying in college. It stayed as a hobby - this car was featured in a magazine. Was so excited I couldn't sleep. Had to sell it to fund more projects like this one. C'est la vie.
www.16vminiclub.com/showthread.php?p=244073
www.speedhunters.com/2012/07/b18_min/
www.stanceiseverything.com/2012/07/fifty-two
www.youtube.com/watch?v=p9xFDvuRNQY

SKYVA 
A professional grade yoyo for 20$. Currently 7500 units sold world wide.
A video showing the whole process from CAD drawing to final product. Wearing a prototype of the Item watch in this during the second half - shout out to my sis for filming:
www.youtube.com/watch?v=J-R2hZV4LYI
Social Media (Check out the hashtag #skyvaworldwide too!):
www.Instagram.com/Skyvaworldwide
Retailers:
www.yoyostorerewind.com/jp/skyva.html
shop.yoyoexpert.com/products/skyva-yo-yo-by-magicyoyo
www.slusny.net/luftverk-skyva
www.latiendadelyoyo.com/en/1a/815-magicyoyo-sky...
(You can search it up on Google, there are like 40 something retailers around the world, in at least 15 different countries!)

Fluid Print Dynamics
Non-profit 3D printing company for educational and hobby purposes.
Something for fun! The first "company" I ever started. I used to sell some 3d printed stuff through it with a Prusa i3 I built in my parents basement. As of Dec. 2016 it as been turned it into a non-profit free download type thing.
www.fluidprintdynamics.com
www.facebook.com/fluidprintdynamics
story_txt:
Intro
Nearly two years ago I drew up these drawings as a weekend project in my small apartment while studying abroad in Europe. And now its become this full blown thing. Its been a monumental amount of work - but now I need your help to bring it to life. With a large minimum order quantity, crowd funding seemed like a good way to get it moving. I've opted for "All or Nothing" funding, which means we must meet that goal or this project won't happen!Please check out the campaign below. If you want to help out the best way is to pick up one of the perks in the sidebar. The price of these watches after the campaign will be 125$ so get them now! Every bit big or small helps make this project get a little closer to reality. Share it with everyone you know on every social media platform you use! Word of mouth is so powerful - it would mean the world to me!
www.itemproject.cowww.instagram.com/Itemproject.cowww.facebook.com/Itemproject.cowww.itemprojectco.tumblr.com


The Design
Feature Summery:316L Stainless Steel Case and BucklesSwiss Ronda 763 MovementSapphire CrystalGenuine Fine Grain LeatherRemovable Straps (Includes Strap Removal Tool)Water Resistant 3ATM (light rain, showers, sweat, ect)Dimensions:Case Diameter: 40mmCase Thickness: 9mmStrap Width: 20mmSmallest Wrist Circumference: 138mmLargest Wrist Circumference: 190mmFull 2 YEAR Warranty:If anything happens within the first 2 years of wearing your watch, shoot me a message! We can try and fix it together, and if we can't, I'll send out a replacement once you send yours back. This of course doesn't include regular wear and tear, abuse or accidents.When I wore this watch out in public for the first time the lug free design is one of the first things that people commented on - the strap seems to disappear seamlessly into the watch case. The dial is completely free of distractions, with absolutely no logos. Just 3 hands. In the age where your telephone can manage your finances and your car can stream movies, it seems rare to find objects that do just one thing. This watch has one job - to tell you the time. It adds to the ideology of this whole campaign - both conveyed with the design language and in it's beautifully simple function.The case is machined from 316L and finished with a soft media blast. An Ion Vapor Deposition (IVD) coating is then applied to the watch case and matching buckles. The crown is slightly over-sized for easier adjustment and a more balanced aesthetic. As mentioned, the face has absolutely no branding or logos - meaning this watch can be worn on both the left and the right hand with the crown facing outwards. The only branding is a small logo on the case.The case back has been engraved with a very intricate design based on the Canadian maple tree. It represents both the origin of myself, as a born and raised Canadian and as the cyclic nature of time. I wanted something unique that was very personal to the customer - which is why only the wearer of this time piece will know it is there.The crystal is sapphire. This is one of the most expensive parts of the watch because of how scratch resistant the surface is. The combination of the solid 316L stainless steel case and the sapphire crystal should ensure it can take a beating. The crystal is pressed into a nylon gasket seal - this combined with the rubber seal on the crown makes the watch water resistant.The leather straps is a fine grain genuine leather. The main strain points are stitched for extra strength and durability. The leather is soft and supple - it molds well to the wrist and breaks in the longer you wear it. Integrated stainless buckles ensure that they do not fray or become loose over time. I went through 3 different iterations before finding something that both felt premium and was durable against every day wear and tear.The movement selected for this watch is a Ronda 763. Ronda AG is a watch manufacture based in Switzerland since 1946. I wanted something that was robust - something that could survive the abuse of being worn every single day. This particular movement was chosen for its small form factor, serviceability and reliability with the 763 being a proven workhorse among many other quarts watches. For the more nerdy ones like myself, technical information can be found on this PDF provided by Ronda AG. 
The Presentation/Packaging
I love beautiful packaging. Its why I have spent a lot of time focused on making the best possible unboxing experience. I teamed up with my incredibly talented friend Aaron Davis (Seriously - check out his Instagram its nuts @aarondav1s) who gave me permission to use one of his photos as a cover art for the sleeve. The photo wraps around the back of the box showcasing a beautiful waterfall located in the PNW. The tree logo adds a layer of continuity between the packaging and to the watch. A very important part of the experience.Sliding off the sleeve reveals a technical exploded view of the watch. A white ink was used instead of black to keep the overall aesthetic light. This line work was actually created directly off of an early CAD file I sent to the manufacturers. The sleeve with the photo is a matte soft touch finish while a glossy spot UV has been applied to the white badge. Although much more expensive, the textual contrast between the two look and feel very premium.Inside you will find the watch and a spring bar tool (for strap removal) set in high density foam. This impact absorbent foam offers protection during shipping as well as adding to the overall aesthetics. The grey color was selected for its resemblance of poured concrete. A large card is included inside with a pull tap that reveals more extras. Contact information is included in the event you need to message me regarding problems. A sticker featuring matching artwork is also included.

Extra Perk: 11 x 14 Inch Technical Print
A fun little extra I made while designing the packaging - a full exploded view of the watch itself! The diagram is the same one on the box, only this one explains what each of the components are. These are printed on poser paper with the help of my friend Dwayne who is located just outside of Toronto. The frame is not included (its a $4.99 Ikea special!) 

Look Book
I teamed up with two friends of mine to create this look book. They are both very talented individuals with unique perspectives - check it out below.  
Alec Campbell (@aleccampbell)Aaron Davis (@aarondav1s)Myself (@jeffreypang911 ft. @fernandos2k)

story:
Who are these guys?

My brother and I created John Doe Shoes three and a half years ago. We found there was a huge gap in the men’s shoe industry. Whenever you were buying shoes, you could only choose two of these qualities at best: Price, Quality, Availability.

Price and Availability = Crappy shoes made in a sweatshop with subpar materials, sold by fast fashion companies and department stores.

Price and Quality = You would have to look for sales, deals or buy second hand. This is not something you control. You must wait for the right chance if it ever happens.

Quality and Availability = Be ready to splurge, when talking about quality men shoes things can get pricey pretty fast.

We wanted to offer the 3 things. And we failed. At first. See, that’s the thing with starting a business, no matter how much you think you are prepared, things will eventually get hard and issues you never even thought of will arise. To be honest our first shoes had availability and kind of the good price thing and kind of the quality thing. Our objective was to make people feel they were stealing from us. How could such an impressive shoe cost that? Instead people were like, meh, it certainly looks and feels better than my “genuine” leather, “designer” shoes but I’m definitely not blown away.

We messed our chance to create a great first impression. we went back to the workshop to work more. Some months later, our second generation of shoes was ready. Better craftsmanship and materials, and this time we got a lot of people to be quite impressed of our shoes. But it wasn’t enough for us, so we made our shoes even better, and once they were awesome we made them even better. You get the idea. Even though our shoes are great we will never stop trying to make the best shoes money can buy, with the only difference you won’t have to spend so much money. Truth is that we have become so good at doing it that we are ready to take all this knowledge, experience, contacts and resources to other areas. And those other areas will start with our line of leather jackets.

You had me on affordable leather jac. Tell me more.

You know how the usual crowdfunding campaign starts. I was walking one day through the neighborhood with my dog when suddenly I saw this guy who looked like an actor, he was driving a red sports car and by his side there was a gorgeous girl, that I’m sure was a model. They looked so happy and perfect. But what struck me the most, was the awesome leather jacket he was wearing. I knew that if I could get my hands on one of those bad ass leather jackets, then suddenly I would have all those things. But man, leather jackets are so damn expensive. That’s when it came to me. Why nobody offers cheap leather jackets?

Ok, some little details of this story were made up, well maybe most of it. Anyway, back to the question. Why there are no cheap leather jackets? Short answer, leather is expensive, and everybody wants to have some crazy profit margins. So, you either buy a crappy jacket or you spend a lot on a good jacket. I really don’t know what’s worse, plastic that looks like leather or cheap bad leather. But that’s what you will find on “leather” jackets that won’t cost you an arm and a leg.

Until now.

It feels nice to say we are finally respected shoemakers and we get to know a lot of people in the industry, Tanneries, other shoemakers, stores and so on. On one of our trips we met a cool Italian dude, who like 10 years ago went to Puerto Vallarta, Mexico to spend a summer, he would fall in love with a Mexican girl, get married and make Mexico its new residence. I know, I know by now you must be thinking I’m making up this, again. But I swear for all the future sales of John Doe Shoes that I’m telling the truth. But wait, it gets even better. It happens that this guy’s job back at Italy was to make leather jackets for a luxury brand. Now you see where this is going. I could write a book about this, but I still have so much other stuff to write so I’ll cut to the chase.

We partnered with the Italian guy, he knows how to make awesome jackets and we have kind of a big muscle and know how in terms of buying the best leathers of the world. Together we made a beautiful leather jacket with supple yet durable lambskin. Which is the way to go in terms of luxury jackets. We believe in fair business and so we priced the jackets accordingly.

Ok, so why are you running a crowdfunding campaign?

We will be totally honest; we don’t need your money to fund the project or make the jackets. Which as I see it, is better, since we won’t be tempted to flee to the Caribbean with your money, or in two months end up saying; you know what guys the jackets are gonna take an extra 2 months to be ready, or we priced the jackets so low that now. Surprise, your jacket has turned into a vest! Or not even that, what about an I'm sorry along with an IOU note valid for a jacket to be delivered somewhere between now and year 2179. If you have been long enough lurking around crowdfunding sites you know these things happen. Not with us. Regardless of the campaign outcome, we are making the jackets and as soon as the campaign is over we will sell them at our website for a higher price. We are here for publicity. In case you have been living under a rock for the past three years and somehow you don't know about the John Doe Shoes goodness, this is your chance to buy the best leather jacket by far that $199 can buy.

How "great" is the jacket?

Whenever we launch a product we consider what are the best in class features, the most attractive designs and the best materials. It was no different this time.

We chose the racer style as we consider it to be quite versatile. It allows you to dress for many occasions and pull out several looks like no other jacket style.

Our jackets are made with lambskin. This leather hits all the right spots. It's durable, supple, no break in period and it looks damn great. That's why lambskin is more expensive than other leathers and the usual choice for top brands around the world.

The jackets have a slim fit. By slim fit we mean that they will look great on people on the slim to athletic range. This is our first run of jackets, we will make a looser fit eventually. They also have high armholes that give the jacket a better movement and look.

 

Alright, enough talking, I want 17 leather jackets now!

Whoa, easy tiger. Our name is on the line here and we will cover our asses a little bit in regards to the delivery date. No matter what happens, the jackets will be shipped no later than 01/31/2017. Although I have a little secret, we are already making the jackets, so you have a very good chance to get it just in time to rock it before 2017 is here. If for any reason (I'm thinking an alien invasion, Zombie apocalypse) we don't deliver the jackets on January 2017, you are gonna get your money back and the jacket for free as soon as it is ready. Again, our name and all the work of four years is on the line, so we would definitely honor this.

It happens that this guy’s job back at Italy was to make leather jackets for a luxury brand. Now you see where this is going. I could write a book about this, but I still have so much other stuff to write so I’ll cut to the chase.We partnered with the Italian guy, he knows how to make awesome jackets and we have kind of a big muscle and know how in terms of buying the best leathers of the world. Together we made a beautiful leather jacket with supple yet durable lambskin. Which is the way to go in terms of luxury jackets. We believe in fair business and so we priced the jackets accordingly.Ok, so why are you running a crowdfunding campaign?We will be totally honest; we don’t need your money to fund the project or make the jackets. Which as I see it, is better, since we won’t be tempted to flee to the Caribbean with your money, or in two months end up saying; you know what guys the jackets are gonna take an extra 2 months to be ready, or we priced the jackets so low that now. Surprise, your jacket has turned into a vest! Or not even that, what about an I'm sorry along with an IOU note valid for a jacket to be delivered somewhere between now and year 2179. If you have been long enough lurking around crowdfunding sites you know these things happen. Not with us. Regardless of the campaign outcome, we are making the jackets and as soon as the campaign is over we will sell them at our website for a higher price. We are here for publicity. In case you have been living under a rock for the past three years and somehow you don't know about the John Doe Shoes goodness, this is your chance to buy the best leather jacket by far that $199 can buy.How "great" is the jacket?Whenever we launch a product we consider what are the best in class features, the most attractive designs and the best materials. It was no different this time.We chose the racer style as we consider it to be quite versatile. It allows you to dress for many occasions and pull out several looks like no other jacket style.Our jackets are made with lambskin. This leather hits all the right spots. It's durable, supple, no break in period and it looks damn great. That's why lambskin is more expensive than other leathers and the usual choice for top brands around the world.The jackets have a slim fit. By slim fit we mean that they will look great on people on the slim to athletic range. This is our first run of jackets, we will make a looser fit eventually. They also have high armholes that give the jacket a better movement and look. Alright, enough talking, I want 17 leather jackets now!Whoa, easy tiger. Our name is on the line here and we will cover our asses a little bit in regards to the delivery date. No matter what happens, the jackets will be shipped no later than 01/31/2017. Although I have a little secret, we are already making the jackets, so you have a very good chance to get it just in time to rock it before 2017 is here. If for any reason (I'm thinking an alien invasion, Zombie apocalypse) we don't deliver the jackets on January 2017, you are gonna get your money back and the jacket for free as soon as it is ready. Again, our name and all the work of four years is on the line, so we would definitely honor this.

story:
Short Summary

  • I'm Quinn Hughes, I'm a 9th grader, a member of my high school's debate team and the founder and creative director of Akwete Fashion.
  • Without your contribution, I'll be unable to get Akwete off the ground. With you...everything is possible!

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need about $7,000 to start Akwete, produce the t-shirts and get to Colorado to participate in a debate camp that will be the inspiration for the next pieces that I produce. 
  • If I don't get the full amount that I need to lay the foundation of Akwete, I'll be producing the t-shirts on a more limited basis and sell the extras here in Evanston.
  • Once we have reached our goal we will be continuing to produce products and grow our company in the near future.

The Impact

What makes our company so unique is that it was started with the hopes of creating conversation. With each of the pieces that we produce, we have put the utmost thought and care into the garment and how it interacts with the world. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • I appreciate any support you can give. I would appreciate you getting the word out about my dream and Akwete Fashion!
  • Please share this page on your social media!

Thank you!

story:
MoonWax Surf Wax is not just for surfers it is made from 100% natural coconut oil which makes it amazing for good traction on your feet, but also AWESOME for your skin! Have you ever gone home after a long surf session and felt the rash on your skin from the friction? Well, that's exactly what we are going to avoid here with MoonWax. As our first prototype as already been created thanks to the funding of this campain, we have shipments ready to send out! 

The Surf You To The Moon crew is back again! To create something even BIGGER: SYTTM product line...the same awesome company everyone loves...now with products! Here's how it all started:

The Surf You To The Moon partnership was formed on a Starbucks napkin in May 2015 by all three co-founders Rachel Sherrill, Joseph Sherrill and Evan Moon. The three co-founders formed Surf You To The Moon with one vision: To Spread our Love and Passion, and Stoke We Have Of Water Sports and The Ocean To Future Water Lovers In San Diego. Surf You To The Moon started with teaching surf lessons. Seeing the smiles of their customers and discovering their success in the surf lesson market, Rachel, Joseph and Evan set out to start a new and currently our most popular product: snorkeling in San Diego. We currently hold snorkel tours visiting the sharks in La Jolla Shores, the majestic sea caves at La Jolla Cove and the beautiful San Diego Mission Bay. Surf You To The Moon also offers Stand Up Paddle boarding, where we explore the open water in San Diego, boldly traveling where no car can see, we, travel and explore.

Sound like a cool story!? Isn't it cool to see so much success in such a short time!? Well, what we are about to do is something even BIGGER...a vision so BIG that will disrupt the surf industry and product market as we know it. 

This next project line launch will offer products that can compete with Lululemon's high quality, but at a much lower price. It will provide immense value and comfort for women (and men) around the world. 

This next SYTTM product line launch will create a new surf wax...with stickyness, shape and scent that is so cool...everyone will want a bar of our wax...and on top of that...a T-shirt! 

Lastly...this SYTTM launch we will be embarking upon, will provide stoke and happiness for surfers, adventure lovers around the world, providing access to services people couldn't once afford, or even have. 

Ever know someone's life who was changed by someone who learned a new sport or how to surf? We sure do at Surf You To The Moon check out this exceptional review from a happy customer: 

"This was the absolute best time! I originally saw this company on groupon and gave them a call about snorkeling in the caves. I was in town for a 5k and wanted to check snorkeling off my bucket list. Everyone was so helpful in friendly from scheduling the day we would go with Rick and Rachel was such a doll leading the tour. She captured some great memories via photos and video. I will always remember this adventure and I will recommend this company to anyone I know heading to San Diego. When I come back for a visit I will definitely use them again. Thanks for being awesome smile emoticon " - Jenny Courter

Read more reviews on our facebook.com/surfyoutothemoon page!

Risks and challenges

Having enough material to fulfill future orders or our new wetsuits, yoga pants and wax is our biggest challenge and getting them at a good price. We have overcame this challenge by forming local partnerships with clothing tailors and also excessive market research and experts in the industry. The 3 partners of Surf You To The Moon, Evan Moon, Rachel Sherrill and Joseph Sherrill are work horses, and can overcome any challenge presented their way just as they did this past summer launching multiple products and services in the water sports industry in San Diego. The 3 partners read multiple books on business every week, and business and the study of business is their game. The surf industry and water sports industry is their passion and love, and they each work on their dream with Surf You To The Moon hours and hours and hours every week...seeking help and mentorship when they need it. As a team, the crew of Surf You To The Moon believe they can accomplish and overcome anything and any obstacle that comes their way. They are ready for SYTTM and ready for their next big move in the market reinventing the industry as we know it.

They are ready for SYTTM and ready for their next big move in the market reinventing the industry as we know it.

story:
Presenting the revolutionary Mumba Bra. The only nursing bra designed for BOTH mum and baby



We’ve reinvented the nursing bra because so many mothers want to breastfeed, but sadly, a large number of those who start or plan to start never make it past the first few days.

So we’ve created the Mumba Bra to prepare and support BOTH mother and baby on their breastfeeding journey.

Enabling more mothers to initiate breastfeeding and continue for as long as she wants to.



Some of the most frequently cited reasons by mothers for discontinuing with breastfeeding are:

The Mumba Bra incorporates two great innovations to address these problems and take babies contribution to successful breastfeeding into consideration.


The Mumba Bra incorporates unique design features for BOTH Mum and Baby.


The patented Mumba clasp is a world’s first. 

A bra clasp which also functions as a breastfeeding reminder to help mums quickly and easily track which breast to feed from next.

 Every breastfeeding mother knows how often a newborn feeds in the first few weeks, it’s therefore easy to understand why so many mothers have difficulty remembering which side to feed from next.

The Mumba clasp is designed to support mothers especially in the early weeks when sleep deprivation can add to a mother’s inability to remember which breast she last fed on. It’s also designed to support a busy and exhausted mother at any stage off her breastfeeding journey.

Alternating breast and regular feeding is the recommended way for breastfeeding mothers to maintain good milk supply in both breasts and to avoid painful engorgement which could lead to mastitis.

The Mumba clasp is permanently fixed to the bra and a uses a unique two hook design system, which allows mums to easily track which side to feed, when simply opening and closing her bra, before and after every feed.


Using the Mumba Clasp is as easy as 1,2,3.


HOW TO USE THE MUMBA CLASP REMINDER 

1. To feed, always choose the LOWER NUMBER of the two hooks.

For example if the hooks are on numbers 1 and 2, you would choose number 1.

2. When finished, always return the hook, to the HIGHER CONSECUTIVE NUMBER, to the opposite hook.

For example if feeding and the opposite hook is on number 2, return the hook to number 3 to close.

3. Lastly when the hooks are on numbers 1 and 4, always CHOOSE NUMBER 4. This is the only time when the LOWER NUMBER does not apply. When finished as always, return the hook, to the HIGHER CONSECUTIVE NUMBER, to the opposite hook

The numbers 1 and 4, have been colored to alert you.

What breastfeeding mums say about the unique Mumba clasp




The original BabyFocus print


                                              

   

The BabyFocus print is inspired by babies and research by neuroscientist and development psychologist on visual stimulation for babies.

Researchers have repeatedly proven that newborns prefer to look at black and white geometric shapes and that these patterns provide babies with something simple yet engaging to focus on, and in this intense concentration it allows their minds to rest. 

 Breastfeeding is a new experience for a newborn and although instinctive it’s a skill that they’ll have to learn like many others.

Unlike any other nursing bra, the Mumba Bra recognizes that a baby’s contribution to successful breastfeeding is just as important as their mothers.


               


Because of this we developed the original BabyFocus print to focus baby’s attention and soothe and relax babies whist feeding helping a newborn take to the new experience of breastfeeding.

After the calm of the womb, babies are welcomed in the world where there is so much going on and their minds can become completely overwhelmed. The BabyFocus print is therefore perfectly placed to capture and soothe babies at feeding time.


Comments from existing research on black and white and visual stimulation for babies.

What the experts say about the BabyFocus Print


What breastfeeding mums say about the original BabyFocus print


The benefits of achieving your breastfeeding goals with the Mumba Bra

           

                               

                


                     



Our quest is to #makeadifference 

We want every breastfeeding mother and her baby to receive the optimal benefits from breastfeeding. The Mumba Bra is the world's first nursing bra to incorporate unique multi-functional features as a response to breastfeeding mothers needs and offer you support in more ways than one.

                                              

MY STORY

Hi, my name is Elizabeth Morana, I’m a mother of two and the inventor of the Mumba Bra. 

                           

When my daughter was born I knew breastfeeding and breast milk was the best choice. But in 2011 a few weeks after of her birth, I started experiencing some of the common breastfeeding problems. What seemed like the simplest thing of remembering which breast I last fed my daughter from and which to feed from next, soon became impossible.  So I used to note it down on a piece of paper and I even bought a breastfeeding reminder bracelet in a desperate attempt to make things easier. But after using them, I felt that these accessories were adding to my problems, as they were never to hand when I needed to feed her. Because of this my breast felt painful and engorged from not alternating breast when feeding.

I also found that my daughter was constantly and easily distracted by anything in the room whilst feeding, She would pull away when distracted with my nipple in tow, which as you can imagine was very painful. I started dreading breastfeeding and wanted to give up. 

But having breastfed my first child for a year, I didn’t want to just give up. I knew that breastmilk was best for my baby and so I was determined to persevere through the pain and give her what I believed to be the best start in life. It was then, in my moment of despair that I was inspired  to create the Mumba Bra.


                   THE MUMBA BRA JOURNEY FROM CONCEPT TO PRODUCT


                 

We want to bring the beauty and elegance of our current range into our seamless advanced 4-way stretched nursing bra. The use of this fabric allows us to support mothers from the pregnancy stage right through to breastfeeding. As the luxuriously soft fabric is adaptable to a mothers changing shape as its able to stretch up to 2-3 bra sizes 



WHY SUPPORT OUR MUMBA BRA CAMPAIGN


Breastmilk is the best start a mother can provide for her baby. Various medical organisations have extensively researched breastmilk and verified the substantial beneficial effects breastfeeding has on the lives of babies, mothers and children. Data published in  The Lancet report in January 2016 reported that increasing breastfeeding rates worldwide could prevent over 800,000 child deaths and 20,000 deaths from cancer every year.

The researchers said that it was a "widespread misconception" that breastfeeding was only beneficial in poor countries. Nothing could be further from the truth. Professor Cesar Victor added that "our work clear shows that breastfeeding saves lives and money in all countries rich and poor alike"


We understand that breastfeeding can be difficult, so the Mumba Bra aims to prepare and support BOTH mother and baby, right from the onset and throughout of their breastfeeding journey, so that some of the common breastfeeding problems can be avoided. We can then #makeadifference to the breastfeeding statistics that reports the low numbers of mothers initiating breastfeeding and even more disturbing, the greater number of mothers giving up.

So please back us and help millions of mothers succeed in achieving their breastfeeding goal and allow more babies to get the best start in life they deserve.                                           Together we can #makeadifference





If you’re not able to contribute financially to our campaign, but you love our product, why not simply share our IndieGoGo page with your friends on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter. Tag us to let us know that you’ve done so, or hashtag our campaign #mumbamakeadifference and we’ll give you a shout out on our social media pages and our Mumba Family Wall of supporters’ which we’ll be adding to on our website throughout the campaign to say a big THANK YOU.


WE HAVE SOME AMAZING PERKS FOR THOSE WHO WANT TO SHOW THEIR SUPPORT FOR                     BREASTFEEDING



Show your support for breastfeeding and our Mumba Bra campaign  with our Mumba medium shopping bag. Choose from two colours pink and blue denim.

Bag size - Height 30cm x Width 30cm x Gusset 20cm


                              

                                              


We've designed a some visually stimulating wall art which you can frame and decorate your home or babies nursery. The size of the print is 28 cm x 21.6 cm (11" x 8.5")

                        Make your world a more beautiful and interesting place!

                

                                 


THE AMAZING PERKS FOR BREASTFEEDING                MOTHERS

      WE'D LOVE TO TAKE YOUR ORDER ON A DISCOUNTED MUMBA BRA 



 

Is the Mumba Bra safe for my baby?

Numerous studies have shown that not only do babies prefer to look at white and black high contrast graphics, but such images can

  1. Increase babies attention span
  2. Calm babies
  3. Enhance curiosity
  4. Encourage brain and visual development 

Visual stimulation is very important for baby's development. The BabyFocus print is perfectly placed to stimulate these senses during feeding. Helping your baby to take to the new experience of breastfeeding and allowing your baby's brain to thrive


How does the Mumba Bra help me?

It’s a well-known fact that when breastfeeding you regularly forget which breast to feed your baby from next. Additionally it isn’t always easy to keep your baby’s attention focused on the breast whist breastfeeding. As your baby grows they can become easily distracted. The Mumba Bras unique design features solves these problems and incorporates the solution onto your nursing bra. This means no more breastfeeding reminder bracelets, mobile apps and necklaces used to focus babies attention or any other additional accessories to carry around. Your Mumba bra is always close to you, ready to support you. Giving you more time to focus on you and your baby.


What colors of the Mumba Bra are available?

We'll be taking pre-orders for only the white and purple 4-way stretch fabric Mumba Bra and you will get in contact with you within a week to choose your color  . If we go beyond our goal, we will be introducing more colors and styles. So we will keep you updated.


Do you ship anywhere?

Yes, global shipping is available and included in all perk prices to the UK and Europe. Some perks have a flat $10 additional fee for shipping to the rest of the world.

When will my Mumba Bra be ready

Please see our timeline

HELP US TO UNLOCK THE POTENTIAL OF THE MUMBA BRA AND

REVOLUTIONIZE BREASTFEEDING LINGERIE. 

SO THAT BOTH MUM AND BABY CAN BE SUPPORTED ON 

THEIR BREASTFEEDING JOURNEY. BECAUSE....



                       



ONCE AGAIN...

If you’re not able to contribute financially to our campaign, but you love our product, why not simply share our IndieGoGo page with your friends on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter. Tag us to let us know that you’ve done so, or hashtag our campaign #mumbamakeadifference and we’ll give you a shout out on our social media pages and our Mumba Family Wall of supporters’ which we’ll be adding to on our website throughout the campaign to say a big THANK YOU.
WE HAVE SOME AMAZING PERKS FOR THOSE WHO WANT TO SHOW THEIR SUPPORT FOR                     BREASTFEEDING




Show your support for breastfeeding and our Mumba Bra campaign  with our Mumba medium shopping bag. Choose from two colours pink and blue denim.
Bag size - Height 30cm x Width 30cm x Gusset 20cm
                                                                            


We've designed a some visually stimulating wall art which you can frame and decorate your home or babies nursery. The size of the print is 28 cm x 21.6 cm (11" x 8.5")
                        Make your world a more beautiful and interesting place!
                
                                 

THE AMAZING PERKS FOR BREASTFEEDING                MOTHERS
      WE'D LOVE TO TAKE YOUR ORDER ON A DISCOUNTED MUMBA BRA 







 
Is the Mumba Bra safe for my baby?
Numerous studies have shown that not only do babies prefer to look at white and black high contrast graphics, but such images can



Increase babies attention span


Calm babies


Enhance curiosity


Encourage brain and visual development 


Visual stimulation is very important for baby's development. The BabyFocus print is perfectly placed to stimulate these senses during feeding. Helping your baby to take to the new experience of breastfeeding and allowing your baby's brain to thrive

How does the Mumba Bra help me?

It’s a well-known fact that when breastfeeding you regularly
forget which breast to feed your baby from next. Additionally it isn’t always easy
to keep your baby’s attention focused on the breast whist breastfeeding. As
your baby grows they can become easily distracted. The Mumba Bras unique design
features solves these problems and incorporates the solution onto your nursing
bra. This means no more breastfeeding reminder bracelets, mobile apps and necklaces
used to focus babies attention or any other additional accessories to carry
around. Your Mumba bra is always close to you, ready to support you. Giving you more time to focus on you and your baby.
What colors of the Mumba Bra are available?
We'll be taking pre-orders for only the white and purple 4-way stretch fabric Mumba Bra and you will get in contact with you within a week to choose your color  . If we go beyond our goal, we will be introducing more colors and styles. So we will keep you updated.

Do you ship anywhere?
Yes, global shipping is available and included in all perk prices to the UK and Europe. Some perks have a flat $10 additional fee for shipping to the rest of the world.
When will my Mumba Bra be ready
Please see our timeline


HELP US TO UNLOCK THE POTENTIAL OF THE MUMBA BRA AND
REVOLUTIONIZE BREASTFEEDING LINGERIE. 
SO THAT BOTH MUM AND BABY CAN BE SUPPORTED ON 
THEIR BREASTFEEDING JOURNEY. BECAUSE....





                       
   

ONCE AGAIN...

story:
PRESIDER Premium Wallets: Luxury + Impact

Dear Believer, my name is Nabil, and it is an immense pleasure to introduce myself to all of you as the founder of the Presider Company. I am passionate about sustainability and am captivated by the essences of social innovation. I am pleased to share that the PRESIDER brand will begin its journey through a minimally-posh line of signature wallets for men.

As a fashion enthusiast, I believe in the power of details. Bold contrasts, robust materials, agile craftsmanship, and minimal, anthropocentric touches are all elements that inspired me to curate a wallet that looks, feels, and fits well. 

Quite recently, I have had the fortuitous opportunity of visiting my homeland of Bangladesh — a fruitful wonderland that is rooted in poverty. A country where many do not have access to fundamental necessities.

Many underserved children in such emerging nations remain uneducated and may be forced to begin work at early stages of their lives. To gauge their interest in education, I am on a mission to equip them with backpacks for school; a simple accessory, that can empower them to dream through knowledge, by allowing them to carry their education. 

Infusing these two realms, PRESIDER aspires to drive value by bringing such premium leather wallets to the palms of modern visionaries with purpose and empowering underserved children to attain an education that can catalyze positive change.

Together, we can re-invent contemporary luxury, and aspire to inspire the ones in need.

Minimally bold.

We are seeking $3500 in Canadian Dollars. For every wallet that you purchase, we will be providing a school backpack to an underserved child in Jaipur Hat (Joypurhat), Rajshahi, Bangladesh.

10 Wallets: $50 -- 1x PRESIDER first-fifty Wallet (Black/Red) + Your Initials on the "PRESIDER Digital Board of Visionaries"

20 Wallets $55 -- 1x PRESIDER first-fifty Wallet (Black/Red) + Your Initials on the "PRESIDER Digital Board of Visionaries"

15 Wallets: $60 -- 1x PRESIDER first-fifty Wallet (Black/Red) + Your Initials on the "PRESIDER Digital Board of Visionaries"

5 Custom-Monogrammed Wallets: $75 -- 1x Custom-Monogrammed PRESIDER first-fifty Wallet (Black/Red) +  Your Initials on the "PRESIDER Digital Board of Visionaries"

Estimated Delivery: June 2018

The following avenues are of immense of focus to us:

Production, Diversification, and the Accessory-for-Accessory Social Impact Model

  • We will fulfill the first fifty wallets with efficiency; each wallet featuring your initials on the “PRESIDER Digital House of Visionaries”; your pledge will also support initial manufacturing
  • Part of the gathered funds will go towards product diversification + innovation; we hope to design a multitude of color-ways and diversify our product offerings 
  • We will equip underserved children with school backpacks, and hope to engage in larger social innovation projects

Marketing & Branding

  • We aim to focus our attention on creating an elegant + transformational brand that will be adored by loyalists — with the support of intriguing global partnerships
  • Starting from Social Media, PRESIDER’s presence will be witnessed throughout smart media channels​

Research & Development + Day-to-Day Activities

  • Our focus is on discovering, testing and working with alternative materials for sustainable product designs + categories; we also hope to enable smart technologies
  • Our goal is to efficaciously carve digital pathways to make for engaging customer experiences + interactions; we wish to create a user-friendly buying journey so that we can effectively be present for our customers
  • We will utilize the funds to handle legal, operational, and fundamental business matters 

Elegantly impactful.

The impact this campaign will create is enormous. Firstly, the campaign will enable the proliferation of PRESIDER products, beginning with the first-fifty limited line of wallets for men. Throughout history, humanity utilized natural leather to protect themselves from the elements of the environment. The first-fifty line will draw from this important innovation and will be ultra-crafted to be sheer, firm, and graceful. Made from A-grade leather, the well-sized billfolds will feature a meticulous pocket — a versatile vault for sensitive items. The slim wallets will also feature an ID card slot and will bear the capacity of storing more than ten cards. 

“Education is the passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today” — Malcolm X. By the end of this campaign, 50 underserved children will receive backpacks for schools, for backpacks can allow such children to carry knowledge, and promote lifelong, equitable learning through empowerment.

Risks & Challenges

We are collaborating with craftspeople with years of experience in producing leather accessories. Their commitment, professionalism, and attention-to-detail are all of immense value to us. We hope to keep you folks involved throughout our journey, and if any unforeseen obstacles were to arise, we would make it a priority to keep you folks well-informed. I, Nabil Arif will be proactively involved in the project.

Please contribute, you can help bring PRESIDER to life.

Other means of support (It would mean incredibly):

  • Share this campaign through your social media accounts
  • Personally share this project with anybody that you think would be interested
  • Tell your friends, and co-workers about this project 
  • Follow @presidergoods on Instagram, and post using the following hashtag: #presiderwallets

story:
In the Media

 

Panzer is an unique watch. So unique that most of you probably have never seen it in the world before this campaign was launched. Because I kept it as a top secret until one day I showed a prototype to my old sister. Yes, I was preparing to give it as her wedding gift. My dear sister always kind to me. "Hm, COOOL." she said, "But how does it work? Must I get the time by counting the tree rings? " She is a biologist.

So how does it work?

Following GIF may tell. The user interface is as same as the real display of Panzer.

*Please note the given GIFs don't show all the functions such as "battery life check" and "cancel time-setting".

How to trigger different functions?

Since one button is too few to switch among different modes, a 4-direction detector sensor was added. That is:

A particular angle of watch rotation + A button click  = Display modes shift / Functional selection. The given examples also do not show these actions. 

Hidden-display

The LED light is filtered by thin wood case, making it suitable to check time in the darkness or under dim light.

Dice Numeral Font, Count Your Time

Panzer's "screen" is a 7x7 LED matrix. Although it has much bigger pixels, the resolution is only  1/20,571 of the iPhone 7. It's a real challenge to display HH:MM  simultaneously on such a tiny matrix.

Inspired by Mahjong and dice, luckily I find a way out for displaying numerals: just count the lighted LED(s) on the 3x3 sub matrix, three is 3, four is 4,etc. Even Aliens can understand it.

A Smart Watch?

No. However, since it allows you to program it yourself through USB-MCX cable, you can make it smarter*.

*Backers who interested in programming of this watch could contact me in personal.

Smart is What the Smart Wear

Not very reasonable, but it's true. Smart is what the smart wear. 

USB-MCX Cable & Genuine Leather Strap

The gilded USB-MCX cable plays two roles: power charging and program downloading. You can charge Panzer by the USB ports on your laptop,  5V DC output adapters or power bank. The USB plug is also made of hardwood.

The strap is made of top layer cattlehide, strong, soft and sweat-absorbing. There will be more colors for you to choose if we win this campaign. 

*Please note these chestnuts are not for sale.

The Package

Haven't decided yet. I prefer to cut a deep slot in a piece of maple, beech or walnut, and then put the whole watch in. 

 ​I've tested dozens of woods that from Africa, Europe, India, Southeast Asia and South America, but only a few are qualified. Following woods are selected as the perks:

1. Blood Padauk [Red LED]

The fresh wood has a blood-red color (especially in the sun). As time goes, it will turn to dark red. It's very hard,  heavy and has a pleasing scent.

2. Pau Rosa [Red LED]

Has a beautiful wavy grain. It's also hard, with a high natural luster.

3. Olive [Warm-white LED]

If I have to select one kind of wood to live with the rest of my life, I will choose Olive with no hesitate. It's hard, smooth and has a sweet fruit scent. If I was a white dove, what else could it be to carry with if not olive branch?

4. Huaqi-nan [Warm-white LED]​

The entire internet cannot tell me what it actually is except some pages say "it's a kind of vine from Southeast Asia." Tell me its Latin name if you sure. It has a beautiful figure and color. 

5. Tauari [Warm-white LED]​

Also known as "Brazilian Oak". In general, it 's for solid wood flooring use. It is a very good wood material on strength and dimensional stability on hot & wet conditions.

6. Verawood [Warm-white LED]​

Verawood is extremely hard, heavy, oily, and have a feathered grain pattern. It has a distinct, perfume-like fragrance that lingers even after it has been machined. The color tends to "green" with age, especially upon exposure to light.

7. Bocote [Warm-white LED]​

Bocote is a born artist. With its striking and bold figuring, Bocote can be a very eye-catching wood. 

How It's Made & History Reversions

My DIY CNC is a real workhorse. Since I lack of woodworking machines, it plays a main role for making prototypes. 

And sanding, a lot of sanding. Unlike metal, plastic or glass, wood needs sanding again and again to accomplish a good look. Although with the help of CNC, it's still very time-consuming. 

The evolution of Panzer PCB

Risks & Challenges

I was an electronic engineer. Now I'm a designer, an EE, a coder, a carpenter, a copywriter and a photographer. Yes, I switch back and forth among these roles during the past 2 years and I now I've launched this campaign on Indiegogo. For me, standing here is already a victory.

I'd been working for an OEM company, so I know clearly it's one thing to develop some prototypes and another thing to make mass production. I'm not running for president, it's not my style to talk big (although I'm quite confident). So there will be obstacles ahead. But the biggest one have been cleared, it's time to strike back.

______________________________________________________________________________________

Notification:

No more mass production. Panzer is limited to 100 pcs in total, customized only @ $215/pcs. 10 backers limited through IGG. Thanks all especially my first backer @Su Wen and the two dearest "anonymous" donors.

Thanks!

www.eastwood.work

story:
Introducing the TAKTEK pant. We wanted to build a pant that was more than just clothing, but a tool, and an extension of your body. 

The TAKTEK pants and shorts are designed to compliment and enhance your body.

Engineered with space age fabrics, this pant is built to handle whatever your day throws at you, allowing you to seamlessly transition from business casual, to urban lifestyle, to outdoor performance. 

Packed with 13 features, and guaranteed for 365 days, these are pants like you've never seen before. 

Back our project today, and help us change clothing forever.

Available in 3 colors, Men's & Women's.  

 Packed with 13 features, these pants are engineered from space-age materials that are a true game changer. Built with tactical-grade construction, these pants are built to look great, feel amazing, and perform like nothing else. 

  

 

 

 

Available in 3 colors. Each color was carefully selected to offer great fashion appeal, and also embody outdoor and tactical sensibilities. This is the first pair of pants that will seamlessly transition from business outfits intro the great outdoors.  

 

 

 

  

 

We offer free exchanges, so if you have any sizing problems, we'll get it swapped out for a perfect fitting pair immediately. 

Thank you for being a part of our campaign. We truly value your support, and are excited to change the possibilties of clothing with you.
