story:
Project Vdora

Project Vdora is all about spreading the the Vdora lifestyle, which is beautiful and easy-going yet sustainable and conscientious. 

_

 

With the help and expertise of local seamstresses, w/ over 20 years of experience and diverse backgrounds, we're able to deliver these smart solutions. [ Thanks, Salma & DeDe ]


About Our 100% Merino Versa Line:

Smart, Versatile and Sustainable



SMART
Our Versa Toques & Throws will keep you fresh and comfortable for days:

  • Naturally Temperature Regulating
    You'll be kept warm when it’s cool and cool when it’s warm. How?
    Unlike cotton, which tends to get clammy, Merino wool absorbs the moisture from your skin and releases it to the environment. This means that it can still keep you fresh even when wet. This also means that it dries faster than most fibers.
  • Naturally Anti-Bacterial
    Thus naturally odour resistant, which means that you can wear it without washing for daaaays... which also means that you would be doing less laundry thus using less water!
  • Double-ply Toques
    For added functionality, warmth and comfort

Our Versa Toques & Throws can be worn everywhere. They are...

  • Light
    The Versa Toque and Throw are so light that everyone who has tried them so far has been surprised by how cosy they are. 
  • Stealth

    An interior secret cash stash in case you need to creatively hide your valuables. This is most beneficial when walking through streets or crowd where there is a high risk of pick-pocketing. This also becomes beneficial for women (generally speaking) who don't have pockets & just need to carry emergency cash without wanting to carry a purse.

  • Good-looking
    Our toques are simple yet fashionable. You can wear them out in the mountains or to compliment your suit as you run from meetings to meetings downtown.
  • Easily Storable
    Our 100% Merino Versa Toque can be easily folded and kept in your pocket or hung.
    Our 100% Merino Versa Throw can easily fit in a purse; rolled up or folded.

VERSATILE
Wear the VERSA TOQUE multiple Ways:

  • Toque (Beanie)
    Wear it as a hat.
  • Open Toque
    Wear it as a hat even with your hair up! Perfect for ponytails, man buns and dreads.
  • Ear Warmer / Head Band
    When you just want to keep your ears warm without messing your hair.
  • Scarf
    When you need a neck warmer instead.
  • Mask
    "Sometimes the wind hurts my face"

Get creative with the VERSA THROW. Here are some ways you can wear it:

  • Throw
    Use it as a blanket at home, at camp, on the plane, wherever!
  • Hooded Cape
    It's our favourite look.
  • Wrap Around Shawl/Poncho
    This one's great if you're feeling stylish and want to feel extra comfy
  • Open Shawl/Poncho
    When you just want to throw it on quickly
  • Scarf
    Simply let it dangle around your neck or get creative with your twists



SUSTAINABLE
We work with eco-certified suppliers. Our Versa Line is made of 100% Merino wool, which is a natural resource. They are:

  • Renewable
    Wool is an organic and renewable resource. 
  • Biodegradable
    Because wool is all-natural, it's biodegradable.
  • Recyclable (or Can Be Repurposed)
    Our durable hem tags are made of (scrap or repurposed) leather.

 

MADE IN TORONTO
We support local seamstresses, production companies and manufacturers. Because it's accessible to us, we get to oversee the process and ensure quality, care and ethical labour practices.

 

Why should you invest in the Versa Line?

We strongly advocate buying less disposable fashion and buying with more consideration.

We believe that we don't need harsh chemicals that stay in the environment for decades to provide you with quality apparel. Nature's got it all.

 

Pricing & Perks:

The available perks are located to the right of this page.
Here are some stuff you should know:
 

The Early Bird perk is for those who believe in us early on. Be one of the first 75 to support us by Boxing Day (Dec 26) to be eligible to receive the Early Bird perk.

When you contribute $40 CAD of more, you can avail an IndieGoGo Special perk. No need to wait 'til we release the items on our online shop... and because these are perks/gifts, no retail tax either! 

The Toronto (Soft) Launch Party
One of the values we live by when travelling is to learn about and respect the local culture. We practice the same in our own community. We want to show locals and visitors alike what our city has to offer. The launch party aims to do just that. Picture a small venue with a bar and local musicians serenading you as you meet likeminded folks who, like you, support the Vdora lifestyle.

This said event will be held on the last weekend of January. The details will be announced at least 2 weeks prior to the event. When you grab this perk, your name and info will be added to the guest list. You will receive a confirmation e-mail along with the event details at least 2 weeks before the event.

Fun Fact: Project Vdora's 100% Merino Versa Line logo pays tribute to "the six" / Toronto

 

 

 


Fit/Sizes/Colour:


Backers will be sent a survey where they can choose the size & colour. 
 

Timeline:

Our aim is to deliver the Versa Line to your doorstep by February 2017.



As of December 15,
we are waiting to run the first batch of production. We are testing out alternatives to the first failed batch of scrap leather used for hem tags (they were too brittle) & screen printing care instructions on the organic woven pockets that we are using for the toques.

____

Our Story: The long & short of it

"Project  Vdora"

In the past year, I have been able to live, work and travel abroad. It's an amazing opportunity that I will forever be grateful for. While overseas, I was told by people, "Que vidorra tienes!" which translates to "What a life you have!" Indeed, I felt blessed. But I wanted to share this gift. I wanted people to simply say "What a life!" - an all encompassing statement. I wanted to be able to help people enjoy the simple things in life, preserve the beauty of the world, and find ways to help those in need to make their situation a little bit easier. *Ding! Project Vdora was conceived.
 

____


FAQ
 

Why Campaign on IndieGoGo?

We want to reach a broad audience to spread our cause and receive funding that can help us jumpstart Project Vdora. Research, prototyping and production require a lot of time and money. We refuse to settle for mediocre - and that costs us a lot.  We need your help to fund our initiative. Help us raise at least $5,000 CAD in 25 days. Not only could you claim a perk but also help us work towards a greater good - share a more amazing, sustainable lifestyle!

Your donation can help Project Vdora:

  • Cover cost of production
  • Relieve us of some of the start-up costs
  • Add members to the team 
  • Rent an office / production space
  • Design and research the next line of products
  • Spread the Vdora lifestyle worldwide

Do I need to select a perk?

Nope. You can contribute any amount to the campaign without having choosing a perk. 

I want to grab multiple perks! How?

Unfortunately, IndieGoGo currently only allows one perk per transaction. You can make separate transactions for each one you'd like to avail. Sorry! 

When will my stuff ship out?

  • If you picked the Ticket + Item perk, you can pick up your Versa Toque and/or Throw at the Toronto Launch Party in January.
  • If you chose the Early Bird perk, your item/s will be in the first batch to ship out in February
  • If you chose the IndieGoGo Special, your items will ship out in February

 

Can you tell me more about shipping?

While we can't afford to pay for the all the shipping costs, we will cover about 5-10% to make the situation a bit better for you.

We will ship your items via Canada Post.

  • Shipping within Canada may take 2-5 business days using Canada Post's "Regular Parcel" Service, which includes tracking
  • Shipping to the U.S. may take 5-8 business days using Canada Post's "Small Packet Air USA"
  • Shipping to anywhere else may take 6-10 business days using Canada Post's "Small Packet Air International" service
  • Upgrades are available if you'd like your items tracked and covered
  • Upgraded Shipping to the U.S. may take 4-7 business days using Canada Post's "Tracked Packet USA" service
  • Upgraded Shipping to anywhere else may take 6-10 business days using Canada Post's "Tracked Packet International" service

You can learn more about Canada Post's timeline and  policies here. 
It is your responsibility to check and abide by your respective country's import rules & duties.

Where can I choose my size/colour?

We will send backers a survey, during the campaign / before fulfilment. Please allow a few hours/days as we prepare our backer kit.

Why do you have limited quantities?

We are dependent on our suppliers and can only work with how much fabric they have. We cannot push for more as we don't want to pressure the wool farmers to produce more than they should in a specific amount of time.

Can you break down the anatomy of the Versa Line?

Sure. The toques and throws are made of 100% Merino wool. The labels are made of natural hemp and cotton blend. The hem tags on the toques are made of leather for durability. We are currently looking into and testing out the most eco-friendly alternatives for future production.

What are the care instructions for your Versa Line?

We prefer to handwash but you can throw our Versa Toque & Throw in the wash - just make sure that it's on "warm", "gentle", and/or "wool" setting. Simply lay flat to dry. Do not bleach or tumble dry.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Wanna help but just don't have that extra cash? We understand. We've been there. Here are some other ways you can help out:

  • Spread the word. Discuss the Vdora lifestyle with your friends and fam!
  • Share our campaign on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Pinterest, Whatsapp, iMessage, Viber, you name it! @projectvdora #projectvdora #whatalife
  • Live and breathe the sustainable lifestyle



Thank You!

This campaign would not be possible without you and the team of volunteers and professionals who helped make this project a reality. Cheers!
 

To learn even more about Project Vdora, check out our website: www.projectvdora.com

We are always willing to listen and learn. Your friendly comments and suggestions are welcome :)
story_txt:
Project Vdora
Project Vdora is all about spreading the the Vdora lifestyle, which is beautiful and easy-going yet sustainable and conscientious. 
_
 
With the help and expertise of local seamstresses, w/ over 20 years of experience and diverse backgrounds, we're able to deliver these smart solutions. [ Thanks, Salma & DeDe ]

About Our 100% Merino Versa Line:
Smart, Versatile and SustainableSMARTOur Versa Toques & Throws will keep you fresh and comfortable for days:


Naturally Temperature RegulatingYou'll be kept warm when it’s cool and cool when it’s warm. How?Unlike cotton, which tends to get clammy, Merino wool absorbs the moisture from your skin and releases it to the environment. This means that it can still keep you fresh even when wet. This also means that it dries faster than most fibers.

Naturally Anti-BacterialThus naturally odour resistant, which means that you can wear it without washing for daaaays... which also means that you would be doing less laundry thus using less water!

Double-ply ToquesFor added functionality, warmth and comfort


Our Versa Toques & Throws can be worn everywhere. They are...


LightThe Versa Toque and Throw are so light that everyone who has tried them so far has been surprised by how cosy they are. 

StealthAn interior secret cash stash in case you need to creatively hide your valuables. This is most beneficial when walking through streets or crowd where there is a high risk of pick-pocketing. This also becomes beneficial for women (generally speaking) who don't have pockets & just need to carry emergency cash without wanting to carry a purse.


Good-lookingOur toques are simple yet fashionable. You can wear them out in the mountains or to compliment your suit as you run from meetings to meetings downtown.

Easily StorableOur 100% Merino Versa Toque can be easily folded and kept in your pocket or hung.Our 100% Merino Versa Throw can easily fit in a purse; rolled up or folded.

VERSATILEWear the VERSA TOQUE multiple Ways:


Toque (Beanie)Wear it as a hat.

Open ToqueWear it as a hat even with your hair up! Perfect for ponytails, man buns and dreads.

Ear Warmer / Head BandWhen you just want to keep your ears warm without messing your hair.

ScarfWhen you need a neck warmer instead.

Mask"Sometimes the wind hurts my face"


Get creative with the VERSA THROW. Here are some ways you can wear it:


ThrowUse it as a blanket at home, at camp, on the plane, wherever!

Hooded CapeIt's our favourite look.

Wrap Around Shawl/PonchoThis one's great if you're feeling stylish and want to feel extra comfy

Open Shawl/PonchoWhen you just want to throw it on quickly

ScarfSimply let it dangle around your neck or get creative with your twists


SUSTAINABLEWe work with eco-certified suppliers. Our Versa Line is made of 100% Merino wool, which is a natural resource. They are:


RenewableWool is an organic and renewable resource. 

BiodegradableBecause wool is all-natural, it's biodegradable.

Recyclable (or Can Be Repurposed)Our durable hem tags are made of (scrap or repurposed) leather.

 
MADE IN TORONTOWe support local seamstresses, production companies and manufacturers. Because it's accessible to us, we get to oversee the process and ensure quality, care and ethical labour practices.

story:
The idea of creating an online business has been sort of a pipedream for me. Like most people, the ability to be creative, set my own schedule, and be my own boss has always excited me. Most entrepreneurs form their businesses because of a chance they were given and, for me, my chance came from a series of life-altering incidents: a serious car accident and the loss of my expected career. However, finding a job given the current economy has proved to be quite difficult, so I took this as an opportunity to grow my desire of building an online business, instead. This desire is what has created the project and motto that I am presenting to you today: Hutsylife. Over the years, a close friend and I have talked about ‘living the dream’ somewhat jokingly. But this phrase has become more than just a joke to me after my accident and unemployment; I want to make Hutsylife my dream and this campaign is my attempt, through your generous support, to ‘keep the dream alive’



For starters (pun intended), given my current financial situation, Kickstarter would allow me to jump start my website and get off the ground much easier. Although the website I have created is functional and we have a wide variety of products already available, this Kickstarter project would allow me to expand my collection of attire. Primarily, the $1,000 I am asking for will go towards purchasing digital arts rights which will allow me to develop and create new product designs.



Go to Hutsylife.com and find the products you like, then choose the Package/Bundle that works best for you. The website contains over 3000+ products, therefore pledges are broken down into packages or bundles. Below is an example of how a package/bundle works.
(View FAQ for shipping information)

Example #1: Package A allows a pair of socks OR iPhone case.  Meaning you are allowed to pick ONE item. 
A pair of socks or iPhone case

Example #2: Bundle B allows you Package A+C+D. 
Meaning you are allowed to pick ONE item from each package type. 
Such as an iPhone case + Tank top + All over print shirt

Note: For Bundle pledges, under "items included" you choose ONE package combination

When the campaign is over, you will be contacted via email and given a survey to complete based upon your pledge type.



Click GIF to visit Hutsylife for Pledge options


Choose either a pair of socks or iPhone case  
(includes iPhone 5/5s/SE, 6/6s, 6/6s Plus Case, iPhone 7/7 Plus Case)



Click GIF to visit Hutsylife for Pledge options


Choose a Pillow case or Hat (includes beanies 5-panel campers, and all caps)
Tote bags are an option for this package


Click GIF to visit Hutsylife for Pledge options


Choose either a Poster (18''x24'') or Tank top (All over print or Frontal print) 



Click GIF to visit Hutsylife for Pledge options


Choose either an All over print of Frontal print shirt
(Hutsylife Brand shirt's are an option in this Package)



Click GIF to visit Hutsylife for Pledge options



Choose either a Crewneck or Hoodie or Leggings



Click GIF to visit Hutsylife for Pledge options


Choose either a Brand Crewneck or Hoodie

 





 

1. How many items do you get from a Package Pledge?
- One item of your choice. 

2. How do Bundle's work?
- A Bundle let's you pick multiple items within the given package options.

Note: For Bundle pledges, under "items included" you choose ONE package combination

Example #1: Bundle A allows you Package A x3
Meaning you are allowed to pick 3 items from Package A of either a Sock or iPhone case. Such as 1 iPhone case & 2 pair of socks or any other combination applicable.

Example #2: Bundle C allows you Package E x2 + Package A. Meaning you are allowed to pick 2 item's from Package E and 1 item from Package A. 
Such as two Crewnecks+ one iPhone case, or any other combination applicable.

3. Where do I go to pick what I want for my pledge?
- Hutsylife.com

4. How do I find what size I am for a shirt/tank/hoodie/crew? 
-Every product will have a sizing chart on the product page in our website (Hutsylife.com)

4. How do we let you know what items we have picked?
-You will be given a form to complete based upon your pledge type when the campaign is over via email. 

5. How long will it take to receive my pledge if I live in USA?
-Backers who live in USA will receive their pledge no later then end of April. 

6. How long will it take to receive my pledge if I live outside of USA?
-Backers who live outside of USA will receive their pledge no later then end of May. (Possible to receive within April, depending on your location)

7. Do I receive tracking for my pledge?
-Backers who reside in USA will have Tracking numbers, in which they will be given after their item has been shipped. 
-Backers who reside outside of USA will not have tracking (however I will give you a date in which you should receive your pledge by, if it is not received by the date given, a free re-shipment will be done instantly)

story:
SAME SIZE AS A CREDIT CARD

 

TRADITIONAL WALLET V.S. MINI

SPEED WALLET V.S. SPEED WALLET MINI

SEE IT IN ACTION

Black Italian Leather

ALL FEATURES​

 

TECH SPECS​

COLORS AVAILABLE

 

GREEN/TAN

 

ULTRA NAVY/TAN

 

MOCHA/TAN

 

BLACK BALLISTIC NYLON

 

 

WHAT THEY SAY ABOUT US

 

READY TO SHIP

OUR STORY

Three years ago, my brother and I were looking for a wallet we couldn't find so we decided to join forces and our passion for quality goods to make what we believed to be the best products on the market.

OUR MISSION

Help people be more productive and feel more comfortable by making super functional top quality products they would be proud to use.

OUR TEAM

FAQ

ARE COLORS EXACTLY AS THEY APPEAR HERE?

It‘s very hard to represent the exact color of the real product, specially considering that every screen shows colors differently. However, we tried to show the colors as accurate as possible.

HOW MUCH DOES SHIPPING COST?

We offer free worldwide shipping. However, please keep in mind that import fees or any other carrier fees are not included. Depending on your country's custom's regulations, you will have to pay for them upon arrival.

CAN I PAY WITH CASH ON DELIVERY? 

No, unfortunately it‘s not possible for us to receive payments on cash. The
purchase must be made with a credit card on Indiegogo.


HOW MUCH ARE IMPORT TAXES TO MY COUNTRY?

No extra charges at delivery for the following countries:

If your country is not on this list you may be charged for import taxes and carrier fees. 

 

WHERE DO YOU SHIP EVERYTHING FROM?

We manufacture and ship all of our products from Colombia, South America.

I HAVE A PROBLEM/NEED TO SPEAK TO SOMEONE! CAN I CALL YOU? 

We don't offer international phone call service at the moment. Please contact us at support@thefrenchieco.com We'll be more than happy to help you.

story:
This campaign will help kick off our business. We will use these funds to develop our new line of Personalized Apparel. As you choose your perk – either a style service or a beautifully constructed and personalized garment, know that you are not only getting something for yourself but you are helping us build a much needed business.

Each of us is unique in wonderful and beautiful ways. Different shapes, sizes, colors, personalities and lifestyles. It is our differences that make us who we are and our unique features that make each of us special. So, why can't our clothing reflect that too?

I went about trying to figure out how to solve this problem. Along the way I became a Certified Personal Stylist so I could at least understand why some things work and others don’t in simply putting together a “look”.  I found there is an interesting science behind the art of styling. When you match up a person’s individual “style code” which includes body shape/proportion, color and style personality you look and feel amazing! If you leave one of those elements out – something is missing.          - Terri Ghio C0-Founder, CEO and Chief Rainmaker

What we do is easy, quick and creative. You meet with a personal stylist (in-person or online) and she puts together your Style Code. Now sit back, let us take care of you and bring the fun back to shopping. We will create clothes together that will flatter your body in the right color and style details (trust us it is a three legged stool – you need them all). It is interactive and fun and the professional help you get is from Certified Stylists who really want and know how to make a difference for you.


Your garments will be personalized to you. There are at least 8,000 different possibilities.

We're on Indiegogo to raise funds to take us to our next level of development:

  • Test new styles and patterns
  • Secure access to even more fabric & trims options
  • Create a world class shopping experience for you on our website

Support our Indiegogo Campaign and do something for yourself or your daughter, mother, sister, best friend or colleague. Your contribution will help us make this vision a reality so we can help you build the wardrobe of your dreams. 

  • Purchase any of the options as a gift. Just let us know who it is for and we will reach out and let her know the exciting news.
  • Spread the word! Tell all the women you know who would benefit from our product + service.  Send them the link to this page. -- www.fundperfectly.me 
  • Share this page (see the links at the top of this page) on your favorite social media platforms. The more who know about us, the faster we can grow.  

How do I choose my sizes, colors, and styles?

At the end of the campaign we will send you a link to a page with a form to fill out. You will be partnered with a personal stylist who will help you create your new, personalized apparel. Together we will choose your best style in a color flattering on you and create it with style details that reflects your personality.

What sizes do they come in? How do I know my size?

There are no sizes – there is just you. Your personalized garments will be made for your body type and proportions.

I live outside the USA.  How do I get my clothing?

For this phase of our business, we are concentrating on the USA and Canada only.  If that’s where you live, you’ll select your perk just like everyone else.  You’ll be prompted for your shipping information in the process.  When our campaign ends, we will contact you for your styling appointment.

If you live outside the USA and Canada, stay on our mailing list!  We plan to update the locations we serve and you’ll be one of the first to know when we come to your country.

******

Have another question? Contact us on this page and one of us will respond personally!

Thanks again for your support.

-PERFECTLY.ME Team

story:
About Us

"Tim knew the joy of a great hat. He also knew the gratification that came with giving. Whether it be love, a birthday gift, or a smile, he barred no expense. This winter season, keep someone warm in his name."

Since 2013, Timmy's Hats for Tots has been collected crafted children's clothing and donating them to hospitals in New England for ill and underprivileged children. Donations are made during the holiday season, when winter is just getting started and winter clothing is sorely needed.

Donations

All monetary donations go towards crafting materials, shipping expenses, and advertisement for the organization.

Can't make a donation?

If you can't make a monetary donation but would like to donate clothing or crafted items, please email TimmysHatsforTots@gmail.com for shipping information.

story:
ABOUT ME

"NEVER FORGET WHERE YOU CAME FROM AND NEVER TAKE YOUR EYES OFF WHERE YOU'RE HEADING"

ARGENTINE>BS AS> MAR DEL PLATA CITY

HERE ,SOFIA ROMAN

Since I was very little I had always wanted to become a professional field hockey player. It was a very sacrificed path that I had to go through, but I succeeded and felt very proud about it.

For 5 years, I played for my National Field Hockey Team, including World Cups and Pre-Olympic Games.

Being a professional athlete was my school for values and helped me learn how important is dedication and passion in life.

-STAGE ONE: SOMETHING CAME ACROSS MY MIND

One day I realized that my creativity was not fulfill, my passion for design was still  awake. So I started studying fashion design and got my degree. It was then when I built and ran my own fashion boutique, which featured my label, Sofia Roman.

I designed, scheduled and staff my own runway shows and fashion events as well.

HERE, SOME OF MY WORK


-STAGE TWO: AGAINST ALL ODDS.

After a complicated situation related to family changes and a long process I went through, I had my biggest wakeup call and realized the value of life.  

It is said that "the value of life lies not in the length of the days but how we make use of them”.

-STAGE THREE: MOVING FOWARD

My life has always been intense, but to never give up and keep on taking risks is the biggest motivation of all, as well as never forgetting people that helpt you on the way and the ones that are left behind. Everyone teaches you something. The secret is to learn from everyone, everytime.

So... now here I am, willing to make my biggest dream come true, looking forward for you to discover what I do, and have a chance to show my work at NYC Fashion Week 2015.

A Mega Fashion Show Cost Breakdown in NYC goes like this:

Venue: up to $100,000

Hair and Makeup: up to $100,000

Stylist: $5,000 to $20,000

Public Relations: $10,000 to $25,000 for a monthly retainer

Models: up to $200,000

Lighting: from $10,000 

Invitations: from $5,000

WHAT I NEED

After doing a deep three months research on the market, contacting people, going to fashion shows, meeting with investors, fashion producers and asking stylists, I came to the conclusion and the certainty that I can make it happen with 30K.

Fortunately, my Budget is highly reduced as I already have the location for free so the money will be destined to:

1) Hiring Models

2) Hair and Make Up

3) The Set Up> Lighting, Furniture, Runway Parade, Sound System, Catering.

4) Inivitations> Printing and Delivery

5) Hiring Staff> I will offer a whole week volunteer internship for fashion students. I want to give them the opportunity to experience, learn and feel how dynamic a fashion show is. This will reduce my budget as well.

6) PR> Press Call, Bloggers and Fashion Stylists attention. Nowadays, Social Media is extremely important for an instant expanding in the fashion industry .

 THE IMPORTANCE TO GIVE SOMETHING IN RETURN

Also, by supporting Sofia Roman Fashion Show NY 2015, 5% of the raising will be destined to the Argentine Association of Children who suffer from Cystic Fibrosis (ASFIM)  

Cystic Fibrosis (CF)  is an autosomal recessive genetic disorder that affects mostly the lungs, and also the pancreas, liver, intestine and capability of breathing of a person.

WHAT ABOUT @ASFIM?

ASFIM is an Argentinian nonprofit, donor-supported organization, leaded by a group of parents whose children suffer from Cystic Fibrosis. The Foundation funds lifesaving research and works to provide access to quality, specialized care and effective treatments for people with CF, no matter the social economic status.

Nearly every CF drug available for argentine children today was made possible because of Foundation support. Through its efforts, the life expectancy of a child with CF has increased, and research to find a cure is more promising than ever before.

  FOLLOW @Asfim Mar del Plata

GOOD TO KNOW

In case of having extra funds or exceeding the purpose, this will be donated.

Getting brand recognition is extremely difficult. It takes hard work & dedication but most of all it costs money... but ANYONE WHO DARES, WINS. If I achieve my goal I will be taking a huge leap from my previous work and I promise to give you the best of me.

NETWORK EXPAND

If you are unable to pledge an amount, your support is not lost.  Help spread the word about SOFIA ROMAN dream.  Tell your friends and family.  Share on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and e-mail.

story:
What is Tracky?

How do you picturise your sportswear?
Smart, focussed and spontaneous- just like you
and the intelligence to see beyond what you see...
If that’s true, then come and get Tracky, as this is where your search culminates!
Close to your body with the minute sensors, always sensing, monitoring and analyzing your heart rate and body temperature. Your complete work out report in your phone in a matter of moments- it is that unbelievably simple.
Now, here is your personal coach at it best!


What Tracky tracks?

  • Body Movements: Be it any form of physical activity, Tracky systematically traces the corresponding action points. Run, dribble, stretch, do yoga or any customised exercise and Tracky will let you know the impact.
  • Heart rate: The net impact of the work out regime and the health is reflected in the subtle variations of the heart rate before any other physical signs. Tracky uses this information as an input to analyse your optimum point so that you reap the maximum benefit of your workout without fatigue.
  • Body Temperature: The major parameter that is used to let you know to stop, rest and cool off because Tracky knows that the more energy that you use, the more your body temperature will be.

    •  

What Tracky can do?

Tracky is your expert advisor in sports science. You know your workout in terms of the efficiency and impact it has on your body by having a look at the meaningful data and intelligent feedback by Tracky and there is more to it than just graphical interpretations.
Name the method of work out and Tracky knows it. Create anything new and Tracky learns it alongside you. And Tracky knows- it’s all about efficiency and end result, and it’s most important to keep the rate of injury to the minimum possible level.
For instance, Tracky points out if your stretching is not having the adequate efficiency, if your posture needs correction during yoga, or the angle of your feet is not appropriate while track running.

 

Who can use Tracky?


The answer is anyone! Anyone who loves to stay fit or achieve a fitness milestone including athletes who want to do it with a blend of fun and sytematicity, coach or trainer who is sharp to the details, researchers or biomechanical scientists who would like to explore the uniqueness of Tracky.

The Ardour Gym work-outs:
To hone every moment of the work out to perfection, Tracky counts your workout, systematically analyzes and provides you with live feedback. Be proud as you see yourself improving every minute, every hour and everyday as Tracky provides you the efficiency report as time progresses.

The Yoga devotees:
A perfect yoga pose was previously achieved by years and years of practise- not anymore! Tracky can help you achieve that perfect, most effective and most powerful asanas with a specific time frame. Tracky understands the principles of yoga and guides you to the perfect posture by monitoring the heart rate and temperature as well as the body movements.

The Sports enthusiasts:
Defying the concept of one sport at a time, Tracky is powerful enough to understand and incorporate multiple sports. To begin with, Tracky is all set to be with the athletes and players of Running, cycling, boxing, tennis and soccer. Whether, it is a jab, hook, dribble, pass, swing or volley, Tacky analyses your movements, skills and techniques. Tracky is in the process of being incorporated for all other sports items in the near future.
We are also providing open API, so that developers also can create own apps for new sports.
If you have any queries, related to open API / Developer kit, please do not hesitate to drop an email to us. We will be happy to revert back to you with all details.


The Trainers & Coaches
Sharper and precise than an athlete in understanding- that is what a coach is. Tracky is specially designed to make a better and accurate understanding of the body of the athlete by giving detailed graphical reports. Considering the impact of the movements even considering the subtlest of the indications and criteria, Tracky helps the coaches and trainers in reaching a more suitable decision for the training.
Sharing the comparative report of the current pattern and the desired pattern helps your trainee to move ahead in the desired direction with more understanding. The result is a faster, better and positive result with minimum effort and time.


The Bio-mechanical Researchers
Our vision is a world where the products of R&D should be accessible to be studied upon, developed upon and to be loved. We just did that with Tracky. Sports sciences till now was accessible only to the elite athletes due to affordability and non comprehensible technology for a layman, which hindered the passion to possess a device.


Here, we come with the revolution that takes technology to everyone. We invested tremendous amount of energy for building the algorithm to give detailed reports on biomechanical analysis, comparative study and performance evaluation for all the enthusiasts to use and create a beautiful world of sports based on science.


How Tracky works?


The sensor strap of Tracky is seamlessly integrated with a 9– axis motion sensor. Each individual sensor is capable of capturing the whole movement of the body in a 3-dimensional space and sends all the captured data to a beautifully designed hub. Hub collects all the data, processes it and sends it to IOS/Android devices through Bluetooth or Wi-Fi.
In the absence of Bluetooth and Wi-Fi, the hub has an internal storage where it stores the data which can be transferred to your phone when you have access to Wi-Fi Bluetooth. You will also be able to transfer it to your desktop or mac later after you sync it phone by using USB cable. We just made it safe and easy for you as all the data is stored in secured cloud server as well.
The entire system of Tracky wear including the hub is incredibly light weight and designed keeping the biomechanics in mind so that it is the most comfortable wearable technology that does not disturb even the extreme and fastest body movements.


How Tracky is unique

  • Set a personalized goal of your choice. For instance, Reducing your body weight by 5 kilograms in 30 days, or Achieving 200 m Track run in 50 seconds
  • Tracky generates a campaign plan to achieve your specific goal and optimizes when you miss a workout schedule
  • Equipped to track all your sports and fitness activities ranging from gym workouts, athlete training, yoga sessions- all with a single device
  • Tracks your body movements, heart rate,  temperature and the biomechanical parameters
  • Fitness intelligence notifies and guides you when your workout is not perfect
  • 3D Visualization to analyse and understand the posture and performance
  • Learns alongside you when new workouts which are not in library are practised.
  • Real-time feedbacks to perfect your techniques
  • Open API for developers
  • Can be made more competitive by setting  goals , difficulty level and progress with campaign plan
  • Its social – Share progress, compete with your friends and make it fun!

    •  

 

Frequently Asked Question

What Does Tracky Really tracks?

Tracky tracks Body movements, Heart-rate & Body temperature.

Is The Tracky Kit Waterproof?

  1. Tracky is not waterproof as of now. However, you’ll still preserve the data if you get caught in light rain. While Tracky itself is machine washable, we request that you disconnect it from the sensor strap before the wash. 
  2. The Hub is water-resistant. It will do well with sweat and regular fitness wear and tear but it is not built to dive into the pool with you. We also ask that you disconnect the Hub from your Tracky wear before washing.

What Devices Does The Tracky App Support?

The application is presently available for iOS and Android platforms only. We will release the Windows version in the future. 

Can I Use The Sensors And Hub With Other Tracky Wear?

Yes, you can! Simply unclip the sensors from the sensor strap of one shirt and clip them into the other Tracky wear.

How Do I Wear The Tracky Suit?

Just like you would wear any other T-shirt and track pant! Simply put on your T-shirt and compressed pant and snap the light weighted hub in place on the right side of your abdomen. To transmit your data to your app, make sure the hub is connected to your phone via Bluetooth or Wi-Fi

How Does My Tracky Share Data With My Phone?

The little hub collects the data from your Tracky wear and transmits it to your phone via Bluetooth or Wi-Fi.

In What Sizes Is The Tracky Wear Available?

Our T-shirts are available in sizes from small to extra-large. These fit almost everyone. The compressed pant also comes in default sizes.  

How Do I Charge My Hub?

Use a regular micro-USB connector to connect the hub to your computer or wall charger. We include the charging cable into your Tracky kit to make sure that you have everything you need. 

How Long Does The Tracky Battery Last?

The Tracky battery lasts 8 to 10 hours during a continuous workout.

Do You Have An API And/Or An SDK?

Yes, we do provide an open API so that developers can create their own applications.

Who Can Use Tracky? 

The answer is anyone! Anyone who loves to stay fit or achieve a fitness milestone including athletes who want to do it with a blend of fun and sytematicity, coach or trainer who is sharp to the details, researchers or biomechanical scientists who would like to explore the uniqueness of Tracky.

What Do Tracky Kits Contain?

  1. Compression T-shirt
  2. Compression Pants
  3. TRACKY+ Sensor Strap
  4. TRACKY+ Hub
  5. Charging cable
  6. User manual

Can I Wear Clothes Over Tracky Wear?

Yes, you can.

How Many Kinds Of Sport Is Tracky Designed To Monitor?

We designed Tracky for 5 main sports –Running, Boxing, Cycling, Tennis and Soccer.

What About The Possibility Of Monitoring Other Sports?

We plan to incorporate other sports in the near future. Meanwhile we provide an open API so that developers can create new apps for more sports. 

How does One Pre-Order Tracky?

You can pre-order Tracky via the Indiegogo website. You can mail us at support@projectpole.com for any assistance.

    Our vision  is a world where the products of R&D should be accessible to be studied  upon, developed upon and to be loved. We just did that with Tracky. Sports  sciences till now was accessible only to the elite athletes due to  affordability and non comprehensible technology for a layman, which hindered  the passion to possess a device.

          Here, we  come with the revolution that takes technology to everyone. We invested  tremendous amount of energy for building the algorithm to give detailed reports  on biomechanical analysis, comparative study and performance evaluation for all  the enthusiasts to use and create a beautiful world of sports based on science.


How Tracky works?

          The sensor  strap of Tracky is seamlessly integrated with a 9– axis motion sensor. Each  individual sensor is capable of capturing the whole movement of the body in a  3-dimensional space and sends all the captured data to a beautifully designed  hub. Hub collects all the data, processes it and sends it to IOS/Android  devices through Bluetooth or Wi-Fi. 
          In the  absence of Bluetooth and Wi-Fi, the hub has an internal storage where it stores  the data which can be transferred to your phone when you have access to Wi-Fi  Bluetooth. You will also be able to transfer it to your desktop or mac later  after you sync it phone by using USB cable. We just made it safe and easy for  you as all the data is stored in secured cloud server as well.
          The entire  system of Tracky wear including the hub is incredibly light weight and designed  keeping the biomechanics in mind so that it is the most comfortable wearable  technology that does not disturb even the extreme and fastest body movements.


How Tracky is unique

Set a personalized goal of your choice. For instance, Reducing  your body weight by 5 kilograms in 30 days, or Achieving 200 m Track run in 50  seconds
Tracky generates a campaign plan to achieve your specific goal and  optimizes when you miss a workout schedule
Equipped to track all your sports and fitness activities ranging  from gym workouts, athlete training, yoga sessions- all with a single device
Tracks your body movements, heart rate,  temperature and the biomechanical parameters
Fitness intelligence notifies and guides you when your workout is  not perfect
3D Visualization to analyse and understand the posture and  performance
Learns alongside you when new workouts which are not in library  are practised.
Real-time feedbacks to perfect your techniques
Open API for developers
Can be made more competitive by setting  goals , difficulty level and progress with campaign  plan 
Its social – Share progress, compete with your friends and make it  fun! 
 

  
Frequently Asked Question
What Does Tracky Really tracks?
Tracky tracks Body movements, Heart-rate & Body temperature.
Is The Tracky Kit Waterproof?

Tracky is not waterproof as of now. However, you’ll still preserve the data if you get caught in light rain. While Tracky itself is machine washable, we request that you disconnect it from the sensor strap before the wash. 
The Hub is water-resistant. It will do well with sweat and regular fitness wear and tear but it is not built to dive into the pool with you. We also ask that you disconnect the Hub from your Tracky wear before washing.

What Devices Does The Tracky App Support?
The application is presently available for iOS and Android platforms only. We will release the Windows version in the future. 
Can I Use The Sensors And Hub With Other Tracky Wear?
Yes, you can! Simply unclip the sensors from the sensor strap of one shirt and clip them into the other Tracky wear.
How Do I Wear The Tracky Suit?
Just like you would wear any other T-shirt and track pant! Simply put on your T-shirt and compressed pant and snap the light weighted hub in place on the right side of your abdomen. To transmit your data to your app, make sure the hub is connected to your phone via Bluetooth or Wi-Fi
How Does My Tracky Share Data With My Phone?
The little hub collects the data from your Tracky wear and transmits it to your phone via Bluetooth or Wi-Fi.
In What Sizes Is The Tracky Wear Available?
Our T-shirts are available in sizes from small to extra-large. These fit almost everyone. The compressed pant also comes in default sizes.  
How Do I Charge My Hub?
Use a regular micro-USB connector to connect the hub to your computer or wall charger. We include the charging cable into your Tracky kit to make sure that you have everything you need. 
How Long Does The Tracky Battery Last?
The Tracky battery lasts 8 to 10 hours during a continuous workout.
Do You Have An API And/Or An SDK?
Yes, we do provide an open API so that developers can create their own applications.
Who Can Use Tracky? 
The answer is anyone! Anyone who loves to stay fit or achieve a fitness  milestone including athletes who want to do it with a blend of fun and  sytematicity, coach or trainer who is sharp to the details, researchers or  biomechanical scientists who would like to explore the uniqueness of Tracky.
What Do Tracky Kits Contain?

Compression T-shirt
Compression Pants
TRACKY+ Sensor Strap
TRACKY+ Hub
Charging cable
User manual

Can I Wear Clothes Over Tracky Wear?
Yes, you can.
How Many Kinds Of Sport Is Tracky Designed To Monitor?
We designed Tracky for 5 main sports –Running, Boxing, Cycling, Tennis and Soccer.
What About The Possibility Of Monitoring Other Sports?
We plan to incorporate other sports in the near future. Meanwhile we provide an open API so that developers can create new apps for more sports. 
How does One Pre-Order Tracky?
You can pre-order Tracky via the Indiegogo website. You can mail us at support@projectpole.com for any assistance.

story:
Short Summary

B.A.D APPAREL STUDIOS is an upscale women clothing boutique/photography studio that intends to open Fall of 2015 in Midtown NY. B.A.D APPAREL will carry a mix collection of Ready-to-Wear (RTW) designs of urban, swim wear, Couture and casual/contemporary apparel & accessories for women. It will be home for today’s everyday women, from plus size to teen wear. In addition B.A.D APPAREL will feature other choice selections by American and European designers such as Lockdown International Design. The B.A.D APPAREL customer is a busy professional woman, mom, artist, and model who lives in New York City. She enjoys the unique boutique fashions and wants a place where she can go to get services that meet her busy lifestyle.

What We Need & What You Get

B.A.D would like to raise money for our store front with both our M6 Cr8tion’s T shirt line and our very own fashion show. Headline as “M6 Cr8tions” fashion show is intended to launch Saturday April 11th 2015. Startup costs for the show will include Rent, food and drinks, operation expenses, payroll for staff, Models, Stylist, hair and makeup. The fashion show in all of which will produce future benefits for the store front are estimated at $8,000. Dollars. We’ve already raised $2,000 through personal investments and online sales. We also plan to donate some of the funds of our fashion show to a charity of the audience’s choice. If you help us not only would you be helping our company grow but also help with the donation of a much need charity Such as cancer research, domestic violence and sheltering and feeding the homeless. Which will be the top three charities for our audience to decide from.

The Impact

(Photography section of store)

B.A.D APPAREL’s photography section will be the unique part of the store. Never been done before in the NYC area will give shoppers a one stop experience in shopping. Not only will the shopper be able to purchase one of a kind brand and the latest trends, but they will also have the option to experience feeling great in their clothes with the option of a photo shoot. With top photographers such as Lillie Brown of Beautiful achieving Dames LLC and Kim Spears of Fashions Tops INC, the customer will truly have the shopping experience fashion runway.

                                           OUR SIGNATURE "PEARL" DRESS

                                      OUR SIGNATURE "ROSE" DRESS

                                      OUR SIGNATURE "SKY" DRESS

                             OUR SIGNATURE "CUTTER SLEEK" DRESS

                                THE GRAND PHOTO SHOOT EXPERIENCE

 EXPERIENCE THE GRAND PHOTO SHOOT EXPERIENCE (ONLY IN THE NYC AREA)

    OUR SIGNATURE SWAG T SHIRTS (CUSTOMIZE ONE OF YOUR OWN TODAY)

Risks & Challenges

 If we dont raise enough for this fashion show it will prolong the process of opening up our store front and doing something great for our community such as donating to a much needed charity.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cant contribute with a donation no biggie there are other ways to help. By sharing this campaign and getting the word out on your social media sites. Also Liking our Facebook like page or following us on our Twitter and Instgram pages will be such a great help. Thank you so much.

story:
Elegant Swipe & Auto-return* mechanism: Uncover contents with a intuitive swipe and see it close itself when released.

                        


Retractable  Drawer, OUR FIRST STRETCH GOAL: An add-on that makes Kallet truly versatile! (Free for every Kallet if our first stretch goal of $50,000 is reached!)


*Patent Pending

LOVED BY:



Stretch Goals

1st Goal at $50,000


More stretch goals to come after achieving our goal! ;)

Perks

Your pledges will not only fund the production of Kallets, but are also your exclusive chance to pre-order your very own Kallet before anyone else, at special prices, through our perks!

Specs

Capacity:

6x Credit Cards

8x ID cards

20x 300gsm cards

20x notes


Team

Alvin: After graduating from a college in Singapore, I made my first step into the working world as a sales executive, where exchanging name cards was part of my everyday ritual.That is when I realized that my cards crease so easily in my traditional wallet. I set out to look for something that can not only keep my cards crisp and in presentable condition, but something that also looks sleek. After a long, fruitless search in stores, I sought out my childhood friend, Klain, and we took things into our own hands.

Klain: I took a different path after graduation and joined a well-known innovative company as a design engineer. In my college years, I won a few design competitions in Singapore. When Alvin shared with me his idea to revolutionize how people carry one of their most intimate items, it stoked my passion to improve lives through innovative designs.

We at KAXION want to bring new and smart designs into everyday lives, starting with Kallet. Help us and let’s create a new wave in this world together!


Other Ways You can Help!

There are many ways to contribute! You can also help us turn Kallet into a reality by sharing this Indiegogo campaign with your friends. Just click on any of the Facebook and other sharing buttons, and let the world know about Kallet! 

facebook.com/kaxionkallet




Adventure Timeline

Challenges

Design for Manufacturing

We are doing something that has never been done before: Revolutionizing how we carry our most personal items. Our prototypes are rigorously tested to create an optimal final product that meets our strict manufacturing requirements. Kallet may be further modified. In addition to keeping you up to date, we will ensure any that changes made during manufacturing stay true to our original design intentions.

We are committed to bringing you a great product and will not settle for anything less. Hence, during the manufacturing stage, we will actively work with our factory to make sure everything is up to our standards. We recognise that this might result in a longer manufacturing process if complications arise. While we find it important to make sure Kallets are shipped in a timely manner, we prioritize quality above all else. Be rest assured that we will keep everyone updated on our progress so there will be no surprises.

Media Coverage

http://www.trendhunter.com/trends/metal-wallet

http://n4bb.com/kallet-coolest-wallet-youve-seen/

http://odditymall.com/kallet-wallet-that-slides-open

http://gearnova.com/kallet-is-the-coolest-wallet-you-will-ever-see/

http://www.bestslimwallet.com/kallet-swipe-auto-return-wallet/


FAQ

•Is Kallet safe for my credit cards?

Kallet does not contain any magnetic component, so the magnetic strips in your cards are safe. On top of that, Kallet’s shell blocks NFC signals, protecting your cards from possible duplication and theft. 

•How long is the warranty?

We’ve got you covered. Kallet offers a two year warranty to cover manufacturing defects. (Damage caused by unreasonable use or neglect will not be covered by the warranty.)

•How I can put my banknotes/bills?

You can leave your notes/bills in any of the compartments. We designed Kallets’ bends and cuts to securely store your notes without them slipping out! We also have an DRAWER add-on for your coins and other items!

•How are products shipped?
The shipping includes a tracking number to make sure delivery is a smooth process for you. Currently, we are negotiating with our fulfillment partner. Your contribution will help bring down the shipping cost for everyone if we have a larger volume. Help us now!

story:
The Dloko Choir will be visiting the Edinburgh Festival Fringe this year on their first trip out of South Africa.

The 30-strong choir hail from an impoverished school based in J section, Umlazi, a township outside Durban, an area beset by horrific levels of violent and sexual crime. The youngsters will be using their time at the Fringe to raise money to take back to their hometown. While the members of the choir, most of whom only own one pair of shoes, are used to performing in bare feet, they may find the pavements of Scotland’s capital city to be a little less pleasant to walk on unshod! And that’s why, with your help, we want to raise enough money to buy a new pair of shoes for each and every member. As well as keeping their feet warm through the unpredictable August weather, these shoes are also likely to last them a long time once they’re back home, and will be much appreciated by their new owners.

But why just help 30 people when you can help 60? That was our thinking when we decided we would purchase Tom’s Shoes for the Dloko choir. For every pair of shoes bought, Tom’s will donate another pair to someone in the developing world, and have already provided around 10 million pairs worldwide.

And as if that wonderful feeling of helping your fellow man was not enough – we’ll also give a free pair of tickets to one of the choirs shows at The Assembly Rooms to the first ten people who donate £40. £40 is enough to buy one pair of shoes outright - and also provides another pair to someone else in the developing world!

story:
Short Summary

A passionate and diverse group of executive MBA students at Duke came together and created Mantra financial. Our passion lies in making the funds available to the right people (Banking is one of the oldest businesses) for their Sporting needs.

  • A couple of IT veterans, Client development expert, and an experienced Entrepreneur have taken up the challenge to solve the problem of convenience in borrowing when buying Power sports equipment. We are raising funds to establish legal and regulatory paperwork for the company. Our 50 years of combined experience needs a boost of your funds so we establish Mantra in an environment of compliant and clean lending.

What We Need & What You Get

We have zoomed down on a law firm who are experienced in advising the financial institutions. Your money is going to help pay the cost of working through compliance requirements. 

If you are reading this, you are obviously as passionate about power sports as we are. We are going to publish the week by week report on progress to the early investors and contributors. You will also get a chance to vote for your favorite power sports brand so we enable your favorite brand to become reachable to many more fans.

The Impact

Your early engagement is necessary for us to bring your dreams to reality. We realize it is a tough environment for people to borrow and even for banks to lend money out. Our business model allows us to identify you (without having to wait a long time) and provide the right amount of funds for your needs. This company is going to be built on great customer service and the realization that it is about people and their dreams.

It is your turn to make the difference through a contribution and bring your passion to the world. Please do mention this campaign to your friends...

story:
Shop now at tenslife.com!


Our Indiegogo campaign this summer completely blew us away... we want to extend our thanks once again to everyone that supported us and cemented the start of Tens!

It's been amazing to see Tens all over the world via #TheRealLifePhotoFilter - See what people think on Instagram!

After month of shipping orders across the globe, Indiegogo invited us to be part of this pilot program - allowing us to continue selling Tens through Indiegogo indefinitely!

   

"Tens enhance your field of view to the extent that a clunky device never could. In a sense, they’re Instagram to the second power” - VICE

“When you put them on, the world around you is bathed in a Polaroid-like warmth” - CNET

"The ultimate filter" - TIME

Tens is a sunglasses brand with a simple ambition; to make your day look ten times better. Through our custom lens tint we aim to add an extra burst of colour to your summer. 

We're continuing to offer our debut frame style ‘The Classic’ through Indiegogo. Select a perk on the right hand side to order your pair of Tens. 


Tens is defined by the idea of filtering the things you see through our custom, sense-heightening lens tint. Whilst typical sunglasses block out the light with desaturated, cold colours; Tens work with the warmth of the sun to lend an uplifting tint to the world beyond the lens.

The lens features UV400 protection, blocking 100% of harmful rays. Made from a CR-39 plastic polymer, the lens is scratch resistant - holding up to the rigours of everyday life.

It’s taken us almost three years to achieve the perfect lens. We promise that the Tens lens is like no other, it will truly make your day look ten times better. 


Our first frame style 'The Classic' is available in a unisex fit and comes in 4 matte colours. It's made from a durable, adventure-proof acetate and features a strong 5-tooth hinge. 


Due to the initial costs and high minimum order quantities in manufacturing our sunglasses, we need your support to allow us to begin our first production run. Here’s how you can support our campaign and be the first to wear Tens this summer:

1) Select a perk on the right hand side to start your order

2) Continue onto the next page to enter shipping information followed by payment details. Note; if you would like to contribute necessary international postage costs, you can change the figure above.

3) Complete payment via Paypal or using your credit/debit card. 

4) Your Tens will be dispatched within 7 days of you ordering. Delivery time to UK/Europe will take 2 - 5 days. Rest of the World will take up to 10 days. 



How long will my Tens take to arrive?

Your Tens will be dispatched within 7 days of you ordering. Delivery time to UK/Europe will take 2 - 5 days. Rest of the World will take up to 10 days. 

We are aiming to reduce this time with a new distribution system in October 2014 and ensure you get your Tens as fast as possible.

Does our Tens lens protect your eyes from harmful rays and are they polarised?

Tens feature UV400 protection, blocking 100% of harmful rays. Our sunglasses aren't polarised. The reason for this is that the perfect lens tint isn't possible whilst being polarised.

What makes our Tens lens special in comparison to other lenses?

We have spent almost 3 years working with our supplier to create a perfect, sense-heightening tint. To our knowledge, there are no other sunglasses available on the market that will offer you as pleasurable a view as Tens. You’re going to love them!

What size are Tens?

Tens are a standard size. Measurements are as follows:
Width - 142mm
Height - 47mm
Length of leg - 137mm

Are Tens available with prescription lenses?

Unfortunately we don't currently offer a prescription version of Tens, but it's certainly something we wish to provide in the near future. Keep in touch via our social networks for updates!

I entered my address incorrectly. Can I change it?

Please email indiegogo@tenslife.com with subject title: ‘Address Change’. Thank you.

Are Tens available in other colours or frame styles?

Tens are currently available in four matte finish colours: Black, Navy, Deep Red and Teal. We will be releasing new frame styles in 2015.


Please ensure you've read the FAQ before contacting us!

Backers: indiegogo@tenslife.com

Business Enquiries: business@tenslife.com

Press Enquiries: press@tenslife.com

Thanks for taking the time to check out Tens! We'd hugely appreciate you sharing it with your friends.

#TheRealLifePhotoFilter

Marty, Kris & Tom

(@marty, @_krisreid and @getdeluxe)

After month of shipping orders across the globe, Indiegogo invited us to be part of this pilot program - allowing us to continue selling Tens through Indiegogo indefinitely!   "Tens enhance your field of view to the extent that a clunky device never could. In a sense, they’re Instagram to the second power” - VICE“When you put them on, the world around you is bathed in a Polaroid-like warmth” - CNET"The ultimate filter" - TIMETens is a sunglasses brand with a simple ambition; to make your day look ten times better. Through our custom lens tint we aim to add an extra burst of colour to your summer. We're continuing to offer our debut frame style ‘The Classic’ through Indiegogo. Select a perk on the right hand side to order your pair of Tens. Tens is defined by the idea of filtering the things you see through our custom, sense-heightening lens tint. Whilst typical sunglasses block out the light with desaturated, cold colours; Tens work with the warmth of the sun to lend an uplifting tint to the world beyond the lens.The lens features UV400 protection, blocking 100% of harmful rays. Made from a CR-39 plastic polymer, the lens is scratch resistant - holding up to the rigours of everyday life.It’s taken us almost three years to achieve the perfect lens. We promise that the Tens lens is like no other, it will truly make your day look ten times better. Our first frame style 'The Classic' is available in a unisex fit and comes in 4 matte colours. It's made from a durable, adventure-proof acetate and features a strong 5-tooth hinge. Due to the initial costs and high minimum order quantities in manufacturing our sunglasses, we need your support to allow us to begin our first production run. Here’s how you can support our campaign and be the first to wear Tens this summer:1) Select a perk on the right hand side to start your order2) Continue onto the next page to enter shipping information followed by payment details. Note; if you would like to contribute necessary international postage costs, you can change the figure above.3) Complete payment via Paypal or using your credit/debit card. 4) Your Tens will be dispatched within 7 days of you ordering. Delivery time to UK/Europe will take 2 - 5 days. Rest of the World will take up to 10 days. How long will my Tens take to arrive?Your Tens will be dispatched within 7 days of you ordering. Delivery time to UK/Europe will take 2 - 5 days. Rest of the World will take up to 10 days. We are aiming to reduce this time with a new distribution system in October 2014 and ensure you get your Tens as fast as possible.Does our Tens lens protect your eyes from harmful rays and are they polarised?Tens feature UV400 protection, blocking 100% of harmful rays. Our sunglasses aren't polarised. The reason for this is that the perfect lens tint isn't possible whilst being polarised.What makes our Tens lens special in comparison to other lenses?We have spent almost 3 years working with our supplier to create a perfect, sense-heightening tint. To our knowledge, there are no other sunglasses available on the market that will offer you as pleasurable a view as Tens. You’re going to love them!What size are Tens?Tens are a standard size. Measurements are as follows: Width - 142mmHeight - 47mmLength of leg - 137mmAre Tens available with prescription lenses?
Unfortunately we don't currently offer a prescription version of Tens, but it's certainly something we wish to provide in the near future. Keep in touch via our social networks for updates!I entered my address incorrectly. Can I change it?Please email indiegogo@tenslife.com with subject title: ‘Address Change’. Thank you.Are Tens available in other colours or frame styles?Tens are currently available in four matte finish colours: Black, Navy, Deep Red and Teal. We will be releasing new frame styles in 2015.Please ensure you've read the FAQ before contacting us!Backers: indiegogo@tenslife.comBusiness Enquiries: business@tenslife.comPress Enquiries: press@tenslife.comThanks for taking the time to check out Tens! We'd hugely appreciate you sharing it with your friends.#TheRealLifePhotoFilterMarty, Kris & Tom(@marty, @_krisreid and @getdeluxe)

story:
Little Buddha Reviews Needs a New Feature!

Hi, my name is John Sedawie.

I have a website, Little Buddha Reviews (“where there is big love for small toys”), which showcases the world of small toys, designer vinyl and collectible art figures.

I plan to add a monthly Mystery Box service called "What's in the Box?!" Each month, subscribers will receive a Mystery Box filled with collectible figures from the leaders in the industry: Funko, Kidrobot, Tokidoki, Titan, The Loyal Subjects and many more! (Well, when I say “filled,” I mean they will receive, on average, about 5 - 6 items – it will all depend on what is available at that time and the cost associated with them.)

This is a fantastic deal for the subscribers, regardless of how many items are in the box, as The retail value of each box will be much greater than the cost of the monthly subscription.

This “What’s in the Box” program will also help boost viewership to Little Buddha Reviews, so it’s a win-win for my small business and my present and future customers.

How It Will Work

Once I start gaining capital (with your help) I will be able to create the brand design for the Mystery Box (in other words, its logo and packaging), and then I’ll be able to start the marketing push to collect subscribers. I’ll start accepting subscribers a month before I order the products that will go into the Mystery Box.  This way, I will have a good idea of how many subscribers I will have in the first month, which will ensure that I will be shipping the most current and sought-after items possible.

I will continue to accept subscribers until I've reached my limit of products ordered. I will designate a "ship-out" date so that my subscribers will have a rough idea of when they will receive their package. As an additional marketing strategy, I will ship out a handful of Mystery Boxes to well-known toy reviewers in exchange for a free review. This will increase my subscriber base for the next month.

Financial Breakdown

I have well-established accounts with many manufacturers and distributors through my online toy store, Monkeyface Toys. To make the Mystery Box profitable, I need to buy in bulk, however, and then market it to all my loyal readers – and potential new readers.

Here’s the cost breakdown:

$6,000 - Purchase products

$2,000 - Marketing

$800 - Shipping Supplies

$200 - Procedural costs (web hosting and subscription fees)

$1,000 - Brand creation (graphic design)

$1,000 – Miscellaneous

The Impact

I hope to bring some joy to all the toy lovers and collectors out there. Everyone loves getting mail so, I believe, subscribers will anxiously await their mystery package each month and will have a lot of fun opening the box and discovering what's inside.

The Mystery Box will therefore allow Little Buddha Reviews to keep our current readership base and expand our readership considerably. That in turn will help make Little Buddha Reviews a successful online business, and enable us to keep providing valuable information to our readers – toy collectors young and old.

Help me spread a little joy with toys!

A Little Bit About Me

I've always been a toy enthusiast. About ten years ago, I decided to turn my love for toys into a business. I created an online toy company called Monkeyface Toys.

I began my selling on eBay and was able to increase my sales every year. Eventually I created a website for Monkeyface Toys, and over the last ten years I’ve learned a lot about the distribution and marketing game.

About a year ago, I created a new website, Little Buddha Reviews, which showcases the world of small toys, designer vinyl and collectible art figures. This new website allowed me to express my love for toys in a whole new way. I'm now looking to expand Little Buddha, with a little help from you, my friends!

Other Ways You Can Help

Every little bit helps, whether it’s you pledging a few bucks and receiving great rewards in return, or you helping us out by sharing news of our campaign with everyone you know on all of your social networks.

Thanks for supporting us in any way you can.

story:
digitaltrends.com

"In essence, it takes the hassle out of monitoring your home’s energy usage."


techcrunch.com

“[…] the key here are the analytics. […] we are entering the era of the quantified home.”

etechmag.com

"In a world where the numbers of electric devices increase rapidly, it’s very important to become conscious about the energy consumption and to minimize energy waste."









This smart home device is the first product of the Parce family. It measures and controls the energy usage of your electronic devices to save you money by reducing your energy consumption.

Wirelessly connecting with the Parce cloud, the Parce One intelligently learns how you use energy, producing visual reports to enable you to clearly see how you could be saving energy and cutting hundreds of dollars off your bills.

Set it up to manage things automatically, or take control yourself at any time through easy to use web and mobile apps. We’ve focused on removing the hassle from smart energy use so you’ll never waste energy or money again!



The Parce device gets smarter the longer you use it. It picks up on your TV viewing habits, the times of day you need energy most, and even when you’re out of the house.



Easily and quickly view your home’s total power consumption at any time. See how much money and CO2 you’ve saved and find out how to save even more.



Parce helpfully asks you if it can turn off standby devices, without you needing to command it to do so.



Take control over your energy usage – it couldn’t be simpler to install the Parce One into your home.



Define detailed schedules for the Parce or select from a host of pre-defined settings. Boast about/Share your energy savings through social networks.



Use our apps on your smartphone, tablet or web browser to connect with your Parce account and access all kinds of settings remotely.



At the moment there is no way for everyone to easily save energy, money and the environment.

We’ve spotted a great opportunity to change the general opinion on power consumption, removing all the associated hassle and replacing it with attractively designed, fun to use products to enable us all to save money and the environment.

1. Transparent

Parce’s intelligent learning means you can access the cloud any time to receive insights into your home’s energy usage – meaning you can spot new and even better ways to save money and the environment.

2. Smart Home

Taking control of all your devices couldn’t be simpler. There’s no complicated registering process or set-up time. Parce is ready to go out of the box with its automatic mode, or professional mode for custom settings.

3. Cloud Control

Access your Parce account through web and mobile apps to take control from wherever you happen to be. Brag about your energy savings to friends and family on social networks to spread the word about Parce!





Hayley Platt report

“Home automation is becoming increasingly popular and there are predictions the market will grow by more than 50 % by 2017”


Parce is a groundbreaking new concept within the smart home devices market. It’s not just about lifestyle and design, but could also impact on the way we all use energy and think about the environment.

The Parce One has the potential to save every home up to 150 € ($200) per year. This potential works out to be roughly 30-50% of an annual bill, and is even greater in office buildings and production plants. Here are some every day examples of power consumption in our homes.



Depending on which devices you choose to control with Parce, you will be able to recoup the investment on Parce’s hardware between 6 – 24 months of use. After that, you’ll notice the difference in your bank balance at the end of every month. Not to mention the environmental impact, which will result in an average household saving more than half a ton of CO2 per year.

The Parce concept is totally independent from energy companies and is completely focused on realizing a change in power consumption habits worldwide.



Below are the available styles of the Parce One on its launch, the first product of the Parce line. We are currently working on plans for further smart devices for saving energy.






Here’s a breakdown of the perks you can choose from when you support this campaign (select your perk from the sidebar at the top of this page).



Here are some answers to frequently asked questions:

1. Country / Sockets

We developed Parce for countries which use EU (german style) and US sockets. The beta test units will be limited to EU and US version.
We reached > $25.000 so we will provide a UK and China/Australian socket fitting version. If you purchase a perk now we will come back to you asking which of the models you will need.

2. Connection

The Parce One connects to your local Wifi. Therefore you can control it from everywhere you have an Internet connection via the Parce Website and any browser.

3. Apps

We will release the Parce App for iOS before we deliver the first units. An Android App will be released as well when we reach our goal of $20.000. A Windows Phone version will be available later.




Eugen Pflüger

Cofounder - Interaction Designer. Developing and designing online experiences since 1998.






We already have a working prototype of the Parce One and have developed the software setup. 

At the moment we are gathering a team of engineers and programmers to configure our cloud intelligence and reduce the size of the hardware components. We are also in talks with manufacturers to enable us to keep production costs low.


Parce began as a concept over a year ago. We’ve spent the last 12 months defining the software and hardware requirements as well as building fully functional prototypes. 

We need your help to keep on going with the development of the final app, the cloud intelligence and to manufacture the first range of the Parce One. The more help you’re able to invest in us, the more units we can build, lowering costs on manufacturing and retail price. 

We’re at the cusp of making a hugely positive impact on wallets around the world, as well as the environment. Every pledge takes us a step closer. 

Please feel free to contact with any questions you might have. 

Thanks for all your incredible support. 

Say hello on Facebook and Twitter!
