story:
Nipple Chafing

Want to set a resolution you know you can achieve? Then resolve to never let your nips chafe again! Every male distance runner knows what we are talking about. Whether you are new to the sport or run everyday; you have had that awkward moment in the run where your nips sting more than your lungs. It sucks! Thankfully, NipStrips is doing something about it.

How We Got Started:

After experiencing this awful dilemma firsthand, we set out testing many of the products on the market that claim to prevent it. We were dissatisfied with what we found. So we decided to carry the weight of the nipple chafing world on our backs and find a better solution. We tested scores of products and finally landed on a product that was invisible, non-staining, affordable, and tough enough to handle the miles. We have the prototype and now we want to start a nipple revolution. Want to help? You should help!

What We Need & What You Get:

No revolution comes without a price. We have created our prototype but we need your help to cover the costs for the adhesive, manufacturing and packaging. We need to raise about $5,000.00 to cover our initial order.

We know your desire to end nipple chafing is what really compels you to give, BUT we would like to recognize your contribution in the following ways:

  • $7.00: Sample Box (4 pairs) of NipStrips
  • $12.00: 1 Box (20 Pairs) of NipStrips
  • $25.00: 3 Boxes (60 Pairs) of NipStrips
  • $50.00: 3 Boxes of NipStrips + NipStripper Tech-Tee
  • $130.00: 5 Boxes of NipStrips + $100 Rogue Running (Austin, TX) Gift Card + Nipstripper Tech-Tee. Rogue Running gift card must be redeemed in-store only.
  • $145.00: Case of NipStrips (20 Boxes/400 Pairs)
  • $150.00: 5 Boxes of + Personalized Running Plan by Coach James (Rogue Running Coach and NipStrips Founder)
  • $200.00: 5 Boxes of Nipstrips + Lifetime Wholesale Pricing (limit 12 boxes per year).  Lifetime Wholesale Pricing value is approximately $70 / year.  Boxes are for customer's personal use only.  Boxes will be marked "Not For Resale".
  • $400.00: Case of NipStrips (20 Boxes/400 Pairs) + 10 NipStripper Tech-Tees.  

About The Nipstrippers:

James Dodds is currently an operations director for a local cold-pressed juice brand in Austin, TX. For the past three years he has coached various runners in the Austin area from beginners to professionals. He has run 13 marathons and was the first “Guinea Pig” (a.k.a product tester) for NipStrips. He oversees sales and market development for NipStrips. If you would like to know more about carrying the product in your store then email him at:james@nipstrips.com

Travis joins the NipStrips team as a design professional practicing in Austin, TX.  Although he never dreamed that his training would be applied to helping design a solution for male nipple abrasion, he is excited to be using his design skills to help solve this nip-epidemic.

Stuart is currently involved in the digital marketing space and works with a multimedia company based in Austin, TX. He considers himself a novice when it comes to running and very much dislikes the discomfort of of a freshly chafed nipple after a run.

Other ways you can help:

If you're not able to help by investing dollars, we ask that you help spread the word to friends and family who might be interested. Sharing is caring! 

To chafe-free running,

James, Travis, and Stuart

story:
I have developed and patented a true answer to the long term problem of head/neck drooping that occurs when a child falls asleep in an upright position, it is called NECK CORRECT. I realized the need for NECK CORRECT after observing the symptoms associated from nerve irritation that occurs when the neck is compressed, such as when a child falls asleep in an upright position. These children present with symptoms of chronic sore throats, neck pain, ear aches, headaches and irritability, to name a few.  Beyond those annoying symptoms, a very serious condition could develop, if left untreated and uncorrected, which is SCOLIOSIS of the spine. When a child's head droops to one side, the body compensates and shifts the hips to the opposite side, thus forming an "S" shape to the spine.  Did you know that 70% of American school age children have some form of scoliosis? The majority of these children spent a lot of time in a car seat or stroller, sleeping upright, no doubt.The long term financial effects of SCOLIOSIS places a huge unnecessary burden on our society, let alone the physical and health effects, when it could have been avoided from the start! For a more detailed explanation, of these statements, please go to YOU TUBE: no sko/neck correct, to see the infomercial I had developed and produced.

Another benefit to backing my project is that I am having it "Made in the USA".  Though this decision to have NECK CORRECT Made in the USA is more expensive than overseas, creating and keeping jobs in the USA is just as important to me, as is healthy, happy kids with straight spines.

To date I have invested many thousands of dollars to get NECK CORRECT patented, prototype developed, test group studied, domain name protected, web development, infomercial produced, licensed, and insured, as well as payment of Accounting and Legal fees.  The money we raise will go to the following:

$15,000. for product liability insurance.

$25,000. Minimum order cost requirements and shipping costs.

$10,000. Legal and Accounting costs Indiegogo fees.

Please be a part of this great project.  NECK CORRECT is the true answer to preventing the inevitable, unhealthy and mostly unnecessary head drooping when a child falls asleep while sitting up. We look forward to having a NECK CORRECT in every car seat, stroller and child carrier in the world. But only if you pledge. Your pledges won't go unrewarded,  take a look at the reward levels and see what appeals to you.  PLEASE KEEP IN MIND, Indiegogo will not release funds if the project is underfunded, but they will release funds if they are 100% or better. Thank you in advance for helping the children of the world and fulfilling my dream, Chris Connolly DC

story:
OUR INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN IS OVER

Thank you all for supporting the 1:Face Campaign!

If you would like to buy a watch, go here - www.1facewatch.com

If you still need to pay for international shipping, go here - www.1facewatch.com/shippingfee

1:FACE WATCH 

Changing the World 1:Face at a Time

           
           

Campaign Update:

Social Impact Goals - Progress To Date:

Support for the 1:Face movement has been incredible! Thank you all! The stories you are sharing and the changes you are creating are a real source of inspiration. Because we believe so strongly in these causes and in YOU, the face of this movement, we have set ambitious goals for us to achieve. It won't be easy, but together we will change the world!

NEW PERK ($200) - Get the Universal Touchscreen watch!

The universal watch is a touchscreen version of the 1:Face watch that fulfills all metrics. That means you are supporting every cause! The watch has no buttons, instead displaying the time when you touch the mirrored face. The alloy metal frame is the same material used in the iPhone frame. 

The 1:Face Watch empowers YOU to create change in the World.

How: Each color watch represents a different cause and has a particular metric tied to it. When you buy a watch, this metric is carried out by our supporting charities. 

For example, when you buy 1 white watch, our supporting charity One Day's Wages provides food supplements to 16 children in the Horn of Africa.   

 

Look Good.  Do Good.

The 1:Face watch is a fashion product with much more than fashion value. Create change in the World while looking good & feeling good! 
 
 

 

How it works 

Each color watch is paired with a cause, a charity, and a specific metric. For each watch you purchase, the charity tied to that cause will fulfill that specific metric. YOU are creating the change in the World! Through our website and social media, we will be highlighting stories of the change being created. YOU will literally be able to see the change YOU have created. 

 HUNGER: White - One Day's Wages

The horn of Africa (Ethiopia, Kenya, and Somalia) has recently experienced its worst drought in 60 years, leaving 13 million people in need of assistance and food. Along with their long term work in the region, for every white watch purchased, One Day's Wages will be able to provide treatment for 16 malnourished children with food supplements they desperately need.

 

WATER: Yellow - Charity: Water

30,000 people die every week from unsafe drinking water. For every 625 water watches purchased, Charity: Water will build a well, providing sanitary drinking water for an entire village.

 

 BREAST CANCER: Pink - National Breast Cancer Foundation

1 in every 8 woman will develop breast cancer in their lifetime. A simple mammogram can help save these woman's lives.  However, millions of women don't have the money to pay for this procedure. Every 14 pink watches purchased will enable the National Breast Cancer Foundation to provide 1 mammogram for a woman in need.

 

ENVIRONMENT: Blue - The Adventure Project

Everyday, 3 billion people in developing countries are exposed to toxic smoke when preparing meals.  The Adventure Project will provide 1 charcoal efficient stove to a family in Haiti for every 3 blue watches purchased.

 

AIDS: Red - Keep a Child Alive

Over 30 million people live with AIDS worldwide. For every 5 red watches purchased, Keep a Child Alive can provide the AIDS care necessary to keep a child alive with AIDS alive for one month.

 

CANCER: Black - American Cancer Society

Millions of people are affected by cancer each year. Many of them aren't educated about the treatment options available and even more struggle with the emotional impact this causes on them and their family. To help these people, for every black watch purchased, the American Cancer Society can provide the necessary education and support to 8 cancer patients and their families.

 

Our Story - The Beginning 

This project began its life at Mirza Minds, a product and branding firm in Chicago. The watch brand was originally the vision of Creative Director Fam Mirza. Having experienced both the hardships of the 3rd world and the comfort of the 1st, Fam desired to create something that could bridge that gap and ultimately make the world a better place.

"Change originates from within. That is why the face of the watch is designed as a mirror. When you check the time, you see your reflection looking back within you." -Fam Mirza 

Our vision was not just to create a product, but to start a movement that would bring change to a world that so desperately needs it. While many of us live comfortable lives, almost half the world survives on less than $2.50 a day. There are people facing real problems - poverty, cancer, aids, lack of shelter, lack of water.  Each of us can make an impact. When we all join together, we can change the world.

We have worked tirelessly on this project for the past year, and after finalizing everything from product design, supporting charities, & change metrics the only part left is YOU!

 

1:Face Watch Functional Specs 

The watch has a mirrored face with 4 parallel buttons and is set in a high-grade silicone band. When a button is pressed, the time is displayed with white intensity LED lights. Overall, the watch has a simplistic design that fits any outfit, style, or culture. Everything is symmetrical and has a smooth composition.  The battery lasts for about 2 years and of course the watch is waterproof.




What are we going to do with the money?

EVERY WATCH PURCHASED = WATCH METRIC MET

The rest of the money raised here on Indiegogo will go toward building the 1:Face movement.  The money will fund the first production run & distribution so you can get your watch and start showing it off. Additional money will go toward marketing efforts to expand the movement.

Manufacturing - We know you want your 1:Face watch as soon as possible, so we are already working with our manufacturing factory on production.  We need the money to get this first batch manufactured and shipped.

Distribution - Our mission is to empower consumers to change the world.  As such, we want to make 1:Face as easily available for as many people as possible. To do this, we want to extend our distribution channels through ecommerce and retail outlets such as Macy's, Target, Urban Outfitters etc.  

Marketing - YOU are the genesis of this movement.  In order to build upon this momentum, we need you to tell your friends/family and the easiest way to do that is through social media: POST ON FB, TWEET, & INSTAGRAM A PHOTO!  

Growth - As we grow, we want to increase our support for these causes.  This means releasing new watches, creating viral content, and organizing volunteer and donation efforts to continue our mission to change the World...

 

 

Perk Levels

As a donor, you can receive any of the following perks. You can receive 1:Face watches, the 7th voted watch (see $300 perk), Universal Touchscreen watches, or different combinations of those perks.

If you really want a life-changing experience, come with our team to India to help build a well in a village! (All Expenses Paid- See $10,000 perk) 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

  

FAQ

If my question isn't answered here, how do I ask?

Just email us - hi@1facewatch.com.

When will my watch be delivered?

Shipping Date: 11.20.2012.

We know you want to show off your watch, so we are working hard to get them manufactured and ready to ship as soon as possible. We refuse to send you anything but the highest quality product!

Will the screen crack?

The screen is made out of tempered glass and will not crack unless there is a VERY heavy impact. If it does crack, let us know and we will either fix it or replace it. 

Is there a warranty for the 1:Face watch?

Yes. There is a 1-year warranty. If there are any defects, our repair center will fix it or replace it. However, we strive to provide the highest quality materials so this will not be an issue.

How long does the battery last?

The watch is battery-powered. The battery life depends on how often you check the time, but if you check about 6 times per day, it should last around 2 years.

Can the battery be changed?

You can definitely replace the battery.  Take it to any watch repair shop in your city and they'll be able to do it for you easily.

Is the watch waterproof?

YES 

Are the watches available in retail stores?

Not yet, but soon! 1:Face will be in retail stores in 2013. 

What is the Universal Touchscreen watch?

The universal watch is a touchscreen version of the 1:Face watch that, when purchased, fulfills every metric. The watch does not have any buttons, but displays the time when the face of the watch is touched by the user.  

What percentage of donations go to the charities?

Each watch comes with a metric which is carried out with the purchase of the watch.  We want to make the business model as transparent as possible and never want you to have to ask the question "And then what?"  With that said we will not only tell you what, we will show you what!

For example, for every white watch purchased, One Day's Wages will provide 16 children in the Horn of Africa with food supplements.  The same holds true for each of the other metrics. The goal is to create an actual quantified change in people's lives around the world for each watch sold.

Where are the watches manufactured?

The watches are designed at the Mirza Minds headquarters in Chicago, IL & assembled in Shenzhen, China. The facility has passed the SA8000 (Social Accountability) and ISO14000 (Environmental) audits. Furthermore, our manufacturing facility is ROHS compliant.  

How do the watches work?  What functions do they provide?

The watch has a minimalist design, both visually and functionally.  The fundamental purpose of a watch is to display the time, and with its large LED display, that is what the 1:Face watch does.  At the press of a second button, it can also display the current date.  The mirror face of the watch is a reminder that you are change.  

Setting and modifying the time and date is as easy as pressing one button to enter "EDIT" mode and another button to change the selected value. Full instructions will be included when the product is shipped. 

Is there a charge for International Shipping?

Yes, there will need to be an additional charge to ship internationally. It costs $15 per watch to ship to international addresses.  If you buy a 3-watch half-set ($120 perk), international shipping is $25. For a 6-watch full-set ($240 perk or any perk levels higher), international shipping is $40.  Please include that in the checkout price.  If you forget, we'll contact you prior to shipping to finalize those details.

If you have any specific questions about your location, please email us at hi@1facewatch.com.

 

 

Join the 1:Face Movement! 

There are a few ways you can help:

1. Buy a watch!  

With your purchase, you'll be making a real difference in people's lives.

2. Tell your friends about 1:Face!  

Share the link to this site on all your social media platforms. Love is the movement!

3. Support the #1Face Trend

Every Wednesday and Friday at 4:00pm EST we will tweet #1FaceWatch to make it trend. To work, we need your help! Please follow us and re-tweet the message. Together, we'll inspire the world.  

         

 

Send a tweet now!

 

 

 

Thank you! We hope you will join us in 

Changing the World 1:Face at a Time! 

 

http://facebook.com/1Facewatch 
http://1facewatch.com 
http://youtube.com/mirzaminds 
http://twitter.com/1Facewatch 
Instagram: @1Facewatch
story_txt:
OUR INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN IS OVER
Thank you all for supporting the 1:Face Campaign!
If you would like to buy a watch, go here - www.1facewatch.com

If you still need to pay for international shipping, go here - www.1facewatch.com/shippingfee


1:FACE WATCH 
Changing the World 1:Face at a Time

                         

Campaign Update:

Social Impact Goals - Progress To Date:
Support for the 1:Face movement has been incredible! Thank you all! The stories you are sharing and the changes you are creating are a real source of inspiration. Because we believe so strongly in these causes and in YOU, the face of this movement, we have set ambitious goals for us to achieve. It won't be easy, but together we will change the world!
NEW PERK ($200) - Get the Universal Touchscreen watch!
The universal watch is a touchscreen version of the 1:Face watch that fulfills all metrics. That means you are supporting every cause! The watch has no buttons, instead displaying the time when you touch the mirrored face. The alloy metal frame is the same material used in the iPhone frame. 

The 1:Face Watch empowers YOU to create change in the World.
How: Each color watch represents a different cause and has a particular metric tied to it. When you buy a watch, this metric is carried out by our supporting charities. 
For example, when you buy 1 white watch, our supporting charity One Day's Wages provides food supplements to 16 children in the Horn of Africa.   



 
Look Good.  Do Good.
The 1:Face watch is a fashion product with much more than fashion value. Create change in the World while looking good & feeling good! 
 
 



 
How it works 
Each color watch is paired with a cause, a charity, and a specific metric. For each watch you purchase, the charity tied to that cause will fulfill that specific metric. YOU are creating the change in the World! Through our website and social media, we will be highlighting stories of the change being created. YOU will literally be able to see the change YOU have created. 

 HUNGER: White - One Day's Wages

The horn of Africa (Ethiopia, Kenya, and Somalia) has recently experienced its worst drought in 60 years, leaving 13 million people in need of assistance and food. Along with their long term work in the region, for every white watch purchased, One Day's Wages will be able to provide treatment for 16 malnourished children with food supplements they desperately need.
 
WATER: Yellow - Charity: Water

30,000 people die every week from unsafe drinking water. For every 625 water watches purchased, Charity: Water will build a well, providing sanitary drinking water for an entire village.
 
 BREAST CANCER: Pink - National Breast Cancer Foundation

1 in every 8 woman will develop breast cancer in their lifetime. A simple mammogram can help save these woman's lives.  However, millions of women don't have the money to pay for this procedure. Every 14 pink watches purchased will enable the National Breast Cancer Foundation to provide 1 mammogram for a woman in need.
 
ENVIRONMENT: Blue - The Adventure Project

Everyday, 3 billion people in developing countries are exposed to toxic smoke when preparing meals.  The Adventure Project will provide 1 charcoal efficient stove to a family in Haiti for every 3 blue watches purchased.
 
AIDS: Red - Keep a Child Alive

Over 30 million people live with AIDS worldwide. For every 5 red watches purchased, Keep a Child Alive can provide the AIDS care necessary to keep a child alive with AIDS alive for one month.
 
CANCER: Black - American Cancer Society

Millions of people are affected by cancer each year. Many of them aren't educated about the treatment options available and even more struggle with the emotional impact this causes on them and their family. To help these people, for every black watch purchased, the American Cancer Society can provide the necessary education and support to 8 cancer patients and their families.
 

Our Story - The Beginning 
This project began its life at Mirza Minds, a product and branding firm in Chicago. The watch brand was originally the vision of Creative Director Fam Mirza. Having experienced both the hardships of the 3rd world and the comfort of the 1st, Fam desired to create something that could bridge that gap and ultimately make the world a better place.
"Change originates from within. That is why the face of the watch is designed as a mirror. When you check the time, you see your reflection looking back within you." -Fam Mirza 
Our vision was not just to create a product, but to start a movement that would bring change to a world that so desperately needs it. While many of us live comfortable lives, almost half the world survives on less than $2.50 a day. There are people facing real problems - poverty, cancer, aids, lack of shelter, lack of water.  Each of us can make an impact. When we all join together, we can change the world.
We have worked tirelessly on this project for the past year, and after finalizing everything from product design, supporting charities, & change metrics the only part left is YOU!
 

1:Face Watch Functional Specs 
The watch has a mirrored face with 4 parallel buttons and is set in a high-grade silicone band. When a button is pressed, the time is displayed with white intensity LED lights. Overall, the watch has a simplistic design that fits any outfit, style, or culture. Everything is symmetrical and has a smooth composition.  The battery lasts for about 2 years and of course the watch is waterproof.



What are we going to do with the money?
EVERY WATCH PURCHASED = WATCH METRIC MET
The rest of the money raised here on Indiegogo will go toward building the 1:Face movement.  The money will fund the first production run & distribution so you can get your watch and start showing it off. Additional money will go toward marketing efforts to expand the movement.
Manufacturing - We know you want your 1:Face watch as soon as possible, so we are already working with our manufacturing factory on production.  We need the money to get this first batch manufactured and shipped.
Distribution - Our mission is to empower consumers to change the world.  As such, we want to make 1:Face as easily available for as many people as possible. To do this, we want to extend our distribution channels through ecommerce and retail outlets such as Macy's, Target, Urban Outfitters etc.  
Marketing - YOU are the genesis of this movement.  In order to build upon this momentum, we need you to tell your friends/family and the easiest way to do that is through social media: POST ON FB, TWEET, & INSTAGRAM A PHOTO!  
Growth - As we grow, we want to increase our support for these causes.  This means releasing new watches, creating viral content, and organizing volunteer and donation efforts to continue our mission to change the World...
 

 
Perk Levels
As a donor, you can receive any of the following perks. You can receive 1:Face watches, the 7th voted watch (see $300 perk), Universal Touchscreen watches, or different combinations of those perks.
If you really want a life-changing experience, come with our team to India to help build a well in a village! (All Expenses Paid- See $10,000 perk) 


 
 

 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 

  
FAQ
If my question isn't answered here, how do I ask?
Just email us - hi@1facewatch.com.

You can definitely replace the battery.  Take it to any watch repair shop in your city and they'll be able to do it for you easily.

YES

story:
Check out some of the other videos below to learn more about the process to machine a mold, how to put the risers on, and other useful information about the Edge Risers.

What are the Edge Risers?

The Edge Risers are a new type of snowboard binding accessory which raises your boot and binding higher off the board thus increasing leverage power to your edges. Also, our new snowboard binding riser reduces toe and heel drag and helps riders with larger feet by allowing them to ride on a narrower board with a quicker edge to edge response!
 
The Edge Risers

Key advantages:

  • Our Edge Risers provides 20 mm [apox. 3/4 inch] of lift which give you, the rider, significant toe and heel clearance to avoid drag when edging.
  • The Edge Risers are made of high strength polycarbonate plastic, which is also used in creating bullet proof walls.
  • Edge risers increase leverage properties which allows pressure to transfer more directly to the edges for more responsive carving.
  • They are very light weight, weighing in at only only 5 oz.
  • They have a unique cross hatch ribbing pattern to better strengthen the design.
  • Edge risers smaller platform surface allows a more natural board flex.
  • Using our Edge Risers allows people with larger feet to get the most out of their board.
  • On top of all this, the edge risers were made entirely in the United States of America.

How to use them

The risers are easy and fast to install. No drilling or modification of board or binding.  It takes only about 5 minutes for you to do the actual installation yourself.  All the hardware is included. Simply sandwich between deck and binding bottom using the longer binding screws provided. These screws work on all regular bindings produced today. (See a video below to see how it's done)

Check out our gallery to see a video on how to put the Edge Risers on!

We will be making both standard 4 bolt pattern Risers as well as Burton 3 bolt pattern Risers.

Who We Are

Val Strals is the proud owner of the plastic injection mold machining companyHorizon Precision Machining Inc. Val has been machining parts and making molds for over 35 years. He works with a range of clients, ranging from large aerospace engineering companies to local inventors needing help getting started with the machining and molding process.

Eriks Strals is a creative software engineer and technologist who has been working in the tech and games industry for more then 6 years. 

Togther, Val and Eriks have been snowboarding for over 20 years and working on the Edge Risers for the last 5 years, trying to get them out to the world and in the hands of the snowboarders who need them.

How we are going to do it

With the help of Horizon Precision Machining we have molded a working version of the Edge Risers which is ready to be used for manufacturing the Edge Risers. Upon success of this campaign, we will first check over the mold and make any changes required to the mold and replace the tools used for molding the part. Then we will be sending out the mold to a mold manufacturer, thus the injection molding cycle begins. We then check over all the molded Edge Risers and make sure everything looks good. After this, we will need to order the correct screws and shipping materials. Finally, we will package up the Edge Risers and ship them out to you!

For more information about the mold making process, here is a video describing the process we go through in machining the mold and manufacturing the Edge Risers

Check out our gallery to see a video on learning more about the process of manufacturing the Edge Risers!

The challenges in molding and machining

There are many challenges and high costs to machining and manufacturing a mold. We have already spent a lot of money in tooling costs and molding materials, along with hundreds of hours machining and designing prototypes, field testing the risers, and making sure everything is perfect before even being able to start the manufacturing process of making the Edge Risers for the general public. 

This is a screenshot of the actual 3D model used to machine the mold. This is after many iterations done to the model.

3D model of mold

Where your contributions will go

Even though we have already done a lot of this work for making sure the Edge Risers are ready, we still have a lot of work ahead of us in getting these out to you and the rest of the snowboarders out there. This includes paying for the costs associated with machining the parts (tools, etc), manufacturing the parts (including paying for the materials and work required to do this), and packaging and shipping out the parts. On top of all this, we need to pay for the costs to develop our new website.

 

Here's a picture of the of the current Edge Risers being used with boots and a board:

Our awesome Edge Riser logo done by Vincent Iannone. This will be on the stickers.

Edge Riser Logo

Credits:

Video Editing and design, Antonio Gussenhoven      http://www.elucidly.com

Logo design, Vincent Iannone                 https://www.facebook.com/VincentIannone

Camera man, Dan Cote                                                  http://enhanceye.com

Photo Credits: 

Faceplant picture                                http://www.flickr.com/people/laurentbolli/

Graphic designer picture                    http://www.flickr.com/photos/benswing/

story:
Story

DIVAK Sunglasses are a combination of durable, eco-friendly materials and style. Usually wooden sunglasses break easily, but we are using a special method of creating very strong plywood. That way, DIVAKs become really hard to break.

Our sunglasses are made of real wood that gives them a warm and unique look. 

Wood has an amazing texture. Every piece of it is unique. Every pair of our sunglasses is hand-crafted with the single goal to enhance the wooden texture. We are using a 8-step process that makes the wood look rich and elegant by highlighting its color and figure. That process also protects the wood surface from dirt and moisture.


 

OUR MISSION

Nowadays, artificial materials that harm the environment, such as plastic, are becoming a serious threat. With our wooden sunglasses, we want to inspire people and companies to go back to natural materials and take care of the environment while consuming and producing.

Wood is not only natural and biodegredable but it is also renewable. That is why it is probably the best material on this planet. We believe that people and companies should use wood instead of plastic, and do that in a sustainable way - by helping the forests.

We'll be planting five trees in the wild for every pair of sunglasses ordered. We'll be doing this ourselves, too! Our small team will select the area and the type of trees, and then do the actual work. We'll use some external help from forest specialists to guarantee the trees will grow healthy without any intention of being cut down. Our goal is to help the forests.


TECHNOLOGY & FEATURES 

Inspired by a method of using wood in airplane construction, we've developed our own way of creating ultra-strong plywood. It is made of real birch. The glue that we use is non-toxic.


Pressure-resistant

 

Impact-resistant



Great for the outdoors

 




OUR HANDMADE WOODEN CASES ARE HERE!

They are made of real wood. We've used birch because of its unique qualities - it is strong, flexible and leight.

We've also decided to use the same finishing process that we use for our sunglasses. In order to enhance the wooden texture... the results are just worth it!

We also find it awesome that the wooden case is THE SAME COLOR as your sunglasses.


MODELS & SIZES



We have created two models for you to choose from! Our TRIBAL model features one of the most popular unisex frame shapes. It comes in two sizes, large and small.  Our second model is the CAT EYE, which sports a more rounded look and is available in one standard size.

 


Additional Choices


Red MIRROR Lenses



 

Green MIRROR Lenses


Blue MIRROR Lenses


WHY WE NEED YOUR PLEDGE

We need your help to get us going: all the funds that we gather through Kickstarter will be spent to fund production and secure an FDA registration fee. In the future, we plan to develop new sunglass models, and continue our research and development of other eco-materials to make sunglasses from. We have set a minimum funding amount that's needed to help us roll into production.


Risks and challenges

We've spent months in selecting materials, refining the design and testing our models. That is why we believe that the risk of using our sunglasses is close to zero. We've been using natural materials such as wood and metal (for the hinges), also the glue and finishes that we use are non-toxic. We've invested a lot of our time and finance in our sunglasses and the real challenge starts now - it's up to our backers if our project will succeed or not. Our workshop is based in Sofia, Bulgaria and we are not capable of manufacturing unlimited amount of sunglasses. To deal with that, we've actually started making sunglasses in the beginning of April. Nevertheless, our max-capacity untill the end of July is 800 pairs. We'll stick to that in order to deliver the sunglasses to all our backers in September the latest. In these challenging times when the world is fighting with COVID-19 a lot of people advised us to postpone our project. We however decided that we will continue. We are optimists and believe that even it tough times people should follow their dreams.

In order to enhance the wooden texture... the results are just worth it!We also find it awesome that the wooden case is THE SAME COLOR as your sunglasses.
MODELS & SIZES
We have created two models for you to choose from! Our TRIBAL model features one of the most popular unisex frame shapes. It comes in two sizes, large and small.  Our second model is the CAT EYE, which sports a more rounded look and is available in one standard size. Additional Choices

Red MIRROR Lenses

 Green MIRROR Lenses
Blue MIRROR LensesWHY WE NEED YOUR PLEDGEWe need your help to get us going: all the funds that we gather through Kickstarter will be spent to fund production and secure an FDA registration fee. In the future, we plan to develop new sunglass models, and continue our research and development of other eco-materials to make sunglasses from. We have set a minimum funding amount that's needed to help us roll into production.
Risks and challengesWe've spent months in selecting materials, refining the design and testing our models. That is why we believe that the risk of using our sunglasses is close to zero. We've been using natural materials such as wood and metal (for the hinges), also the glue and finishes that we use are non-toxic. We've invested a lot of our time and finance in our sunglasses and the real challenge starts now - it's up to our backers if our project will succeed or not. Our workshop is based in Sofia, Bulgaria and we are not capable of manufacturing unlimited amount of sunglasses. To deal with that, we've actually started making sunglasses in the beginning of April. Nevertheless, our max-capacity untill the end of July is 800 pairs. We'll stick to that in order to deliver the sunglasses to all our backers in September the latest. In these challenging times when the world is fighting with COVID-19 a lot of people advised us to postpone our project. We however decided that we will continue. We are optimists and believe that even it tough times people should follow their dreams.

story:
About us:

we are The Premo Workshop, a handmade leather goods company in upstate New York. Our company is run by Me (Mason Premo) and my wife Jackie. We have a beautiful 15 month old boy named Morris and our daughter Elsie that will arrive in August! 

We started this journey a few years back and grew it from a part time hobby to a full fledged business that is now our sole source of income. In a few short years we've gone from a couple hundred followers to nearly 20 k on instagram alone. With that said, we have a lot of orders and our wait time is always increasing due to our high demand and not enough hands. Thats where this campaign comes in...

We need your help!

This campaign is to raise $6000 to fund a major overhaul of how we run our business. With this money we will purchase not only materials but we will invest in time saving equipment such as a "clicker press" which uses die cutters and a hydraulic press to stamp out panels of leather for all our products. This will cut my wait time in half because I won't spend time cutting panels by hand. we will also spend a majority of the money on materials like leather, brass, and packaging materials. This will all help to accomplish a shorter wait period for products and bring it from 4-8 weeks down to just 1-2.

Each pledge of $60 or more will receive The Lovetap Keyhook as their incentive. with the sale of 100 key hooks we hope to accomplish our $6000 goal.

How does this help us?

We are a small family just trying our best to do what we love and find ourselves feeling overwhelmed with orders and stressed with money during the low times. We know that with your help, you can get us to a place where we are freed from the shackles on our growth and allow us to produce more with less. Its not just a business, its what feeds our children and puts a roof over their heads. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to give financially, please help us by spreading the word about this awesome product. You can also follow us on instagram and have a look at our website where you can choose and purchase over 50 different handmade products.

story:
What exactly am I gathering money for? To buy silkscreen printing equipment. This type of printing is used on industrial levels. It prevents the prints from getting washed off, peeling off and fading when exposed to strong sunlight. Basically, it's a printing method that allows to make durable high-quality prints.

 

The equipment includes: 

A silk-screen machine 
A light cabinet for preparing stencils 
Stencil frames 
A thermopress 
Intermediate drying devices 
A high-pressure washing machine 
Reagents 
Expendable materials 
Paint and a little something more

The assembled money will be used to buy various knitwear and subsequently to transfer images into sweaters and T-shirts.

story:
FRENCH VERSION >>>
Jump to : See it in action · Perks · Our commitment · Who we are · Additional views ·

The Cigar Knife is very easy to operate and provides the cleanest of cuts you can imagine. It is also simple to open with one hand thanks to the lever extending the blade, typical feature of Piedmont Folding Knives.

Every cent could help, that's why if you wish to contribute to our project and don't want to claim any physical good you can do it selecting this perk.

Tired of holding your cigar? Don't want it to stay in shared ashtrays at cigar events? The perfect solution is this elegant Cigar Stand that you can easily slip into your pocket or attach to your belt using the clip included on the case.
Stand out from the crowd!

The tool you have been looking for : our luxurious handmade Cigar Knife alone.
Save $60 from retail price by selecting this perk today. Added benefits are an earlier shipping date and a smaller limited and numbered series.

Our handmade in France Cigar Knife alone at its retail price. Limited and numbered edition of 1,000 units.

The early bird bundle ! Everything we make being shipped earlier, being limited to 80 units solds and being 10% off! Also the Early Bird edition will be numbered in a separate and very exclusive series.

Everything we make. Get the most innovative cutter in the world and finest crafsmanship in handmade cigar accessories. Don't miss a cut anymore with this luxurious cigar knife, handmade in France by skilled crafstmen, only available in limited and numbered edition: 1,000 units only!
Selecting this perk will grant you our Cigar Knife (along with a leather sheath) and our Cigar Stand coming with its leather case. Everything arranged in a nice and luxuous packaging and shipped to your door regardless of where you live for a cost directly included in price.

This unique edition will not be available past the crowdfunding campaign. That's why we call it the Founders Edition. If you want this time-limited product finish and to be able to say "I was here when it all started", pre-order now!



The registered shape of our cigar knife blade allows it to retain a razor sharp cut on the part that cuts the cigar thanks to its inward curve. If you use it as a dining knife for instance, it is physically impossible for this part of the blade to touch the plate. You won't ever dull the cigar cuting edge. 




You can buy our Cigar Knife as a Gift for someone. Let us know that it's a Gift and we'll ship it in an Exclusive Gift Wrap for Free!

Three friends bound together by the love of Puros.

  • Yann BOUTEN,  designer, cutler and leather-worker
  • Gilles BAILLY-MAITRE, skilled smith and cutler
  • Pierre JOURDAN, project manager and communication specialist

The initial idea originated in Pierre's afficionado mind, and was refined by Yann and Gilles through the mastery of their craft. A first prototype was created, and then tested for several months. Happy with the result, we decided to start a company to bring this fantastic accessory to the world.

Because we strongly believe in community validated projects.

We already invested a lot of time and money in perfecting our prototypes, registering trademarks and designs.

Now in order to produce the accessory on a larger scale we would need to invest in costly machinery, setup a shared workshop, get some help from specialised accountants and attorneys... and we're confident this great accessory will meet the aficionados community's support. 

Prove us we are right, help us live our dream !


You don't need to worry about shipping cost since they're included in the perk prices. Wichever perk you chose it will be delivered to your door regardless of where you live at no additional cost.

* Except for the "Early Bird Essential " and "Founders Essential " perks



Aller à : L'objet en action · Contreparties · Notre Engagement · L'Équipe · Galerie ·

Notre coupe cigare est très facile à utiliser et procure la coupe la plus nette que vous puissiez imaginer. Il est aussi très simple de l'ouvrir d'une seule main grâce à la "Lentille", sorte de levier en métal prolongeant la lame, caractéristique typique des couteaux pliants Piémontais.

Chaque centime compte, c'est pourquoi si vous souhaitez contribuer à notre projet sans pour autant bénéficier d'une contrepartie physique il vous est possible de nous aider en sélectionnant cette contrepartie virtuelle.

Vous rêvez du "cigare mains-libres" ? Vous ne souhaitez pas le poser dans les cendriers communs lors de vos événements cigare ? La solution parfaite est ce repose-cigare élégant que vous pourrez facilement glisser dans votre poche ou attacher à votre ceinture grâce à la boucle prévue à cet effet sur l'étui qui l'accompagne. Distinguez-vous !

L'accessoire dont vous aviez toujours rêvé : notre luxueux Couteau Coupe-Cigare artisanal uniquement. Economisez 60€ par rapport au prix de vente conseillé en optant dès maintenant pour cette contrepartie. Les autres avantages dont vous bénéficierez sont une date de livraison avancée et une série limitée restreinte.

Notre Couteau Coupe-Cigare artisanal uniquement à son prix de vente en boutique. Edition limitée et numérotée de 1000 pièces.

L'édition INTÉGRALE en version Early Bird ! Notre collection d'accessoire complète livrée plus tôt, limitée à 80 exemplaires et 80€ moins chère ! La version Early Bird  comporte également l'avantage de faire partie d'une série limitée et numérotée de manière indépendante et donc très exclusive.


Notre collection complète. Obtenez le coupe-cigare le plus innovant jamais imaginé et le meilleur de la réalisation artisanale dans l'univers des accessoires cigare. Ne ratez plus jamais la moindre de vos coupes grâce à ce coupe-cigare luxueux, conçu et fabriqué en France par des artisans qualifiés, disponible uniquement en une série limitée et numérotée de 1,000 pièces seulement !

En sélectionnant cette contrepartie vous obtiendrez le Couteau Coupe-Cigare, accompagné de son étui en cuir, ainsi que le Repose-Cigare, lui aussi pourvu de son étui cuir. L'ensemble présenté dans un conditionnement luxueux  et livré sur le pas de votre porte où que vous habitiez pour un coût de transport directement inclus dans le prix de vente.
Cette édition unique ne sera plus disponible après la campagne de financement participatif. C'est pour cela que nous la nommons "L'édition des Fondateurs". Si vous souhaitez obtenir cette version exclusive dont la disponibilité est limitée dans le temps et être en mesure de dire "J'étais là au commencement de l'aventure", pré-commandez maintenant !



La forme de lame de notre modèle déposé de coupe-cigare lui permet de conserver un tranchant rasoir sur la partie coupant le cigare grâce à sa courbure spécifique. Si par exemple vous l'utilisez comme couteau de table, il est physiquement impossible pour la partie arrière de la lame d'entrer en contact avec votre assiette. Vous n'émousserez jamais le tranchant prévu pour couper vos vitoles. 




Il est possible de commander notre Couteau Coupe-Cigare pour l'offrir à quelqu'un. Indiquez nous le simplement à la commande et nous l’emballerons dans papier cadeau exclusif gratuitement !

Trois amis unis par l'amour des vitoles.

  • Yann BOUTEN,  designer, coutelier et sellier
  • Gilles BAILLY-MAITRE, coutelier et forgeron expérimenté
  • Pierre JOURDAN, chef de projet et spécialiste communication

L'idée initiale est à porter au crédit de Pierre, qui l'a vu naître dans son esprit d'amateur de cigare. Soumise à l'expertise de Yann et Gilles, elle fut raffinée via l’exceptionnelle maîtrise des arcanes de leur art. Un premier prototype fut crée et soumis à des tests rigoureux pendant de long mois. Heureux de nos résultats, nous avons décidé de créer une société pour mettre à jour ce fantastique accessoire. 

Car nous croyons fermement aux projets validés par la communauté.

Nous avons déjà investi beaucoup de temps et d'argent dans le perfectionnement de nos prototypes, l'enregistrement de notre marque et le dépôt de nos modèles.

Afin de produire l'accessoire à plus large échelle, nous avons maintenant besoin d'investir dans du matériel coûteux, de mettre en œuvre un atelier partagé, de nous faire accompagner par des comptables et conseils spécialisés... et, sur la base de l'accueil reçu depuis que le projet a été dévoilé, nous ne doutons désormais pas un instant que ce fantastique accessoire occasionnera la pleine adhésion de la communauté d'amateurs de cigares.

Prouvez nous que nous avons raison, aidez nous à vivre notre rêve !


Afin de ne pas vous embêter avec cela nous avons choisi d'inclure les frais de port directement dans le prix des contreparties. Quelle que soit la contrepartie choisie, elle sera donc livrée sur le pas de votre porte quel que soit l'endroit où vous vous trouvez et sans aucun coût additionnel.

*Sauf sur les offres Earlybird Essentiel et Fondateurs Essentiel

story:
What is Diamodo?

Diamodo seamlessly blends technology, social networks, and art into a beautifully handcrafted piece with touches form many engineers, craftsman, and artists that make every single one of them a unique piece.

What makes Diamodo special is that it connects you with your loved ones. Whenever you call your loved one, Diamodo will flash to show your care about her.
 
 

Journey of Diamodo

Row rocks from mines in many countries such as India and Tanzania flow into gems headquarter of the world; Bangkok for cutting and polishing.

In another path, silicon chips which are literally made of sand as well find their path to China for microelectronic assembly.

After their smooth merger with the rocks, unique smart gemstones are carried to the ancient parts of the world; mainly to Istanbul and Cairo for jewelry handcrafting.

Here many local artists with thousands of years back mystic skills handcraft them piece by piece into their final look.

Meanwhile, many accessory pieces such as PCBs, wooden art-boxes are transferred to California. Here, they are locally hand-assembled into a magic jewelry box that can wirelessly charge your Diamodo set.

 

How it works?

Diamodo is a user friendly product, just download the mobile application and connect your smart phone to the jewelry. 

 

Ring, Bracelet and Necklace

Diamodo comes in many forms; ring, bracelet and necklace. Many distinct models each with its special stone, art and color around serve wide range of tastes and preferences.

 

What makes it distinct from other wearable technologies?

  • True handcrafting around the technology
  • Wireless charging capability and water resistant designs
  • LED based illumination technology with various types and colors of gemstones from distinct corners of the world.

Diamodo comes with a special jewelry box that charges your jewelry when it is just dropped in.

 

Features

Technical Demonstration of Diamodo

In this video, first prototypes of Diamodo are being tested at laboratory. As shown in the video, Bluetooth connection and wireless charging functionality of Diamodo successfully works.

 

Risks & Challenges

There are still challenges in reaching a rock solid system after bringing all the pieces such as the jewelry, software, apps, firmware and the traffic servers all together. Another challenge is keeping up with the demand. It would require literally a city full of craftsmen to handle handcrafting of the pieces. A test process is already in place to try out production prototypes and clean all the hardware and software weaknesses and bugs. If everything goes well in all the hardware, the software and the art; all the gift samples would be shipped by mid November two weeks after the end of the campaign and just before the thanks-giving holiday. All the features have to be extensively characterized and analyzed statistically in detail to reach a robust design.

 

    Contact us

                    

     

    Collections

    Albuquerque

     Breathtaking sterling silver art around stunningly beautiful Carnelian stone. The natural vessels along the ore of this eye-catching fire orange stone boosts up the wearer with lots of attention. Wear it on strong emotional occasions...

     

    Bangkok

    Finely crafted sterling silver ring around a deep blue corundum stone. Flexible open-ended grasp around the finger allows you to switch fingers. Fits the casual occasions better but may result in an intriguing and brilliant look in formal gatherings as well...

     

    Canberra

    Taste of yellow aventurine gently encircled with a rope of sterling silver. this exotic stone combined with twisted rope of silver blend into something you may find just perfect for your colorful occasions. The color glows as your hand shows off its newly added features of the crisp, golden yellow jewelry.

     

    Delhi

    Mystic blend of deep sapphire blue corundum with ancient glorious taste of oxidized sterling silver. Stunning details of this genuine art may yield an exotic and exquisite look on your daily casual wear rich in colors...

     

    Doha

    Glorious and majestic blend of half a thousand crystals, and a blue corundum on a sterling silver platform. This extraordinary piece of art yields a spectacular look, yet without overemphasis.

     

    Guangzhou

    Sapphire blue corundum delicately crowned with two rows crystal pave and textured sterling silver. Bold and mature look may fit well with formal occasions of mid-age folks. Mildly emphasized, gentle and pleasing... 

     

    Istanbul

    Elegance of deep blue corundum with 
    alloy plated sterling silver and half a thousand crystal pave. Inspired by the ancient city that it was handcrafted in, the piece includes half a thousand crystals lined up manually one at a time.. it reminds the majestic styles of sultans of the time. Wear this iconic piece with confidence...

     

    Karachi

    Delicately crafted piece of sterling silver art with sapphire blue corundum. The classy taste of deep blue stone is complemented with ancient sophistication of dusty sterling silver. Elevating and rich..

     

    Kuala Lumpur

    Elegantly crafted necklace of sapphire blue corundum with aged sterling silver. Unique touches from professional artists make this remarkable stone into something unbelievably exquisite and amazing. Wear it as you wish..

     

    Manila

    Eye-catching silver craftsmanship around an elegant navy blue corundum stone. A necklace rich in details can enhance your daily casual wear...

     

    Midyat

    Beauty of dark navy blue corundum with ancient look of oxidized sterling silver. The sophisticated art lines around the stone gives this handcrafted necklace a mystic taste… Rich in details, this remarkable piece reminds a flower. It is named after the Mesopotamian city in which it was first excogitated.

     

    Taipei

    Flawless captivity of deep blue corundum with ancient themes of sterling silver.
    This gorgeous classic piece of art would fit both casual and formal occasions, wear it as it deserves it…

     

    Tokyo

    Harmony of intriguingly detailed sterling silver and deep blue corundum. This alluring bracelet piece may result in a eye-catching look when worn along with a colorful outfit. Artistic open-ended grasp, yields extra comfort and flexibility for a casual wear...
story_txt:
What is Diamodo?
Diamodo seamlessly blends technology, social networks, and art into a beautifully handcrafted piece with touches form many engineers, craftsman, and artists that make every single one of them a unique piece.

What makes Diamodo special is that it connects you with your loved ones. Whenever you call your loved one, Diamodo will flash to show your care about her.
 
 
Journey of Diamodo
Row rocks from mines in many countries such as India and Tanzania flow into gems headquarter of the world; Bangkok for cutting and polishing.


In another path, silicon chips which are literally made of sand as well find their path to China for microelectronic assembly.

After their smooth merger with the rocks, unique smart gemstones are carried to the ancient parts of the world; mainly to Istanbul and Cairo for jewelry handcrafting. 

Here many local artists with thousands of years back mystic skills handcraft them piece by piece into their final look.



Meanwhile, many accessory pieces such as PCBs, wooden art-boxes are transferred to California. Here, they are locally hand-assembled into a magic jewelry box that can wirelessly charge your Diamodo set.


 How it works?Diamodo is a user friendly product, just download the mobile application and connect your smart phone to the jewelry. 

 
Ring, Bracelet and NecklaceDiamodo comes in many forms; ring, bracelet and necklace. Many distinct models each with its special stone, art and color around serve wide range of tastes and preferences. What makes it distinct from other wearable technologies?
True handcrafting around the technology
Wireless charging capability and water resistant designs
LED based illumination technology with various types and colors of gemstones from distinct corners of the world.
Diamodo comes with a special jewelry box that charges your jewelry when it is just dropped in. FeaturesTechnical Demonstration of DiamodoIn this video, first prototypes of Diamodo are being tested at laboratory. As shown in the video, Bluetooth connection and wireless charging functionality of Diamodo successfully works. Risks & Challenges
There are still challenges in reaching a rock solid system after bringing all the pieces such as the jewelry, software, apps, firmware and the traffic servers all together. Another challenge is keeping up with the demand. It would require literally a city full of craftsmen to handle handcrafting of the pieces. A test process is already in place to try out production prototypes and clean all the hardware and software weaknesses and bugs. If everything goes well in all the hardware, the software and the art; all the gift samples would be shipped by mid November two weeks after the end of the campaign and just before the thanks-giving holiday. All the features have to be extensively characterized and analyzed statistically in detail to reach a robust design.
 
Contact us                 CollectionsAlbuquerque Breathtaking sterling silver art around stunningly beautiful Carnelian stone. The natural vessels along the ore of this eye-catching fire orange stone boosts up the wearer with lots of attention. Wear it on strong emotional occasions... BangkokFinely crafted sterling silver ring around a deep blue corundum stone. Flexible open-ended grasp around the finger allows you to switch fingers. Fits the casual occasions better but may result in an intriguing and brilliant look in formal gatherings as well... CanberraTaste of yellow aventurine gently encircled with a rope of sterling silver. this exotic stone combined with twisted rope of silver blend into something you may find just perfect for your colorful occasions. The color glows as your hand shows off its newly added features of the crisp, golden yellow jewelry. DelhiMystic blend of deep sapphire blue corundum with ancient glorious taste of oxidized sterling silver. Stunning details of this genuine art may yield an exotic and exquisite look on your daily casual wear rich in colors... DohaGlorious and majestic blend of half a thousand crystals, and a blue corundum on a sterling silver platform. This extraordinary piece of art yields a spectacular look, yet without overemphasis. GuangzhouSapphire blue corundum delicately crowned with two rows crystal pave and textured sterling silver. Bold and mature look may fit well with formal occasions of mid-age folks. Mildly emphasized, gentle and pleasing...  IstanbulElegance of deep blue corundum with alloy plated sterling silver and half a thousand crystal pave. Inspired by the ancient city that it was handcrafted in, the piece includes half a thousand crystals lined up manually one at a time.. it reminds the majestic styles of sultans of the time. Wear this iconic piece with confidence... KarachiDelicately crafted piece of sterling silver art with sapphire blue corundum. The classy taste of deep blue stone is complemented with ancient sophistication of dusty sterling silver. Elevating and rich.. Kuala LumpurElegantly crafted necklace of sapphire blue corundum with aged sterling silver. Unique touches from professional artists make this remarkable stone into something unbelievably exquisite and amazing. Wear it as you wish.. ManilaEye-catching silver craftsmanship around an elegant navy blue corundum stone. A necklace rich in details can enhance your daily casual wear... MidyatBeauty of dark navy blue corundum with ancient look of oxidized sterling silver. The sophisticated art lines around the stone gives this handcrafted necklace a mystic taste… Rich in details, this remarkable piece reminds a flower. It is named after the Mesopotamian city in which it was first excogitated. TaipeiFlawless captivity of deep blue corundum with ancient themes of sterling silver.This gorgeous classic piece of art would fit both casual and formal occasions, wear it as it deserves it… TokyoHarmony of intriguingly detailed sterling silver and deep blue corundum. story:
Time is valuable. It’s love, it’s money, it’s life. It's everything.

Introducing Time Capturer, a unique watch that preserves the best moments of your life. This distinctive timepiece is modelled on the look and feel of a classic camera, a retro-aesthetic that pays tribute to traditional photography while harking back to age-old traditions.

Inspired by the camera, the sole method that we as individuals can truly capture time, and driven by the longstanding art-forms of precision and craftsmanship, the Time Capturer’s vintage appeal extends beyond its wristwatch qualities and into its design.

Available in two camera-inspired colours, and using a Japanese Quartz automatic movement focused on precision, the watch is made in collaboration with esteemed French brand Montrichard. As such, its quality is of a significantly higher standard than that of others in its price range.

Time Capturer is made for everyone, ideally sized for both men and women. We’ve created a watch that allows its wearer to showcase their true sense of style. And we’re making sure everyone gets to own one, no matter their budget.

Unlike an expensive luxury watch, we’ve cut out the middle-man. Time Capturer is a high-quality timepiece that comes direct from the source, making its price more than affordable.

Stainless-steel case with both satin and polish finishes, alongside a three-dimensional shutter-inspired sandwiched-hollow multi-layered dial with cut-through 'viewfinder'. 

Dome-shaped European Sapphire crystal lens with anti-reflective coating, alongside genuine leather applied on the case.

Super-LumiNova dial and minutes-hand, water resistant up to 50 meters, alongside a genuine French-made goat leather strap with quick-release Capsa spring-bar.

Cover accessories and a lens hood, effortlessly allowing you to switch from formal to casual.

Time Capturer is currently a prototype. But with your help, our unique watch will soon be a reality - and you'll be the first to own it.

We will ship all orders within four months of campaign completion (est: April 2018).

Detailed Watch Specifications: 

  • 12-month Warranty
  • Available in two colours: Aperture Black and Reflector Silver
  • Japanese MIYOTA 2026 Quartz Movement
  • Stainless Steel watch case with satin-finish
  • Case diameter: 44mm
  • Case thickness: 14mm
  • Polish uni-directional rotating bezel
  • Dome-shaped European Sapphire Crystal lens, with anti-reflective coating
  • Transparent floating hour-hand
  • Super-LumiNova dial and minutes-hand
  • 3D shutter-inspired sandwiched-hollow multi-layered dial
  • French goat leather strap
  • Lens hood
  • Water resistant up to 50 meters

Detailed Camera-style Watch Features:

  • Inner-bezel design paying tributes to the best lenses on the market
  • Hollowed cut-through camera case ‘view-finder’
  • Classic red-and-white Rolex-style printing
  • Lasered minutes-indicator, replicating camera lenses
  • Rotating polish-finished bezel, replicating camera lenses
  • Lens hood, replicating camera lenses
  • Lens cover, replicating camera lenses

 

From the desk of our founder, Dennis Lee

Time is valuable.

Our lives here are short. Our sense of style, one of the few things that can truly express who we are. I don’t want people spending it on a lesser timepiece. At Dennis Lee Watches, I’m making sure everyone gets to own a unique watch, no matter their budget.

My watches walk the line between classic and contemporary, blending age-old craftsmanship with distinctive styles. They’re made for everyone.

Our time here is fleeting. Don’t waste it.”

- Dennis Lee, Founder & Chief Designer

 

 

Project Timeline:

story:
My name is Carolina Gawron and I am an international designer currently residing and creating in Poland. Carolina Gawron Couture is the brand endorsing my Haute Couture and Ready-to-Wear outfits.

The close collaboration with a client on developing the design regardless of her location not only enables to ensures her needs are met, but also that her dreams come true which makes me feel over the moon. Each of my dresses is one of its kind and so are my clients. What counts to me is first of all superb quality, details, unique designs, natural materials and infusing an element of myself into each project be it an evening dress, a special occasion outfit or a bridal gown. 

Thanks to Indiegogo fundraising I going to cover the cost of developing a new collection for Spring - Summer 2015. It will include 15 Haute Couture dresses and 15 Redy-to-Wear dresses. In addition, this founding will allow me to start building the brand, organize photo sessions and a fashion show.

Carolina Gawron Couture brand was founded in 2012. So far, I’ve successfully developed two pilot collections consisting of more than 20 projects Haute Couture dresses and more than 10 Dresses Ready-to-Wear outfits. Urged by clients and motivated by the enthusiastic feedback from not only clients, but also fashion magazines, star photographers, I feel obliged to deliver a full-blown collection. Thus, I am asking for help with achieving this goal. 

Testimonials of my clients are the most authentic assessment of my work:

"We offer minimalism, and Carolina Gawron offers the imagination"

"Mesmerized! I've been privileged to have Carolina design for me an evening dress and a couple of suits. All outfits are gorgeous, feminine, chick and classy. They empower, so that I can feel and look in charge and control in both social and professional spheres of my life. Looking forward to seeing more of her designs on the red carpet. I am confident she will make it to the very top. Thank you! "

Vision of the Carolina Gawron Couture brand:

- Create the most desired dresses with genuine passion 

All Carolina Gawron Couture outfits are characterized by unique designs that supremely stress and reveal feminity. 

My project created so far are available on the website and the facebook profile. Please visit:

    www.carolinagawron.com

    www.facebook.com/CarolinaGawronCouture


                       


We are looking to raise $9,500 USD

  • Collection of 15 Haute Couture SS 2015 dresses
  • Collection of 15 Ready-to-Wear SS 2015 dresses
  • Photo session of the Haute Couture SS 2015 collection
  • Fashion show for the SS 2015 collection

OR

If we manager to raise $20.000 USD

  • Collection of 15 Haute Couture SS 2015 dresses
  • Collection of 15 Ready-to-Wear SS 2015 dresses
  • Collection of 10 SS 2015 swim suits
  • Photo session of the Haute Couture SS 2015 collection
  • Photo session of Ready-to-Wear SS 2015 collection
  • Photo session of 10 SS 2015 swim suits
  • 2 fashion shows for the SS 2015 collection 

Please help me launch the new collection! You will enjoy it and lots of other people will as well. You will make my dream come true and I will be empowered to make others’ dreams come true.

If you are unable to support this project financially, please recommend it to friends via Instagram or Twitter. I would appreciate if you become fans of our Facebook fan page and stay posted on our progress. Every little act of support means a lot and I am grateful for it. 

Thank You!

story:
Samuel Samuel

Speak !  For your servant is listening.

We are presenting a unique, comfortable, elegant, high quality and interchangeable shoe collection.

  • 4 types of Shoe Style.
  • 3 kinds of Material.
  • 11 feet Lengths (210mm – 260mm foot length) .
  • 3 feet Widths.
  •  Accurate dimension and propose shoe will be measured and selected by our Smartphone app.
  • Shoe accessories series are interchangeable by any circumstances, according to consumer's style and mood by innovative magnetic switch, they are securely fastened and very user friendly.

 

 

A PAIR OF SHOE:

Infinite Possibilities:

 

 

AVAILABLE IN 4 STYLES:

Pointed Flats:

 

Stiletto Heels:

 

Ballet Flats:

 

Mid Heels:

 

 

AVAILABLE IN 3 KIND OF MATERIALS:

 

Kid Leather:

 

Faux Suede:

 

Patent Leather:

 

 

IT IS NOT ONLY "ONE" FEET WIDTH:

Most exiting brand only provide shoes with one width.  This makes production more easy. However, it does not take into account of different customer needs.  We are providing 3 different feet widths to match you, made them and aim to provide comfort and happiness to the consumers.

 

 

REPLACE IN A FEW SECONDS:

It is an innovative magnetic switch design which enables an instant change of your shoes' style.

 

 

SHOE ACCESSORIES:

 

Casual Items:

 

Flower Items:

 

Classic Items:

 

 

SECURELY FASTENED:

 

 

EASY SIZING:

We have designed a smartphone app - "Foot Measuring".  It is very user friendly and accurate when measuring feet lengths and widths.

 

 

DEDICATION AND THANKSGIVING:

With every item sold, we are committing to dedicate $1 USD to support Christian missionary ministry.  Mark 16:15 reads, "Go into all the world and preach the gospel to all creation."

 

 

PLEASE NOTE:

You will choose your size, color and style after the campaign is over via a special confirmation email sent after Oct 2017.

 

 

HOW TO PLEDGE:

To pledge to our project, click the pink "Get This Perk" button on the campaign page and select the perk you would like to receive and enter your payment information.

 

 

PLEASE PLEDGE WITH CONFIDENCE.
