story:
Voted as The Best Kickstarter Watch Brands To Invest in!

 

What is a FLIEGER WATCH ? A Flieger watch is a Pilot or an Aviator watch , the original Flieger watches were developed during World War II as a method of timekeeping specifically for fighter pilots.the main focus of the Flieger was legibility, robustness and accuracy but if the navigator or pilot couldn’t quickly tell the time, the watch was of no use.

 

 

 

The 1919 FLIEGER Series Features 44MM one-piece-mold

  • The Stainless steel case that is durable, attractive and water-resistant up to 5ATM. 
  • The strap is made from Italian suede leather.          
  • The layered dial is luminous for your convenience. 
  • The state-of-the-art quartz movement is the highest of reliability and moves just like an automatic movement.

 

FLG 1919A

Case : 316L Matt finish Surgical grade Stainless Steel with single click revolving crown design and 5 Atmosphere water proof .

DIAL : Multi Layered Matt Black dial with shiny polished hands. Embossed White luminous hour index and Super hardened Mineral crystal

STRAP :Italian Suede Calf Brown leather band with engraved Steel buckle .22 mm lugs best fit for 14 - 23 cm wrist . 

Flieger 1919 A Throttle

 

FLG 1919B

Case : 316L IP Black Matt finish Surgical grade Stainless Steel with single click revolving crown design and 5 Atmosphere water proof .

DIAL : Multi Layered Matt Black dial with shiny polished hands. Embossed White luminous hour index and Super hardened Mineral crystal

STRAP :Italian Suede Calf Black leather band with engraved Steel buckle .22 mm lugs best fit for 14 - 23 cm wrist . 

Flieger 1919 B Switch 

FLG 1919C

Case : 316L Matt finish Surgical grade Stainless Steel with single click revolving crown design and 5 Atmosphere water proof .

DIAL : Multi Layered Matt Grey dial with shiny polished hands. Embossed Yellow luminous hour index and Super hardened Mineral crystal

STRAP :Italian Suede Calf Grey leather band with engraved Steel buckle .22 mm lugs best fit for 14 - 23 cm wrist . 

Flieger 1919 C CockPit Dashboard 

FLG 1919D

Case : 316L Matt finish Surgical grade Stainless Steel with single click revolving crown design and 5 Atmosphere water proof .

DIAL : Multi Layered Matt Black dial with shiny polished hands. Embossed Green luminous hour index and Super hardened Mineral crystal

STRAP :Italian Suede Calf Green leather band with engraved Steel buckle .22 mm lugs best fit for 14 - 23 cm wrist . 

Flieger 1919 D In-Hand 

Flieger 1919 D Wrist-shot 

WHY A MECHA QUARTZ WATCH - We find it difficult to imagine that mechanical watch which simply stops working if it is not moved for a few days would be preferable to a modern quartz watch, which keeps running for years on a single battery, self-adjusts with millisecond precision and maintains time an order of magnitude more accurately than any mechanical watch.

 

 

 

Our Watch Company has been redefining pilot watches for over 12 years and now we are about to launch the most innovative Military pilot watch collection to date. Up until today, if you were looking to purchase a decent automatic pilot watch on the market, you had to spend about 300-500$. But our upcoming Flieger series is going to change all that and we are going to do it in just one-third of the price!

 

 

The basic cost reduction was a traditional one-piece stainless steel case we used and the state of the art Mecha quartz movements which moves and acts just like an automatic timepiece. For most watch connoisseurs, it’s a known fact that a quartz movement is more reliable and precise than an automatic one. It needs much less upkeep and maintenance and if the movement fails completely- in one in a million cases- you can easily replace it for fraction of the price of getting a mechanical watch repaired by a decent watchmaker.

 

 

 
So, to put it simply, you are getting the accuracy and reliability of a quartz watch but the look and feel of an automatic backed up with a 24 month worldwide warranty and all of that at just above $100. It’s definitely a winning deal for pilot watch enthusiasts.
 
 

We are producing this watch as part of a limited edition, and when you reserve your watch through this campaign, you will not only ensure that you get one but also get one at almost half the retail price.

 

 

 

 

Here at Chotovelli Watches, we come from a long and proud tradition of quality-watchmaking. For seventy years, the Chotovelli name has been synonymous with stunning, top-shelf watches, and with this latest military pilot watch; we believe we have created our best offering yet. Following three generations  aviation enthusiast Ilan Chotovelli has designed this watch by combining classic styles with modern forms

 

 

THE FLIEGER is also backed with a warranty.

With over 70 years expeirenex in watchmaking we are confident with the quality and durability of our watches, that if something were to happen within the first 2 years, we hope you will send it back to us.  Warranty includes all internal parts of the watch.

Warranty does not cover:  

The life of the battery 

Wear and tear and aging (e.g. scratched crystal; alteration of the color and/or material of non metallic straps and chains, such as leather, textile, rubber; peeling of the plating) 

Any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents (knocks dents, crushing, broken crystal, etc.) 

We Need Your Support!

YOU CAN HELP In addition to making a monetary contribution to our campaign, you can help us by sharing our campaign link on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. Spread the word! We want everyone to know that the latest offering from Chotovelli Watches has arrived and that it is available at half-price for a brief time only! We thank you for all your support and for taking the time to read about what we are doing!

 

       

 

 

 

 

 

Risk and Challenges 

Watchmaking runs in the Chotovelli family, and Ilan Chotovelli is leading the way forward in the field. With his latest design, Ilan has raised the bar, producing something that is all at once affordable, durable, and stylish. This is a watch suitable for all occasions, and we are excited to bring it to market. Of course, if any challenges arise along the way, anything that prevents us from sticking to our timeline, we will be sure to keep all our generous contributors updated. We know that we can get this watch comfortably, though!

If you have any additional questions, please email us at info@chotovelli.com
story_txt:
Voted as The Best Kickstarter Watch Brands To Invest in! What is a FLIEGER WATCH ? A Flieger watch is a Pilot or an Aviator watch , the original Flieger watches were developed during World War II as a method of timekeeping specifically for fighter pilots.the main focus of the Flieger was legibility, robustness and accuracy but if the navigator or pilot couldn’t quickly tell the time, the watch was of no use.   The 1919 FLIEGER Series Features 44MM one-piece-mold
The Stainless steel case that is durable, attractive and water-resistant up to 5ATM. 
The strap is made from Italian suede leather.          
The layered dial is luminous for your convenience. 
The state-of-the-art quartz movement is the highest of reliability and moves just like an automatic movement.
 FLG 1919ACase : 316L Matt finish Surgical grade Stainless Steel with single click revolving crown design and 5 Atmosphere water proof .DIAL : Multi Layered Matt Black dial with shiny polished hands. Embossed White luminous hour index and Super hardened Mineral crystalSTRAP :Italian Suede Calf Brown leather band with engraved Steel buckle .22 mm lugs best fit for 14 - 23 cm wrist . Flieger 1919 A Throttle FLG 1919BCase : 316L IP Black Matt finish Surgical grade Stainless Steel with single click revolving crown design and 5 Atmosphere water proof .DIAL : Multi Layered Matt Black dial with shiny polished hands. Embossed White luminous hour index and Super hardened Mineral crystalSTRAP :Italian Suede Calf Black leather band with engraved Steel buckle .22 mm lugs best fit for 14 - 23 cm wrist . Flieger 1919 B Switch FLG 1919CCase : 316L Matt finish Surgical grade Stainless Steel with single click revolving crown design and 5 Atmosphere water proof .DIAL : Multi Layered Matt Grey dial with shiny polished hands. Embossed Yellow luminous hour index and Super hardened Mineral crystalSTRAP :Italian Suede Calf Grey leather band with engraved Steel buckle .22 mm lugs best fit for 14 - 23 cm wrist . Flieger 1919 C CockPit Dashboard FLG 1919DCase : 316L Matt finish Surgical grade Stainless Steel with single click revolving crown design and 5 Atmosphere water proof .DIAL : Multi Layered Matt Black dial with shiny polished hands. Embossed Green luminous hour index and Super hardened Mineral crystalSTRAP :Italian Suede Calf Green leather band with engraved Steel buckle .22 mm lugs best fit for 14 - 23 cm wrist . Flieger 1919 D In-Hand Flieger 1919 D Wrist-shot WHY A MECHA QUARTZ WATCH - We find it difficult to imagine that mechanical watch which simply stops working if it is not moved for a few days would be preferable to a modern quartz watch, which keeps running for years on a single battery, self-adjusts with millisecond precision and maintains time an order of magnitude more accurately than any mechanical watch.   Our Watch Company has been redefining pilot watches for over 12 years and now we are about to launch the most innovative Military pilot watch collection to date. Up until today, if you were looking to purchase a decent automatic pilot watch on the market, you had to spend about 300-500$. But our upcoming Flieger series is going to change all that and we are going to do it in just one-third of the price!  The basic cost reduction was a traditional one-piece stainless steel case we used and the state of the art Mecha quartz movements which moves and acts just like an automatic timepiece. For most watch connoisseurs, it’s a known fact that a quartz movement is more reliable and precise than an automatic one. It needs much less upkeep and maintenance and if the movement fails completely- in one in a million cases- you can easily replace it for fraction of the price of getting a mechanical watch repaired by a decent watchmaker.   So, to put it simply, you are getting the accuracy and reliability of a quartz watch but the look and feel of an automatic backed up with a 24 month worldwide warranty and all of that at just above $100. It’s definitely a winning deal for pilot watch enthusiasts.  We are producing this watch as part of a limited edition, and when you reserve your watch through this campaign, you will not only ensure that you get one but also get one at almost half the retail price.    Here at Chotovelli Watches, we come from a long and proud tradition of quality-watchmaking. For seventy years, the Chotovelli name has been synonymous with stunning, top-shelf watches, and with this latest military pilot watch; we believe we have created our best offering yet. Following three generations  aviation enthusiast Ilan Chotovelli has designed this watch by combining classic styles with modern forms  THE FLIEGER is also backed with a warranty.With over 70 years expeirenex in watchmaking we are confident with the quality and durability of our watches, that if something were to happen within the first 2 years, we hope you will send it back to us.  Warranty includes all internal parts of the watch.Warranty does not cover:  The life of the battery Wear and tear and aging (e.g. scratched crystal; alteration of the color and/or material of non metallic straps and chains, such as leather, textile, rubber; peeling of the plating) Any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents (knocks dents, crushing, broken crystal, etc.) We Need Your Support!YOU CAN HELP In addition to making a monetary contribution to our campaign, you can help us by sharing our campaign link on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. Spread the word! We want everyone to know that the latest offering from Chotovelli Watches has arrived and that it is available at half-price for a brief time only! We thank you for all your support and for taking the time to read about what we are doing!             Risk and Challenges Watchmaking runs in the Chotovelli family, and Ilan Chotovelli is leading the way forward in the field. With his latest design, Ilan has raised the bar, producing something that is all at once affordable, durable, and stylish. This is a watch suitable for all occasions, and we are excited to bring it to market. Of course, if any challenges arise along the way, anything that prevents us from sticking to our timeline, we will be sure to keep all our generous contributors updated. We know that we can get this watch comfortably, though!If you have any additional questions, please email us at info@chotovelli.com

story:
Updates:

It costs $61.73 per month only. Hurry up before this pre sales it gone. The following is how much would it cost for different no. of the replacement system.

The highlighted in red is the installment price for 11 months of Owakai Hair. 

Last 5 days for you to get this price!

You have to first put the deposit for a Owakai hair @ $239 first at the following package. Each month after you would only have to pay $61.73 per month for 11 months.

Get back your dashing stylish hair in 30 mins.

I am a father to 2 children. I have been busy for as long as I can remember. Until I retired and started to dress myself up, I started to notice the thinning hairline on myself and son. Wanting to feel young and solve the family's hair thinning genetics, Owakai is created that is safe for thinning hair solutions.

About this project

 


 

Hair is the crown of the head – like a lion, king of the jungle. For most of us, it’s a way of presenting ourselves. Regardless of your health, baldness is just natural.

Currently, there are gazillions of options available in the market today from cosmetic surgery to temporary wigs. However, Owakai focuses on providing people with a non-invasive solution yet permanent enough to regain back the lost confidence - non-surgical, unique and stylist hair for anyone.

 



 

 

The right hair


Every individual is unique and so we believe it is important that we paid close attention to our designs. We provide customisation to each, bringing your stylist hair back.

 

 

Unique and stylist hair replacement look book

 

Top restoration/ The short hair style:


Hairline restoration/ The medium hair style:
 


Entire restoration/ The customised hair style:
 


 

The following are some reviews after 8 batches of sample:


 

Say hello to Owakai


Introducing Owakai (a Japanese expression of being youthful again), a  toxin-free, non-surgical and drop-proof hair replacement for any lifestyle – whether you’re the sport buff or the boy/girl next door. 
 


Our extensive research on Japan and Germany’s current and leading hair replacement solutions enabled us to create and begin Owakai’s process. After combining the best of both worlds, we are proud to launch our latest innovation.  
 


The 0.01 mm biological scalp is paper thin and sticks to the head like it is a part of you. Together with Japanese's knotting technique, it’s breathable, fast drying and absorbs water quickly therefore no more accumulation of sweat mustiness. Join us in our pursuit of excellence in hair replacement because we know you will love it.

 


 

Microscopic view
 

Product features' summary
 

  • 0.01 mm biological scalp: Using Germany’s technology to create the thinnest biological scalp to recreate a natural hairline.
  • Drop-proof: Improved knotting technique prevents any accidental drop - jogging, gym or eve during any intense ball games   
  • Comfortable for any lifestyle: Fast water absorption & quick drying time supports an active lifestyle. Swim or shower in it, simply wear it like your own!
  • Easy maintenance: Maintain once every 2-3 weeks due to the toughness of Owakai’s scalp and the incorporation of a knitted mechanism.
  • Authenticity: With manual stitching of each strand and using 100% real hair, Owakai is guaranteed to look and feel like your own hair. 
  • Non-Toxic: Owakai is a non-surgical and a toxic-free hair replacement method. We at Owakai use it too! 
     


 

Capable of handling any situation - as good as real
 


 


Back by guarantees – long term relationship programs


We strive to build an unbreakable trust and so we guarantee that you will love Owakai. In case you aren’t satisfied, we have 3 different policies designed to protect you. 

 

 

Order process
 

There are 4 stages of the order process. You pre-book Owakai  replacement hair by paying a deposit first. We will provide the best quality but if you do not feel confident with our online procedure, we will give you back your full deposit before we begin customisation.

 


Pricing/ perks overview
 

By backing this project, you are helping to make this challenge into a reality. This low price is possible because of each of you buying together at the same time. Otherwise, the entire package will be around 1.5-3k.  

You will get a Owakai by paying the deposit first. Full payment is after consulation at the end of the campaign. You can choose either:

  1. Top up $100 for Owakai Hair Only (Total price $XXX - depending the amount you grab) 
  2. Top up $300 for the Full Customisation for any Thinning Challenges + Stylist Hair Selection + Hair Density/ Length/ Curve/ Colour (Total price $XXX - depending the amount you grab)

 

*Free worldwide shipping for all Owakai's buyer during this launch.

​**After normal bird, no more deposit payments packages available. 
 

 

 

Please share this project via social media, email, and word of mouth to tell your friends and family about our campaign. This would help to make the early pricing lower and longer for more. Thank you in advance! 
 

 

Delivery time
 


 

Where we are
 


Our designs have been thoroughly thought of and further refined at every step of the way. We are in collaboration with highly skilled craftsmen, factories and suppliers from across the globe. Trust is our foundation and we ought to keep it that way!
 

What we need 
 


 

We need your help to raise $33000 in order to fund the first product run of the Owakia hair replacement. More specifically, this money will go towards the initial production run, ordering of raw material and hiring the skills required.
 

Presses
 

Click this link to download the kits over here. Thanks for sharing.


Risks and challenges
 

We take pride in our suppliers who are always ready to manufacture our hair replacements. But of course, unforeseen bumps can happen along the way. If and when such issues arise, we promise to communicate them as timely and as openly as possible so you never feel left out.
 

Specification 

 

 

General FAQ

 

 

Technical FAQ

story:
The Beginning of an Ecoventure 

 

My humble beginnings began in a fairly populated city in Nigeria. My connection with the environment has always played a big role in my life--- even from a tender age.  Most of my young teenage life was spent outdoors and it wasn't until I left Nigeria that I realized the poor and depleting state of our natural resources. In 2011, I got more hands on with an environmental ethics/research class that I took during my MBA, I was confronted with the grave issues affecting the Niger Delta area due to oil spills dating as far back as the 1930s. Tied in with my Fashion IQ (my father was a buyer and fashion designer), experience as a fashion stylist and producer, I knew that I could use fashion as a vehicle to push the message of sustainability and inspiring ways to positively change our world.
 
From my experience and research, there aren't enough sustainable platforms to represent and/or showcase eco-friendly designers in New York City. Most parts of the world have their own ecofashion week that's held annually. The role FASHION plays in our daily lives is very important. We love to dress in the most fashionable gears that our disposable income can afford, drive the most fashionable looking cars, and immerse ourselves in brand association that our society craves for. It begs the question... How are we treating our environment? Why is there ignorance when the conversation of our environment comes up? This is NO longer an issue that can be ignored. Our environment is talking to us... we see the ice caps are melting, air and water pollution have taken its course on many levels that the effects are destructive. You must ask yourself, what can I do to change my environment... this of course can mean your apartment building, neighborhoods, communities, towns, cities, states, country... the WORLD!?
 
As the founder of Fashion Envie, this was a passion project that came about due to the lack thereof of Eco-friendly events to support these artists and designers. I was born and partly raised in Nigeria. I was constantly surrounded by one type of pollution or another during those tender years. It wasn't till I moved to the States with my family I realized the dangers we were in; the media back home fails to mention how deteriorated our natural resources are. With this in mind and upon conclusion of my Shell Oil project in 2011, the seed was planted. Fashion can be used as vehicle to promote change and create dialogue about these environmental issues. Hence, the reason for Fashion Envie!
 
It seems that the perception of anything that's eco-friendly either smells, has poor quality, and/or lacks value. That argument is beginning to lose ground since high-end designers such as Stella McCartney and Vivienne Westwood have already taken major steps in becoming more eco-conscious with their collection and brand image. So, that should suggest that we are on the path to saving our planet and returning to nature. We hope that through Fashion Envie, we can infuse F.U.N (Fashion Understanding Nature) into the fashion industry and rebrand the concept of eco-design (art, fashion, interior home design etc).

Fashion Envie Cost Breakdown

From my professional experience, to produce an event of this magnitude usually requires a fixed budget of $10,000. However, we are looking for ways to curb our expenses while remaining Eco-friendly in our approach. For instance, to green print event programs, purchase Eco-friendly gift bags, and other production materials will cost an estimate of $2,000. This is where we need the most financial assistance. 

-By supporting Fashion Envie, you will be investing in the designer's future in a tremendous way!

-Add value in terms of production and presentation.

-Most Eco-friendly projects lack originality and creativity. However, Fashion Envie will showcase inspiring and F.U.N (Fashion Understanding Nature), highlighted by a creative aesthetic that will appeal to our guests.

 

The Impact

-Fashion Envie's goal is to rebrand the concept of Eco-friendly as an essential need for our environment.

-By aligning our mission with  Skraptacular--a nonprofit organization based in New Yirk City, we will inspire the younger generation to transform their environment for the future. Please visit www.skraptacular.org to learn more.

-Through Fashion Envie's in-kind sponsorship, we hope to leave a lasting and positive impact for others to follow,

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't financially donate to our cause, we will also appreciate Word of Mouth marketing or spreading the message of sustainability and FASHION ENVIE. Thank you very much!

story:
Our Story

Our story is simple.  Two friends, Evelyn Rivera and Chelsea Ferrette combined their love for sewing, being creative and handbags and decided to create a business....hence Everette...Handbags of Pure Jeanious!  was born. 

I've always had a creative eye and a passion for unique handbags. What better way to indulge this passion than creating our own line of bags.  Using recycled jeans for the bags' foundation, creatively styled with leather, suede and unique hardware pieces for that finishing touch.  Each bag is distinctively designed to represent an individual style and character.  (www.everettehandbags.bigcartel.com)


The Impact

Everette Handbags is a fusion of creativity, recycling and distinctive fashion design.  Everette Handbags are one- of-a-kind hand-made bags that appeal to all females young at heart and full of wisdom alike.  Our bags are for the party girl on the scene to the career-driven and ultimate fashionista in all of us.  We imaginatively recycle jeans that no longer fit or are outdated and ready to be tossed away, but you just can't seem to let them go.  Having a custom-made Everette Handbag allows you to always have that favorite pair of jeans forever.

What We Need & What You Get

We are excited about Everette Handbags, however we are a small in-home business, just starting out and meticulously making each bag by hand.  We need assistance meeting our manufacturing costs.  Most of the profits from the business are allotted for materials and hardware to create your one-of-a-kind piece.

I'm excited to create an Everette custom design for those who choose to donate.

  • Donors up to $50 will receive a custom-made leather business card holder.
  • Donors higher than $50 will receive a custom-made wallet for men or petite clutch for women
    and an exclusive invitation to one of our launch events
  • Donors higher than $100 will receive a custom-made leather and denim shopping, an exclusive invitation to one of our launch events and an advertisement link on our blog
  • Anyone donating $200 and up will have the opportunity to collaborate directly with me to create a custom handbag to perfectly match their style, and exclusive invitation to one of our launch events, and an advertisement link on our blog.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please forward the Everette handbags website to your friends and colleagues so they can learn about our fund raising campaign.  Everette can be found on Facebook and Twitter.

story:
BUZZITEASY!

Internet is the greatest windows to the world! However, it is so difficult to drive traffic to your site or your project. Social Networks have a big potential on connecting people and sharing stories. What do you think about cross-promoting our ideas , products or compaigns sharing it with real persons around the world??

Here comes the BuzzItEasy!

I started an Indiegogos campaign : BacBuddy. I thought the idea was interesting, but I did not get any traffic, and no funders at all. Was it a bad idea, or a commucation problem? I was not able to create buzz about it. 

I start talking with other crowdfunding campaign owners, and some of them had the same problem: No buzz about their project.

Then the idea came up to our minds! Why don't we share our social networks? Why don't we all promote each other to generate buzz about every project?

So, that is what my project is about. I want to open a WEBSITE where real people with real campaigns , products or ideas can generate extra buzz.

The worst thing that can happen to you is to have a great idea or project and not being able to spread the word.

What We Need & What You Get

 We need to create a website that let people connect with each other and organize groups to share forces. This involves a lot of coding , a database backend and an internet server to park the website. 

What will you get for 1$?

You will be able to register to the website, make groups, and share forces. Possibly, it will be the best invested dollar of your project.


Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you can’t contribute, but you can help others:

  • Get the word out and make some noise!
  • Join everyone's forces
story_txt:
BUZZITEASY!
Internet is the greatest windows to the world! However, it is so difficult to drive traffic to your site or your project. Social Networks have a big potential on connecting people and sharing stories. What do you think about cross-promoting our ideas , products or compaigns sharing it with real persons around the world??
Here comes the BuzzItEasy!
I started an Indiegogos campaign : BacBuddy. I thought the idea was interesting, but I did not get any traffic, and no funders at all. Was it a bad idea, or a commucation problem? I was not able to create buzz about it. 
I start talking with other crowdfunding campaign owners, and some of them had the same problem: No buzz about their project.
Then the idea came up to our minds! Why don't we share our social networks? Why don't we all promote each other to generate buzz about every project?
So, that is what my project is about. I want to open a WEBSITE where real people with real campaigns , products or ideas can generate extra buzz.The worst thing that can happen to you is to have a great idea or project and not being able to spread the word.

What We Need & What You Get
 We need to create a website that let people connect with each other and organize groups to share forces. This involves a lot of coding , a database backend and an internet server to park the website. 
What will you get for 1$?
You will be able to register to the website, make groups, and share forces. Possibly, it will be the best invested dollar of your project.


Other Ways You Can Help
Maybe you can’t contribute, but you can help others:

Get the word out and make some noise!
Join everyone's forces

story:
Project Summary

I'm Andy Hurtt: an artist, graphic designer, professor, beer and coffee lover, father and an ALLY. I have an amazing partner that I share my life with, and because we are a man and a woman our marriage is legally recognized. That is not the case with some of the closest people in my life, and many of you reading this now. I believe that everyone has the right to legally marry the person that they love, regardless of gender.

This design was created for my partner and our close friends to wear at the Portland Pride Festival in Maine in 2011. Some of us are allies, others homosexual; we are all family.

The shirts were in such demand that year I have decided to have them professionally printed.

I do not have the personal capital to fund the project upfront.  I am setting up this campaign to help fund the cost of producing the shirts. Consider it similar to a pre-order system.

With your help we can get this project rolling and more importantly, proudly display your support at a pride festival and where you live. It is my hope that together we can spread the message that marriage matters to ALL.

What We Need

Screen printing on high quality shirts with many colors is expensive. The $1,400 campaign will cover costs for about 60 shirts including set up fees, screen costs, shirts and printing.
 
The shirts are from Royal Apparel which are made in the USA, 100% cotton, super soft fine jersey. They are slightly fitted, so I might suggest ordering a size up. I generally wear a size L and an XL in these shirts is perfect, not too loose, not too tight.
 
My aim with this pre-order is to print the shirts that are ordered, regardless if we don't reach our goal. This way, those that are interested can receive their product.

Available For Order

PLEASE INDICATE SIZE & COLOR VIA COMMENTS OR DIRECT MESSAGE.

$25

Unisex Ally T-Shirt
White, Pink, Red
Sizes S-XXL
 

$25

Unisex Homo T-Shirt
White, Pink, Red
Sizes S-XXL
 

$25

Women's Ally T-Shirt
White, Pink, Red
Sizes S-XXL
 

$25

Women's Homo T-Shirt
White, Pink, Red
Sizes S-XXL

Ally & Homo Prints (25 available)

18" x 18" digitally sublimated print on fabric, mounted on a canvas frame. Prints will not have watermark and are hand signed.

story:
What is Paper Clouds Apparel ?

Paper Clouds Apparel is a shirt company with a conscience. We take artwork created by special needs individuals and put that art on Earth friendly super soft bamboo shirts. We then donate 50% of the profit from the sale of the shirt back to the school/organization that created the art. For the past two years we have been teamed up with VALLEYLIFE, located in Phoenix, AZ. VALLEYLIFE is the oldest habilitation center in Arizona and helps over 450 special needs individuals valley wide. Our ultimate goal at Paper Clouds Apparel has always been to help special needs schools and organizations in all 50 states ! This is where you can help us

 

Why Paper Clouds Apparel needs your help-

The funding we raise on Indiegogo will be used to cover the production and expansion of Paper Clouds Apparel. We have teamed up with Autism Speaks, the nation's largest autism science and advocacy organization, and a new group of special needs schools. We will be creating and selling shirts from a different school/organization every week. There will be two pieces of art selected each week: one men's and one women's design. For the men's shirts, the art will be on three different colored crew neck or v-neck bamboo shirts. Women can chose from a v-neck shirt, tank top, or a spaghetti strap camisole top, also made from bamboo. The next line will use plant and soy based screen printing chemical products and water based inks. We set our goal at $20,000 however we hope to exceed our goal to aid our expansion. The more we raise the more schools we can help fund. Our Indiegogo funding will go to the construction of an updated website, the hiring of graphic designers to turn the art into vector form so screens can be made. We would love to raise enough to order the next line of shirts in a large bulk quantity, thus lowering the overhead. We also would like to raise enough to purchase our own screen printing press and screens. This would mean no longer having to outsource this process. Both of these steps would lower the cost of making the shirts, thus making the profit larger and more money we could donate back to the special needs schools/organizations.

Why The Special Needs Schools/Organizations Need Our Help ?

Most special needs schools are privately run, non-profit organizations that rely on government funding and private donations to keep their doors open. Government funding to special needs schools has been drastically hit hard by budget cuts. For instance, VALLEYLIFE has had their funding cut by 15% since May 09. Paper Clouds Apparel wants to make sure the students don't feel the effects of such cuts. Less than 1% of the budget of the National Institute of Health is devoted to autism research. Along with our previously states desires, we are hoping that our cause can impact organizations researching causes.

How you can help-

FUND- up until now Paper Clouds Apparel has been a one man operation. Paying for everything by many hours bartending, operating heavy machinery, and any other odd job I could find to make a buck. However, to take Paper Clouds Apparel to the next level and help millions of special needs individuals, I need your help !

JOIN- Become a fan of us on facebook , follow us on Twitter, read our Blog , or email us at papercloudsapparel@gmail.com. We would love to hear from you. If you know of any special needs schools or organizations looking for funding, please contact us !

SPREAD THE WORD- Have a blog ? Know others who might be interested in helping Paper Clouds Apparel ? Spread the word by any means available. None of this will be possible without YOU !

Why Bamboo ?

Bamboo is one of the world's most sustainable resources. As the fastest growing grass on Earth, bamboo roots continually sprout new shoots without the need for fertilizers or harmful pesticides. Commercial cotton uses only 2.4% of the world's arable land; however cotton requires the use of 24% of the world's insecticide market and 11% of the sale of global pesticide chemicals in the form of fertilizers and pesticides. Creating a single cotton t-shirt requires 700 gallons of water, a bamboo t-shirt requires 34 gallons of water. The production of bamboo clothing has a lower impact on the environment than the conventional cotton farming methods. Bamboo fabric also feels like a cross between silk and cashmere, super soft to the skin. Bamboo fabric offers comfort, is highly absorbent, hypoallergenic, has wicking abilities, more breathable than cotton, and a natural sheen. Did we mention how comfortable it is ? We LOVE bamboo !!

How the shirts fit-

The shirts do run a little small. So if in doubt order a size larger. However, if the shirt does not fit you just how you would like, Paper Clouds Apparel will make sure you get a shirt that does fit you. We want you to love your Paper Clouds Apparel shirt and wear it all the time !!


Don't Forget to let us know which shirt and in what size you want :)

SIZES-

CREW NECK- S-XXL

WOMEN'S SHIRTS- XS-XL

Thank you !!!!!!

We appreciate you taking the time to check out out Indiegogo add. Hopefully you dig our cause and will help fund our expansion. And when you do, you wear your Paper Clouds Apparel shirt like a champ and take some pictures. We would love to post a picture of you wearing it on our blog, facebook page and on our new website we will have after your funding. So please feel free to email us any shots of you rocking your PCA shirt :)

Paper Clouds Apparel in the media-

http://www.abc15.com/dpp/lifestyle/sonoran_living/turning-artwork-into-t-shirts-for-people-with-special-needs

http://www.westvalleyview.com/main.asp?SectionID=2&SubSectionID=1&ArticleID=39601

http://www.upiu.com/culture-society/2011/05/02/Socially-conscious-businesses-use-profits-to-give-back/UPIU-7731304364417/

story:
More Perks are in our Shipyard!

Can't use IndieGoGo? Visit our site to use more than 100 payment options! 

 

 

Real quick

  • A universe of alternate history of the second half of the XX century, with trading, piracy and epic battles.
  • Lots of real warships and submarines
  • Single-player mode - Offline or Online (Coop)
  • Global game universe for all players
  • No Subscriptions
  • No Pay to Win

For more information, there’s a lot to read down below, and there is a lot of info on our forums, especially in HDIW magazine issues. Also - all games come with a digital copy of the Manual.

Here’s the deal

We're doing crowdfunding on IndieGoGo and our own website.

The great news that project will be released in any case (as we're fans of our action), but its size depends on you! We need your support to make it best - the money raised on our site and here on IndieGoGo are combined to determine which of the main stretch goals we’ve met.

We work closely with the community, so the order of feature integration will be fitted.

Realism

We want to create a really deep and many-sided gameplay. There are no straight solutions, strict rules and restrictions in the real naval warfare. There is only knowledge of equipment, strategies, ability and luck. Forget about annoying HP straps, we want every shell to bring an emotional chute-the-chute. Enemy detection systems are damaged? Adjust your tactics on the fly or perish. And of course there is no place to the "golden invulnerable ship of 80th level". Any combat ship like old Komsomolets or new Sea Lion brings death and destruction and makes headways to the victory.

The main idea is classic - easy to start, difficult to master. Our balance approach and unique setting give us ability to create fantastic game for different player skills - from casual action to hardcore depth!

Abundance of the high lvl content

Possibly everyone encounters a situation when your favorite online game bores in a couple of months. All levels are completed, the breast bends under pressure of medals, your trophies occupy an area of a small hangar. And there is nothing for you to do in the game. We consider this way to be wrong. We want our game to be interesting for you after one month, one year or three years of active gameplay. We are sure that interesting, manifold battles, numerous events and random adventures, regular championships and tournaments, open global war is the right way to this goal.

The Style

SeaCraft uses the original setting of the second half of the XX century - great confrontation of two superpowers led to a full-scale military conflict. Now you are the one to create the new history of the world. The time has come to find the best captain!

Micro Updates Rule!

We want to create the whole naval battle universe, and once live, we'll have a team of people adding content on a regular basis. So, there will be always fresh data, stories, ships, weapons and ingame events. We're creating game for gamers first, so with micro updates we'll react to the needs and actions of the players.

Pay Once, Play Forever

There are no subscriptions in our game and you won't pay again and again to play comfortable.

The Map

Our Global War is not a siege of fortresses at Thursdays, this is a complex and manifold game within the game. It depends on you whether to become a member of a large clan or be a one-man boat, to have an old combat ship or a NPS - the fate of the world will depend on You. Mining resources, construction of new ships, piracy, mercenary activities, diplomacy, global events... You will not feel bored ;)

First thing you should know about the global war - you will participate in it. It doesn't matter whether you join a random battle for 15 minutes during the lunch or you are the member of the best squadron in the best clan - every fight will directly affect the situation on the global map. Any battle within the game is linked to a certain territory on the front line. The amount of victories and defeats is compared and, on its basis, it is decided which direction the front line will move.

No one knows what will be with the World in the war like this. Maybe you'll fight in sunken Red Square or New York? With our "new history simulation" concept all is possible and players will write the Story.

Price of Money

The second important thing in the global war is that the war is won not only by soldiers and commanders, but also manufacturers and economists. Every sunken ship requires the time and resources for replacement and will be a tar baby for your country. Territories provide resources required for fleet construction.

Top-rank ships are very expensive and can be lost irretrievably during the battle. However, some clans may afford building several missile cruisers. Huge giants of steel with numerous guns and missile pads can become a real demonstration of your power. And a desired target for the enemy captain. Repair of such vessel and, moreover, its loss, can affect greatly clan's treasury.

Jolly Roger

Only venturous captains dare to become pirates. Regardless your goals - going for the gold or sense of justice - start your own war. Even well guarded convoy is not a barrier for absolute war.

On the other side, you can become a mercenary and get revenues from the "official" robbery

What is more absorbing — to be a daring captain of a missile boat or a sober-minded submarine admiral? Missile and torpedo boats, submarines and submarine hunters, cruisers and battleships and other deadly toys will become your instruments for achievement of global domination in the sea.

Let me show the idea:

   

We want to add aircraft carriers and other countries.. It's in your hands ;)

His friend's shoulder

You can operate one ship with friends to increase it's control. For example, when player's missile boar is destroyed or totally damaged he can "go out" and take a seat on ally's battlecruiser to control the artillery or take a fly on it's helicopter.

The scheme should be inspected beginning with the center. There are 6 types of weapons, 3 of them are located on the top and are responsible for the above water world, and another 3 serve as an under water weapon.

Each type has its own task divided into subtasks. Let's say, special cruise missiles can destroy an NPS at long range, and if it moves closer, an antisubmarine bomb will be used.

Read More in "How does it works?", #2 issue.

Missiles

Even small and outdated missile boats possess some kind of a manifold and arranged ABM/AA defense, starting from small air defense systems and ending with automatic guns. Let alone larger and modern ships.

A missile can be improved to overcome different ABM types. For example, shooting-off decoy targets will help to fight against anti-air missiles, and an improved electronics will not allow to blind the missile easily by EW warfare. However, the number of improvements is strictly limited, but the assortment and power of a particular ship's AA defense can be extensive. Let's say, the missile can evade the fire of an automatic cannon using better maneuvering, but the concentrated fire of 3-4 artillery systems will leave no chances. Thereat a missile cannot be protected from all types of AA warfare, it should be modified within the dockage facilities taking into account a concise specifics of ABM targets.

Read More in "How does it works?", #3 issue.

Big Bang

Tactical nuclear weapons are inside. Just think how demolishing could be a silent hunter armored with missiles or torpedoes with nuke!

Every sea conceals danger for travelers even for military vessels. You should be equally vigilant at calm or angry sea if you expect to see the seashore one more time.

PvP fights will be sessional (same as in many shooters), however, the gameplay differs greatly depends on gametype. From 4 to 32 players will take part in different battles, so you can choose what areas you like - from 6x6 km for high-pressure action to 33x33 km size for long strategic battles.

The World Around

The environment plays very important role in SeaCraft - depends on weather, wind, daylight, terrain and other circs on the map you'll operate your ship different. Your boat in storm could be very unstable and you have to use eyeballs only to pave a way. At the same time at night your tech is your only eyes. When you're in the mist you can't trust sounds. The isle blocks your radars, and so.

If you're the brave captain of the submarine you'll fight with flows and termoclins. You can use underwater caves to hide or canals to move to enemy's rear.

In assault mode or while attacking enemy base in some areas you can find dams. You have a choice to save it (so you won't need to restore it when capture) or destroy it and get a tactical advantages (stranded ships, subs in shock, ground turrets panic).

The game will drive you into the enthralling world of sea battles from equatorial latitudes to northern ices. Sea battles are exciting! :)

No Connection Is Required

If you want to play alone - you'll play! We're working on exciting preface story, which could be played offline (and online if you want to play coop). Nine tenths game modes are available for game in local network with friends or offline with bots.

What's The Story?

Let's imagine - the time of the Cold War, the relationship between USA and USSR is intenced.. and in our alternative timeline something goes wrong.. Not so dreadfully as nuclear winter, but it will be bleak seasons!

Unreal Power

We're working on the highest level of entertainment - you'll fell yourself like a movie participant! We can concentrate on gameplay due to Unreal Development Kit - the award-winning 3D game engine. Only UDK has the power, flexibility and track record of Unreal Engine 3. These tools have been proven with countless releases and dozens of awards. There is no better way to make awesome games on the PC and iOS than with UE3.

UI And UX Design

User interface is only connection between you and the game. We work hard on usability and analyzing lots of great games to create our own system comfortable and informative. We use console basis, so SeaCraft will be played great with XBox controllers too.

The Third Dimension

If you want to get max feelings from the game you definitely should try the 3D screen mode! Thanks to RealD technologies you will dive exactly into fantastic world!

We're fans of our action and you can see a twinkle in our eyes when we're speaking about ships and ocean :) But today we're very small team and we need your support to release the project.

People who sponsored SeaCraft we call Founders, as these people stand at the origins of the project. You as the customer get the ultimate vote in whether we make this game. Your dollars are your votes and the better we do the more resources we’ll have to bring you a great game.

Feel free to say what you think about us and the game! We have a Russian soul and happy to communicate with you :)

Stretch goals?

The purpose of the higher stretch goals is to ensure that the game-as-described is finished in the six month time period. We intend to build the game as described regardless, but without additional funding we are going to have to do it one piece at a time, rather than as a single larger production. With more funding we can include more ships, systems, unique locations and events.

We know what means to be an indie developer - it's hard and responsibly. After game release we'll regular spend 5% minimum of our income for funding campaign here, on IndieGoGo. You'll support us - so we'll support someone else in future.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please tell friends about us, write about SeaCraft in your blog, put "Like" for SeaCraft on our Facebook page or on Steam Greenlight.

  

We'll be very thankfull for yout support!

 

More Perks are in our Shipyard! 

Can't use IndieGoGo? Visit our site to use more than 100 payment options!

The Style
SeaCraft uses the original setting of the second half of the XX century - great confrontation of two superpowers led to a full-scale military conflict. Now you are the one to create the new history of the world. The time has come to find the best captain!
Micro Updates Rule!
We want to create the whole naval battle universe, and once live, we'll have a team of people adding content on a regular basis. So, there will be always fresh data, stories, ships, weapons and ingame events. We're creating game for gamers first, so with micro updates we'll react to the needs and actions of the players.
Pay Once, Play Forever
There are no subscriptions in our game and you won't pay again and again to play comfortable.

The Map
Our Global War is not a siege of fortresses at Thursdays, this is a complex and manifold game within the game. It depends on you whether to become a member of a large clan or be a one-man boat, to have an old combat ship or a NPS - the fate of the world will depend on You. Mining resources, construction of new ships, piracy, mercenary activities, diplomacy, global events... You will not feel bored ;)
First thing you should know about the global war - you will participate in it. It doesn't matter whether you join a random battle for 15 minutes during the lunch or you are the member of the best squadron in the best clan - every fight will directly affect the situation on the global map. Any battle within the game is linked to a certain territory on the front line. The amount of victories and defeats is compared and, on its basis, it is decided which direction the front line will move.
No one knows what will be with the World in the war like this. Maybe you'll fight in sunken Red Square or New York? With our "new history simulation" concept all is possible and players will write the Story.
Price of Money
The second important thing in the global war is that the war is won not only by soldiers and commanders, but also manufacturers and economists. Every sunken ship requires the time and resources for replacement and will be a tar baby for your country. Territories provide resources required for fleet construction.
Top-rank ships are very expensive and can be lost irretrievably during the battle. However, some clans may afford building several missile cruisers. Huge giants of steel with numerous guns and missile pads can become a real demonstration of your power. And a desired target for the enemy captain. Repair of such vessel and, moreover, its loss, can affect greatly clan's treasury.
Jolly Roger
Only venturous captains dare to become pirates. Regardless your goals - going for the gold or sense of justice - start your own war. Even well guarded convoy is not a barrier for absolute war.
On the other side, you can become a mercenary and get revenues from the "official" robbery

What is more absorbing — to be a daring captain of a missile boat or a sober-minded submarine admiral? Missile and torpedo boats, submarines and submarine hunters, cruisers and battleships and other deadly toys will become your instruments for achievement of global domination in the sea.
Let me show the idea:
   
We want to add aircraft carriers and other countries.. It's in your hands ;)

His friend's shoulder
You can operate one ship with friends to increase it's control. For example, when player's missile boar is destroyed or totally damaged he can "go out" and take a seat on ally's battlecruiser to control the artillery or take a fly on it's helicopter.


The scheme should be inspected beginning with the center. There are 6 types of weapons, 3 of them are located on the top and are responsible for the above water world, and another 3 serve as an under water weapon.
Each type has its own task divided into subtasks. Let's say, special cruise missiles can destroy an NPS at long range, and if it moves closer, an antisubmarine bomb will be used.
Read More in "How does it works?", #2 issue.
Missiles
Even small and outdated missile boats possess some kind of a manifold and arranged ABM/AA defense, starting from small air defense systems and ending with automatic guns. Let alone larger and modern ships.

A missile can be improved to overcome different ABM types. For example, shooting-off decoy targets will help to fight against anti-air missiles, and an improved electronics will not allow to blind the missile easily by EW warfare. However, the number of improvements is strictly limited, but the assortment and power of a particular ship's AA defense can be extensive. Let's say, the missile can evade the fire of an automatic cannon using better maneuvering, but the concentrated fire of 3-4 artillery systems will leave no chances. Thereat a missile cannot be protected from all types of AA warfare, it should be modified within the dockage facilities taking into account a concise specifics of ABM targets.
Read More in "How does it works?", #3 issue.
Big Bang
Tactical nuclear weapons are inside. Just think how demolishing could be a silent hunter armored with missiles or torpedoes with nuke!

Every sea conceals danger for travelers even for military vessels. You should be equally vigilant at calm or angry sea if you expect to see the seashore one more time.
PvP fights will be sessional (same as in many shooters), however, the gameplay differs greatly depends on gametype. From 4 to 32 players will take part in different battles, so you can choose what areas you like - from 6x6 km for high-pressure action to 33x33 km size for long strategic battles.
The World Around
The environment plays very important role in SeaCraft - depends on weather, wind, daylight, terrain and other circs on the map you'll operate your ship different. Your boat in storm could be very unstable and you have to use eyeballs only to pave a way. At the same time at night your tech is your only eyes. When you're in the mist you can't trust sounds. The isle blocks your radars, and so.
If you're the brave captain of the submarine you'll fight with flows and termoclins. You can use underwater caves to hide or canals to move to enemy's rear.
In assault mode or while attacking enemy base in some areas you can find dams. You have a choice to save it (so you won't need to restore it when capture) or destroy it and get a tactical advantages (stranded ships, subs in shock, ground turrets panic).
The game will drive you into the enthralling world of sea battles from equatorial latitudes to northern ices. Sea battles are exciting! :)

No Connection Is Required
If you want to play alone - you'll play! We're working on exciting preface story, which could be played offline (and online if you want to play coop). Nine tenths game modes are available for game in local network with friends or offline with bots.
What's The Story?
Let's imagine - the time of the Cold War, the relationship between USA and USSR is intenced.. and in our alternative timeline something goes wrong.. Not so dreadfully as nuclear winter, but it will be bleak seasons!

Unreal Power
We're working on the highest level of entertainment - you'll fell yourself like a movie participant! We can concentrate on gameplay due to Unreal Development Kit - the award-winning 3D game engine. Only UDK has the power, flexibility and track record of Unreal Engine 3. These tools have been proven with countless releases and dozens of awards. There is no better way to make awesome games on the PC and iOS than with UE3.
UI And UX Design
User interface is only connection between you and the game. We work hard on usability and analyzing lots of great games to create our own system comfortable and informative. We use console basis, so SeaCraft will be played great with XBox controllers too.
The Third Dimension
If you want to get max feelings from the game you definitely should try the 3D screen mode! Thanks to RealD technologies you will dive exactly into fantastic world!

We're fans of our action and you can see a twinkle in our eyes when we're speaking about ships and ocean :) But today we're very small team and we need your support to release the project.
People who sponsored SeaCraft we call Founders, as these people stand at the origins of the project. You as the customer get the ultimate vote in whether we make this game. Your dollars are your votes and the better we do the more resources we’ll have to bring you a great game.
Feel free to say what you think about us and the game! We have a Russian soul and happy to communicate with you :)
Stretch goals?
The purpose of the higher stretch goals is to ensure that the game-as-described is finished in the six month time period. We intend to build the game as described regardless, but without additional funding we are going to have to do it one piece at a time, rather than as a single larger production. With more funding we can include more ships, systems, unique locations and events.

We know what means to be an indie developer - it's hard and responsibly. After game release we'll regular spend 5% minimum of our income for funding campaign here, on IndieGoGo. You'll support us - so we'll support someone else in future.
Other Ways You Can Help
Please tell friends about us, write about SeaCraft in your blog, put "Like" for SeaCraft on our Facebook page or on Steam Greenlight.
  

We'll be very thankfull for yout support!
 
More Perks are in our Shipyard! 
Can't use IndieGoGo? Visit our site to use more than 100 payment options!

story:
While designing and building custom furniture and cabinetry I set my work apart from others by applying the techniques used in marquetry and stained glass. I created designs for cabinet door panels using exotic wood veneers and then applied lead and solder much like stained glass. Recently I came across these beautiful patina copper patterns and couldn't resist using them in place of the wood veneers. The patinas are made by hand so no two patterns can ever be the same. This adds even more uniqueness to each piece of work!
             









The response has been so impressive I decided it's time to bring this to market on a much larger scale and this is where I need your help. Your contributions will make these unique products available on a level that I can not achieve on my own.

The Coppertree puts a unique twist on the products by offering a choice of the patinas to fit individual tastes. Simply choose the ones that will match your decor and our software will show you a preview!

         





         

                             

   These door panels will add elegance to any cabinet! Custom designs available.

 

 



                             

           What a cool way to match and compliment the cabinet door panels!

        


                             

    The CopperTree wall hangings add flare to any room in your home or office.

       

        

                                         

                            


                             




The leading process is one of the features that makes these products so unique. After the design has been mounted and sealed, the leading is applied over the seams and each joint is soldered. A bluing solution adds a dark patina to the leading for the final touch.

                                                   

                                                         

          


 When the goal has been reached the funds will be used accordingly:
34% for perk fulfillment (materials,labor,S/H,campaign fees)
40% for Annual operating costs (rent,utilities,supplies,insurance,payroll)
12% for Marketing to homeowners, interior designers, cabinet shops, trade shows, gifts shops, and through the Internet.
14% held in cash reserves.
New products will continue to be designed and marketed on an ongoing basis. 


By using the Flex funding, if the goal is not reached within a 20% margin, my spreadsheets indicate the The CopperTree products could still be produced and marketed but on a smaller scale of course. I know it will still be worth the effort and your contributions!


             


A common risk is the lack of consumers with needs for a particular product. My past experiences show me there are consumers who want and need distinctive handmade products that The CopperTree offers.

Another risk can be the cost of copper and skilled labor causing high end pricing but there are enough ways this technique can be applied that both high and moderate pricing can be achieved. Typical production costs for the door panels is $38.00s/f  while the cost of jewelry pieces is about $8. 

Other risks are greatly reduced by the fact that this technique has created  a truly new and unique product line.

            


To thank you for your generosity The CopperTree is offering you a choice of the pendants and or the light switch wall plates.

The CopperTree Pendants are 1"W. by 2"L. silver-toned bases inlaid with the patina coppers and a resin cap to protect the patinas. Please note that the patinas will be random and the necklace is not included.

The CopperTree Light Switch Plates are available for single, two or three switches. These copper covered plates will fit standard ( American ) electrical boxes. You won't see any funky screws because they simply snap int place. Very cool! 
  • Single switch - 2 1/4" x 3 1/2"
  • Two switch - 4' x 3 1/2"
  • Three switch - 5 3/4" x 3 1/2"

Please indicate which of these patinas you would prefer: Azul, Enhanced, Flamed, Distressed, Mottled, Sunburst, Stellar, or Verde. (see above)

                             

Can't contribute financially? You can still be a great help by spreading the word!
Have a comment or question? Please use the comment tab above. I'd like to hear from you too.

                           

Q: Can the cabinet door panels be made to fit my cabinets?
Yes for any cabinet measuring 18" w by 30" h. Custom sizes can be made.

Q: What if I have my own design?
No problem. The CopperTree uses a specialized software just for that purpose.
Designs can also be made from photos.

Q: Can I see a preview of how the different patinas would look in a design?
Yes. The software lets you customize your design with any of the patinas.

Q: Can the copper be applied to a curved surface?
Yes. The copper is 32 gauge which is light enough to cut by hand but strong enough for bending.

Q: Can The CopperTree make signs and logos?
Of course. Why not add something unique to your business too!

story:
ReBag: Perfect for Gift, Family Memoir, Friends' Birthday Presents, Team Honor-We help you to collect the memories and carry them forward.

We send you an envelope, you choose the pattern and mail the clothes to us, and you receive your ReBag.

Completely Personal + Connect Present and Future + Extend Emotional Ties: All made happen with ReBag: good-quality handmade refashioned bags of sustainability and fun. 

Why Repurposing 

Fast-moving fashion brings textile waste pollution: Fashion comes in swamps and leaves when people delve into another new experiences. In United States alone, the Ecommerce fashion market (clothes, bags, shoes) will reach 54 billion sales and 17% annual growth from now to 2017. However, there are 4 millions tons of used textile simply thrown away every year. 

Wardrobe stores experiences: I remember one day when I opened my mom’s wardrobe, I found many tiny baby clothes neatly folded and put in the corner. I asked my mom ‘why do you keep those outfashioned flory pants?’ she said those baby clothes remind her so much of how small and cute I was when I was 6 months, and look at how tall I am now (5’ 8). Moms keep kids’s clothes, brides keep wedding dresses, friends keep gift garments, alumni keep school uniforms, you keep your experiences. 

Creativity with new purpose: Refashioning gives your experience-rich clothes a new life and purpose. Turning clothes into your personalized bag allows the past memories to exist and function in a new form. Creativity brings us surprises, and makes it possible that our valuable experiences are carried with us along the way. Keep the clothes, ReBag, and carry it on. 

Why ReBag and How it works

     ReBag believes that every single piece has its value, and encourage people to ‘Keep the clothes, ReBag, and carry it on’. We explore feasible, socially inclusive and fashionable ways to not only recycle clothes, but also promote green life practices, and serve as a resource and chain integrator to bring sewing experts, designers, craftsmen (usually underprivileged women) and social-impact community together to make and deliver value-added bag products.

We send you an envelope, you choose the pattern and mail the clothes to us, and you receive your ReBag.


Once ReBag is funded, we will be sending out form to get your chosen style(s), clothes info and address. 

Our Bags: Pattern at your choice with your OWN clothes

Be a designer to collect your memories, fashion and style. Your choice of clothes will decide how you ReBag is like.


Rewards


It is not about BAGS, it is about your passion, experiences, and the loved ones.

Meet Voirrey (50-year-old, originally from UK, who traveled from Germany to Beijing as intrigued by Eastern Culture)


Voirrey: “The way she’s done it is beautiful. The way she sewed the material, so it fits the flowers. It’s amazing. The shapes she has come up with, and she’s made these buttons with clothes on them. I’m really astounded. It’s so beautifully done, and have lined too. They have lining inside, like that.These were just old clothes, which I thought were very boring for her to use. I was really worried that they weren’t good enough for her to use, but she has really done something special."


Collect your experiences in another form and carry it on

 music credit to music. Baidu.com
