story:
Reinventing Winter Apparel

Torch is the World's First Universal Coat Heater (Patents Pending).  Torch is a battery operated heater specifically designed to fit seamlessly inside your coat and can easily be moved from one coat to another.  Beat the cold in ANY and EVERY coat you own. 

Torch is fully rechargeable, with 4 heat settings and can last up to 5 hours on a single charge. Transform your coat into a heated coat so you can go outdoors and enjoy the beauty of winter!

*******CAMPAIGN UPDATE 11-13-2017***********

We had a great first season last year, and again with the help of all of our backers we were able to refine the Torch Coat Heater and officially launch Torch 2.0, our Second Generation Coat Heater.  We have some great discounts for all of our friends here on Indiegogo, so check the updates for Promo Codes!

With the help of our backers we came up with some great upgrades for Torch 2.0 Check them out here:

And Torch 2.0 is now available in 3 sizes!

 

 

 

*******CAMPAIGN UPDATE 2016***********

We had a great run here on Indiegogo and we are so grateful to all of our backers.  With the success of the campaign we were able to turn our idea of Torch into a great, retail-ready product.  We have fulfilled all of the orders from Indiegogo as of 10/27/2016 and we officially have Torch for sale online.  If you would like to purchase Torch you can do so here on Indiegogo or on our website here:
https://torchcoatheater.com/ 
 
or you can visit our friends at the Warming Store.
 

Or check us out on Amazon!!

 

We Reached our $22,000 Stretch Goal:

By popular demand, once we reach $22,000 in backing, each Torch will be upgraded with a specially designed pocket to house the battery!

Compare Torch to Similar Heated Coats

Torch utilizes the same technology as the leading brands, but has huge advantages with this patented design.  By taking the heating elements out of the coat, Torch brings the heat pads closer to your body, which means less waste and more heat for you.  
But whats the real advantage?  Let's hear it from an outside source.

"Torch offers an affordable and versatile solution [to heated coats] that can be used on any of your coats." Noel Palacios, Gadget Explained.

Beat The Cold

Live your life without the weather restrictions.  Remember, there is no such thing as being cold, only unprepared.  With Torch you can be prepared for anything.  Be confident that your coat will keep you warm.

 

 

One Heater - Any Coat - No Bundling

 

Step 1: Pick Your Coat

 

Step 2: Install Torch

Step 3: Enjoy

 

Your Coat - Your Style

The coat you want to wear is rarely the most practical. With Torch, you now have the option to add a heater to whatever coat you can think of.  No more sacrificing comfort and style for functionality.

 

 

Take Torch On Any Adventure

Live your life filled with adventure without worrying about the weather. Torch is the most versatile heating apparel product in the world and can literally accompany you on any adventure. That's what makes Torch so special, you pick the coat, for any occasion and every adventure.

 

Where will you take Torch?

 

Be a Part of the Wildest Adventures Known to Man

 

When you contribute to Torch, you will be a part of something bigger.  We have partnered with a few exceptional individuals who will take Torch on the most extreme adventures known to man, and with you, we plan to follow their every move.
Follow an amazing women, Lynette Trott through an incredible story as she summits Everest.

 

Follow a group of motorcycle enthusiasts as they travel from the southern tip of South America all the way north to Alaska.

Torch may be built to withstand the elements, but it was made with the everyday person in mind.  Yes, Torch can be installed in a coat made for Everest and a jacket that will travel thousands of miles through intense wind, but also your  pea coat, your camouflage hunting jacket or even your suit coat.  No matter what coat you choose, Torch is guaranteed to keep you warm.

 

Pass The Torch

Like the Olympic Torch is passed from athlete to athlete, our Torch can be passed from coat to coat.   
 

 

 

 

Key Features

Battery and Charger

 

 

 

Thin and Durable Heat Pads

 

Installation Kits

 

How is Torch Installed?

 

 

Best Practices

Warranty

 

Risks and Challenges

We are a team of people that are very experienced in building projects to exact specifications and delivering on time.  We have also surrounded ourselves with other successful partners with proven track records.  We are very confident in our ability to supply every order on time.  In fact,  we have already completed a full manufacturing run with our suppliers and manufacturers. The biggest obstacles for manufacturing have already been overcome which will GREATLY REDUCE YOUR RISK.  

Materials:  We have sourced all of the materials we need, completed our quality testing, safety testing and we have locked in pricing and shipping requirements. 

Manufacturing:  We are teamed with a local manufacturer that has already done a first run for us.  They have been intimately involved in the product development and have all the resources needed to complete our order, and we love their lean manufacturing techniques!  They are aware of our schedule and we have top priority when our materials arrive in April.  

Shipping:  We have also partnered with a local fulfillment center.  We recently met with their team to further clarify the process and renegotiate shipping prices.  They have also been involved in the scheduling process and will be ready to fulfill all of our orders.  The owner of the fulfillment center is very excited for us, as she started her business from the ground up as well.  

 

Meet The Team

 

 

Torch in the Real World

 

Get a little more acquainted with the team and our friends and relive some of our memories with Torch.  This is why we do what we do, to keep the people we love warm and happy!

 

 

Torch in the Community

 

What People are Saying

"Torch is the bee's knees of  rechargeable heated coats! Torch has filled a gap in the market by offering an affordable and versatile solution that can be used on any of your coats"  Noel Pallacios (See the full review here)

Find us Across the Web

 

 

Special Thanks!!

The Song in the video is called Sedona, performed by Houndmouth.  We met the lead singer Matt after a show in Tucson, AZ and he gave us permission to use their song. Here is a picture of us!  It was an awesome show!!  

 

 

Thanks again to everyone who has helped, ESPECIALLY:

My beautiful wife Alana who has supported me through all the work put into Torch. Shane Eberspacher with Live Life the Brand for all the ideas and creative works. Joe Wesley (Hitmakers Media) and Paul Savory for filming/producing/editing and starring in the video, and of my old friend and partner Luke Cesarz.
story_txt:
Reinventing Winter ApparelTorch is the World's First Universal Coat Heater (Patents Pending).  Torch is a battery operated heater specifically designed to fit seamlessly inside your coat and can easily be moved from one coat to another.  Beat the cold in ANY and EVERY coat you own. Torch is fully rechargeable, with 4 heat settings and can last up to 5 hours on a single charge. Transform your coat into a heated coat so you can go outdoors and enjoy the beauty of winter!*******CAMPAIGN UPDATE 11-13-2017***********We had a great first season last year, and again with the help of all of our backers we were able to refine the Torch Coat Heater and officially launch Torch 2.0, our Second Generation Coat Heater.  We have some great discounts for all of our friends here on Indiegogo, so check the updates for Promo Codes!With the help of our backers we came up with some great upgrades for Torch 2.0 Check them out here:And Torch 2.0 is now available in 3 sizes!   *******CAMPAIGN UPDATE 2016***********We had a great run here on Indiegogo and we are so grateful to all of our backers.  With the success of the campaign we were able to turn our idea of Torch into a great, retail-ready product.  We have fulfilled all of the orders from Indiegogo as of 10/27/2016 and we officially have Torch for sale online.  If you would like to purchase Torch you can do so here on Indiegogo or on our website here:
https://torchcoatheater.com/  or you can visit our friends at the Warming Store. Or check us out on Amazon!! We Reached our $22,000 Stretch Goal:By popular demand, once we reach $22,000 in backing, each Torch will be upgraded with a specially designed pocket to house the battery!
Compare Torch to Similar Heated Coats

Torch utilizes the same technology as the leading brands, but has huge advantages with this patented design.  By taking the heating elements out of the coat, Torch brings the heat pads closer to your body, which means less waste and more heat for you.  
But whats the real advantage?  Let's hear it from an outside source.
"Torch offers an affordable and versatile solution [to heated coats] that can be used on any of your coats." Noel Palacios, Gadget Explained.


Beat The ColdLive your life without the weather restrictions.  Remember, there is no such thing as being cold, only unprepared.  With Torch you can be prepared for anything.  Be confident that your coat will keep you warm. 


 

One Heater - Any Coat - No Bundling 
Step 1: Pick Your Coat

 

Step 2: Install Torch


Step 3: Enjoy


 


Your Coat - Your Style
The coat you want to wear is rarely the most practical. With Torch, you now have the option to add a heater to whatever coat you can think of.  No more sacrificing comfort and style for functionality.
 


 
Take Torch On Any Adventure


Live your life filled with adventure without worrying about the weather. Torch is the most versatile heating apparel product in the world and can literally accompany you on any adventure. That's what makes Torch so special, you pick the coat, for any occasion and every adventure.
 


Where will you take Torch?



 

Be a Part of the Wildest Adventures Known to Man
 When you contribute to Torch, you will be a part of something bigger.  We have partnered with a few exceptional individuals who will take Torch on the most extreme adventures known to man, and with you, we plan to follow their every move.
Follow an amazing women, Lynette Trott through an incredible story as she summits Everest.


 
Follow a group of motorcycle enthusiasts as they travel from the southern tip of South America all the way north to Alaska.

Torch may be built to withstand the elements, but it was made with the everyday person in mind.  Yes, Torch can be installed in a coat made for Everest and a jacket that will travel thousands of miles through intense wind, but also your  pea coat, your camouflage hunting jacket or even your suit coat.  No matter what coat you choose, Torch is guaranteed to keep you warm. 
Pass The Torch Like the Olympic Torch is passed from athlete to athlete, our Torch can be passed from coat to coat.   
 

  
 



 

Key Features

Battery and Charger

 

 

 


Thin and Durable Heat Pads 

 Installation Kits




 
How is Torch Installed?


 

 

Best Practices


Warranty


 

Risks and Challenges
We are a team of people that are very experienced in building projects to exact specifications and delivering on time.  We have also surrounded ourselves with other successful partners with proven track records.  We are very confident in our ability to supply every order on time.  In fact,  we have already completed a full manufacturing run with our suppliers and manufacturers. The biggest obstacles for manufacturing have already been overcome which will GREATLY REDUCE YOUR RISK.  
Materials:  We have sourced all of the materials we need, completed our quality testing, safety testing and we have locked in pricing and shipping requirements. 
Manufacturing:  We are teamed with a local manufacturer that has already done a first run for us.  They have been intimately involved in the product development and have all the resources needed to complete our order, and we love their lean manufacturing techniques!  They are aware of our schedule and we have top priority when our materials arrive in April.  
Shipping:  We have also partnered with a local fulfillment center.  We recently met with their team to further clarify the process and renegotiate shipping prices.  They have also been involved in the scheduling process and will be ready to fulfill all of our orders.  The owner of the fulfillment center is very excited for us, as she started her business from the ground up as well.  
 
Meet The Team  


 
Torch in the Real World
 
Get a little more acquainted with the team and our friends and relive some of our memories with Torch.  This is why we do what we do, to keep the people we love warm and happy!
 
 Torch in the Community 

 
What People are Saying 
"Torch is the bee's knees of  rechargeable heated coats! Torch has filled a gap in the market by offering an affordable and versatile solution that can be used on any of your coats"  Noel Pallacios (See the full review here)

Find us Across the Web
 
 Special Thanks!!


The Song in the video is called Sedona, performed by Houndmouth.  We met the lead singer Matt after a show in Tucson, AZ and he gave us permission to use their song. Here is a picture of us!  It was an awesome show!!  
 
 Thanks again to everyone who has helped, ESPECIALLY:
My beautiful wife Alana who has supported me through all the work put into Torch. Shane Eberspacher with Live Life the Brand for all the ideas and creative works. Joe Wesley (Hitmakers Media) and Paul Savory for filming/producing/editing and starring in the video, and of my old friend and partner Luke Cesarz.

story:
Update:

Successfully funded on April 16th! Thank you! Artisan & Fox is now live on ArtisanAndFox.com with our online artisan marketplace.

Artisan & Fox is an ethical marketplace for extraordinary craftsmanship from developing regions. We've scoured the globe to discover extraordinary makers, so you can discover the human stories behind the things you love and wear.

 

After a successful pilot bringing Nepali artisans online in 2015-2016, we've expanded our social impact to countries including Afghanistan, Kenya and Guatemala. Now, we need your help to launch our first collection – featuring ethical jewelry, bags and shawls, collaboratively designed with these talented makers.

Join us in moving towards a better future for the fashion industry!

The following artisans' crafts are now available through our online marketplace at https://www.artisanandfox.com/.

 

 

It has never been so important to know the people behind the things we buy. With the rise of fast fashion, many of us have become disconnected from the stories behind the things we wear.

Fashion is a huge industry that employs over 100 million people in developing countries. But it is no secret that many workers in the fashion and craft industries are facing major ethical challenges. Our mission is to empower underprivileged makers in developing regions by connecting them directly to ethical consumers like you. 

We love our makers, our staff, and our conscious consumers. Our social promise reflects our commitment to ethics and transparency: 

  1. Our artisans are paid upfront for their work,
  2. 50% of the profits from each sale, and
  3. The cost breakdowns will be made fully transparent on our website.

 

We need your support so we can launch our first collection, developed in partnership with our artisan partners in Afghanistan, Guatemala, Kenya, Nepal, and Mexico.

50% of the profits from your purchase goes directly to the makers, while the other 50% is reinvested into building a platform that will help us expand our outreach to more artisans globally.

Your support will help:

  • Preserve traditional craftsmanship with centuries of history,
  • Provide fair prices and expand economic opportunity for the makers, and
  • Kickstart the development of an e-commerce platform to empower more artisans in developing regions.

Update: As of April 18th, we have raised US$25,374 from 275 backers. Thank you! Discover these artisans' crafts at Artisan & Fox.

 

Frequently Asked Questions

Where can I see more photos?

View our extended product catalogue with close-up of the products here.

How do I choose the size/style of my reward?

When our campaign ends, we’ll send you a form to specify your reward preferences in regards to size or color, as well as additional information on shipping destination. 

Do you carry my ring size?

Yes! Your ring will be hand-forged by your artisan after collecting your ring size. Artisans can generally accommodate US sizes 3 through 13 (that's basically everyone!).

What about shipping fees?

Shipping fees are not included in the perks, and backers will be responsible for shipping fees. For this Indiegogo campaign, shipping fees are reduced with economies of scale, and are calculated based on your destination. 

Who is responsible for duties/VAT/custom charges?

Backers will be responsible for any applicable custom or duties.

What is the meaning of the "Fox" in your name?

We were original inspired by the fox in the novel The Little Prince, who very aptly represents what we stand for with the quote, "It is only with the heart that one can see rightly, what is essential is invisible to the eye".

The “Fox” is also the spiritual Inari messenger in Japanese mythical culture. Similarly, we want to be the spiritual bridge between you - the conscious consumer - to your makers residing in developing countries.

You are offering the perks at a discount from the retail value, does this mean my artisan gets paid less?

No, the artisans will get paid approximately 50% of the estimated profit from the Retail Value (which eventually comes to 20%-40% of the retail price, depending on the item). 

We make it a point to pay our artisans upfront because many makers often do not have enough for materials or daily living expenses. Also, with this Indiegogo campaign, we are able to pass on the cost savings from organic marketing and reduced shipping costs directly to you. Hence our perks are at a discount!

 

Risks & Challenges

We have high trust in our artisans in meeting production schedules. During our pilot programme running between 2015-2016, our partners have never let us down and have always delivered on time.

That being said, each artisan works in a different yet challenging environment. Even though we do not foresee any delays, life can have unexpected surprises. Please also note that due to the handmade nature of each product, your item may be 1%-5% differently made from the image shown above. These are not defects, and we believe this adds to the unique character of your item.

Lastly, if anything unexpected happens, we will be sure to let you know right away, with full transparency in mind! You will be updated about the progress of your rewards with regular updates after the campaign.

story:
About this project

COMMUTER OUTERWEAR COLLECTION

Introducing the most versatile urban commuting jackets designed to keep you fashionably warm and dry for your daily commute.  

Sweet Clothing is a small company that designs and produces the brand names Mia Melon and One Man Outerwear. We are starting to emerge thanks to the help of Crowdfunding, our supporters and retailers. Our niche is multi-use weatherproof fashion outerwear. We are in a very capital intensive industry with a niche group of products that serves our customers very well. Unfortunately to keep the costs and affordability reasonable, we need to make hundreds at at time. We hope that one day, one of these campaigns will not only support the project we are trying to finance, but maybe finance the company and give us financial stability. Thank you in advance for taking a look at our latest campaign. I hope you are compelled to support this campaign.

URBAN STYLE + TECHNICAL FEATURES

RAYON JERSEY/ MICROFLEECE STREETWEAR HOODIES COMPLETE WITH WEATHERPROOF TECHNOLOGY AND OPTIONAL REFLECTIVE FEATURES. A GO TO OUTERWEAR STYLE FOR THE CITY, TRAVEL AND BEYOND. (ABOVE)

A revolutionary jacket that will change what we wear

With busier cities and car traffic congestion, commuting by urban bike, by foot and public transit is rapidly getting popular. Most major cities are now providing commuting infrastructure, and some cities are even going to extreme levels by planning to ban all car traffic in city down town districts. With the growing community of urban commuters we need to evolve the clothing we wear from day to day. This inspired us to make to deliver a practical jacket for every ones daily urban use.

COMMUTER JACKET COMPLETE WITH WEATHERPROOF TECHNOLOGY AND OPTIONAL REFLECTIVE FEATURES. A GO TO CITY STYLE FOR THE DAILY COMMUTE OR ANY OUTDOOR ADVENTURE. COTTON OUTER SHELL WITH SOFT MICROFLEECE LINING. (ABOVE)

ALL JACKETS INCLUDE: 

OPTIONAL SAFETY FEATURES: 

MULTI USE: 

Travel, Urban Commute

Hiking & Camping

Skiing or Snowboarding

Great Testimonials from our last campaign!

We did a fantastic job delivering our very first men's styles when it comes to quality,fit and comfort.

Heather Webb said: Received my coat today, it's wonderful! Warm, comfy and just the right amount of stretch :) thanks so much  

 Scott Kuo said: yay! i got my STRATUS jacket today! It is awesome and nice! Good job guys!  

Matthew. Got mine 23rd of Dec. Great timing btw. I waited a week for impressions. It was actually a freak 55 degrees in Chicago that day. Not a good test day. But it more appropriately dropped to 17 degrees one morning, and happy to report that the coat was sufficiently warm. Not sure about when it gets to -17, but we shall see. The coat has so far exceeded my expectations, which is a great thing when you blindly buy a $100+ coat through kickstarter. I love the color, which I feared would be too dark; it's a very nice dark army green, very unique. Fleece inside is very cozy. The lefty zipper will take some getting used to, and as one commentor mentioned, seems a little stiff due to the uniqueness of the outer fabric. Fits great and slim, but also long; something hard to come buy in retail shops. Overall a great jacket and pleased to rep the brand. Thanks a bunch. I had the Wander jacket btw. size S, dark olive

 alex lee said: Sensational jacket. Picked it up from the Post Office a few days back. Looks great, fits well & is mega-warm. Well done to all concerned. Many thanks!

larry cheng said: Just received my size medium Stratus jacket today in California. Looking forward to battling the next wave of El Niño with it!

AFFORDABLE QUALITY 


These jackets and hoodies are like buying a waterproof shell and a fleece hoodie all in one. Similar outdoor brands charge hundreds of dollars for big logo'd jackets that do not have much more function if any as our products. Supporting our project for production will save you as much as 33 % for a beautiful jacket or hoodie arriving only a 2-3 months later. So what are we waiting for? Help support us and save for something you will really put to good use!
Commuting Hoodie Perks are $129.00
Commuting Jacket Perks are $129.00
Women's Wanderer Jacket are $129.00
Women's Everglades Jacket are $129.00
Men's Wanderer Jacket are $139.00
The women's and men's wanderer jackets and the women's Everglades jacket all come in our special cotton herringbone fabric. Included in the fabric is our special membrane and an outer-shell DWR treatment. We have included these styles to help hit our 250 contribution goal. These jackets have been selling extremely well at FULL price and you can get one for 30% off right now.

                           Mia Melon Everglades Jacket in Dark Army

                               Everglades In Dark Army also on Light Taupe below



                                 Mia Melon Wanderer Jacket in Light Taupe
The Wanderer jackets are from our online collection. They have our special waterproof and windproof membrane with a DWR coating, and a gorgeous custom herringbone outer shell. They do not have the same features as the Commuting jackets such as under arm ventilation and reflective taping. The Wanderers are fashionable jackets great for every day use and will keep you warm and dry.


             

                     Mia Melon Wanderer Jacket in Light Taupe and Dark Army



           One Man Outerwear Wanderer Jacket in Light Taupe and Dark Army

                              Mia Melon Winter Commuter Jacket in Green 
The Winter weight Commuters have the same features as the "NEW" spring styles but have a 220gm micro-fleece lining instead of 180gm in the spring styles. The outer-shell is a heavier weight as well in the winter weight.

                                    Mia Melon Winter Commuter Perks in Black and Red

Mia melon Classic Tank Top - Perk

HIGH TECH COMMUTER JACKETS LOADED WITH FEATURES 

We have taken feedback from customers and review bloggers and modified the second generation of Commuting jackets. Already a great jacket just got better and only for $139 and we are always 100% customer satisfaction.

 
 

Risks and challenges

Our business in the industry we are in needs a lot of working capital. We also have factory minimums to be able to effectively deliver well priced, quality garments. We have yet to do a project where the results were good enough to finance the entire project. Some of our projects we have delivered on time or even a bit early, and some have been late. We will always deliver but the more successful the campaign is, the more resources we have to get the job done quicker.

story:
PRE- ORDER 100% SILK ADINKRA WOVEN NECKTIE GIFT SET

This year by popular demand we have reduced our standard necktie size from 7.5 to 6.5 cm to make it trendier. Nevertheless we will keep some of the production at the previous size to satisfy our existing customers.

If you have suggestions to colors you think will appeal to you and the general market, kindly let us know.

VIEW MORE IN THE GALLERY....

WE USE WEST AFRICAN ADINKRA IDEOGRAPHIC SYMBOLS TO DESIGN

Adinkra Symbols are old ideograph scripts of expression used mainly by the Ashanti Kingdom, from West Africa; since the 1800's. Oral evidence proves that the scripts were used primarily through various medium and crafts such as clothing, jewelry, furniture and many more. The textile industry around that era used to print these symbolic scripts on Royal, War, funeral and other ceremonial clothing. The Royal family were known for expressing themselves through the symbols printed on their various clothing, on occasions of Victory after war, rewarding the brave and hardworking, marriage, the birth of a child, farewell to the dead and many more.

WHO WE ARE:

Diviniti Wear Group is a registered limited liability company under the Ghana Company’s code Act 1963 (act 179).

  • A fashion house which makes luxury Men's African Clothing and Accessories, and we started our first production with Luxury Adinkra Theme Design, 100% Silk Necktie set ranges.
  • The company is founded by 33 years old Ghanaian entrepreneur Delali Kofi Adayi, based in Ghana.
  • Holds a Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science and Management, and a Master’s degree in Environmental Management and Policy from the Wisconsin International University College and University of Cape Coast respectively, all in Ghana.
  • After many years of working experience and love for fashion, he ventured into the fashion industry with full vigor describing his venture as his life’s fulfilling purpose, representing fashion brands such as EADEN MYLES from Canada, IL DOGE from Turkey, Politet from Turkey  and many more across the world.


GUARANTEE YOUR LUXURY NECKTIES GIFT ORDER FOR TOMORROW WITH A COST PRICE TODAY; AND REASONS ARE:

  • Unbudgeted funds for unplanned gift orders
  •  Late deliveries due to the pressure on courier companies around these seasons.
  • Delays in customs clearance of parcels during these seasons.
  • We can save more to support a rural child during Thanksgiving, Christmas and The New Year in 5 Villages feeding a minimum of 1000 Children per village.

OUR EXPERIENCE, OUR LESSON:

In September 2013, Diviniti Wear Group had a challenging experience of this rush, we sold out  50% of our first production of neckties gift sets before Christmas though our social media platform www.facebook.com/divinitiwear, and because the demand was so high we had to turn down orders due to financial and time constraints, and this applies to many other online and offline gift shops.

YOUR SUPPORT, OUR SUCCESS:

  • Increase our delivery efficiency and improve customer interaction and satisfaction
  • Escape the exponential exchange rate hike uncertainties e.g the exchange of our 1st Production was 2:1 ratio over GHC to USD respectively, today its 3:1 GHC to USD respectively.
  • Avoid high interest loans. (A loan investment for start-up in Ghana is mostly 2.5 – 6% per month for only short periods 6 – 12 months)
  • Reduce cost of production by fulfilling minimum order quantity demands
  • Price differentiation
WHAT WE USE CONTRIBUTED FUNDS FOR:


We are using contributed funds to take care of direct cost of production such as:

Designing  cost

  • Production of our custom designed 100% Silk Fabrics for Neckties
  • Production of custom print of Scarves and Pocket squares
  •  Cuff links Molds, Production and precious Stones
  • Gift Boxes and Packaging
  • Wages for finishing the full production of Gift sets.

WE PLEDGE A PRE-PURCHASE WIN-WIN STRATEGY

  1. We suggested a Gift Idea to you, just in case you didn't know what to buy for that special person.
  2. You support us and we prepare your Gift ahead of time, you only tell us the date of the delivery.
  3. Support us means you already bought a Gift at a the cost price today not the selling price of the season.
  4. We offer you free delivery services to our contributors
  5. We will receive your returned goods if you are not satisfied with the product you receive at our own cost, until you are satisfied with what you need.
  6. 25% of your support puts food on an orphans table during Christmas, through our local social partner The Only Hope.

PRODUCTION PROCESS

Before we order the production of our designs, we undergo a series of reviews by our review team, based on:

  1. Designing 
  2. Fabrics Sample Review and Quality Control
  3. Products Sample Review and Quality Control
  4. General survey of the most demanded designs with regards to the design itself, the colour way, length and size. This is because every design and its colour way is unique and must be treated independently.

2013 MOST SOLD NECKTIES

We have also taken into account a strategic consideration by producing the most demanded necktie designs and color way from our first production.

OUR MILESTONES

  • We began our first production in September 2013 with a total production of 1,000 neckties, 400 Cuff links, and 1500 Gift boxes and bags.
  • This was financed through an owner’s equity of USD 5, 000.00 and acquired a USD 15, 000.00 loan facility.
  • Our expected average sales were targeted at USD 35, 000.00, with the price of a necktie gift set and we were able to sell 70% of the total production at USD 29, 000 by 1st January, 2014. Our sales could only help pay expenses and make the full cost of loan repayment.
  • We were also able to have an inventory of call back customers who kept coming back to check whether we had been able produce new stock.
  • Our sales success was met through the promotion of our products on the social media such Facebook across West Africa, South Africa, UK and Canada, and also family and friends as well as first time customers through other media platforms such as the news prints.                             

FAQ

What does the Standard Gift Package contain?

 Our Standard Gift Set Package includes:

2 Neckties 100% Silk Woven Adinkra Design Necktie, self tipping and woolen interlining

2 of 100% Silk Pocket square that complements necktie

2 pairs of Stainless steel/Precious stones Cufflinks that compliments necktie

Our idea of using complementary pocket square and cufflinks is to make the entire package more contemporary and unique, yet driving the Adinkra message.


  How Do I Select My Orders From Your Product Range

  • Production is done after we receive your support and contributions and the complete full production shall be  ready on September, 2014.
  • We shall post our full collection of neckties, cufflinks and pockets onto our Facebook page www.facebook.com/divinitiwear.
  • Mails would be sent to all our contributors to visit our page and make their selections according to their perks contributions.

How Do I Pay For Orders

Payment shall be done through our bank Account Details:

Diviniti Wear Group Ltd

Barclays Bank Ghana

Branch: Prestige Banking, Achimota

Account Number: 0301110000001011508

SWIFT CODE: BARCGHAC

How Do You Deliver your Gift Sets

After you've made your customized selection from our product range, we will send your Gift Package or reward within 7 days through DHL to every part of the world.

Contributors will pay 50% of the cost of shipments.

New and existing customers will pay the full cost of the shipments of USD25.00.

Can I Custom Pick The Details Of My Gift Package

Yes you can custom pick the designs, all you need is to visit our shopping center on our website or our Facebook page and you can select them into your cart or message inbox, we already will have your contact details so we will crosscheck with our list and deliver accordingly. 

For every Vision Partner contributor we have the pleasure to allow you determine which specific colors you would want for us to custom produce the neckties for you.

 What Is The Guarantee That You Will Honor Your Rewards For My Contributions

We are a registered company with TIN Registration number C0002577267

You can also track the record of the Business owner Delali Kofi Adayi with TIN registration number P0002142805

REFERENCES

Mr. Emmanuel Amo - Atta

Prestige Banking

Achimota Branch

Barclays Bank Ghana

P.O.Box AT 1219

Achimota-Accra Ghana

Office Tel: +233-302-403360

Isaac Dankyi Koranteng

Resourcery Ghana Limited

35 B Busia Crescent

East Legon, Accra

Office Tel: +233-302-543671

e-mail: isaacdk@resourcery.com

Eric Eaden Myles Ampong

Eaden Myles

2100 Steeles Ave W, Suite 201

Vaughan, Ontario L4K 2V1

Canada

Office Tel: +1-647-985-8448

story:
UPDATE


We have improved the current extruder we had. The new extruder will adopt Teflon and aluminum alloy heat radiator for heat dissipation and duralumin alloy nozzle. It will have a 12V operating cooling fan. Its surface will be covered with anodic oxide coating, which can resist oxidation corrosion and increase nozzle hardness. Since the heat-insulated pipe is designed with Teflon, the material will not soften easily, thus ensuring finer and more stable printing. We are also installing a LED light to the extruder as well, which can be controlled by the LCD.

We have been working hard since we launched the project to try and upgrade some features on the printer. We will be able to upgrade the LCD, making it easier to use and offering more options to control the whole machine without connecting the printer directly to the computer, this LCD is one of the best options for 3D printing.


What we are Doing

We at Botler3D are creating a full 3D printing solution for home consumers. We want this technology to be available to everyone (at great and affordable prices!) and also easy to use for a positive user experience. Our long-term mission is to be innovative at every level of 3D printing, from object design all the way to printing and beyond.

 Our Vision

At Botlerlab, we believe that the biggest problems in our world are solved by taking a bigger view. That’s why our project is aimed at designing the first large-format 3D printer that you can also take home or to work with you. It’s not only about taking the amazing technology of 3D printing and amplifying it. If we’re successful, we can envision entire markets opening up to use this technology. Markets which have struggled to maintain the status quo, let alone use some of the cutting-edge technology that for the rest of the world is an overnight delivery away. We believe that by making a production-quality model of our 3D printer, and putting it in the hands of small business owners anywhere on the planet, we will give them the flexibility to sustain their community, their business, and ultimately, the world we live in.

 Here is what we offer:

Easy and Intuitive set up, The Botler3D is built to be as easily set up as possible. You do not need to mess around with raw spools of plastic lying around on your table because it is now integrated into the machine. There are no unnecessary wires or parts that get in the way and every Botler3D is fully set up and ready to go in minutes.

Botler3D is disrupting 3D printing

Our reason for starting this project is simple: there are no low-cost 3D printers that meet the quality standards of the professional designer. But, we became frustrated by the fact that all the professional-quality 3D printers were overly expensive – most cost thousands of dollars – and were so complex to use. Since early 2013, we decided to build a solution to solve this problem ourselves and we’re finally ready to show it to the world.

Why our Project Matters

Many prominent people believe 3D printing technology is not ready for the home. We respectfully disagree. When you help us to succeed, you are helping to bring this technology to everyone at a price that is easily affordable. Our dream is to make the user experience of this technology as seamless as it can be and to open up the technology while at the same time not being greedy and squeezing our customers for unsustainable profits.

Affordability:

Starting below $700, Botler3D is one of the lowest cost assembled, pretested, fast and high quality 3D printer available – it’s even less expensive than many leading consumer printers. Printers currently on the market with similar build area (+/- 3" all axes) have an average price tag of $3,000-$5,000. Help us bring Botler to everyone at an affordable price!

What makes Botler3D different? The results rivaling the best print quality of virtually every printer on the market at a price lower than most competitors'. Botler3D is top-notch from components to design and software to materials. This allows the machine very precise movement enabling extremely high print quality with minimum fuss.

Large Enclosed Build Area

It may be true that 90% of 3D Prints are less than 6”x4”x5” in size, but what do you do the other 10% of the time? Outsourcing large prints can be very expensive and gluing or bonding multiple piece prints is a real pain.

The Botler® printer is engineered to produce high resolution parts with the touch of a button. Botler® software is intuitive and simple to use so you can spend less time setting up prints and more time designing.

Botler® boasts a print volume (315 mm x 315 mm x 315 mm) because you never want equipment to limit your creativity. Smaller printers may be cheaper, but the peace of mind that Botler® gives you is priceless.

Heated Build Platform

Botler® features a heated aluminum build platform that allows printing with all varieties of materials without warping or lifting. The high-powered system provides consistent temperatures throughout a long build.

The build plate has some neat features. By using aluminum instead of glass you don't have to worry about the glass breaking when the nozzle hits the build plate.This saves time and money. The parts stay on the bed during printing and remove easily when done. The build plate locks into place without the commonly used binder clips.

Because we're using an all metal hotbed, your choice of printing materials is ABS and PLA.  It is possible that other filaments could be used, but only the above have been tested and confirmed to work.

Stand-Alone Printing Capability

We wanted Botler® to be an easy to use stand-alone printer since it is expensive and inconvenient to have an extra computer lying around to keep a 3D printer running. The Botler® control panel has a LCD control screen and built in SD Card reader that allows users to load and initiate prints with the push of a button.

Who is Botler3D for?

  • Architects- print out model homes and buildings for clients. Change and print out again without hassle.
  • Designers- Have an idea that you want to bring to life? Print out your designs and see if they were everything you imagined. If not, change it and print out the next idea.
  • Hobbyists/DIY- Easily create your projects in the comfort of your own home.
  • Small Business owners- Manufacture your own products at the office!
  • Students- Senior engineering project coming up? Use Botler3D to print the parts you need to get the job done.
  • Home owners- Replace broken household items for next to nothing!

High resolution belongs on your desktop. We've been hard at work for over a year and with your help, we’re ready to take Botler into full-fledged production. By supporting this effort, you’ll be the first to get your hands on an amazing 3D printer and help usher in a new era of 3D printing – an era in which your creative output is no longer limited by price or dauntingly complex machines.


What is Botler?

Botler3D is the ultimate 3D printer everyone has been waiting for. We combined the best minds from the open source community, the best hardware we believe can give the best prints, and our own ideas based on our experience working with 3D printers. What we created ended up being a functional 3D printer with an attractive, sleek design that is also so user-friendly that you could teach your children how to use it.

Mechanicals

Why ours is better

Current 3D printers have a very unfinished feel to them. By improving the aesthetics of a 3D printer as well as making the device more user-friendly, we felt this could bridge the gap to mass adoption of 3D printing. Along with that, we want to also keep final price affordable so it would make economical sense to purchase a Botler.

 Highlights

  • Open source 3D printer that anyone can use, regardless of knowledge and skill level.
  • Precise and high detail printing.
  • Low cost without sacrificing quality.
  • Easy to use *Large print area 12.4x12.4x12.4in / 315x 315x 315mm
  • Looks great, professional, and enticing
  • Sturdy structure, high quality parts, built to last
  • Great beginner printer or advanced printer – Botler does it all!

What can you create with Botler 3D?

The amount of things you can print out with our 3D printer are only limited by your imagination. The list goes on and on but some examples are iphone cases, prototypes, household items, replacement/spare parts, and more! There is plenty of free 3D modeling software out there. 3D Printer Beginners: Go to thingiverse.com, check out all the different designs people have created. When you see something you like, it’s as easy as plugging Botler3D into the wall, plugging it into your computer via USB, downloading that design, and then let the printer do the work!

What's Included with My Reward?

Besides our eternal gratitude, we’ll assemble a Botler 3D Printer with great care and send it to you along with software, instructions manual, USB cable, country-specific power adapter, and one filament spool. You can unbox it, install the software, and print right away - it’s as quick and as simple as that.


Why Botler 3D is Great!

  • Precise and high detail printing

We had to make sure that our printer was extremely precise and as detailed as possible when printing. Still in the works, but we included some of the prints we have currently done!

  • Low Cost Without Sacrificing Quality**

We wanted to create Botler 3D to not break the bank in the Consumer 3D Printing Industry. For just around $695, we are not only one of the cheapest, but one of the most precise printers out there.

  • Open Source 3D Printer that anyone can use**

Botler 3D was created for ease of use. Buying the fully assembled printer will allow you to plug it in, download the software and start printing within minutes. You do not have to create anything yourself before you begin prints. Find something cool that has already been designed by other 3D printer artists, download it and open in software and press print! Simple as that.


Risks and Challenges


We have built a few functional prototypes of Botler already. However, with all hardware projects, there is always a risk when it comes down to manufacturing. We will be reliant on our suppliers to deliver on time in order to maintain our schedule. If components or raw material are delayed in arriving, our production schedule will be delayed correspondingly. We are serious about keeping to our schedule but if there are unintended delays during material transport, manufacturing processes, or shipping, we will always be upfront about them and share it with all of you.
We know everything in a 3D printer has to be fine-tuned in order for everything to work perfectly. We challenge ourselves to create this product so that when it is fully assembled, it can be calibrated and in perfect working order very easily and efficiently. We will strive to make this happen throughout the funding stages to make sure this is our main focus.


FAQ

· When will my Botler Arrive? 

We are already working hard to plan our supply chain and manufacturing operations to make sure you get your Botler as soon as possible. We feel comfortable targeting June 2015 for our full production shipments.

· Why is the shipping cost not included?

Shipping prices vary by location and country. It’s simpler and cheaper for you to handle this separately. After the project is over and we are ready to start shipping, we will calculate the cost according to your address so you pay the appropriate amount.

· How much does international shipping cost?

Unfortunately, international shipping is not as easy or cheap as we would like it to be. Prices vary by country and by what taxes and other regulations your government has. You assume responsibility for all these charges. After the project is over and we are ready to start shipping, we will calculate the cost according to your address so you pay the appropriate amount.

· How big is the Botler? 

The entire Botler is 24.4 x 20.2x 29.1 in (61.9 x 51.3 x 73.9 cm) Print area 12.4" X 12.4" X12.4" in.

· Do you offer the option of adding a Dual Extruder?  

We currently are not offering a Dual Extruder option so that we could keep things a little bit simpler. We wanted to get everyone a working Botler as soon as possible with the chance of expanding and upgrading in the future. Once we get everyone their printers, we will work on trying to add different options and kits so you can upgrade if you would like.

· Do you have plans to make a bigger printer?

Well, we hope you can help us. Let’s get Botler off the ground into the 3D printer world, and then we’ll see what the future brings.

· What is the retail price of the Botler? 

We have not yet set an ongoing price. Our Indiegogo supporters are definitely receiving special treatment for believing in our product!

· What color options do I have for my Botler?

We are currently offering the Botler in three different colors. You can choose between silver, black or blue.

· Can I purchase filaments material with my Botler? 

Yes, currently you can purchase one 1kg spool of PLA or ABS for only $15 or buy in bulk and pay only $14 each since our wholesale price would last until the end of the project (the original price will be $25 each).

· Can you design with the Botler Software? 

Botler is not a design package but it is an amazingly easy and intuitive tool to take your designs from any 3D CAD package and allow you to simply set up and start the print process. The Botler Software will accept standard STL files.

· What operation systems will support the Botler Software? 

We are working to have Botler available on all major operating systems. Because the majority of 3D users are PC, this is our first priority, followed by Mac.

· What is the build speed, will the printer and parts last? 

Our build speed is comparable to other high resolution printers. It varies depending on the type of print. We’re designing this printer to be a serious workhorse and we have been running the prototypes in our office pretty much all day, every day during months of development.

· Is there an option for a heated plate? 

The Botler comes with a heated bed unlike most 3D printers out there. Botler comes with the heated build plate without increasing the cost.

·  Will Botlerlab offer a warranty or support?

Yes, we offer 1 year warranty on the Botler, we know it’s very important and are working on it as a high priority. We’ll guarantee that you receive a working printer, and are planning to take extra special care of those of you who have supported us from the beginning.

· What is the LCD/SD upgrade option? 

The LCD/SD upgrade allows the Botler to print without being connected to a computer. You can control temperatures, move the head, as well as start and pause prints. The LCD will provide information about the print while it is printing. Without the LCD/SD upgrade, you can control your printer via a USB connection to your computer.

· What materials can the Botler print? 

The Botler can print PLA, ABS and more.

UPDATEWe have improved the current extruder we had. The
 new extruder will adopt Teflon and aluminum alloy heat radiator for 
heat dissipation and duralumin alloy nozzle. It will have a 12V 
operating cooling fan. Its surface will be covered with anodic oxide 
coating, which can resist oxidation corrosion and increase nozzle 
hardness. Since the heat-insulated pipe is designed with Teflon, the 
material will not soften easily, thus ensuring finer and more stable 
printing. We are also installing a LED light to the extruder as well, which can be controlled by the LCD.We have been working hard since we launched the project to try and 
upgrade some features on the printer. We
 will be able to upgrade the LCD, making it easier to use and offering 
more options to control the whole machine without connecting the printer
 directly to the computer, this LCD is one of the best options for 3D 
printing.What we are Doing We at Botler3D are creating a full 3D
 printing solution for home consumers. We want this technology to be 
available to everyone (at great and affordable prices!) and also easy to
 use for a positive user experience. Our long-term mission is to be 
innovative at every level of 3D printing, from object design all the way
 to printing and beyond.  Our Vision At Botlerlab, we believe that the biggest 
problems in our world are solved by taking a bigger view. That’s why our
 project is aimed at designing the first large-format 3D printer that 
you can also take home or to work with you. It’s not only about taking 
the amazing technology of 3D printing and amplifying it. If we’re 
successful, we can envision entire markets opening up to use this 
technology. Markets which have struggled to maintain the status quo, let
 alone use some of the cutting-edge technology that for the rest of the 
world is an overnight delivery away. We believe that by making a 
production-quality model of our 3D printer, and putting it in the hands 
of small business owners anywhere on the planet, we will give them the 
flexibility to sustain their community, their business, and ultimately, 
the world we live in.  Here is what we offer: Easy and Intuitive set up, The 
Botler3D is built to be as easily set up as possible. You do not need to
 mess around with raw spools of plastic lying around on your table 
because it is now integrated into the machine. There are no unnecessary 
wires or parts that get in the way and every Botler3D is fully set up 
and ready to go in minutes.Botler3D is disrupting 3D printingOur reason for 
starting this project is simple: there are no low-cost 3D printers that 
meet the quality standards of the professional designer. But, we became 
frustrated by the fact that all the professional-quality 3D printers 
were overly expensive – most cost thousands of dollars – and were so 
complex to use. Since early 2013, we decided to build a solution to 
solve this problem ourselves and we’re finally ready to show it to the 
world. Why our Project Matters Many prominent 
people believe 3D printing technology is not ready for the home. We 
respectfully disagree. When you help us to succeed, you are helping to 
bring this technology to everyone at a price that is easily affordable.
Our dream is to make the user experience of this technology as seamless 
as it can be and to open up the technology while at the same time not 
being greedy and squeezing our customers for unsustainable profits. 
Affordability: Starting below $700, Botler3D is one of the
 lowest cost assembled, pretested, fast and high quality 3D printer 
available – it’s even less expensive than many leading consumer 
printers. Printers currently on the market with similar build area (+/- 
3" all axes) have an average price tag of $3,000-$5,000. Help us bring 
Botler to everyone at an affordable price!What makes Botler3D different? The
 results rivaling the best print quality of virtually every printer on 
the market at a price lower than most competitors'. Botler3D is 
top-notch from components to design and software to materials. This 
allows the machine very precise movement enabling extremely high print 
quality with minimum fuss.Large Enclosed Build Area It may be true that 90% of 3D
 Prints are less than 6”x4”x5” in size, but what do you do the other 10%
 of the time? Outsourcing large prints can be very expensive and gluing 
or bonding multiple piece prints is a real pain. The Botler® 
printer is engineered to produce high resolution parts with the touch of
 a button. Botler® software is intuitive and simple to use so you can 
spend less time setting up prints and more time designing. Botler®
 boasts a print volume (315 mm x 315 mm x 315 mm) because you never want
 equipment to limit your creativity. Smaller printers may be cheaper, 
but the peace of mind that Botler® gives you is priceless. Heated Build Platform Botler® features a heated 
aluminum build platform that allows printing with all varieties of 
materials without warping or lifting. The high-powered system provides 
consistent temperatures throughout a long build. The build plate 
has some neat features. By using aluminum instead of glass you don't 
have to worry about the glass breaking when the nozzle hits the build 
plate.This saves time and money. The parts stay on the bed during 
printing and remove easily when done. The build plate locks into place 
without the commonly used binder clips.Because we're using an all metal 
hotbed, your choice of 
printing materials is ABS and PLA.  It is possible that other 
filaments could be used, but only the above have been tested and 
confirmed to work.Stand-Alone Printing Capability We wanted Botler® to be
 an easy to use stand-alone printer since it is expensive and 
inconvenient to have an extra computer lying around to keep a 3D printer
 running. The Botler® control panel has a LCD control screen and built 
in SD Card reader that allows users to load and initiate prints with the
 push of a button. Who is Botler3D for? 
Architects- print out model homes and buildings for clients. Change and print out again without hassle. 
Designers- Have an idea that you want to bring to life? Print out 
your designs and see if they were everything you imagined. If not, 
change it and print out the next idea. 
Hobbyists/DIY- Easily create your projects in the comfort of your own home. 
Small Business owners- Manufacture your own products at the office! 
Students- Senior engineering project coming up? Use Botler3D to print the parts you need to get the job done. 
Home owners- Replace broken household items for next to nothing!
High resolution belongs on your desktop.
We've been hard at work for over a year and with your help, we’re ready 
to take Botler into full-fledged production. By supporting this effort, 
you’ll be the first to get your hands on an amazing 3D printer and help 
usher in a new era of 3D printing – an era in which your creative output
 is no longer limited by price or dauntingly complex machines. What is Botler? Botler3D is the ultimate 3D printer 
everyone has been waiting for. We combined the best minds from the open 
source community, the best hardware we believe can give the best prints,
 and our own ideas based on our experience working with 3D printers. 
What we created ended up being a functional 3D printer with an 
attractive, sleek design that is also so user-friendly that you could 
teach your children how to use it.Mechanicals Why ours is better 
Current 3D printers have a very unfinished feel to them. By improving 
the aesthetics of a 3D printer as well as making the device more 
user-friendly, we felt this could bridge the gap to mass adoption of 3D 
printing. Along with that, we want to also keep final price affordable 
so it would make economical sense to purchase a Botler.  Highlights 
Open source 3D printer that anyone can use, regardless of knowledge and skill level.

Precise and high detail printing.
Low cost without sacrificing quality. 
Easy to use 
*Large print area 12.4x12.4x12.4in / 315x 315x 315mm 
Looks great, professional, and enticing 
Sturdy structure, high quality parts, built to last 

Great beginner printer or advanced printer – Botler does it all!
What can you create with Botler 3D? The amount of things you 
can print out with our 3D printer are only limited by your imagination. 
The list goes on and on but some examples are iphone cases, prototypes, 
household items, replacement/spare parts, and more! There is plenty of 
free 3D modeling software out there.
3D Printer Beginners: Go to thingiverse.com,
 check out all the different designs people have created. When you see 
something you like, it’s as easy as plugging Botler3D into the wall, 
plugging it into your computer via USB, downloading that design, and 
then let the printer do the work! What's Included with My Reward? Besides our eternal gratitude,
 we’ll assemble a Botler 3D Printer with great care and send it
 to you along with software, instructions manual, USB cable, 
country-specific power adapter, and one filament spool.  You can 
unbox it, install the software, and print right away - it’s as quick and
 as simple as that.Why Botler 3D is Great!
Precise and high detail printing We had to make sure that our 
printer was extremely precise and as detailed as possible when printing.
 Still in the works, but we included some of the prints we have 
currently done! 
Low Cost Without Sacrificing Quality**We wanted to create 
Botler 3D to not break the bank in the Consumer 3D Printing Industry. 
For just around $695, we are not only one of the cheapest, but one of 
the most precise printers out there.Open Source 3D Printer that anyone can use**Botler
 3D was created for ease of use. Buying the fully assembled printer will
 allow you to plug it in, download the software and start printing 
within minutes. You do not have to create anything yourself before you 
begin prints. Find something cool that has already been designed by 
other 3D printer artists, download it and open in software and press 
print! Simple as that. Risks and ChallengesWe have built a few functional prototypes of Botler already. However, with all hardware projects, there is always a risk when it comes down to manufacturing. We will be reliant on our suppliers to deliver on time in order to maintain our schedule. If components or raw material are delayed in arriving, our production schedule will be delayed correspondingly. We are serious about keeping to our schedule but if there are unintended delays during material transport, manufacturing processes, or shipping, we will always be upfront about them and share it with all of you.We know everything in a 3D printer has to be fine-tuned in order for everything to work perfectly. We challenge ourselves to create this product so that when it is fully assembled, it can be calibrated and in perfect working order very easily and efficiently. We will strive to make this happen throughout the funding stages to make sure this is our main focus.FAQ· When will my Botler Arrive?  
We are already working hard to plan
our supply chain and manufacturing operations to make sure you get your Botler
as soon as possible. We feel comfortable targeting June 2015 for our full
production shipments.
· Why is the shipping cost not included? 
Shipping prices vary by location and
country. It’s simpler and cheaper for you to handle this separately. After the
project is over and we are ready to start shipping, we will calculate the cost
according to your address so you pay the appropriate amount.
· How much does international shipping cost? 
Unfortunately, international
shipping is not as easy or cheap as we would like it to be. Prices vary by
country and by what taxes and other regulations your government has. You assume
responsibility for all these charges. After the project is over and we are
ready to start shipping, we will calculate the cost according to your address
so you pay the appropriate amount.
· How big is the Botler?  
The entire Botler is 24.4 x 20.2x
29.1 in (61.9 x 51.3 x 73.9 cm) Print area 12.4" X 12.4" X12.4"
in.
· Do you offer the option of adding a Dual Extruder?   
We currently are not offering a Dual
Extruder option so that we could keep things a little bit simpler. We wanted to
get everyone a working Botler as soon as possible with the chance of expanding
and upgrading in the future. Once we get everyone their printers, we will work
on trying to add different options and kits so you can upgrade if you would
like.
· Do you have plans to make a bigger printer?
Well, we hope you can help us. Let’s
get Botler off the ground into the 3D printer world, and then we’ll see what
the future brings.
· What is the retail price of the Botler?  
We have not yet set an ongoing
price. Our Indiegogo supporters are definitely receiving special treatment
for believing in our product!
· What color options do I have for my Botler? 
We are currently offering the Botler
in three different colors. You can choose between silver, black or blue.
· Can I purchase filaments material with my Botler?  
Yes, currently you can purchase one
1kg spool of PLA or ABS for only $15 or buy in bulk and pay only $14 each since
our wholesale price would last until the end of the project (the original price
will be $25 each).
· Can you design with the Botler Software?  
Botler is not a design package but
it is an amazingly easy and intuitive tool to take your designs from any 3D CAD
package and allow you to simply set up and start the print process. The Botler
Software will accept standard STL files.
· What operation systems will support the Botler Software?  
We are working to have Botler
available on all major operating systems. Because the majority of 3D users are
PC, this is our first priority, followed by Mac.
· What is the build speed, will the printer and parts last?  
Our build speed is comparable to
other high resolution printers. It varies depending on the type of print. We’re
designing this printer to be a serious workhorse and we have been running the
prototypes in our office pretty much all day, every day during months of
development.
· Is there an option for a heated plate?  
The Botler comes with a heated bed
unlike most 3D printers out there. Botler comes with the heated build plate
without increasing the cost.
· 
Will Botlerlab offer a warranty or support? 
Yes, we offer 1 year warranty on the
Botler, we know it’s very important and are working on it as a high priority.
We’ll guarantee that you receive a working printer, and are planning to take
extra special care of those of you who have supported us from the beginning.
· What is the LCD/SD upgrade option?  
The LCD/SD upgrade allows the Botler
to print without being connected to a computer. You can control temperatures,
move the head, as well as start and pause prints. The LCD will provide
information about the print while it is printing. Without the LCD/SD upgrade,
you can control your printer via a USB connection to your computer.
· What materials can the Botler print?  
The Botler can print PLA, ABS and
more.

story:
International Shipping Available (Email info@printrbotter.com for rates)




Jan.29.13: Our flagship StepperDampers are now added at the cheapest price EVER and shipping is included to the US

Jan.30.13: All StepperDampers included in the perks will be the brand new 2014 models!




These are the cheapest prices possible and I am making $0 profit from this campaign.


Size: 185mmx100mm




As seen on 3DERS.org: http://www.3ders.org//articles/20140112-heated-bed-for-abs-printing-with-the-printrbot-simple-xl.html




Who is the 3D Printer Aftermarket? (formerly printrbotter)

The 3D Aftermarket is a small company (1 person) that has been making heated beds for the Printrbot Simple since Summer 2013. It has shipped out over 30 beds, making it the largest source of heated beds for the Printrbot Simple.  We have since expanded our variety with our newest product, stepperDampers, but our core buisiness is heated bed kits. We are proud to announce our first crowdfunder!



Our Printrbot Simple Heated Beds in the wild (Customer Photos)




What We Need

This campaign is necessary for me to make one run of beds, 100 heatbeds. In September we asked for a few beta testers for our first run of beds since I already did the stenciling and templates required.

This time is different. This is a new size, new heat dissipation techniques need to be applied. I need to stencil, template, and make 10 scrap boards before I produce a run. This is both a costly and time consuming task. This time will be faster, expect a 1 month lead-time.

I am using the best quality material for heatbeds on the planet, and past customers can attest to this. 

Prices on this page are probably cheaper than the current prices of the normal beds on Printrbotter.com because I am producing this in volume opposed to one-offs.


What you are getting in return

We are willing to make our USA-Manufactured heated bed for the award winning Printrbot Simple. It will allow you to print in ABS (or exotic filament such as Laywood and Nylon) or have your PLA prints stick to the bed without any fuss. The heated bed prevents warping and shift by making sure the first layer sticks perfectly. Also, we are including shipping in the price to ensure no extra fees occur! The shipping included in the price only pertains to United States shipping. If you are out of country, please email info@printrbotter.com after the campaign to pay extra for international shipping.

story:
With it's signature two-band system and highlight colors, Barebands is unlike ANY watch you've seen before. And the ease with which you can swap parts in and out means you can customize the watch to match your style... whatever that is.


How BareBands Came to be...

It’s mere minutes before I’m going to leave my apartment to compete in the 2012 New York City triathlon… and I am terribly out of shape and underprepared.

Like a maniac, I am double-checking all of my gear as if that will make up for the months of training I skipped. In the process, I manage to rip my watchband, the one thing I really need for the race (besides divine intervention to carry me across the finish line). In a MacGyver-inspired instant I swapped in two broccoli bands from a bunch of broccoli in my fridge.

The watch face was yellow. The bands were green. It looked cool. But more than that it was super comfortable. Super light. And there was no sweat build up under the bands after I huffed my way across the finish line. The bands were barely there. And in a few hours the product inspiration and the name for my company, BareBands, were born.

Watch me explain how the watch came to be in a segment I did for Fox Business Network.

The Product - How Does it Work?

At the heart of the BareBands system is the band, inspired by the thin broccoli bands I used for the race. These are custom designed soft-touch silicon bands made in multiple sizes to ensure a snug and comfortable fit on different wrists. They will come in infinite colors. And of course are customizable for your favorite team or cause. In the next couple of weeks, we’re actually going to be releasing a bunch of custom bands to support some causes we care about.

We innovated a metal rail, which looks awesome on its own, but is actually a docking mechanism that mates with a groove in the back of a watch. It slips in and out super easily, forming a snug fit.

And then there is the shell, which you can pop on and off for color accents, and also locks the rails in place.

We kept our first design purposefully retro, with octagonal face and digital display. It felt right to pay homage to my old favorite watch that inspired Barebands in the first place. We've left a nice thick bezel around the edge of the watch as a canvas for artist collaboration... And customization.

 

While customization and color are obviously our calling cards, we haven't sacrificed in the least on quality. Every part of the watch has been rigorously tested and each watch is waterproof to 30m. 


The Styles

Right now, we have seven styles of BareBands. You can see them below and more details on our website. (Note that two of our watches are in need of names! If you pledge a donation, you can vote on what that name will be!).

SUNSET comes with Eggplant and Pink shells, and Yellow Bands.


MAKO comes with Turquoise and Black shells, and Light Gray bands.


MONTAUK comes with Yellow and White shells, and Beige bands.


FAHRENHEIT comes with Warm Gray and Black shells, and Orange bands.


MIAMI comes with White and Glow-in-the-Dark shells, and Pink bands.

comes with Beige and Sand colored shells, and Gum colored bands.


comes with Glossy and Matte Black shells, and Black bands.



Fundraising Platform

If you choose to support BareBands, not only will you be supporting the creation of an awesome, never-before-seen watch, but you’ll also be helping create a new platform for fundraising that benefits from placement on the wrist and adds functionality and fashion in the process.  As referenced above, once we’re fully up and running, we’ll have specific watches dedicated to specific causes. For example, if you buy a pink watch to support the fight against breast cancer, a to-be-determined portion of your watch cost will go to that charity.  The same would be true for a blue watch to raise awareness about prostate cancer, and so on.  Or, using tools we are planning to integrate into our site with funds from this campaign, you can build your own custom watch to support your own cause/community/team. 

Why are we Raising Money?

The good news is that our first batch of watches is READY TO SHIP.  You can be confident that if you back our campaign, your watch will arrive soon. But we need your help to close our funding gap. See, manufacturers have what are called "minimum order quantities". This means I can't just buy 1 watch, or even 100 watches... I have to buy 3,000. The faster we get commitments in, the faster these watches will be in your mailbox. 

We also need funding to scale up our personalization tools so you can personalize every single aspect of the watch.  Enabling all that customization costs money.

Last, there's technology.  We, too, have been paying attention to "smartwatches" and "activity monitors."  With your support, we'll be able to continue to innovate and make the latest watch tech available to you.  And our modular system means that when we do, all you'll have to do is slide the old piece out and the new one in. Easy peezy.

    Spread the Word!

    In addition to backing this campaign, we need your help getting the word out! 

    Tweet about BareBands. Facebook about BareBands. Email about BareBands. Draw a picture about BareBands.  And then Instagram it.

    We have built a fun watch that you’re going to love wearing and which will allow you to customize it over time. And, more than that, we’re trying to build a brand that wraps all that fun and self-expression up into something meaningful.  Be part of BareBands from the beginning.  Thank you.

"activity monitors."  With your support, we'll be able to continue to 
innovate and make the latest watch tech available to you.  And our 
modular system means that when we do, all you'll have to do is slide the

Email about BareBands. Draw a picture about BareBands.  And then Instagram it.We have built a fun watch that you’re going to love wearing and which will allow you to customize it over time. And, more than that, we’re trying to build a brand that wraps all that fun and self-expression up into something meaningful.  Be part of BareBands from the beginning.  Thank you.

story:
The first 750 funders will receive their product before December 24, 2014

As long as your contribution was received by 12/18/2014 and it is being shipped domestically (USA).  We want to be a part of your holiday season, that's why we have worked very hard to assure that we can guarantee 750 watches to be shipped and received domestically before December 24th.

Share ERA this holiday season!

 

 

Share Our Video On Facebook/ Twitter!  #startYourEra

 

Start Your Era

Our Team is passionate about creating a whole line of watches that provide revolutionary features that benefit our customers, while also structuring our company to be a benefit to the entire world! We are focused on making an impact on the watch industry and the standard of business. Our company has vowed to donate 5% of all our sales to a charity for the future of our company's existence. For this campaign, 5% of our sales will benefit Water.Org.

We are here to make a difference. Here's how we plan on doing that:

  • Create Amazing Timepieces for our customers (THAT WON'T BREAK THE BANK)
  • Change the standard of business, forever
  • Give back to the world, always

 

We Need Your Support

In order for us to start a new era, we're going to need your support! We want you to join us, and together we can truly revolutionize the watch industry. To support us, you can pledge for one of our amazing timepieces, and also share our story with your friends. Share this LINK on Facebook, Instagram & Twitter, that way our reach expands. Make sure to mention that you are a part of this mission. 

So, pledge to put an ERA watch on your wrist and share our page on social media. By doing this, you are becoming a very valuable asset to our team. We are excited to have you! Thank you for your support #StartYourEra

Simply click the Facebook and Twitter Tabs at the top of the page, right below the video!  

 

Our Goal   

We are asking for $5,500 in funding in order to create a line of watches! We have incredible ideas that we are excited to share with the world, the only missing piece to the puzzle is you. Join us in starting a new ERA.

 

The Revolution by ERA

For $59 we are offering our One-Of-A-Kind timepiece: The Revolution by ERA. This watch comes with a pre-set genuine Italian Leather band and it also comes with an interchangeable jet-black silicon band, that can be changed in a matter of seconds (without any tools)!

 

 

     

The Impact

Its hard to justify how much an impact this campaign will have. As the founders of ERA, we are extremely excited about this opportunity to show the world how we work as a team of siblings. We have incorporated our values, morals, and strong work ethics into this company. We are building this company with the hopes that many will follow in our footsteps. We truly want to change the standard of business by inspiring many individuals that it is possible to work with what you have and create something truly revolutionary. We believe we have done so,  now you, as crowd-funders, will be the ones to decide how well we have done that.

 We thank you, in advance, for your support. It truly means the world to us that you spent your time on our campaign.

Risks & Challenges

 There are challenges to this campaign. The biggest challenge lies with getting the word out and getting enough support on this campaign. The more people we reach on this campaign, the higher our chances of success go! To reach as many people as possible, we ask that you share this campaign with the people in your life.

Thank you for helping us overcome our challenges. It means the world to us!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Its finally time to introduce a company that you are proud of representing. We urge you to share our video ( on FACEBOOK, TWITTER, and INSTAGRAM)! this is the best way you can help your friends at ERA. We are highly appreciative of your action
