story:
Buds Emporium Team

My name is Zac Foreman and I founded Buds Emporium a few years ago with the idea of sharing my love of design with people through graphic shirts. I began working for a family business as my first job in high school. Since then I have work for a few different major companies but have always had the dream of working for myself one day. Since my freshmen year in high school I have self taught myself HTML and CSS and began building my own website to reach that goal. I then decided to take things one step further after my daughter was born and try and find funding to open my own shop so I be with my family more. My dream has never been about making it rich as much as its been about bringing my love for design to people through clothing at a fair price. We strive to bring graphics for anyone and everyone. So whether your planning a birthday party, bachelor/bachelorette party, family reunion or just want something fresh and new we want to have it for you. 

Right now we operate through a third party site we have an account with http://budsemporium.spreadshirt.com/. But by running the business ourself we will be able to give people a lower price with a more wide selection of clothing options such as hats, shirts, hoodies, and much more.


Funding

We dont have the resources to get the things we need on our own that is why we are reaching ourselves out to everyone and trying to make this dream come true. We are hoping to raise $7,500 for the purchase of a heat press machine, printer, vinyal cutter and materials and the clothing options plus shipping to get us on our way.

The Impact

If we could get the funding we need to get our shop up and running that would not only be a great achievement for me and my family but we also believe in helping with our community. We have been in contact with a couple people so that we can help lower cost for for uniforms to help lower income families be able to afford  to put their child in sports. We also have a plan on holding funraisers to help the community.

We also will be offering 3 different types of graphics to choose from to help with lowering the cost and still have the same great quality. We will be offering Plastisol which is like a screen printed feel, Digital Printed Graphic and a Sublimation style graphic which the ink is dyed into the shirt.

Risks & Challenges

Shipping delays would be our challenge, we are a start up campany so it is only a 4 man crew at the moment, so people requesting a large order of clothing and needing then in a short time frame would be something that could challenge us. But we would all band together to do what we could so you can get your order as planned.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    We understand times can be hard financially for people, it's alright if you cant help fund us by donating money, time can be as valuable as money at times so please share our project with other people and help our dream come true.

story:
Short Summary

Hello everyone!  I'm Lindsay, and I am originally from Gretna, Nebraska USA.  I am currently living in Paris, France attending my last year in design school.  This year is extremely important for me.  This year is the year that I graduate and become an employee rather than a student.  I have the best professors at my school; they have worked for big names in the fashion world such as Yves Saint Laurent, Alaïa, Chanel and Dior (to name a few). Now they are teaching me what they have learned from some of the best Haute Couture artists in the world!  I am extremely thankful in having them in my life.

Since this is my senior year I am designing my senior collection. I want to design an optical illusion that both tricks your mind but is still highly wearable.  This is a challenging undertaking and in order to do this I really need your help so I can assemble my team and buy the supplies I need to succeed.  In developing an optical illusion (especially using fabric) the imagery being displayed must be measured and lined up perfectly or else the optical illusion will not work.  I have the best teachers to advise me with respect to sewing and design.  However, I must find models that are all the same size and height in order to make the illusion work.  I have created my own optical illusion design through Illustrator and Photoshop.  Now I need to find someone to take my design and physically print it onto fabric.  Once my collections are completed and being modeled I would like to push my illusion one step further by filming it and creating a photo look book.  Once completed, the final step is to compile a creative portfolio and go after my dream job.


What We Need & What You Get

If I am able to meet my financial goal I see myself going all the way with this idea and definitely raising an eyebrow with the potential companies I would like to work for.
Models - are very important in order to make my idea work.  Since I will be hiring them, they will never miss any fittings that I have during my creation process.  I can also choose models that have the same build and height.  That way my illusion will look and be precise.
Fabric/Materials - Very important in the Haute Couture world.  It is not considered Haute Couture if the materials I use are not high quality.
Supplies - I need to purchase a video and film camera.  This is an important part of my portfolio as I will be able to create a unique video that helps people visualize the concepts I have developed.  At the present time I am using the camera on my phone and my MacBook computer to do all filming and photography (not to mention cereal and pasta boxes for the tripod).  Although this has worked in the past for my needs, it is not the best image and I will not be taken seriously if I use this type of equipment for my portfolio. 
Portfolio – If I reach the monetary goal I have set it will enable me to order a professionally made portfolio.  This type of portfolio is important because it will show the Haute Couture houses I too, am a perfectionist.
Even if I cannot reach my total monetary goal any amount will help and I will have to figure out the rest. I am committed to this project and will figure out a way. I am a college student that has made minimum wage over the years.  In order to make my ideas work and come alive I need your help. Any amount you might be able to give will help me out immensely. 


The Impact

Honestly, any amount given will help.  If I am successful in raising this money I will keep every contributor updated with final photos and share the link to my video as well.  (Read more about how I will give back to you in "Perks").  My whole life’s goal is to get hired at a Haute Couture house for my creativity and skill.  It is my dream to work for Chanel; to become a family member.  If I am able to work for them, I can only imagine how I will grow and continue to learn the art of Haute Couture.  My final goal in life is to open my own brand of clothing and become "LAH". I have worked very hard already; making it to the last year in design school is difficult.  I started in a very small town in Nebraska, USA, took a stepping-stone in Colorado, USA, and made a leap to Paris, France.  I have landed on my feet every time.  Now I need your help to finish what I started with school and begin my career as a Haute Couture designer.  This is not simply an art project.  This portfolio of mine is the door to my future.  Please help me reach my future.  I cannot do this alone.


Risks & Challenges

There are a lot of risks and challenges in design.  Nothing works the first time in any design process.  I am a problem solver.  Through the years of design school I have drawn a collection, faced several problems, and then produced something beautiful at the end.  I will have challenges with this idea as well.  I am certain I can solve the problems I may encounter with this project because I am passionate for what I do.  I know I can't do something perfectly the first time.  This is why I am starting now even though my senior line is not due until graduation, May 1, 2015.  Starting early enough allows me the time to tackle any challenges that I encounter with this project; no matter how big or small.  My goal is to enter the job market in May; I have been preparing for that moment for the last 3 years and this is my final step. 


Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute that is perfectly ok!  I just ask to please help me get my story out to anyone you think would be interested in helping me.  Also, I would love advice of any kind!  The more help I get the stronger I will become.  If you have any questions please feel free to ask!  Thank you so much!

story:
I'm a self employed multi disciplinary artist. My work has won a few awards over the years, and I've been earning my living through my art for over 20 years now. 

I created my latest linocut design to be printed on t-shirts, as  a tribute to the well known Winnipeg folk festival.

My most important goal was to avoid creating a design that was just a  mish-mash of generic cliches that could be used for *any* music or folk festival shirt. I thought it was really important to come up with a design that was unmistakably inspired by the Winnipeg Folk Festival. 

The t-shirt design centres around my interpretation of the new, iconic, Village Tower/structure that was added to the festival grounds last year. The tower was built with the idea of it being a central meeting point for festival goers, and it was designed for and inspired by the festival, so it seemed kind of a no-brainer, to use it as the starting point of a Winnipeg Folk Festival inspired design.

Here is an interesting link to more info about the structure:


http://www.winnipegfreepress.com/arts-and-life/entertainment/music/a-village--for-the-people-214460981.html


On the right hand side of the design, I carved in one of the unique covered festival stages, complete with crowd, hands waving in the air. To the left of the village tower there is a tent. Is it the beer tent? Is it the festival music tent? Part of the Handmade Village? Maybe it is meant to symbolize festival camping, such a unique facet of the Winnipeg Folk Festival...or maybe it is intended to represent 'all of the above'... There is only so much real estate on a t-shirt, after all.

In the foreground, tied to the village tower, the dates of the event are shown on a tarp... Ah, yes, the ubiquitous tarp...so much a part of Winnipeg Folk Fest culture as well...

Above, I cobbled together a few song birds in flight using shapes subtly inspired by musical notes and notations...

Capping it all as if, at this point, any festival goer still needed it...we see the name of the event, flying high... the folksy, sometimes carnival, atmosphere implied through familiar font, flapping banner, and the hand carved linocut process itself.


This unique and original shirt design is my tribute to the 2014 Winnipeg Folk Festival. I hope other Festival lovers appreciate the thought and work that went into this.


I didn't create this with the goal of it never seeing the festival grounds. I hope to see as many festival goers wearing these as possible. It would really be a trip...and an honour... These will be mailed out by the last week of June, to be delivered in time for the festival.


To be honest, I'm currently in kind of a tight spot, financially...and looking for a way to pay some bills... Nevertheless, I will be donating $1, from each shirt sold, to the Winnipeg Folk Festival Endowment Fund...just because I think it's the right thing to do... Here's a link to more info:


http://winnipegfolkfestival.ca/support/ways-to-donate/


All in all, about half of the money raised will go to the printing of the shirts, the other half goes to me.


the more shirts that get ordered, the more money I will make per shirt.... So order soon and order often.


Early Bird Bonus:

The first 40 shirts will be shipped with an original signed and numbered linocut print of this same design.


Please get the word out, about this project tweet, post, share the link... 'Like' the Facebook page! I need to sell some shirts and get them shipped out A.S.A.P! 


Free shipping/delivery is included to NorthAmerica. Please add $10 for anywhere else in the world. 


*****Don't forget to mention the size and colour details in the comment box that appears at the end of the payment process...or just e-mail me those details.

story:
Versiune în română >>>


Hi! I’m Roma, 26, a fresh graduate of medicine and I have a dream!

          Throughout my adult life I have endured a number of troubling issues, such as anxiety, agoraphobia, panic attacks, PVCs, caused by video game addiction, horrible time management, lack of ambition and the stressful lifestyle of a medical student.

          I had to halt my studies for a year, and was fooling myself with medication to alleviate the constant strain headaches and PVCs. Video games became my oasis, a place where my mind could rest, at least for a while, but deep down I knew things were bleak, and I had no answer for how to get out of the mess that was my life at that point.

         With the help of my girlfriend and my friend I managed to graduate from University and can proudly say, have almost been able to get rid of my self-destructive issues, by shifting my whole lifestyle. I feel as if I am close being burden free, but one last step remains for me, an item that has lasted long on my bucket list and, hopefully, with your help can be crossed of it. My dream is to run the marathon, namely the Haspa 42k Marathon in Hamburg, Germany on April 17, 2016!

         The reason I have chosen that specific marathon in that specific location is because as of next year I start my Residency towards becoming a Neurologist and have the opportunity to do so in Germany. However, the first 3 months will be unpaid, and with the little funds I have remaining, the whole plan would be unfeasible. 

         This way I feel like your contribution will serve a dual-purpose: I will once and for all overcome my inner difficulties and finish a marathon, and also will use the knowledge I have gained over the years, both as an individual battling anxiety and agoraphobia, but also as a Neurologist, to aid people who have gone through what I have, and provide them with the drug free support and care that they need. My journey wouldn’t end there at the marathon! Next step till my 30s I will take the Ironman title. No more pills, no more panic!

         Here is a graphic of how your contribution would be spent:

         We will be glad to offer you little souvenirs from our country, by sending you perks for your contribution.

Questions

          Definitions were written consulting medical sources and regarding my personal experiences. This publication is personal, it doesn't encourage the use of a drug of those mentioned or promote the image of a particular pharmaceutical company!          

         What is anxiety? - Anxiety is a strong feeling characterized by an unpleasant inner state, accompanied by nervousness, strange body sensations, intense expectation of future threat. It can be a normal feeling, something everyone experiences once in a while, but when experienced often and continuously the individual may suffer from an anxiety disorder. This in its turn can develop into agoraphobia or/and panic attacks.

         What is panic attack? A panic attack (PA) is an extremely strong sudden fear for one's safeness, feeling intense body-mind sensations like heart palpitations, PVCs, chest pain, dizziness, shakiness, shortness of breath, accelerated heartbeat, having sensations of unreality, the most horrifying being the feeling of imminent death. Usually these emotions force a person to escape or flee the place where the attack began and in the future avoid this environment. Commonly when someone is having their first PA, they end up in the ER. It takes up to 20 min (my case) for it to pass, but it can reappear shortly if medication or proper autocontrol techniques are not used. However, medically speaking, PAs are not dangerous and do not lead to physical harm!

         What is agoraphobia? Agoraphobia is an anxiety disorder where an individual perceives the environment to be dangerous, life threatening. This way simple social situations like football game, at work, shopping malls, movie-theatre, airports, bridges or even just walking around the corner of the house can easily set up an panic attack. This forces that person to avoid every place that triggered in the past unpleasant thoughts or sensations. In many cases the only panic free space is his/her own house, especially when there is someone who can oversee you.

          What are PVCs? PVC - premature ventricular contractions (extrasystoles) are the skipped beats of the heart felt like palpitations, strong sudden beats, sensation of a suction in stomach or throat, or in many cases not felt at all. When related to anxiety, PVCs tend to occur as a cause of adrenalin rush, and a proper breathing-relaxation technique should be enough to stop them. However when someone is having a panic disorder, it’s quite hard to break the vicious cycle without medication, this way every single skipped beat is so terrifying and frightening like if you would have each and every time a heart attack.

      What medication? I was taking Xanax (Alprazolam) for several years, though there were periods when I stayed in my comfort zone and was able to get rid of Xanax for a few days. But as soon as there was an exam or a medium stress event came up I was forced to take medication. Since 2015 I pushed myself to diminish Xanax intake from 5mg per month to 0,5 mg per month! Nowadays (August 2015) when I have severe headaches, because of emotional stress, I may take 0,12mg of Xanax but I am doing my best to do sports instead of taking pills. Take a look at my medication intake chart that I have been completing for the last 5 months. In 150 days I took only 2mg of Xanax, and soon, I wont be needing it at all! 

This publication is personal, it doesn't encourage the use of a drug of those mentioned or promote the image of a particular pharmaceutical company!

         Why I had a stressful lifestyle? Back in 2010 I was doubting my future, I was unsure what I wanted to do in life, I quit  any sport I used to do, I no longer wanted to continue my medical studies, etc. I began to skip classes, arguing with my parents and girlfriend on trivial matters. I was still trying to lead an active life as a student, I was working as a surgical medical assistant at a hospital, participating in scientific researches, etc., but I was hoping that somehow University will be soon finished without me and everybody will leave me alone. This inner fight continued and grew bigger and bigger with every month. Starting with 2011 I started playing a computer game, and that became my only island of peace and safeness. However I perfectly understood at that moment that I am sinking in my pleasure and I am spiritually suiciding. But I had no power of will to change myself and change the way I saw the world. I started to ignore people, eveniments, classes, family .. everything, anyone. I remember myself back then as very nervous, easily annoyed and mad at everyone, especially at myself.This bomb slowly grew up to April 2012 when I had my first panic attack. It was as if a hammer hit me on the head, then  uncontrollable shaking, blurry vision and a constant feeling of fear. With the little medical knowledge I had at the time I thought I had a stroke. I was sure that something went wrong in my head and I was going to die. That day I ended up in the ER. Being so far from home, I started to panic, and even if I consulted doctors and made every possible medical investigation I still believed that there is something wrong with me. This is when I  began to take pills. I halted my studies for a year. Video games became my life. I started to have quite a lot PVCs, which became my most powerful panic attacks triggers. I thought I had a heart attack each and every time I had a skipped beat. I made even more medical investigations, and even if that proved everything was just fine, I didn't believe it. I completely isolated myself. Even though I was trying to change things my anxiety, my insecurity, was every time much greater than my wish to alter. Pills were my solution.

          How I shifted my lifestyle? I felt guilty every time I took a pill. I was missing the freedom of walking alone. I was missing the gym, cycling, badminton, tennis that I used to do. I tried to make some workouts but PVCs stopped me everytime from doing them. Since summer 2013 I tried to do at least I could, but the fear of having PVCs or headache halted me anyway. With the support of my family I went back to studies. I had even more stress and anxiety. But the thought that this problem of mine could last for the rest of my life was killing me. My inner fight for freedom was winning, up until a severe panic attack. And then I tried again, and every time I failed. I’ve tried acupuncture for several times, I can’t say it made a big change. I had some psychoanalytic discussions. I tried to do at least some sort of physical exercises. At some point everything was in van. No major changes, same number of panic attacks or/and headaches or fear. I hated myself for whom I was. I was trying not to believe my senses but to trust my rational thinking. No matter how strange or scary my feelings were I began to think differently, to negate my senses! That was hard but that was my one way ticket, my only option. Then I tried to work with my thoughts, senses, feelings, to understand them, and finally.. to control them. Since 2015 I diminished 10 times my medication intake. I did that through sport, reading, dancing and other positive activities. To even accelerate my comeback I am doing each day at least one of following: calisthenics exercises, cycling, jogging or swimming and guess what, I am PVC free for 9 months. Lots of other complicated problems are awaiting me in life, I don’t how to solve them yet, that’s why I am not stopping here, I will fight every day to make the best out of my choices. You can take my ticket, its free.

If you have any questions you can always contact me:

Facebook: Roman Cobiletchi

Indiegogo: Roman Cobiletchi



Româna

Salut! Sunt Roma, am 26 de ani, sunt proaspăt absolvent medicinist și vreau să vă povestesc despre visul meu!


          De la începutul maturității am trăit un șir întreg de senzații, precum anxietate, agorafobie, atacuri de panică, extrasistole, având drept cauze comune dependența de jocurile video, gestionarea ineficientă a timpului, lipsa de motivație și, pe lângă acestea, stilul de viață stresant al unui student la medicină.

         Am fost nevoit să fac o pauză de un an de la studii și mă auto-amăgeam cu medicamente pentru atenuarea migrenelelor și extrasistolelor. Jocurile video au devenit refugiul meu, o lume unde mintea mea se putea relaxa, cel puțin pentru o scurtă perioadă, dar în subconștient știam că lucrurile nu stau bine și nu aveam nici cea mai vagă idee cum să scap de dezordinea de la acel moment din viața mea.

         Cu ajutorul prietenei mele și al unui prieten, am reușit în cele din urmă să finisez universitatea și pot zice cu mândrie că aproape am scăpat de majoritatea problemelor mele auto-distructive, prin schimbarea radicală a modului meu de viață.  Simt că sunt aproape liber de această povară, dar mi-a mai ramas un pas important, un lucru pe care mi l-am dorit de foarte mult și sper că, cu ajutorul vostru, acesta va deveni realitate. Visul meu este să particip la maraton, și anume Maratonul Haspa 42k din Hamburg, Germania pe 17 Aprilie, 2016!

         Motivul pentru care am ales anume acest specific maraton în această specifică locație este deoarece anul viitor voi începe să lucrez în calitate de medic-rezident în Neurologie și există oportunitatea să o fac în Germania. Unica problemă este că primele 3 luni nu vor fi salariate și deci, cu resursele financiare limitate, întregul plan nu ar fi realizabil.

         Astfel, contribuțiile voastre ar servi unui dublu scop: voi trece odată și pentru totdeauna peste dificultățile mele interioare și voi alerga maratonul, dar cel mai important este că voi folosi cunoștințele acumulate pe parcursul ultimilor ani, din duelul meu personal cu anxietatea și atacurile de panică, dar și în calitate de Neurolog, pentru a ajuta persoanele care trec prin ceea ce am trecut eu și îî voi susține ne-medicamentos cu suportul de care au cu adevărat nevoie. Călătoria mea însă nu își va avea finișul la maraton! Următorul scop până la 30 de ani este titlul de Ironman (Omul de fier). Fără medicamente, fără panică!

         Iată o reprezentare grafică a distribuției contribuțiilor voastre:

        Vom fi bucuroși să îți oferim suvenire din țara noastră, expediindu-ți cadouri pentru contribuție.

Întrebări


         Definițiile au fost scrise consultând surse medicale și referindu-mă la experiența personală. Aceasta publicație este personală, nu încurajează utilizarea unui medicament din cele menționate și nu promovează imaginea unei anume firme farmaceutice!          

         Ce este anxietatea? - Anxietatea este o senzație puternică caracterizată printr-o stare internă neplacută, însoțită de nervozitate, senzații ciudate prin corp, impresie de pericol iminent. Poate fi o trăire normală, pe care fiecare o poate simți uneori, dar când devine frecventă și continuă, persoana poate suferi de tulburare de anxietate. Aceasta, la rândul ei, se poate dezvolta în agorafobie și/sau atacuri de panică.

         Ce este un atac de panică? Un atac de panică (AP) este o frică extrem de puternică apărută brusc, însoțită de senzații psiho-somatice, precum palpitații, extrasistole, durere toracică, amețeli, tremur, respirație îngreunată, ritm cardiac accelerat, senzații de irealitate, iar cel mai înspăimântător este sentimentul morții iminente. De obicei aceste trăiri forțează persoana să evadeze din locul unde atacul de panică a început și să îl evite chiar pe viitor. Adesea, când cineva are pentru prima dată un atac de panică, ajunge să se adreseze la Urgență. Durează până la 20 minute (în cazul meu), dar poate să reapară în scurt timp, dacă nu se administrează nici un medicament sau nu se efectuează tehnici de auto-control. Totuși, din punct de vedere medical, atacurile de panică nu sunt periculoase și nu aduc nici o daună fizică organismului!

          Ce este agorafobia? Agorafobia este o tulburare de anxietate, în care persoana percepe mediul ambiant drept periculos, amenințător pentru viață. Situații de viață cu adevărat inofensive cum ar fi jocurile de fotbal, locul de la serviciu, magazinele, cinematografele, aeroporturile, podurile sau chiar plimbările prin cartier ar putea cu ușurință declanșa un atac de panică. Aceasta forțează persoana să evite orice locație care anterior a generat gânduri sau senzații neplăcute. Adesea, unicul spațiu cu risc scăzut de a porni un atac de panică rămâne propria locuință, în special dacă acolo mai este cineva care te supraveghează.

          Ce sunt extrasistolele? Extrasistola - este o contracție ventriculară prematură, care este simțită precum palpitație, bătaie puternică subită, senzație de constrângere în stomac sau gât, sau adesea nu este simțită deloc. Când se referă la anxietate, extrasistolele apar din cauza unui flux masiv de adrenalină, iar o tehnică respiratorie adecvată de relaxare ar fi trebuit să fie suficientă pentru a le opri. Totuși, când cineva are atacuri de panică, este destul de dificil de rupt acest cerc vicios fără medicație, în acest fel fiecare bătaie de cord este atât de înspăimântătoare și deranjantă, de parcă ai suferi de fiecare dată un infarct miocardic.

          Care medicamente? Eu am luat Xanax (Alprazolam) timp de mai mulți ani, totuși existau perioade când rămâneam în zona mea de confort și reușeam să scap de Xanax pe câteva zile. Dar cum un examen sau un stres de intensitate medie apăreau, eram din nou forțat să iau medicamentul. Începând cu 2015, m-am obligat să scad doza de Xanax de la 5 mg pe lună la 0,5 mg pe lună. Acum (august 2015), când am o durere de cap puternică din cauza unui stres emoțional, aș putea să iau 0,12 mg de Xanax, dar încerc să fac sport în loc. Priviți la reprezentarea grafică cu medicamentele administrate timp de ultimele 5 luni. Timp de 150 zile am luat doar 2mg de Xanax, iar curând nu voi mai avea deloc nevoie de el!


         

          Aceasta publicație este personală, nu încurajează utilizarea unui medicament din cele menționate și nu promovează imaginea unei anume firme farmaceutice!

          De ce am avut un stil de viață stresant? În 2010 îmi puneam la îndoială viitorul, nu eram sigur ce vreau să fac în viață, am încetat să practic orice sport, nu mai vroiam să îmi continui studiile medicale, etc. Am început să nu frecventez cursurile, certându-mă cu părinții și prietena pe probleme banale. Încercam totuși să duc o viață activă în calitate de student, lucram în calitate de asistent chirurgical la un spital, participam la lucrări de cercetare științifică, etc., dar speram că cumva universitatea se va sfârși fără mine și toți mă vor lăsa în pace. Această luptă internă continua să crească din ce în ce mai mare cu fiece lună. Începând cu anul 2011, am găsit un joc la PC și acesta a devenit unica oază de pace și siguranță. Totuși, înțelegeam perfect la acel moment că mă scufund în propria plăcere și mă sinucid spiritual. Dar nu aveam nici o putere de voință să mă schimb și să schimb felul în care vedeam lumea. Am început să ignor oamenii, evenimentele, cursurile, familia … totul, pe toți. Îmi amintesc de mine pe atunci ca fiind foarte nervos, ușor de plictisit și iritat de toți, în special de mine însumi. Această bombă încet-încet a crescut până în aprilie 2012, când am simțit primul meu atac de panică. A fost de parcă un ciocan m-a lovit în cap, apoi un tremur incontrolabil, vedere incețoșată și o senzație constantă de frică. Cu puținele cunoștințe medicale pe care le aveam la acel moment, am crezut că am un AVC (accident vascular cerebral). Eram convins că ceva s-a întâmplat în interiorul capului meu și că voi muri. În acea zi am ajuns la Urgență. Fiind departe de casă, am început să fiu anxios și, chiar dacă am fost consultat de medici și am trecut orice investigație posibilă, oricum credeam că ceva nu e în regulă cu mine. de atunci am început să iau medicamente. Am luat o pauză de la studii pe un an. Jocurile video au devenit viața mea. Am început să simt destul de multe extrasistole, care deveniseră triggerul cel mai important al atacurilor mele de panică. Credeam că am infarct miocardic odată cu fiecare extrasistolă. Am trecut și mai multe investigații și chiar dacă toate rezultatele arătau foarte bine, eu nu credeam. M-am izolat complet. Chiar dacă încercam să schimb câte ceva, anxietatea mea, nesiguranța mea, erau de fiecare dată mai puternice decât dorința mea de a mă schimba. Medicamentele erau soluția.

         Cum mi-am schimbat radical modul de viață? Mă simțeam vinovat de fiecare dată când luam un medicament. Îmi era dor de libertatea de a mă plimba singur. Îmi era dor de sala de sport, de bicicletă, de badminton, tenis.. tot ce făceam odată. Am încercat să fac exerciții fizice, dar extrasistolele mă opreau de fiecare dată când începeam. Din vara anului 2013 am încercat să fac minimul pe care îl puteam, dar frica de a simți extrasistole sau dureri de cap, mă opreau oricum. Cu susținerea familiei mele, m-am întors la studii. Am avut și mai mult stres și anxietate. Dar gândul că această problemă a mea ar putea dura toată viața.. mă ucidea. Lupta mea internă pentru libertate caștiga pentru perioade scurte de timp, de obicei până la un atac de panică sever. Și apoi, încercam din nou și de fiecare dată pierdeam. Am încercat și acupunctură de câteva ori, nu pot să spun că a făcut o diferență mare. Am avut și niște discuții psihoanalitice. Am încercat să fac măcar careva tipuri de exerciții fizice. La un anumit moment, totul părea zădarnic. Nici o schimbare majoră, același număr de atacuri de panică și/sau dureri de cap sau frică. Mă uram pentru cine eram. Încercam să nu cred în senzațiile mele, ci să mă încred în judecata rațională. Indiferent de cât de ciudate sau înspăimântătoare erau senzațiile mele, am început să gândesc diferit, să neg ceea ce simțeam. A fost greu, dar era unicul meu “bilet”, unica mea cale de scăpare. Apoi am încercat să lucrez cu propriile mele gânduri, sentimente, senzații, să le înțeleg și, în sfârșit… să le controlez. De la începutul anului 2015 am scăzut doza de medicamente administrate de 10 ori. Am făcut aceasta prin sport, lectură, dans și alte activități pozitive. Pentru a-mi accelera progresul, în fiecare zi fac cel puțin una din următoarele activități: gimnastică calistenică, ciclism, alergat sau înot și, ca să vedeți, nu mai am extrasistole deja de 9 luni. O mulțime de alte probleme complicate mă așteaptă în viață, nu știu cum să le rezolv încă, iată de ce nu mă opresc aici, voi lupta în fiecare zi ca să fac cea mai bună alegere. Poți lua “biletul” meu, el e gratuit!

          Dacă aveți orice întrebare, puteți să mă contactați oricând:

Facebook Roman Cobiletchi

Indiegogo Roman cobiletchi



Perks / Cadouri

          Here you can see our special Perks for your contribution.

          / Aici poți vedea cadourile care te așteaptă cu drag pentru contribuție.

          

Enjoy :)

Versiune în română >>>

Hi! I’m Roma, 26, a fresh graduate of medicine and I have a dream!          Throughout my adult life I have endured a number of troubling issues, such as anxiety, agoraphobia, panic attacks, PVCs, caused by video game addiction, horrible time management, lack of ambition and the stressful lifestyle of a medical student.          I had to halt my studies for a year, and was fooling myself with medication to alleviate the constant strain headaches and PVCs. Video games became my oasis, a place where my mind could rest, at least for a while, but deep down I knew things were bleak, and I had no answer for how to get out of the mess that was my life at that point.         With the help of my girlfriend and my friend I managed to graduate from University and can proudly say, have almost been able to get rid of my self-destructive issues, by shifting my whole lifestyle. I feel as if I am close being burden free, but one last step remains for me, an item that has lasted long on my bucket list and, hopefully, with your help can be crossed of it. My dream is to run the marathon, namely the Haspa 42k Marathon in Hamburg, Germany on April 17, 2016!         The reason I have chosen that specific marathon in that specific location is because as of next year I start my Residency towards becoming a Neurologist and have the opportunity to do so in Germany. However, the first 3 months will be unpaid, and with the little funds I have remaining, the whole plan would be unfeasible.          This way I feel like your contribution will serve a dual-purpose: I will once and for all overcome my inner difficulties and finish a marathon, and also will use the knowledge I have gained over the years, both as an individual battling anxiety and agoraphobia, but also as a Neurologist, to aid people who have gone through what I have, and provide them with the drug free support and care that they need. My journey wouldn’t end there at the marathon! Next step till my 30s I will take the Ironman title. No more pills, no more panic!         Here is a graphic of how your contribution would be spent:         We will be glad to offer you little souvenirs from our country, by sending you perks for your contribution.

But the thought that this problem of mine could last for the rest of my life was killing me. My inner fight for freedom was winning, up until a severe panic attack. And then I tried again, and every time I failed. I’ve tried acupuncture for several times, I can’t say it made a big change. I had some psychoanalytic discussions. I tried to do at least some sort of physical exercises. At some point everything was in van. No major changes, same number of panic attacks or/and headaches or fear. I hated myself for whom I was. I was trying not to believe my senses but to trust my rational thinking. No matter how strange or scary my feelings were I began to think differently, to negate my senses! That was hard but that was my one way ticket, my only option. Then I tried to work with my thoughts, senses, feelings, to understand them, and finally.. to control them. Since 2015 I diminished 10 times my medication intake. I did that through sport, reading, dancing and other positive activities. To even accelerate my comeback I am doing each day at least one of following: calisthenics exercises, cycling, jogging or swimming and guess what, I am PVC free for 9 months. Lots of other complicated problems are awaiting me in life, I don’t how to solve them yet, that’s why I am not stopping here, I will fight every day to make the best out of my choices. You can take my ticket, its free.If you have any questions you can always contact me:Facebook: Roman CobiletchiIndiegogo: Roman CobiletchiRomâna
Salut! Sunt Roma, am 26 de ani, sunt proaspăt absolvent medicinist și vreau să vă povestesc despre visul meu!
          De la începutul maturității am trăit un șir întreg de senzații, precum anxietate, agorafobie, atacuri de panică, extrasistole, având drept cauze comune dependența de jocurile video, gestionarea ineficientă a timpului, lipsa de motivație și, pe lângă acestea, stilul de viață stresant al unui student la medicină.         Am fost nevoit să fac o pauză de un an de la studii și mă auto-amăgeam cu medicamente pentru atenuarea migrenelelor și extrasistolelor. Jocurile video au devenit refugiul meu, o lume unde mintea mea se putea relaxa, cel puțin pentru o scurtă perioadă, dar în subconștient știam că lucrurile nu stau bine și nu aveam nici cea mai vagă idee cum să scap de dezordinea de la acel moment din viața mea.         Cu ajutorul prietenei mele și al unui prieten, am reușit în cele din urmă să finisez universitatea și pot zice cu mândrie că aproape am scăpat de majoritatea problemelor mele auto-distructive, prin schimbarea radicală a modului meu de viață.  Simt că sunt aproape liber de această povară, dar mi-a mai ramas un pas important, un lucru pe care mi l-am dorit de foarte mult și sper că, cu ajutorul vostru, acesta va deveni realitate. Visul meu este să particip la maraton, și anume Maratonul Haspa 42k din Hamburg, Germania pe 17 Aprilie, 2016!          Motivul pentru care am ales anume acest specific maraton în această specifică locație este deoarece anul viitor voi începe să lucrez în calitate de medic-rezident în Neurologie și există oportunitatea să o fac în Germania. Unica problemă este că primele 3 luni nu vor fi salariate și deci, cu resursele financiare limitate, întregul plan nu ar fi realizabil.         Astfel, contribuțiile voastre ar servi unui dublu scop: voi trece odată și pentru totdeauna peste dificultățile mele interioare și voi alerga maratonul, dar cel mai important este că voi folosi cunoștințele acumulate pe parcursul ultimilor ani, din duelul meu personal cu anxietatea și atacurile de panică, dar și în calitate de Neurolog, pentru a ajuta persoanele care trec prin ceea ce am trecut eu și îî voi susține ne-medicamentos cu suportul de care au cu adevărat nevoie. Călătoria mea însă nu își va avea finișul la maraton! Următorul scop până la 30 de ani este titlul de Ironman (Omul de fier). Fără medicamente, fără panică!         Iată o reprezentare grafică a distribuției contribuțiilor voastre:        Vom fi bucuroși să îți oferim suvenire din țara noastră, expediindu-ți cadouri pentru contribuție.Întrebări         Definițiile au fost scrise consultând surse medicale și referindu-mă la experiența personală. Aceasta publicație este personală, nu încurajează utilizarea unui medicament din cele menționate și nu promovează imaginea unei anume firme farmaceutice!          
         Ce este anxietatea? - Anxietatea este o senzație puternică caracterizată printr-o stare internă neplacută, însoțită de nervozitate, senzații ciudate prin corp, impresie de pericol iminent. Poate fi o trăire normală, pe care fiecare o poate simți uneori, dar când devine frecventă și continuă, persoana poate suferi de tulburare de anxietate. Aceasta, la rândul ei, se poate dezvolta în agorafobie și/sau atacuri de panică.         Ce este un atac de panică? Un atac de panică (AP) este o frică extrem de puternică apărută brusc, însoțită de senzații psiho-somatice, precum palpitații, extrasistole, durere toracică, amețeli, tremur, respirație îngreunată, ritm cardiac accelerat, senzații de irealitate, iar cel mai înspăimântător este sentimentul morții iminente. De obicei aceste trăiri forțează persoana să evadeze din locul unde atacul de panică a început și să îl evite chiar pe viitor. Adesea, când cineva are pentru prima dată un atac de panică, ajunge să se adreseze la Urgență. Durează până la 20 minute (în cazul meu), dar poate să reapară în scurt timp, dacă nu se administrează nici un medicament sau nu se efectuează tehnici de auto-control. Totuși, din punct de vedere medical, atacurile de panică nu sunt periculoase și nu aduc nici o daună fizică organismului!
          Ce este agorafobia? Agorafobia este o tulburare de anxietate, în care persoana percepe mediul ambiant drept periculos, amenințător pentru viață. Situații de viață cu adevărat inofensive cum ar fi jocurile de fotbal, locul de la serviciu, magazinele, cinematografele, aeroporturile, podurile sau chiar plimbările prin cartier ar putea cu ușurință declanșa un atac de panică. Aceasta forțează persoana să evite orice locație care anterior a generat gânduri sau senzații neplăcute. Adesea, unicul spațiu cu risc scăzut de a porni un atac de panică rămâne propria locuință, în special dacă acolo mai este cineva care te supraveghează.
          Ce sunt extrasistolele? Extrasistola - este o contracție ventriculară prematură, care este simțită precum palpitație, bătaie puternică subită, senzație de constrângere în stomac sau gât, sau adesea nu este simțită deloc. Când se referă la anxietate, extrasistolele apar din cauza unui flux masiv de adrenalină, iar o tehnică respiratorie adecvată de relaxare ar fi trebuit să fie suficientă pentru a le opri. Totuși, când cineva are atacuri de panică, este destul de dificil de rupt acest cerc vicios fără medicație, în acest fel fiecare bătaie de cord este atât de înspăimântătoare și deranjantă, de parcă ai suferi de fiecare dată un infarct miocardic.
          Care medicamente? Eu am luat Xanax (Alprazolam) timp de mai mulți ani, totuși existau perioade când rămâneam în zona mea de confort și reușeam să scap de Xanax pe câteva zile. Dar cum un examen sau un stres de intensitate medie apăreau, eram din nou forțat să iau medicamentul. Începând cu 2015, m-am obligat să scad doza de Xanax de la 5 mg pe lună la 0,5 mg pe lună. Acum (august 2015), când am o durere de cap puternică din cauza unui stres emoțional, aș putea să iau 0,12 mg de Xanax, dar încerc să fac sport în loc. Priviți la reprezentarea grafică cu medicamentele administrate timp de ultimele 5 luni. Timp de 150 zile am luat doar 2mg de Xanax, iar curând nu voi mai avea deloc nevoie de el!
                   Aceasta publicație este personală, nu încurajează utilizarea unui medicament din cele menționate și nu promovează imaginea unei anume firme farmaceutice!
          De ce am avut un stil de viață stresant? În 2010 îmi puneam la îndoială viitorul, nu eram sigur ce vreau să fac în viață, am încetat să practic orice sport, nu mai vroiam să îmi continui studiile medicale, etc. Am început să nu frecventez cursurile, certându-mă cu părinții și prietena pe probleme banale. Încercam totuși să duc o viață activă în calitate de student, lucram în calitate de asistent chirurgical la un spital, participam la lucrări de cercetare științifică, etc., dar speram că cumva universitatea se va sfârși fără mine și toți mă vor lăsa în pace. Această luptă internă continua să crească din ce în ce mai mare cu fiece lună. Începând cu anul 2011, am găsit un joc la PC și acesta a devenit unica oază de pace și siguranță. Totuși, înțelegeam perfect la acel moment că mă scufund în propria plăcere și mă sinucid spiritual. Dar nu aveam nici o putere de voință să mă schimb și să schimb felul în care vedeam lumea. Am început să ignor oamenii, evenimentele, cursurile, familia … totul, pe toți. Îmi amintesc de mine pe atunci ca fiind foarte nervos, ușor de plictisit și iritat de toți, în special de mine însumi. Această bombă încet-încet a crescut până în aprilie 2012, când am simțit primul meu atac de panică. A fost de parcă un ciocan m-a lovit în cap, apoi un tremur incontrolabil, vedere incețoșată și o senzație constantă de frică. Cu puținele cunoștințe medicale pe care le aveam la acel moment, am crezut că am un AVC (accident vascular cerebral). Eram convins că ceva s-a întâmplat în interiorul capului meu și că voi muri. În acea zi am ajuns la Urgență. Fiind departe de casă, am început să fiu anxios și, chiar dacă am fost consultat de medici și am trecut orice investigație posibilă, oricum credeam că ceva nu e în regulă cu mine. de atunci am început să iau medicamente. Am luat o pauză de la studii pe un an. Jocurile video au devenit viața mea. Am început să simt destul de multe extrasistole, care deveniseră triggerul cel mai important al atacurilor mele de panică. Credeam că am infarct miocardic odată cu fiecare extrasistolă. Am trecut și mai multe investigații și chiar dacă toate rezultatele arătau foarte bine, eu nu credeam. M-am izolat complet. Chiar dacă încercam să schimb câte ceva, anxietatea mea, nesiguranța mea, erau de fiecare dată mai puternice decât dorința mea de a mă schimba. Medicamentele erau soluția.
         Cum mi-am schimbat radical modul de viață? Mă simțeam vinovat de fiecare dată când luam un medicament. Îmi era dor de libertatea de a mă plimba singur. Îmi era dor de sala de sport, de bicicletă, de badminton, tenis.. tot ce făceam odată. Am încercat să fac exerciții fizice, dar extrasistolele mă opreau de fiecare dată când începeam. Din vara anului 2013 am încercat să fac minimul pe care îl puteam, dar frica de a simți extrasistole sau dureri de cap, mă opreau oricum. Cu susținerea familiei mele, m-am întors la studii. Am avut și mai mult stres și anxietate. Dar gândul că această problemă a mea ar putea dura toată viața.. mă ucidea. Lupta mea internă pentru libertate caștiga pentru perioade scurte de timp, de obicei până la un atac de panică sever. Și apoi, încercam din nou și de fiecare dată pierdeam. Am încercat și acupunctură de câteva ori, nu pot să spun că a făcut o diferență mare. Am avut și niște discuții psihoanalitice. Am încercat să fac măcar careva tipuri de exerciții fizice. La un anumit moment, totul părea zădarnic. Nici o schimbare majoră, același număr de atacuri de panică și/sau dureri de cap sau frică. Mă uram pentru cine eram. Încercam să nu cred în senzațiile mele, ci să mă încred în judecata rațională. Indiferent de cât de ciudate sau înspăimântătoare erau senzațiile mele, am început să gândesc diferit, să neg ceea ce simțeam. A fost greu, dar era unicul meu “bilet”, unica mea cale de scăpare. Apoi am încercat să lucrez cu propriile mele gânduri, sentimente, senzații, să le înțeleg și, în sfârșit… să le controlez. De la începutul anului 2015 am scăzut doza de medicamente administrate de 10 ori. Am făcut aceasta prin sport, lectură, dans și alte activități pozitive. Pentru a-mi accelera progresul, în fiecare zi fac cel puțin una din următoarele activități: gimnastică calistenică, ciclism, alergat sau înot și, ca să vedeți, nu mai am extrasistole deja de 9 luni. O mulțime de alte probleme complicate mă așteaptă în viață, nu știu cum să le rezolv încă, iată de ce nu mă opresc aici, voi lupta în fiecare zi ca să fac cea mai bună alegere. Poți lua “biletul” meu, el e gratuit!          Dacă aveți orice întrebare, puteți să mă contactați oricând:
Facebook Roman Cobiletchi
Indiegogo Roman cobiletchi
Perks / Cadouri




          Here you can see our special Perks for your contribution.



          / Aici poți vedea cadourile care te așteaptă cu drag pentru contribuție.



          



Enjoy :)

story:
Our Story

3RD WHUT? Hi, I'm Dave Trujillo, co-founder of 3rdNut Gear, and I love nuts...well...let me explain. 3rdNut is more than just an expression and a funny logo on our clothes. 3RDNUT IS AN ATTITUDE. Whether you're an extreme athlete, a weekend warrior or you're pushing PAST fear and doubt to accomplish ANY goal or dream you can imagine... you have earned your 3rd Nut... and the 3rdNut Nation wants YOU! We're a small, self funded team who has BIG plans to organize all the bold and fearless people out there earning theirs every day.

WE ARE APPAREL AND GEAR! Available online at 3rdnut.com and select retail stores, we have a great collection of gear at great prices for those who identify with the 3rdNut lifestyle. 

WE ARE A COMMUNITY! We also want 3rdnut.com to be a place for different 'tribes' (your sport or interest) to find events, resources, competitions, contests and most importantly... other 3rdNuts! Think Facebook on pure adrenaline.

WE WANT YOU! We want to organize events like 10K's, mud runs and community cleanups that help raise funds, resources and awareness for your great causes.

3RDNUT.tv CHANNEL! We'll develop a 3rdNut.tv channel to feature you fearless 3rdNutters in action and tell your stories.

Read more about 3rdNut here: http://www.3rdnut.com/3rdNut_Media_Kit_0913.pdf

WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP!

 

1. CUSTOM GEAR - Every warrior should look awesome while busting barriers, so we're building an exciting new line of KILLER gear just for you. None of that 'Fru Fru Lemme pay too much' active wear crap. We're talkin' threads built to be as tough as the people who wear them. All at prices you can actually afford. Starting with Performance Shirts and Caps, we'll add onto the line to match the investment level.

2. WEBSITE OVERHAUL- We'll give you on-line tools to represent your tribe, self organize, set and accomplish goals and connect with other 3rdNutters. Our site needs a serious overhaul y'all. We have some really cool plans and we can't wait to show you what we've been up to!

3. BRAND AMBASSADORS & SALES CAPABILITY TO BECOME SELF FUNDING 
Build our team of Brand Ambassadors and host events like 3rdNut mud runs, races and challenges to generate buzz and raise money to help others reach their full potential. 

4. 3RDNUT.TV -  Create great content and videos featuring our fearless 3rdNutters in action on the 3rdNut.tv channel.

AND NOW, THE SWAG! Please scroll down to see, then grab... gently please... one of our killer, one-of-a-kind gifts by clicking on the perk of your choice on the right side of the screen. Keep checking back for updates and new stuff! Don't sweat the details, we'll get your sizes, colors and the other stuff at the end of the gig. Thank you!

Yes! Your perks will arrive well before the Holidays!!!  Don't worry, we'll get all your details including sizes, colors and styles at the end of the campaign.

 

The Impact

More than a clothing company gearing up the world's barrier busters, 3rdNut can be a powerful, community based brand that will CHANGE the world with your help. Through organizing events that raise money and awareness, like 10K's, Mud runs, Festivals and community cleanups, 3rdNut will make a real impact on communities everywhere. 3rdNut's website will allow Fearless people everywhere to connect with each other to find fun and challenging events, allow them to organize to find ways to give back to their communities and more. 3rdNut donates a portion of all sales to causes that help others 'Earn Theirs'. This means finding worthy causes that give people the tools to help others learn, grow and lead.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please help share our video and story with your friends around the world!
    And don't forget to use the Indiegogo awesome share tools!
  • Do you know any Fearless people that should join 3rdNut? If you think you have what it takes to be a 3rdNut Brand Ambassador or partner, please contact me!
  • We support community, so if you know of anyone who wants to partner with 3rdNut, we can provide customized gear and resources to help you rally your tribe of warriors and get the word out.

story:
A Little Bit About Me


Hi, I'm Robert Murray-Smith an independent researcher. My main idea is to bring the Hi-Tech down to earth. I work on processes that anyone can use to make the weird and wonderful hi-tech materials that are at the forefront of research today. This is so anyone and everyone can research, do or build their own projects or take part in projects they ave always wanted to take part in without having to have the equipment of a large university or the bank balance of a major corporation.
I do a lot of work out in the open and you can find my videos at http://www.youtube.com/user/RobertMurraySmith where I keep an active overview of the comments and I am always happy to answer any questions you might have.
Now the reason for this Project. Lots of people have been asking to buy the stuff I have been making especially the graphene ink and alternative graphene inks are just silly money. At the moment I make small amounts in a long and laborious process and I need the money to buy some machinery and make larger amounts so everybody can have a bit.

What I Need & What You Get

What I need the money for is the machinery. I need something called a three roll mill and they start at 1,000 pounds for a second hand lab mill and go up from there - the one I want is 5,000 pounds and is ideal for inks, paints and potions in the liter range.

If I raise more than the target figure I will use the extra money - if there is any! - to expand the ink range to cover, piezo inks, solar cell inks, electroluminescent inks - the list just goes on!!

If I raise less than the target I shall just buy a smaller machine and make do as well as I can.

What I plan to give you are inks to do with as you please whether it is to print batteries, paint solar cells, design speakers or make unique circuits that can be made from paper.

The Impact

Conductive inks will change the way we look at electronics, reduce harmful waste, get rid of dangerous processes and the chemicals they use. Until now they have been out of reach for the average experimenter, designer, school child and innovator being hard to get hold of, not very good or just too expensive to do anything BIG with. The working Ink project aims to change this and your contribution will help this become a reality.

Contributions don't just have to be money - though that helps, you can contribute ideas and I would like to build a book of ideas for the inexperienced or just curious to play around with and a back up project to this one is to put together a book of ideas, circuits and projects for general release that anyone can get hold of and use.

You can contact me on here, via my youtube (https://www.youtube.com/user/RobertMurraySmith) or my website (https://sites.google.com/site/rmsgraphite/), or email me on rmsgraphite@gmail.com and I would love to hear your ideas.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help,you can:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to let others know
  • come up with ideas for using the ink and let me know

And that’s all there is to it.

I need something called a three roll mill and they start at 1,000 pounds for a second hand lab mill and go up from there - the one I want is 5,000 pounds and is ideal for inks, paints and potions in the liter range.If I raise more than the target figure I will use the extra money - if there is any! - to expand the ink range to cover, piezo inks, solar cell inks, electroluminescent inks - the list just goes on!!If I raise less than the target I shall just buy a smaller machine and make do as well as I can.What I plan to give you are inks to do with as you please whether it is to print batteries, paint solar cells, design speakers or make unique circuits that can be made from paper.The ImpactConductive inks will change the way we look at electronics, reduce harmful waste, get rid of dangerous processes and the chemicals they use. Until now they have been out of reach for the average experimenter, designer, school child and innovator being hard to get hold of, not very good or just too expensive to do anything BIG with. The working Ink project aims to change this and your contribution will help this become a reality.Contributions don't just have to be money - though that helps, you can contribute ideas and I would like to build a book of ideas for the inexperienced or just curious to play around with and a back up project to this one is to put together a book of ideas, circuits and projects for general release that anyone can get hold of and use. You can contact me on here, via my youtube (https://www.youtube.com/user/RobertMurraySmith) or my website (https://sites.google.com/site/rmsgraphite/), or email me on rmsgraphite@gmail.com and I would love to hear your ideas.Other Ways You Can HelpI know some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help,you can:
Get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
Use the Indiegogo share tools to let others know
come up with ideas for using the ink and let me know

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
Not just a smaller phone on your wrist

Existing smartwatches are geeky accessories instead of the wristwatch that every smartphone owner would want to wear.

For a smartwatch to make sense, it shouldn't just be a smaller smartphone. Instead, it actually needs to be better than the smartphone for the tasks you are going to use it for. You are not going to write an email on your watch, but you are going to check the weather on it - because that's something you want to do on-the-go. So it needs to be optimized for these simple tasks being executed in a moving environment - in contrast to current smartphone interfaces, which are made for increasingly complex tasks.


Features & Specifications

  • Illuminated color Mirasol™ IMOD display (40 mm, 220 ppi), always ON and perfectly viewable in direct sunlight or in dark. Screen protected by a scratch-resistant crystal sapphire glass
  • 1 Week battery life and compatible with Qi wireless charging standard
  • Built-in accelerometer and gyroscope for accurate fitness tracking and gesture controls
  • Capacitive touch screen
  • 1 Crown and 2 physical buttons for easy access to various functions and time adjustment
  • Bluetooth® 4.0 supporting simultaneous connections (Smartphone and Bluetooth headset)
  • Customizable vibration notifications
  • Customizable watch faces
  • Compatible with Android, iPhone or Windows 8
  • Water resistant 5 ATM
  • Available in stainless steel, rose gold and titanium


Design

A watch is much more personal than a phone. It's a fashion statement and you actually wear it on your arm for most of the day so that people see it. It's much more intimate than a phone and shouldn't look like a gadget, but like an actual wristwatch.

Attention to detail and premium materials are the main characteristics for the watch. Screen is protected by a dome shaped crystal sapphire which is known for its strong ability to endure scratches and provide clear visibility.

The watch body is offered in three options: brushed stainless steel, titanium and rose gold to match every taste and offer sufficient protection for the watch. The ZAMMANN watch weights 86 grams (68 grams for the titanium model) which feels so light yet very solid.

We decided not to include a microphone or a speaker or any open ports so we can ensure the product is water-tight and robust for many years.


Dimensions and physical specifications:

  • Case size: 43 mm
  • Case thickness: 14.2 mm
  • Case materials: Stainless Steel / Rose Gold / Titanium
  • Watch lens: Crystal Sapphire Glass
  • Band type: Leather
  • Watch case back: Screw down
  • Water resistance: 5 ATM



User Interface & Convenience

The ZAMMANN smartwatch can be operated simply by; touching, pushing and shaking. The screen is touch capacitive so you can simply swipe through different menus and apps.

The smartwatch case design also incorporates 1 crown and 2 physical buttons that add to the aesthetics of a classical wristwatch. To adjust time, you simply pull the crown and rotate, just like a normal watch! The other 2 buttons can be easily customized to perform various functions like; timer, stopwatch, missed notifications, change watch face, alarm, turn volume up/down and many more!

With the built-in accelerometer and gyroscope you can simply shake your wrist to turn on the back-light when in dark situations.






Apps & Notifications

Notifications are an important part of the smartwatch, because much too often, we pull our phones out only to check the notification we just got.

When you get a new notification, the smartwatch vibrates and the notification fills the screen for a few seconds, allowing you to look at it and go back to what you were doing without further interaction. Of course, you can also swipe them away to get rid of them immediately or interact on them. Vibration pattern and intensity can be customized and assigned to different types of notifications and alerts.

Additionally, if you decide that a notification requires more complex interaction (like reading a long email), you can just unlock your phone and it'll immediately open the notification's app for you. Missed notifications are indicated by simple icons on the main watch face.





Customization

The ZAMMANN smartwatch comes preloaded with numerous watch faces to match your need and style; Digital, analog, classical, sport, chronograph, modern, minimal … the sky is the limit! You can change the watch faces directly from the watch or from the installed ZAMMANN Watch Manager on your smartphone. It will also allow users to design their own watch faces and upload/share with a wide community of watch enthusiasts.

The stainless steel version comes with an Italian buffalo grain black leather strap; the rose gold version comes with an Italian crocodile pattern brown leather and rose gold buckle. However, if you’re in a mood to change, the strap can be easily replaced with standard sized straps and bands.


                       



Display



The ZAMMANN smartwatch incorporates the latest technology in Mirasol™IMOD display that offers vibrant colors and easily viewed in direct sunlight just like paper and E-Ink displays. The display is backlit for when there is no outside light source.

Interferometric Modulator Display (IMOD, trademarked Mirasol) is a technology used in electronic visual displays that can create various colors via interference of reflected light. The color is selected with an electrically switched light modulator comprising a microscopic cavity that is switched on and off using driver integrated circuits similar to those used to address liquid crystal displays (LCD). An IMOD-based reflective flat panel display includes hundreds of thousands of individual IMOD elements each a microelectromechanical systems (MEMS)-based device.

The display technology is the main reason behind the extended battery life of 1 week under regular use. Unlike conventional LCDs and AMOLEDs, the Mirasol™ display is always ON, yet consumes very little power and almost zero power when in idle.

The 40 mm diameter offers enough space for the smartwatch’s functions without feeling bulky or over-sized.



Battery

Thanks to the display technology, the ZAMMANN smartwatch can achieve on a single charge 1 week of battery life under daily regular use unlike existing smartwatches with LCD/AMOLED displays that needs to be recharged daily.

The ZAMMANN smartwatch is charged wirelessly via the provided leather watch box. Just plug-in a standard micro-USB cable into the back of the box and simply drop the watch inside the box to start charging. The smartwatch is also compatible with the Qi™ wireless charging standard which can be charged via any standard Qi™ wireless charger.



Timeline

Feb-April 2014: Indiegogo Campaign and launch website

April-May 2014: Order parts for backer rewards and watchcase molds; build production circuit boards

May 2014: FCC, CE, and Qi certification

May-June 2014: Pilot production begins

November 2014: Start delivering to backers

December 2014: Volume production begins and launch webstore

During this process, we will share snapshots of the journey!



We need your support!

Some people might not be able to contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help; help us to spread the word and share our campaign with your friends and family.



Risks and challenges

Every technology project has risks and challenges.

As we move towards production, our main challenges are in final integration, wireless certifications, and parts deliveries.

The ZAMMANN smartwatch is a combination of electronics, software, and watch hardware. We are confident in our design. To deliver a premium product, it is sometimes necessary to spend extra time tuning circuit board designs, refining software, or adjusting mechanical tolerances.

a) Component lead times & availability

Lead times vary for different components.  Some take as long as three months just to deliver. We will be splitting our component orders based on manufacturing times.  Therefore, as soon as we have a good idea of estimated orders, we will immediately place orders for components that take longer to manufacture first. This will decrease our time to receive the components from suppliers.

b) Shipping ZAMMANN smartwatch worldwide

There are a number of unforeseen circumstances that can cause problems during the actual physical shipping of the ZAMMANN smartwatch. Therefore, we will be working directly with world-class fulfillment companies that are extremely experienced in logistics. This will ensure that we are able to get your smartwatch into your hands in the least amount of time!

story:
Could you imagine that preparing a simple slice of bread can provide an exceptional experience?


We have turned imagination into reality.

R&D has delivered the solution:

The Spread-IT Heated Butter Knife!


Inspiration came one morning when the food prepared wasn’t really appetizing.

I felt I had to make a change, and shared my idea with my engineer friend. He designed the technical solution to transform my dream into practical reality. 

Finally, Spread-IT was born.


Technical description

The blade is equipped with a unique heater, capable of supplying the necessary heat evenly throughout the surface of the blade.

Constant temperature is guaranteed by the thermal sensor built into the blade, for maximum protection against overheating.

Added safety is provided by the touch sensor, making a switch unnecessary, as it is turned on by the human touch.



Specifications

  1. Stainless alloy blade with heated element
  2. Temperature indicator light
  3. Circuit board, with capacitive touch sensor
  4. 1020mah 3.7v lithium ion battery
  5. Brushed stainless steel casing
  6. Micro USB B connector, with charge indicator light

Charging is done through a micro-USB port with a waterproof plug – Spread-IT is fully waterproof and safe.


What's in the package?

  • Spread-IT heated butterknife
  • Instruction manual

  • 110-220V 0,8-1A Micro USB B charger


About our team

Three of us started this project, which allowed our product to be the result of solely in-house planning, development, and design work.

Following 20 months of research and development the technology has been perfected and by now the flawlessly functioning prototype is ready.

At last, we can present you this advanced, unique, and stylish kitchen utensil.


Thank You!

Thank you for helping us in our project! Share, and Spread the love.

story:
THIS IS 100% SECRET

My Sister Lauren is leaving University soon and as she will be going for interviews she wants a presentation folder, despite this, the folder is an expensive purchase so she decided not to buy one.

However, if she did get one it would make her stand out in interviews and make her look very professional.

The folder itself costs £90.00 but the minimum amount I could set was £500, so if this surpasses the £90 goal, I would give her the extra money to put towards travelling costs for interviews!

Lauren's designs are the campaign image and I have attached other photos of her work, as well as a link to her website to find out more!

(She doesn't know I've made this so shhh!)

Lauren's designs are the campaign image and I have attached other photos of her work, as well as a link to her website to find out more! (She doesn't know I've made this so shhh!)

story:
BEGINNINGS

"I can't." "I don't know how." "I'll never be able to accomplish that."

Those were thoughts that ran through my head for years. I didn't believe that I could accomplish anything more than I already had. When I hit my lowest point, I discovered photography.

I was depressed and broke so, I decided to sell some of my clothes on Etsy...I didn't have enough to make rent that month. At first, I took pics of my clothes on hangers with a basic point and shoot. I didn't find the images appealing. So, I convinced my Mom to let me buy a Canon T2i with her Best Buy card. Then, I found a model online (pretending that I had experience as a photographer, when in actuality - I had none). During that first shoot, I began to feel like a creative person again...and it felt really, really, really Good. From there, I posted the images online, with the sole purpose of finding more models for my Etsy shop...but, then agencies started contacting me to shoot their models. I still didn't think of myself as a photographer but, I was flattered, nervous, and excited about this new challenge. 

And that's how I started. A year later, I moved to New York.

In the 2 years since I left Chicago, I've moved 13 times. I've survived on ramen for months at a time. I've crashed on couches and box springs and air mattresses, when I had no money and only the kindness of friends to keep a roof over my head. But, despite the initial hardship of my New York Story - I'd never felt more fulfilled in my life. That's because throughout the struggle, I was doing what I loved. The 2nd week after I arrived, I shot my first male model (Tristan Burnett), and I was stunned at how strong and emotional and tangible my images came out. Working with him was much different than when I had worked with women. During that shoot, I discovered that I really love shooting men. And in that moment I knew that capturing them would be my focus. And it has been.

Tristan Burnett


THE MAGAZINE

For many reasons, SCRUGGS is unique and ceiling shattering.  To give you context, most of the photographer's who shoot major fashion editorials and campaigns are white and male.  There are a select group of female photographers who are shooting high level projects but, as far as I know - none of them are black.

The fact that I'm Black and  Female and a Photographer, who's main focus is on shooting Men (when most female photographers usually shoot other women), is incredibly significant. And the fact that I am at the helm of my own magazine, that I've photographed 100% of the content for, and that will be competing on newsstands with the biggest fashion magazines being published today - is even more significant. Yes, SCRUGGS will be sold on newsstands and in shops around country - and around the world.

This magazine's extra-ordinary background will make an impact on the industry.


But, all of these words would be meaningless if I didn't have the talent and the vision to back them up...and I have both. My work is about capturing more than just the fashion aspect of an image. I view the models that I shoot as more than just a "hanger". That's why I push them and myself to create images that have an emotional gravity, interesting lines, and physical agility. 

Those hallmarks of my style have garnered me opportunities to shoot for Details Magazine, Footlocker, and GQ South Africa. I've also cut my editorial teeth shooting for great independent magazine's like GODS, Tabula Rasa, and Creem. 

At this point, I'm ready and able to take my work to the Next Level. I've already shot 80% of the issue, with models that have given me so much inspiration. I've pushed myself beyond what I thought that I was capable of and I'm incredibly proud of the results. Please scroll for a preview of what's to come:

Adonis Bosso @ DNA - Cover Model

Abiah Hostvedt @ Red NYC

Trey Baxter @ LA Models

Roberto Sipos @ Soul Artist Management

Gabriel Gomieri @ One Management

Nathan Rodjam @ Soul & DaJé Barbour @ DNA


Eileen Tjan, an amazing artist and graphic designer, will format/design the look and layout of the magazine. It's not enough to have a great concept and great images. Many magazines fall short because their design isn't up to the industry standard. With SCRUGGS, we will go beyond the standard with innovative, quality, and nuanced design. I'm incredibly excited that she's on board and for the amazing piece of Art that SCRUGGS will be. http://eileentjan.com

WE'RE IN THIS TOGETHER

I've estimated that I need  $8,000 in order to format, print, and ship the magazine.  SCRUGGS won't have any advertising. This fund will be the only revenue for the creation of SCRUGGS...every donation is integral.

-$5,000 for printing & shipping the magazine from the printer

-$1,800 for design/format

-$720 for the IndieGoGo fees + credit card processing fees

-$480 for perks and shipping of perks

**Any surplus donations will be used towards future issues and a more interactive website.

I've come out of my own pocket to produce each shoot. From renting surfboards in Malibu, to paying for gas when we've had to travel, buying food and snacks for the set, renting studio space and lights, and more. I really need your help to launch SCRUGGS into physical form. I can't do this part on my own.

Postcard Print Perks from my Archive:


Adonis Bosso @DNA


Louis Mayhew @ DNA



Vince Harrington @DNA


Adonis Bosso @ DNA


Signature Tote Bag:


8.5 x 11 Print of any image from my archive. View more options on my website and tumblr: http://danascruggs.com + http://danascruggsphoto.tumblr.com



If I don't reach my goal, the money raised will go towards releasing the magazine on a smaller scale, either as a 'zine or in an online format.


PLEASE SHARE THIS PAGE 

  • From my own experience, I understand that not everyone will be able to donate.  I would love for you to support by sharing this page (via the icons at the top) on your Facebook  and/or Twitter pages.  If you're using Instagram, please post  one (or more!) of these images and tag @scruggsmagazine in your caption. Thank You!
