I've pushed myself beyond what I thought that I was capable of and I'm incredibly proud of the results. Please scroll for a preview of what's to come:

Adonis Bosso @ DNA - Cover Model
Abiah Hostvedt @ Red NYC
Trey Baxter @ LA Models
Roberto Sipos @ Soul Artist Management
Gabriel Gomieri @ One Management
Nathan Rodjam @ Soul & DaJé Barbour @ DNA
Eileen Tjan, an amazing artist and graphic designer, will format/design the look and layout of the magazine. It's not enough to have a great concept and great images. Many magazines fall short because their design isn't up to the industry standard. With SCRUGGS, we will go beyond the standard with innovative, quality, and nuanced design. I'm incredibly excited that she's on board and for the amazing piece of Art that SCRUGGS will be. http://eileentjan.com
  WE'RE IN THIS TOGETHER
 I've estimated that I need  $8,000 in order to format, print, and ship the magazine.  SCRUGGS won't have any advertising. This fund will be the only revenue for the creation of SCRUGGS...every donation is integral. 
-$5,000 for printing & shipping the magazine from the printer
-$1,800 for design/format
-$720 for the IndieGoGo fees + credit card processing fees
-$480 for perks and shipping of perks
**Any surplus donations will be used towards future issues and a more interactive website. 
I've come out of my own pocket to produce each shoot. From renting surfboards 
in Malibu, to paying for gas when we've had to travel, buying food and 
snacks for the set, renting studio space and lights, and more. I really 
need your help to launch SCRUGGS into physical form. I can't do this 
part on my own.
Postcard Print Perks from my Archive:


Adonis Bosso @DNA

Louis Mayhew @ DNA



Vince Harrington @DNA

Adonis Bosso @ DNA

Signature Tote Bag:




8.5 x 11 Print of any image from my archive. View more options on my website and tumblr: http://danascruggs.com + http://danascruggsphoto.tumblr.com







If I don't reach my goal, the money raised will go towards releasing the magazine on a smaller scale, either as a 'zine or in an online format. 
 
  PLEASE SHARE THIS PAGE 


From my own experience, I understand that not everyone will be able to donate.  I would love for you to support by sharing this page (via the icons at the top) on your Facebook  and/or Twitter pages.  If you're using Instagram, please post  one (or more!) of these images and tag @scruggsmagazine in your caption. Thank You!

story:
Why is the Blazzar Vape better?

   Not only will there be no gases involved in the use, but the stainless steel will be strong enough to support the heat from the laser, while not heating the stainless steel to the point when toxic vapors can be released. This is a concern for most vaporizers, where the device is heated to the point where fragments of metal may be inhaled by the user.


Will the Blazzar Vape be durable?

   YES! We are buying durable (thus expensive) parts for the Blazzar to guarantee a reliable portable vape that can be used more often and not ruin due to usage. We are striving to make a portable vaporizer that will stand the test of time. 


Will the laser be powerful enough for my needs?

   Whether herb or oil, the laser will be powerful enough for flexible vaping needs, while having an adjustable power level dial. Letting you control the heat output of the laser depending on the substance that you are loading and the vaporization experience you desire!


Why should I buy this product over other Portable Vapes?

   Not only will the Blazzar Vape be the first of its kind on the market, but we believe it is the most durable and efficient vaporizer between usages. We plan to sell our product for a reasonable price for the power and durability.


Is the Blazzar Vape safe?

   We will be installing safety measures to prevent the laser from activating while the chamber is unattached. We will be going through the FDA for approval of safe usage. This device has been designed with ease of use as well as ease of cleaning in mind.


How much will the Blazzar Vape be?

   We want our product to be the best on the market, while maintaining affordability! The Blazzar will be available for $250 USD.


Where is Blazzar from?

   We are based in Austin, Texas! We designed this product with the end user in mind. Blazzar started because everyone involved believes that this will change the way people vape.


How can I find out more about Blazzar?

   We have a Website ( BlazzarVape.Com), Facebook, Twitter, Google+, and Youtube that you can checkout and further your adventure their!


Does Blazzar have any types of warranties?

   YES! We will replace any unlikely faulty circuitry or non-working components for 1 year after purchase. Just ship it to our location and we will repair or replace your product while returning it to you for free of charge.


Is Blazzar only going to have one colored laser and device?

   We plan to make special orders in the future dealing with varied laser colors, but red is what we will be using for the base design. The red color is at a lower wavelength frequency, thus better suited towards transmitting heat. We can use other colors, but they are not as efficient as red when dealing heat.


Will they be sold online?

   Yes, from distributors as well as through our website. Please feel free to refer to our website and/or social networks to read and find out more. We'll keep you posted on all future updates!


Why only one laser?

   One strong laser will be sufficient . Multiple lasers would require more power usage and would be more expensive to manufacture. Due to the bowl being slightly dome shaped, everything will vape evenly towards the center, down into the chamber. 


How will the vape work?

   The unit will be operational with a fully charged battery. There is an adjustable power level control dial. Detach the chamber compartment connected to the casing. Then load personal herb or oil into the chamber. Attach the chamber back to the casing, then temporarily hold down the button in order to heat the substance that was loaded. Then inhale through the mouthpiece.


What is the charge time?

   We will be working towards better charge times versus usage time. Currently, the charge will roughly be about 3 to 5 hours (from a completely dead battery) with approximately 1 and 30 minutes of continuous usage.


How big is the vape?

   The design will be going through a very vigorous redesign phase. Right now the design is fully functional, although not fully optimized in beauty, safety and efficiency of vaping. The design is based on a 6 ½ inch ( 16.5 cm) size. Improvements can and will be made to reduce the size where possible while adding comfort and elegance.


Can it be used while charging?

   Yes!


Will the vape overheat at all?

   The distribution of heat would be sufficient enough to allow a safe hit. Always make sure the chamber is loaded before use to ensure you don't heat the metal up directly. Even so, it would not be harmful to the device.

   Since the heat is directly beamed into the chamber, it allows for the substance to be heated directly without extensive heating to the interior atmosphere. Which can spread throughout the device causing discomfort to the touch or even damage precious circuitry.


How do I clean my vape?

   A full disassembly of the casing would be possible for a deep clean. Sufficient cleaning would be possible with a pipe cleaner and alcohol wipes.


How long will development take?

   The core team is small and we will be working with developers and manufacturers here in Texas and in California to bring you the best product as soon as possible. The developmental process of prototyping, FDA approval, and manufacturing  is estimated to take about 4-6 months.


Why do you need funding?

   Although the design is functional, it's by no means perfect. The funding will help us take this to the next level of design (for efficiency, elegance, and safety) and help with the cost of manufacturing. We truly believe this is the next BIG step in vaping. With the proper funding, we'll be able to make the Blazzar the best (and yes, we're striving to be the BEST) vaporizer on the market. To do so, we require your help and support. 



Butane  
  Pros        

       • Butane can be purchased at stores relatively cheap.

       • Cheaper price tag of vaporization unit.

       • Faster turnaround time between uses.

  Cons

       • Must continuously purchase Butane for use.

       • Butane vapor can be unhealthy.

       • A lot of ambient heat generated from flame.


Electric
  Pros

       • Effective and efficient control of temperature.

       • Can vape oils, liquid, and dry herbs effectively.

       • Compact size.

  Cons

        • Ambient heat can damage circuitry.

       • Large power consumption to generate heat thus, lower battery life.

       • Delicate parts.


Blazzar
  Pros

       • Efficient energy usage, thus longer battery life.

       • Durable parts.

       • Consistent vaporization.

  Cons

       • Not optimized for liquids.

       • No temperature control, only power level output can be controlled.

story:
As seen on Perez Hilton, NY Daily News, Fast Company Yahoo, Venture Beat, Digital Style, The Frisky, etc.

Why we ran an Indiegogo Campaign

On March 19, 2013, we won a competition with The Grommet (www.grommet.com) and Google Apps, and as a result, we were asked to do a campaign on Indiegogo! We're so excited about this for two main reasons.

One, while we had a recently successful Kickstarter campaign, they didn't let us share our key inspiration behind THINX, and two, after hearing from so many of you, we learned that there were a few specific things you guys would like to see us create.
 
So here's the deal!

Exciting reason #1 - Now we can tell the whole story when we couldn't with Kickstarter (they don't allow cause-based funding):

The full story of why we created THINX has two parts.

One, THINX took almost 3 years to develop, and it is the smartest, best-in-class, leak and stain-resistant underwear that thinks of you every day of the month (did we mention that it's anti-microbial, moisture-wicking, comfortable and pretty too?). 

Two, THINX is also the most thoughtful pair because it thinks about women and girls in the developing world thru a partnership in Uganda. 

Here's what a few of the styles look like ("THINX Classics Trio" reward pictured): 

Here are the hidden powers of THINX: 

While many of us may have anxiety or embarrassment every month, in other parts of the world lacking the right resources, women and girls face much greater issues. 

For instance, girls in the developing world are missing up to a week of school every month and using unimaginable things to manage their monthly cycle like twigs, leaves, newspaper, plastic bags or dirty rags. In the developing world, more than 67 million girls have dropped out of school entirely which overwhelmingly leads to early marriage, pregnancy and a greater difficulty in raising themselves out of poverty.

To help change this, every time you buy a pair of THINX you also help fund the production of 7 washable, reusable pads for a woman or girl in the developing world via our partnership with AFRIpads in Uganda.

This 7-pad kit helps create local jobs and empower the economy while also helping keep girls in school during that time of the month. And if you empower a girl to stay in school, the positive effects are many (see www.thegirleffect.org), and the world begins to change for the better, one life, one family at a time. 

Exciting reason #2 - Now we can raise funds to create what you've asked for:

During the Kickstarter campaign, we were able to really listen to our customers and find out more about what you guys would like to see. On the top of our list is the ability to make larger sizes (size 20 and possibly more), a thong style and an eventual sporty style without lace that's great for sports and teens. The more money we raise, the more we'll be able to do! 

What We Need & What You Get

To break it down in more detail, we're looking to raise $10,000 so that we can:

  • Order enough of the special moisture-wicking and anti-microbial fabric that gives our THINX underwear its special functionality.
  • Create thongs because you asked for them.
  • Create a variety of sizes up to 22 or 24 because you asked for them.
  • Raise funds for an eventual lace-free style great for teens and sports

Top 4 Reasons to Own THINX

1) They can completely replace any need for disposable liners on light days. 

2) When you buy one pair, you are directly helping one woman and girl - one with a job, and another to stay in school. 

3) They'll be some of the most comfy & well-made undies you'll own and you won't have to worry about embarrassing moments again. 

4) You'll help the environment and save $$$ in the long run (see below). 

Hiphugger THINX

Every girl's MUST-HAVE pair! For beautiful comfort & coverage 

  • Full coverage in the back for the most protection & zero wedgies 
  • Low cut & super comfortable stretch-lace waistband 
  • No muffin-top worries & limited panty lines
  • Medium to heavy day/night coverage

Cheeky THINX 

Closest to the "va-voom" of a thong but with more coverage & comfort 

  • The most low-cut in the front around the waist 
  • The least coverage in the back that still maintains superior support
  • Super comfortable stretch-lace waist & leg bands 
  • No muffin-top worries & VERY limited panty lines 
  • Light to medium day/night coverage

THINX by NAVEN

Beautiful high-fashion pair for those who want something special with support and coverage. Limited-edition Kickstarter Exclusive designed by NAVEN, a sought-after designing team in L.A. (did we mention they're also twins?). 

 

  • Higher cut with elasticized waist about 2 inches below belly button
  • High-end stretch-lace sides for superior comfort & beautiful appeal
  • Soft upper band - no muffin top worries & limited panty lines
  • For medium to light day/night coverage

Thong THINX

For those who want the sexiness of a thong with some leak/stain-resistant support. Lace pictured is not the lace that will be used. 

  • The most revealing in the front around the waist
  • The least coverage in the back Super comfortable stretch waist & leg bands 
  • No muffin-top worries & VERY limited panty lines 
  • Lightest day/night coverage

 

Here is the AFRIpad kit that every ONE pair of THINX helps to fund: 

One of the many jobs your purchase of THINX helps to create with our partner AFRIpads in Uganda:

Our Track Record

As three female co-founders who face this issue every single month, we deeply understand the value of this product. 

The team has also already built successful ventures and has a history of disruptive innovation.

THINX was created and co-founded by three entrepreneurial friends (two of whom happen to be identical twin sisters which makes their co-founding friend Antonia's head spin!). Miki is the founder of WILD (www.eatdrinkwild.com), a farm-to-table pizza concept based in NYC (and soon in downtown Vegas), and Radha is the founder of Super Sprowtz (www.supersprowtz.com), a children's media company that inspires kids to lead a healthier and happier life, also based in NYC. Antonia is a PR/Marketing Executive and classically trained cellist who has been overseeing the production, design and operations of THINX for the last two years. 

We're here if you want to reach out!

Check in with us via the comments here, or see us over at www.shethinx.com. We're also always checking service(at)shethinx.com

Thanks for reading, and we're excited to be on this journey together, 

Antonia, Miki & Radha xo

story:
Hi! I’m Kate. I am in seventh grade, and I love fashion.  As the weather gets colder, I realize how lucky I am to have warm clothes. I’m also aware that others are not as fortunate. 


Hats are my favorite accessory. They are fashionable and provide great warmth in the winter. Since approximately 30% of your heat loss goes through your head, it is very important to keep it covered. By purchasing one of my hats, you will also be providing a hat for someone in need.


For every hat that you purchase, I will donate a hat to a local homeless shelter. The hats come in three designs: 


        • communiKate
        • eduKate
        • dediKate


I selected these words because I think they are important to making the world a better place. If we all communiKate, we can understand each other better.  It is important to eduKate yourself in order to make good decisions, and to eduKate those around you by providing a good example for them.  And if you dediKate yourself to your goals, you can overcome challenges and be successful.  So, if you communiKate, eduKate, and dediKate, you and the world around you will benefit!

I hope that over the upcoming winter months, I see many people wearing my hats.  It would be a great success if I did. I will be so happy (and you will too) knowing that for each person I see wearing my hat, there is another person out there, who I do not know, but who is also wearing one and staying warm because of your help.  


Please spread the word about KATe IN THE HAT.  The more hats I sell, the more people will be warm. Post a picture on Instagram or Tweet about it with #KATeINTHEHAT


Thank you so much for your help!   Let’s make a difference together! 


xo Kate

P.S.  Special thanks to Perfect Trading Company for helping me to produce the hats!  

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Perfect-Trading-Co/280251082011360

dediKate

If we all communiKate, we can understand each other better.  It is important to eduKate yourself in order to make good decisions, and to eduKate those around you by providing a good example for them.  And if you dediKate yourself to your goals, you can overcome challenges and be successful.  So, if you communiKate, eduKate, and dediKate, you and the world around you will benefit!
I hope that over the upcoming winter months, I see many people wearing my hats.  It would be a great success if I did. I will be so happy (and you will too) knowing that for each person I see wearing my hat, there is another person out there, who I do not know, but who is also wearing one and staying warm because of your help.  

Please spread the word about KATe IN THE HAT.  The more hats I sell, the more people will be warm. Post a picture on Instagram or Tweet about it with #KATeINTHEHAT

Thank you so much for your help!   Let’s make a difference together! 

xo Kate
P.S.  Special thanks to Perfect Trading Company for helping me to produce the hats!  
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Perfect-Trading-Co/280251082011360

story:
Risks and challenges

Why Crowdfunding: 
Launching a new makeup bag comes with substantial order minimums, and with the high quality fabric that we have chosen, this makes the minimums even higher. This campaign will provide the much needed capital to fund our first production run. We want to be able to share Kusshi with the world and we feel that Indiegogo is the best way to do this.

Exchange Policy: 
We want you to be thrilled with your Kusshi! Please contact us if you have any issues with your bag and we will do our best to resolve them. Due to the low prices that we are offering on Indiegogo, we are unable to accept returns. Please note that color tones may vary slightly in the final production run versus the images you see of our sample products.

Risks & Challenges: 
We have been working with our manufacturer and our other partners for many months, testing, training, and refining. We have successfully completed a production run of 200 complete Kusshi samples, and in that process we worked out many of the kinks companies typically have when launching on Indiegogo. We have a commitment from our manufacturer to be able to produce a large number of Kusshi products in time for Christmas delivery, and we have already placed the order. As a result of all this diligence, we are very confident saying we can produce an incredible product and deliver to you in time for Christmas. Despite all this, it is always possible to run into hiccups along the way, and we are committed to open and frequent communication with our beloved backers. We are so excited to be able to share our dream with the world, and we truly appreciate your willingness to help us make it a reality.

story:
│ A B O U T   T H E   L A B E L │

THE LABEL has been invited to showcase its upcoming collection at Vancouver Fashion Week in September. Please show your support and help me promote innovative, refined and ethical designs for women at this event.

My name is Emma O’Rourke and I am an emerging designer from Canberra, Australia. I created THE LABEL in 2015 after completing my Bachelor’s Degree. Through several years of study, I learnt about many of the negative impacts the fashion industry has. It taught me there is a need for emerging designs to not only focus on concept and aesthetics, but the need to consider impact, sustainability and ethics. I have created a label that embodies my drive, my creativity and my determination for an ethical and sustainable fashion industry.

I received my invitation to attend Vancouver Fashion Week in April. My project is bigger than just the final product; THE LABEL is about design, concept, process and commitment to a cause and culture.  My vision is to see a world that thrives on creativity without harm, and success without compromising on value. Each contribution will go towards my registration fee and help me promote THE LABEL’s ethos.  


                              │  P O R T F O L I O   │  I N S T A G R A M  │



                │ W H A T   W E   N E E D   &   W H A T   Y O U ’L L   G E T  │

Every donation helps!

$5800 will be used to cover my registration fee for Vancouver Fashion Week.

Every dollar raised after this amount will assist with the costs of,

·  accommodation;

·  flights;

·  production of the collection, including the purchase of sustainable Australian made fabric, and;

·  Food, travel insurance, incidentals.


                                                 │  T H E   I M P A C T  │

Through my attendance at VFW I hope to influence change and inspire action.  The global apparel industry is an industry that has given rise to a vast range of talented individuals. It has also, unfortunately, proved extremely damaging to the planet and the lives of so many of the 57.8 million people who work within it, for example, through slave labour. I hope to demonstrate to an international audience that there are alternative, innovative solutions to fast fashion.

By highlighting the problems in a large industry and providing solutions through a creative process and hard work, I hope one day to see a world where every day people can choose to be a part of a movement that thrives not just on visual stimulation but on conscious decision making. VFW is a step towards this goal.

Change cannot come to fruition without support and platforms that promote awareness, and this is why Vancouver Fashion Week is vital. VFW has built its model around the support of emerging designers from around the world and prides itself on providing strong platforms for designers across the globe, creating further traction and interest going beyond September. 



                                         │  W H A T   W E   F A C E  │

The fashion industry is extremely competitive, and any emerging designer faces a great deal of challenges when entering the market. This challenge grows greater when designing for ethical production and sustainability – which is how the fast fashion industry has thrived.

The greatest challenge is building a connection between what people wear and the people that made it. It can be so easy to look at the price, but not the true cost of where that item came from.

A brand cannot just be ethical, it has to be something that connects with people. After all, clothing is an expression, visually and otherwise of who we are. THE LABEL understands this and ensures each piece can be innovative and ethical without ever sacrificing on aesthetics.



                                

                                       │  E V E R Y   B I T   C O U N T S  │

All help is greatly appreciated, financial or otherwise, so if you feel you cannot provide financial assistance, spreading the word about the page would be greatly appreciated. It all counts!

Other ways you can help include thinking about the true cost of each garment you buy. Ask yourself who, down the line is paying the price, when you are not?

And remember, this is not just a label, a collection, or a show, it’s a movement!

story:
The Vintage Brown All Leather 48Hr Switch is now available. Simply select the reward level as normal and at the end of the project you will be able to select the colour in the survey that we will send out.

 

 


 

The more time we spend in the workshop beside our craftsmen, the more we appreciate the way the 48Hr Switch is made. Your bag doesn’t just get made, it is literally taken through countless small steps by our craftsmen and with every hour, it slowly gains shape from a simple leather hide to a finished good.

Each handcrafted bag is unique its own way to the one before it, each is imperfectly perfect. We value how your bag is made and we would like to show you just a few of the steps in your bag’s life before it is welcomed into yours.

Feedback from our backers has allowed us to further improve the interior. On top of the padded laptop compartment, we have added a dedicated document pouch allowing you to keep files separate from the main compartment of the bag… no more crumpled edges.

We also designed the interior compartments so that they are just as easily accessible when carrying the 48Hr Switch as a backpack as they are as a briefcase.

 

As passionate photographers, we know how practical it is to have a bag that is adapted to carrying your gear but can also do much more than that, all while blending into your surroundings. The extra camera compartments are ideal for taking your gear on your next adventure and can be easily removed for the overnights stays when maximum space is key.

 

 

We take as much pride in the way our bags are made as the materials they are made from. 

We use premium full grain leather with a semi aniline finish that preserves all the natural qualities of the leather. Each hide is carefully chosen by our craftsmen to best suit the area of the bag which is being used for with most, small natural marks being being included as we believe that these add to the character and uniqueness of each bag. 

The 100% cotton, 20Oz British made, heavy weight canvas we feel is the ideal material to compliment the leather. With age the cotton canvas will get a rugged appeal which will go hand in hand with the patina of the leather giving it character and unique markings with age. 

 

 

 

 

The 48Hr Switch comes with two detachable straps that can be attached and removed in an instant using the metal carabiners to convert from backpack to messenger or briefcase.

 

 

As a backer of our project, you become part of our team and therefore it is our responsibility to be transparent with you throughout the production process. 

We want you to see and be by our side at every significant step from the point our campaign reaches its goal, to the moment the parcel is delivered to your door step. 

That is why, just as we did in our previous project, we want to assure you that we will keep you in the loop with regular updates. Below are some of the comments from our previous Kickstarter project, the 48Hr Classic.
story_txt:
The Vintage Brown All Leather 48Hr Switch is now available. Simply select the reward level as normal and at the end of the project you will be able to select the colour in the survey that we will send out.      The more time we spend in the workshop beside our craftsmen, the more we appreciate the way the 48Hr Switch is made. Your bag doesn’t just get made, it is literally taken through countless small steps by our craftsmen and with every hour, it slowly gains shape from a simple leather hide to a finished good.Each handcrafted bag is unique its own way to the one before it, each is imperfectly perfect. We value how your bag is made and we would like to show you just a few of the steps in your bag’s life before it is welcomed into yours.Feedback from our backers has allowed us to further improve the interior. On top of the padded laptop compartment, we have added a dedicated document pouch allowing you to keep files separate from the main compartment of the bag… no more crumpled edges.We also designed the interior compartments so that they are just as easily accessible when carrying the 48Hr Switch as a backpack as they are as a briefcase.  

Ever found yourself choosing a bag to go to work or university for its practicality and then almost hiding it under the desk once you got there? The 48Hr Switch is created with both functionality and design in mind. That way you can feel proud and comfortable wherever your day takes you.
  

 

 

 

The first stretch goal is all about comfort. At 60k, we will be introducing an extra wide leather shoulder pad. We thought it would be an ideal starting stretch goal as it is something that all our backers can benefit from. At 5cm, the new leather shoulder pad will provide that extra bit of comfort while maintaining the beautiful simplistic design. 

 

 

 

As designers, we value how products withstand the test of time. We believe in creating products that look just as ‘clean’, unique and contemporary today as they would have looked 30 years ago and as they will do in the future.
We continuously demand more from our goods which is why functionality and practicality were key when designing the Switch bag. The result is a working balance between a discreet exterior and a smart interior.
 

 

One of the most appreciated features by the Kickstarter team of backers from our initial project was the expandable compartment, so it’s definitely here to stay! 

Know that feeling when you pack your bag to the limit and then you find that there is an extra zip that you can open to expand your bag? Inspired by the larger travel luggage, we are bringing this convenient feature to our daily bag.

Because there is no single ideal size, the 48Hr Switch adapts to your needs by expanding 70% from its original size.
 As passionate photographers, we know how practical it is to have a bag that is adapted to carrying your gear but can also do much more than that, all while blending into your surroundings. The extra camera compartments are ideal for taking your gear on your next adventure and can be easily removed for the overnights stays when maximum space is key.  We take as much pride in the way our bags are made as the materials they are made from. We use premium full grain leather with a semi aniline finish that preserves all the natural qualities of the leather. Each hide is carefully chosen by our craftsmen to best suit the area of the bag which is being used for with most, small natural marks being being included as we believe that these add to the character and uniqueness of each bag. The 100% cotton, 20Oz British made, heavy weight canvas we feel is the ideal material to compliment the leather. With age the cotton canvas will get a rugged appeal which will go hand in hand with the patina of the leather giving it character and unique markings with age.     The 48Hr Switch comes with two detachable straps that can be attached and removed in an instant using the metal carabiners to convert from backpack to messenger or briefcase.  As a backer of our project, you become part of our team and therefore it is our responsibility to be transparent with you throughout the production process. We want you to see and be by our side at every significant step from the point our campaign reaches its goal, to the moment the parcel is delivered to your door step. That is why, just as we did in our previous project, we want to assure you that we will keep you in the loop with regular updates. Below are some of the comments from our previous Kickstarter project, the 48Hr Classic.

story:
NobleSole makes luxurious leather sneakers that are artisanally crafted by a family-owned factory in Portugal. Rather than bring yet another minimalist sneaker to market, we set out to create a real footwear solution for today's man. By merging the comfort and wearability of a sneaker with the sensibility of a dress shoe we have created something that looks dressy but wears like a sneaker.

Our brand is about blurring the lines between convention and expression in order to create comfortable yet versatile shoes that can be worn for both business and pleasure. We make shoes for the entrepreneur, the creative and the modern professional - sneakers that are  great looking, multi-purpose, super comfortable and premium quality.

We have streamlined our offering to cover your wardrobe essentials and added a patent leather version for tuxedos (or ripped up jeans and a leather jacket).

 

Monk Strap Unlocked! Available in Black, Chocolate Brown and Oxblood.

Be sure to check the bottom of the page for larger images and styling advice for each colour. 

The Tuxedo Sneaker

What if you could covertly wear a pair of sneakers to work with your suit? And what if you could wear that same pair of sneakers after hours and not look like you just left your suit at work?

Business | Casual

We have designed the Windsor sneaker to simplify your life.  Enabling you to leave your uncomfortable dress shoes at home yet still look professional at work. And when the weekend rolls around, they pair seamlessly with your favourite jeans.

Imagine travelling with everything you need for business and pleasure without wasting valuable time waiting for that extra bag to come off the baggage carousel.  We all know that packing multiple pairs of shoes can be problematic because they take up precious space in your luggage. So what if you could pack your bag for business and pleasure with only 1 pair of shoes?  

Business and Pleasure

The Windsor comes fully equipped with a removable dense foam insole. Designed for maximum comfort, it will mould to the shape of your foot over time. However, if you require an orthotic our insoles easily slide out so you can comfortably wear the shoe without compromising your health or safety. No more sizing up or hoping the shoe will stretch enough to be comfortable.

To achieve this type of versatility in a sneaker we had to make a couple of changes to the traditional silhouette. 

A regular sneaker vs. the Windsor

Starting from the ground up, the first change we made was to the sole. Rather than use the same sole that every other sneaker company uses, we selected one with a slightly tapered toe. The taper not only references the silhouette of a fine dress shoe but also nicely complements modern menswear silhouettes. Next we reduced the number of laces to give the shoe a clean profile. And as a finishing touch we added an elegant perforated medallion to the toe.  

All of our leathers are sourced from the best Italian tanneries and the shoes manufactured byartisanal, family-owned factories in Portugal's shoe corridor. We're proud of the quality craftsmanship that goes into our shoes think you will be pleased with them too.

   

        

                   

We're ambitious and want to offer a wide selection of colours and styles to our backers. However, we're also realistic so we have carefully selected some milestones that will enable us to offer more variety to our backers.      

The founder of NobleSole, Patrick Cornish has worked in footwear and fashion industries for over a decade. Patrick has always had a passion for fashion and design, long before he attended design school in Montreal, Canada. Throughout his career, Cornish has worked with brands creating a vast range of fashion as well as functional footwear and apparel. Aside from his passion for designing and manufacturing sneakers, Patrick has had the opportunity to craft footwear for iconic celebrities and numerous private label collections.

story:
Here's what happened, I've had a long standing interest in eyewear and sustainable materials. Bamboo, growing at almost 3 feet per day, is probably the most sustainable product available so I set about to make some "sustainable style" for myself. It proved trickier than first imagined, but I got my pair of new shades. 

When friends said they wanted a pair too, I set about figuring how to get shades for all. Getting a production run made is expensive (about 10K all together). We've got the manufacturing partner all set up and want to get Bamboo Eyewear to everyone. Here's a chance to be a "founder", and get a great pair of shades cheap (we've spoken with retailers and they'll go for $90 in stores, and that's just the base model).

"Crowdfunding"was suggested as a means of inviting my friends and the rest of the world to help get a small biz off the ground. We've set a modest goal to offset some of the production run and ensure everyone can get a pair before they are in shops. 

In return for your contribution we've got 'perks'! Ranging from 'props' to a pair cool shades and cases just in time for summer. Four styles, two stains, three lenses (including Polarized!). If you support, let us know your preferred style, colour and lens. We'll do our best to get you your first choice.  

Thanks for you consideration.

CorvusFittings.com and Jamie Bennett

PS - We've got options to include SHIPPING. POLARIZED LENSES and BAMBOO CASES so have a look at each pledge level for details. The summary is that POLARIZED LENSES are $10 extra, BAMBOO CASE another $10 and SHIPPING in CANADA starts at $14 (it's a 'package', if you're INTERNATIONAL we can work something out). 

The Perks have to bundled together on IndieGoGo (I asked if there were other options but not as of yet).

story:
Introducing the Ideka 2

A year after we introduced our first wallet to kickstarter, we're back with a new wallet with an array of new features. When designing the Ideka 2, we wanted to keep all the features of the first wallet as well as some new features. Lastly, we wanted it to have a low profile while maintaining all it's features. 

FEATURES

Quickly pull and identify your cards in the main compartment.

With a full zipper and multiple different pockets, you can customize the wallet to your own preferences depending on the level of accessibility you prefer.

                                        MULTIPLE CASH & CARD CARRY OPTIONS

Lastly, we wanted it to have a low profile while maintaining all it's features. FEATURESQuickly pull and identify your cards in the main compartment.
With a full zipper and multiple different pockets, you can customize the wallet to your own preferences depending on the level of accessibility you prefer.

                                        MULTIPLE CASH & CARD CARRY OPTIONS

story:
¿PORQUÉ SEA SOCIETY.?

 

 

Nacemos con una clara misión en mente: crear una alternativa de moda de baño fabricada a partir de tejidos 100% reciclados. Nuestros productos son para hombre pero no descartamos la introducción en la moda femenina en un futuro. 

 

En Sea Society no podemos hacerlo solos.

Necesitamos tu colaboración para luchar contra la eliminación de los plásticos que terminan en nuestras costas. Somos un equipo de tres jóvenes emprendedores que encontramos la solución para dar una segunda vida útil a estos residuos plásticos. Las siguientes generaciones sufrirán las consecuencias de esta nueva crisis ambiental si no reaccionamos AHORA. ¡Vivir en un ambiente sano es posible: de nosotros depende!

¿Quieres formar parte del cambio?

¡Únete a Sea Society.!

 

¿CUÁL ES NUESTRA HISTORIA?

 

SEA SOCIETY. fue fundada por Alex Peña, Pep Generó y Laia Xu en Barcelona con el principal objetivo de convertir su pasión, la moda, para crear un mundo más sostenible y generar consciencia de cambio. De aquí proviene el nombre del proyecto, pretendemos formar una comunidad solidaria para promover el cambio.

 

Todo empezó cuando nos cruzamos y empezamos a estudiar nuestra carrera LEINN (Liderazgo, Emprendimiento e Innovación), Dicho título se basa en tres fundamentos: aprender haciendo, emprender en equipo y viajes de aprendizaje internacionales.

 

 

Además, como parte de la carrera, dirigimos una empresa sin ánimo de lucro creada por nosotros, donde desarrollamos proyectos empresariales reales, y como socios, compartimos el objetivo de resolver problemas ambientales y sociales que llevamos tiempo sufriendo, y cada vez son más visibles, de aquí surgió, nuestro proyecto de moda sostenible.

 

Empezamos a pensar que podíamos hacer para dar el primer paso de la aceleración del proceso de transformación hacia la sostenibilidad. Además de decidir que nuestra iniciativa tenia que estar relacionada con la moda, el mar y la sostenibilidad, y por ello, a parte de vender un producto sostenible, nuestra visión es hacer varios eventos relacionados con la sostenibilidad para generar una comunidad que este involucrada y impulsar el cambio. Pretendemos “concienciar con acciones” y ya estamos sobre la marcha, organizando puntos de recogida de plásticos.

 

NUESTROS PRODUCTOS 

 

Porque sabemos que queréis algo diferente, nuestros bañadores están diseñados con detalle, contamos con un patrón índico que se adapta perfectamente al estilismo masculino. Con cada uno de nuestros bañadores, estás ayudando a limpiar nuestros océanos, además de apostar por la moda ética y sostenible. 

Nuestros bañadores hechos a partir de botellas de plástico reciclado post consumo han sido creados en base a la lucha contra la grave situación en la que nos encontramos. De esta manera, queremos ser recordados como una empresa que ha contribuido en lo posible al cambio hacia un mundo más sostenible.

En esta campaña, hemos incluido 2 diseños chulísimos de nuestra colección. Sea Society. pone su sello en dos diseños básicos depurados de estilo casual.


BAÑADOR MELVA 

Bañador azul marino con el logo de Sea Society. Elaborado a partir de botellas de plástico encontradas en el mar, se procesan para convertirse en ecoyarn 100% reciclado.  Este proceso ahorra agua y energía, reduciendo así las emisiones de gas de efecto invernadero.

BAÑADOR PARGO

Bañador rojo con el logo de Sea Society. Elaborado a partir de botellas de plástico encontradas en el mar, se procesan para convertirse en ecoyarn 100% reciclado.  Este proceso ahorra agua y energía, reduciendo así las emisiones de gas de efecto invernadero.

 

TALLAS

 

 

EL PROCESO

1) Nosotros y nuestra comunidad recojemos plástico de las playas.

2) El plástico se limpia y separa. Una vez limpias, se trocean. 

3) Una vez tenemos el plástico troceado lo derretimos y lo convertimos en pepitas.

4) A través de un proceso de extrusión y texturizado, conseguimos crear un hilo de alta calidad de 100% plástico reciclado.

 

 

RECOMPENSAS

 

#RECOMPENSA 1 (5 €) 

- Una carta de agradecimiento del equipo se SEA SOCIETY.

- Una guía para ser más sostenible en tu día día.

 

#RECOMPENSA 2 (20 €)

- Una carta de agradecimiento del equipo se SEA SOCIETY.

- Una guía para ser más sostenible en tu día día.

- Libreta personalizada de la marca AEDRA (las libretas están hechas de papel de piedra no utiliza árboles, ni agua, ni cloro ni PVC; en cambio es resistente, impermeable, lavable y de tacto suave. Así pensamos que era el material perfecto que podía reflejar y transmitir con coherencia nuestro mensaje de diseño y sostenibilidad.)

https://aedrashop.es/pages/nuestra-filosofia

Instagram: @libretas_aedra

 

#RECOMPENSA 3 (35 €)

- Una carta de agradecimiento del equipo se SEA SOCIETY.

- Una guía para ser más sostenible en tu día día.

- Libreta personalizada de la marca AEDRA (las libretas están hechas de papel de piedra no utiliza árboles, ni agua, ni cloro ni PVC; en cambio es resistente, impermeable, lavable y de tacto suave. Así pensamos que era el material perfecto que podía reflejar y transmitir con coherencia nuestro mensaje de diseño y sostenibilidad.)

https://aedrashop.es/pages/nuestra-filosofia

@libretas_aedra

- Un 50% de descuento en la página web.

 

#RECOMPENSA 4 (50 €)

- Una carta de agradecimiento del equipo se SEA SOCIETY.

- Una guía para ser más sostenible en tu día día.

- Libreta personalizada de la marca AEDRA (las libretas están hechas de papel de piedra no utiliza árboles, ni agua, ni cloro ni PVC; en cambio es resistente, impermeable, lavable y de tacto suave. Así pensamos que era el material perfecto que podía reflejar y transmitir con coherencia nuestro mensaje de diseño y sostenibilidad.)

https://aedrashop.es/pages/nuestra-filosofia

@libretas_aedra

- El fantástico bañador de SEA SOCIETY.

 

 #RECOMPENSA 5 (90 €)

- Una carta de agradecimiento del equipo se SEA SOCIETY.

- Una guía para ser más sostenible en tu día día.

- Libreta personalizada de la marca AEDRA (las libretas están hechas de papel de piedra no utiliza árboles, ni agua, ni cloro ni PVC; en cambio es resistente, impermeable, lavable y de tacto suave. Así pensamos que era el material perfecto que podía reflejar y transmitir con coherencia nuestro mensaje de diseño y sostenibilidad.)

https://aedrashop.es/pages/nuestra-filosofia

@libretas_aedra

-Dos bañadores SEA SOCIETY.

 

¿A qué destinaremos las aportaciones?

Vuestras aportaciones irán destinadas a cubrir los gastos de una primera edición de, al menos, 240 unidades. Además, necesitaremos cubrir una serie de gastos administrativos, costes de envío y paquetería (que será vegetal y 100% libre de plástico).

Una pequeña parte de vuestras aportaciones irá encaminada a la innovación e investigación. Queremos poder ofreceros en el futuro otro tipo de prendas. 

¡Esto es sólo el principio!

Fechas estimadas de entrega

Recibirás tus bañadores y otras recompensas entre el mes de junio y julio, antes de las vacaciones de verano.

Aquí te dejamos un calendario para que veas todo de un vistazo (también lo que ya hemos recorrido, ¡porque estamos muy orgullosos de ello!).

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

TENEMOS SÓLO 26 DÍAS PARA CONSEGUIRLO

 

¡Te necesitamos!

Hemos puesto muchísima ilusión y ganas en que este proyecto salga adelante, y que sea una realidad dependiente de ti. Tenemos sólo 26 días para lograr nuestro objetivo. Con tu ayuda, podremos dar este primer gran paso, pero te prometemos que esto es sólo el principio.

¡Hazte con tu recompensa!

Si quieres estar en contacto con nosotr @s y enterarte de todo lo que hacemos antes que nadie, síguenos en redes sociales:

Síguenos en Instagram @seasociety_

Si tienes cualquier duda, también puedes ponerte en contacto con nosotros en sea.society.lab@gmail.com o enviándonos un mensaje privado a través de Instagram. 

¡Gracias!

story:
LOWKEY CO is a movement empowering individual's to take a step away from their everyday lives to discover the unknown. #LIVELOWKEY

 

With so many brands of watches on the market, how could we be the difference? We worked tirelessly to create a product with more value & meaning than other brands, something that could be a constant reminder of the adventurous spirit within every one of our backers.

The soil in our timepiece is from the EXACT centre of Australia, you will hear some arguments about the location of the centre of the country because of the different ways of calculating it.

Currently, there are five points in Australia that have been called the 'calculated centres' The Government has decided that the title goes to the middle point of those five measurements, meaning Erldunda is the 'Centre of the Centre' which is where our red soil is from.

 

Our vision is to continue to focus our love of Australia and passion for adventure as inspiration to create unique, stylish reliable timepieces for like minded individuals who aren't afraid to take the road less travelled. 

If funded, we will begin work on our second release straight away. For this model, we plan to head to the iconic Great Barrier Reef of Australia. We will collect white sand from the pristine beaches and include this in the watch along with a whole new colour way, but not only this, the reef is dying. 

There has been a 50% decline in corals across the reef in the past 2 years. We will produce a whole new video creating more awareness for this situation, and we will also give a percentage of proceeds from this model to charity. Ultimately, as a brand we want to create awareness & give back to charities supporting the sustenance of Australia's beautiful wildlife & landscapes. But hey, we need to get off the ground first!

 

 

These funds will cover the costs of manufacturing, marketing & distributing the initial run of timepieces. To thank you, we are offering some exciting discounts on the Heart of Australia timepiece.
 

We thought long & hard about a design that could be a great fit for all genders. We didn’t want to put a label on it ‘male or female' so we've found the perfect face size of 40mm. We have created a watch for the Adventurer. An individual, who is passionate about what they’re doing and where they are going in life. A fashionable ‘unisex’ timepiece that can look beautiful in both a casual & professional setting.


If we get funded, we can get feedback from YOU, to constantly improve & update our timepieces, bring out more models & grow TOGETHER.

 

 

In addition to making a monetary contribution, you can show your support for LOWKEY CO by sharing our campaign link on any social media platforms you use. Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram are all excellent places for spreading the word about the Heart of Australia Timepiece. All your support, both monetary & non-monetary, is sincerely appreciated. We thank you for taking the time to read about this new business we are launching!

 

Risks and challenges

The challenges of LOWKEY CO will be communicating with our audience, getting the word out there & helping people realise what we are all about. With so many great watch brands, it's a very saturated market, we home we can stand out and inspire others. To reach as many people as possible, we are asking friends, families, and various blogs to help spread the word.

If the KickStarter campaign is successful the challenge will be producing on a large scale. We've visited multiple factories with our designs to find a factory that had both quality & experience, someone who could also cater for our recessed cavity design.

story:
Our Bikini Story

After 10 years of looking for the perfect bikini, I did not find one that flattered or complemented my body. Often the briefs were cut for women who did not have a bigger belly, which meant that it did not cover me well or stay up with movement. It was uncomfortable and often embarrassing to constantly be moving it around. 

Therefore I decided I had to fix this by creating a range of bikinis designed for curve and plus-size women. Girl Got Curves bikinis are designed for women who want innovative sizing with a comfortable fit, that combines the latest quality swimwear fabric to provide lightweight and outstanding support.

 

The Bikinis

The Girl Got Curves bikini brief has been designed to flatter, highlight and enhance your curves. The mid-waist cut and wider waist band makes you feel covered in the right places and stops the need to rearrange the brief. We have carefully placed ruching in the centre to enhance your natural shape. The top of the brief is fashionable and on-trend with a V shape, while the bottom is a Brazilian cut which shows off your curves. 

Our bikini tops have been designed with larger cup sizes in mind to ensure full coverage but keeping a fashionable look. Our tops can be tied in two ways, either traditional halter neck or, for comfortable all day wearing for larger cups, it can be tied in a 'bra' style.

Our bikinis tops come in two styles: 

  • A Single strap traditional look available in red, black and white 
  • A Double strap for a more exciting look available in pink and blue

We make one style of brief designed to match and compliment both tops. Briefs are available in all colours so you can mix & match.

 

 

The Sizes

All bikinis items come in UK sizes 14, 16, 18, 20, 22 and 24.

Prices

At launch our prices will be:

  • Brief - £25
  • Single and Double strap tops - £30
  • Bikini Set (mixed or matching colour) and style - £50

If you support us through this campaign today, you will be receiving your items with up to 20% discount and will be one of the first owners of a Girl Got Curves bikini. 

 

Our Mission

Girl Got Curves wants to give women the confidence to wear a bikini, no matter their size or shape. Like us, we want women to love their bodies and feel comfortable showing them off on holiday, knowing that our bikinis are designed around strong women with real bodies. After speaking to over 200 women about their bikini choices, or rather the lack of them, we understood their reality and their need for a well-fitting, fashionable bikini.

Often bikinis made for plus-size women are high-wasted, designed to cover the entire tummy area. Although we understand this is some women's preference, we want to change plus-size women's idea that they can only wear a bikini that hides their body. We think all women’s bodies are beautiful and want to give curve and plus-size women a new option in swimwear. 

 

Sustainability

We have chosen to minimise our carbon foot print as we know the damage the fashion industry can do to the environment. After successful local pre-production sampling we found we could do all bikini manufacturing and production of tags and labels in the UK. Our performance fabric is currently from Italy but we intend to source from the UK if, and when, this becomes possible. 

 

What the money will be used for

After a personal investment of £5,000 it enabled Girl Got Curves to design and create our first bikini prototype, produce a number of samples and establish our website. Now we need your help to create our first batch of bikinis to sell. The majority of the money raised will be used to manufacture in the UK, ready in time for summer. Part of the money will be used to develop our bikinis further and create more innovative designs. The remainder of the money will be used to complete our mission by enabling us to visit local schools to educate young girls on body positivity and encourage them to challenge the conventional view of what defines beauty.

 

Keep up with us

Instagram: @GirlGotCurves.Bikinis

Facebook: @GirlGotCurves

Pinterest: GirlGotCurves

Website: www.girlgotcurves.com

 

We feel what you wear on the beach is an important part of feeling great and that feeling great is one reasons for going on holiday in the first place!
story_txt:
Our Bikini Story
After 10 years of looking for the perfect bikini, I did not find one that flattered or complemented my body. Often the briefs were cut for women who did not have a bigger belly, which meant that it did not cover me well or stay up with movement. It was uncomfortable and often embarrassing to constantly be moving it around. 
Therefore I decided I had to fix this by creating a range of bikinis designed for curve and plus-size women. Girl Got Curves bikinis are designed for women who want innovative sizing with a comfortable fit, that combines the latest quality swimwear fabric to provide lightweight and outstanding support.
 



The Bikinis
The Girl Got Curves bikini brief has been designed to flatter, highlight and enhance your curves. The mid-waist cut and wider waist band makes you feel covered in the right places and stops the need to rearrange the brief. We have carefully placed ruching in the centre to enhance your natural shape. The top of the brief is fashionable and on-trend with a V shape, while the bottom is a Brazilian cut which shows off your curves. 
Our bikini tops have been designed with larger cup sizes in mind to ensure full coverage but keeping a fashionable look. Our tops can be tied in two ways, either traditional halter neck or, for comfortable all day wearing for larger cups, it can be tied in a 'bra' style.
Our bikinis tops come in two styles: 

A Single strap traditional look available in red, black and white 
A Double strap for a more exciting look available in pink and blue

We make one style of brief designed to match and compliment both tops. Briefs are available in all colours so you can mix & match.

 

 
The Sizes
All bikinis items come in UK sizes 14, 16, 18, 20, 22 and 24.


Prices
At launch our prices will be:

Brief - £25
Single and Double strap tops - £30
Bikini Set (mixed or matching colour) and style - £50

If you support us through this campaign today, you will be receiving your items with up to 20% discount and will be one of the first owners of a Girl Got Curves bikini. 


 
Our Mission
Girl Got Curves wants to give women the confidence to wear a bikini, no matter their size or shape. Like us, we want women to love their bodies and feel comfortable showing them off on holiday, knowing that our bikinis are designed around strong women with real bodies. After speaking to over 200 women about their bikini choices, or rather the lack of them, we understood their reality and their need for a well-fitting, fashionable bikini.
Often bikinis made for plus-size women are high-wasted, designed to cover the entire tummy area. Although we understand this is some women's preference, we want to change plus-size women's idea that they can only wear a bikini that hides their body. We think all women’s bodies are beautiful and want to give curve and plus-size women a new option in swimwear. 
 
Sustainability
We have chosen to minimise our carbon foot print as we know the damage the fashion industry can do to the environment. After successful local pre-production sampling we found we could do all bikini manufacturing and production of tags and labels in the UK. Our performance fabric is currently from Italy but we intend to source from the UK if, and when, this becomes possible. 
 
What the money will be used for
After a personal investment of £5,000 it enabled Girl Got Curves to design and create our first bikini prototype, produce a number of samples and establish our website. Now we need your help to create our first batch of bikinis to sell. The majority of the money raised will be used to manufacture in the UK, ready in time for summer. Part of the money will be used to develop our bikinis further and create more innovative designs. The remainder of the money will be used to complete our mission by enabling us to visit local schools to educate young girls on body positivity and encourage them to challenge the conventional view of what defines beauty.
 
Keep up with us
Instagram: @GirlGotCurves.Bikinis
Facebook: @GirlGotCurves
Pinterest: GirlGotCurves
Website: www.girlgotcurves.com
 
We feel what you wear on the beach is an important part of feeling great and that feeling great is one reasons for going on holiday in the first place!

story:
RecycleDot S is the smartest piece of furniture ever produced. Beside the fact that every product is handmade, the most unique characteristic of the RecycleDot S tabouret is its ability to interact with the user. This exclusive tabouret offers features meant to revolutionize the furniture industry. Another appealing factor of this tabouret is the interesting combination between a rustic furniture and the 21st century technology. This variation will make RecycleDot S tabouret so special and unique.

RecycleDot S tabourets are made from the following materials: jute rope, pale wood, four adjustable metal legs and recycled tire. Here is the best part; this tabouret will be equipped with high-quality portable Bluetooth speakers!

The Bluetooth speakers will allow you to listen to your favorite music from a Smartphone, tablet or any other device which has a Bluetooth function.

What's a party without music? The new daisy-chain capability allows you link the RecycleDot speakers to your own speakers. This fantastic feature enables you to double the speaker sound and  transform it into a wireless one.

This remarkable tabouret also has a presence detector, which automatically illuminates a pleasant blue light when you come within a meter of it. Furthermore, this blue light will turn off when you sit on the tabouret. 

All these great features can be turned on/off by just pushing a nice blue LED light power button.


One of the most amazing things about the RecycleDot S is that it can be moved anywhere you want to go. Due to its rustic style, this tabouret can be placed within any area of your home. It is the perfect piece of furniture for your garden, terrace, apartments or wherever.

When creating these pieces of art, another great and "green" aspect of this project can be highly considered. We will have a peaceful feeling that the used tires, which these tabourets are made of, will not be thrown into nature, where they would definitely cause damage to the natural environment.



The idea of creating this "smart furniture" came to mind, in my garage, where I stored some used tires from my car.  At that time, I had remembered an internet tutorial where a guy explained how many things could be made with a used tire. I decided not to stop at just making a simple tabouret. I wanted to make it smarter, to communicate in one way or another with the user. That way, people would enjoy sitting on it.


                                           RecycleDot tabouret came to life here


The second member of this project is my father. He is the person who helped to advise me with this project and offered many ideas for the RecycleDot S tabouret. Not only that, he is the man behind the development of the electronic components.

 

                

When creating these pieces of furniture, we would be giving people the opportunity to try something new in this field. RecycleDot S is so special because it combines the latest technology integrated into a handmade tabouret that has a rustic style and is made of used tires, which would otherwise pollute our environment.

We didn't stop at just building a single version of a tabouret! We have created  RecycleDot Smart module. It is composed of two tabourets and a smart table. Each tabouret from this module will feature a presence detector that will illuminate with a blue light. The table will also have a presence detector implemented. However, the table will have an amazing white light and  high-quality portable Bluetooth speakers.

 

The RecycleDot S module is for those who want an elegant hand-crafted piece of furniture that definitely changes the atmosphere of the area where it is kept.

So we have two different furniture products, the RecycleDot S tabouret and the RecycleDot S module. As you can see in the images, every product is professionally made and equipped with amazing features which will certainly change our lives.


Our goal is to reduce the number of unused tires that can be recycled and the campaign we put up needs funding to cover for the materials and labor needed to mass produce these fashionable RecycleDot tables and tabourets. 

That's why we've created DIY books and shared our production secret. This way everyone can make it's unique smart furniture from recycled tires, and the same time helping the environment.



Used tires are a real problem in combating pollution. They represent the largest and most problematic sources of waste. This is due to the fact that used tires are produced in a large volume and have a very-low lifetime. More than this, they contain a number of components that are ecologically problematic. According to research, every year around 259 million tires are discarded.

By creating RecycleDot tabourets and tables we will be helping the environment by reducing the number of used tires that will most likely be burned or dumped into nature. So let's reduce the environmental impact of discarded waste as we enjoy the use of these beautiful pieces of art.






Thanks for checking out our IndieGoGo campaign and thanks for supporting! RecycleDot team!


GENERAL

Are RecycleDot products safe?

Yes, RecycleDot products are completely safe.

The tabourets look too good to be true. Are they real?

Yes.

As you can see in the images, the tabourets and the table are real. All the images we've displayed reflects the reality.

When will RecycleDot DIY books ship?

Estimated ship will be February 2015. We will contact you before sending the books.

Is RecycleDot tabouret and table waterproof?

Even if we speak of RecycleDot smart tabouret or RecycleDot module, both are highly weather resistant.

How do I charge the RecycleDot products?

Every RecycleDot Smart tabouret and every table from RecycleDot module comes with a AC/DC adaptor. You can also charge them through the USB port.

If your project doesn't reach the amount you need, I will still receive my DIY book?

Absolutely. We will send the books as promised, even if we haven't gathered the necessary amount. We hope to raise $60.000 in order to create a company that produce such amazing pieces of smart furniture at a large scale.

SHIPPING

Do you ship internationally?

Yes. We will ship our products anywhere in the world that we aren't restricted by law from shipping to. So far I don't know to be any restriction that would prevent us from shipping anywhere. If there is a situation where we can't ship due to some legal restrictions, we can guarantee you that 100% of your amount would be refunded.

How much is shipping going to cost?

We provide FREE Worldwide Shipping.

story:
SHARE IN OUR VISION

Developing the finest Pima Cotton branded apparel is the very heart of our business. Building an apparel manufacturing plant on the tip of a janitor and developing a small team of employees to share in the core values of the company through faith, hard work and commitment to the vision is the foundation of our story. 

REACHING OUR GOAL

GSEA Fashion Group is based in heart of New York City's Fashion District. Our business model is to focus on providing the very best Pima Cotton manufactured apparel products and services to a well-defined market sector in the fashion industry allowing us to develop a cut-to-order direct to consumer vertical operation unlike any other. To accomplish this, we are counting on your support to reach our goal!

WHY INDIEGOGO?

In order to support this development, project-funding is required to make this possible. Like most companies, we have been able to develop what we have on a limited budget, becoming very creative, improvising when needed and building our business literally brick by brick. We invite you to become part of our project; moreover, become an extension of every thread we use to sew each Pima Cotton garment with. Your support will allow GSEA Fashion Group to cover the growth it requires to manufacture its Pima Cotton Branded Apparel and operate to capacity.

SOME OF OUR BRANDED WORK MANUFACTURED IN PIMA COTTON


YOUR SUPPORT

With Your Level of Contribution You Will Receive The Corresponding Style and Size of This Authentic Pima Branded Apparel. Choose Between Your Pima Cotton Tee, Polo, Hoodie, Raglan or Zip Up And Have It All Delivered Right To Your Doorstep! We Appreciate You Taking The Time To Review Our Project and Thank You In Advance For Any Contribution Level as They Are All Important To Us!

story:
Hi everyone! Welcome to the most colorful, sexiest and glamourous Indiegogo campaign for Atiklaman lingerie and swimwear.

                  


                What is Atiklaman?


"Ati Klaman", means " you are beautiful " in " Baoulé", a West-African language. It is a line of feminine lingerie and swimsuit which mixes  the western trends  to colored and original fabrics and accessorizes of Africa. It was launched  in 2013 by Ms Api. 

Atiklaman aims to beautify women, make them feel sexy, appealing   and then   promote to a wide public the wealth of the African fashion through the lingerie and the swimsuit. the era of  fashion only " made in Europe " is over, an emerging time is born the art of mixing materials: An alliance  without complex, and advocating the open-mindedness even for the feminine underwear.

        


Africa is represented in prints  and accessorizes used :   "WAX" printed, african traditional designs, African Jewels, pearls, shells as well as the west with  lace, satin,  microfiber…

     


                                               

               "YOU ARE A QUEEN"

        

 


The slogan of Atiklaman  is:    "You are a QUEEN"

 Because all the women are beautiful and deserve to be highlighted and sublimated.

Our principles and values ​​are summarized in 4 points

1-All women are beautiful : Atiklaman therefore enhances all the beauties and works with models without discrimination of race.

we also make a point of showcasing the beauty of minorities, those not often seen on advertising posters.

2-Quality : Atiklaman also works with quality materials and provide quality products to its customers. Materials are tested before being used .

3-Project manager : Accessories and African jewelry used come directly from Africa . We work with small workshops  for authenticity and as partners to contribute to their economical growth.

4-Solidarity:  Atiklaman also wants to contribute to improving quality of life especially in Africa and to show solidarity. That is why we have decided to support a cause every year through our ongoing operation: 

                               

                                      ONE YEAR, ONE CAUSE

This year, our aid will go to CARE ALBINO CHILDREN, a small Ivorian association wich defends the rights of poor albinos children and helps them by providing, among other, products and accessories for their skin protection, school accessories.

For every purchase of an outfit ( and also here on Indiegogo),Atiklaman will make a donation of $ 3  to  CARE ALBINO CHILDREN

        



       Who? The story of Atiklaman

I’m Api, I am 33 living in a charming city in the Center of France, founder of Atiklaman lingerie.

                                                  


Two years ago,this idea came up,I loved  lingerie and I wanted to make  it differently. I thought:  having a double western and African culture ,Why not take avail on that and get the most out of it? I  dreamed of lingerie which would allow the world to discover the African richness with its amazing conceptions: Bubu, tam-tam, bones in the nose , etc.

           

Then,i was financially down,i nearly had 60 $. bearing in mind that i had no knowIedge whatsoever when it comes to sowing clothes but i was determined,  I realized my first hand made prototypes  with a thread and a needle.

did not know how people would   welcome this new strange and unknown style. But I was delighted  because people loved. It was incredible. They all embraced these warm colors.

Quickly, I enrolled for  special sewing  lingerie class in order to sew the sets  and supply  customers. It was not easy, but I was so passionate and excited that all challenges coming my way were just showers of opportunities and knowledge as they help me documenting my lessons learnt.

Then, I worked with a little Parisian workshop to produce 200 models of the first lingerie collection.
The women felt comfortable, beautiful and sexy in Atiklaman . It was the first satisfaction.

The small collection of 8 models was very well welcomed.

Prices are between 60 and 90$ depending on the model.

Just to say that the request really exists and there is a clientele for this type of product.

Today, The Fan page had almost 2000 fans without any advertising (You know, it is really not easy to sew and advertise at the same time :-)


Atiklaman receives regularly supports and requests from all around the world: North America, Africa, Europe.
I am truly grateful to all those who believed in this project.


  the passion to magnify women

Atiklaman at work . Below, our last  photo shoot  in April with one of our favorite Model , Janet  expecting a baby and our favorite Make up ArtistCrystal .

                                                   Before the shooting, make up time

          

                                                                 The result 

                                       



        Why Atiklaman is on Indiegogo?

                


Today, I wish to give a new run-up to this dream started one year ago by switching to the superior speed. Promote Atiklaman all over the world and be able to dress all the women of all races and all sizes, so that they can have a feel of African's wealth.

The purpose is to improve the quality of products by working with professionals and produce in industrial quantity in order to meet customer demand, improve  the brand value and also attend to national and international events.

An unusual project as Atiklaman is too risky for banks and the necessary amount is very too weak to interest businesses-Angel. that is why I turned to people who really believe in this project.

You, yes YOU can participate in this great challenge and help  make this dream me true. Contribute to the success of this project. t is said that a 1000 miles journey starts with a baby's step, but it is with your help that things can be materialize for good. I need you. Atiklaman needs you to definitely take off.

Alone, I can   only make 10 sets per week.With your help, Atiklaman can produces 500 once  and more and focus on what we do best: Making beautiful designs to beautify women.




                                            The use of fund raised

The objective is to develop and manufacture a first swimsuits collection  for the summer to come , prepare the next collection of lingerie and conduct marketing activities.

 Concretely with $ 20,000 we will:

-Hire a design office to  set up the technical documentation prototypes models swimsuits and lingerie for his next collection,  The lingerie models  will include several sizes from cup A to G. because at the moment  Atiklaman provides only 3 cups (B, C, few D) and hope that all women of all sizes can wear Atiklaman products.

The swimwear collection of this summer will include 10 models too, size S to XXL.

With: 3 Monokinis -1 trikini- 3 bikinis high waisted -3 Bikinis low waisted.


- Produce lingerie and swimwear in a factory in larger quantities to respond to the request.

-to get access to advertising and marketing to promote Atiklaman : Shows, photos, press releases, samples,etc.

                    

           

       What do you earn by supporting                                 Atiklaman?

                     

For all those who decide to trust and  support Atiklaman,  get unique features.

 First, lot of gratitude, the  satisfaction and pride of having contributed to the success of a business and a dream .

By engaging in financing Atiklaman you participate in the success of a company with real values ​​while registering in a sustainable development approach .

then you get uniques perks:  Atiklaman products  at preferential prices for yourself, your friend, family  (it could be a fine gift) or your shop and enjoy advantage of beautiful and original swimsuits   that you will find nowhere else. 

You will look stunning on the beach this summer!

All the contributors will be personally named on the fanpage and the website .Take a look, it's worth it.


You can check here to find your size for swimsuits and bra sets


   

        And now, the ball is your court

                   

Here we are, you know everything. Thank you for having granted  a few minutes of your invaluable time to listen to and read this  project .

 I know that the Indiegogo community is a great community and I rely on you to take up the challenge. Remember that unity is strength. Alone , I can’t do it. Today, You have the power to make the dream Atiklaman become reality. If the Atiklaman project convinced you, just do it.

       If you like Atiklaman, share us!


 Even if you believe that you cannot help in anything,  you can also do something by sharing this project in your circle of friends and in all your social networks. It would be of a great help.

You can use the link provided below the video at the top of the page to invite more people to joins us and also share this tips below.

                         So, be part on it and have a nice day. A très bientôt
